description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesCalledByWarrantsOrRights
description: Number of securities into which the class of warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, 500,000 warrants may be converted into 1,000,000 shares.

name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsIncludingDisposalGroupAndDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEffectiveTaxRate
description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

name: ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit
description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

name: LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount
description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedAndExpectedToVestOutstandingNumber
description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

name: InterestPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalents
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: AmountAvailableForDividendDistributionWithApprovalFromRegulatoryAgencies
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

name: AmountAvailableForDividendDistributionWithoutPriorApprovalFromRegulatoryAgency
description: #N/A

name: ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding
description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

name: BusinessAcquisitionPercentageOfVotingInterestsAcquired
description: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired at the acquisition date in the business combination.

name: RepaymentsOfDebt
description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice1
description: The price per share of the conversion feature embedded in the debt instrument.

name: FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments
description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedShareBasedAwardsOtherThanOptions
description: Amount of cost to be recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: OtherNoncashIncomeExpense
description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

name: AmountOfRegulatoryAssistanceReceived
description: #N/A

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecurities
description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

name: AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), including liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

name: InterestIncomeExpenseNet
description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

name: StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue
description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization
description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForServices
description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

name: StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1
description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AntidilutiveSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

name: TreasuryStockSharesAcquired
description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

name: LeaseAndRentalExpense
description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRatePercent
description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessAmount
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

name: ApplicationOfRecognitionProvisionsOfSFAS158EffectOnAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: EquityMethodInvestments
description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThree
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent
description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

name: TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount
description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResultingFromLapseOfApplicableStatuteOfLimitations
description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

name: BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCosts
description: This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

name: WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutstandingAdjustment
description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

name: LiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInTwoYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod
description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedAndExpectedToVestOutstandingWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

name: AssetManagementCosts
description: #N/A

name: AssetManagementFees
description: #N/A

name: AssetManagementFees1
description: #N/A

name: AssetOrLiabilityFromTransfersOfFinancialAssetsHavingNoReasonableEstimateOfFairValueAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: AssetRecoveryDamagedPropertyCostsCurrent
description: #N/A

name: RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt
description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCashAndEquivalents
description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: FinanceLeaseInterestExpense
description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisitions
description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

name: FairValueAdjustmentOfWarrants
description: Amount of expense (income) related to adjustment to fair value of warrant liability.

name: AssetRetirementObligationForeignCurrencyTranslation
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForServices
description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

name: ProfessionalFees
description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsForfeituresAndExpirationsInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

name: AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

name: PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt
description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

name: AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium
description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

name: SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransaction
description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

name: RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation
description: Amount of transaction price allocated to performance obligation that has not been recognized as revenue.

name: NoncurrentAssets
description: Long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCurrent
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsForfeituresAndExpirationsInPeriod
description: For presentations that combine terminations, the number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan or that expired.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedAndExpectedToVestOutstandingAggregateIntrinsicValue
description: Amount by which current fair value of underlying stock exceeds exercise price of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

name: LongTermDebtFairValue
description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInThreeYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmployer
description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance
description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

name: ShortTermBorrowings
description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockOtherClosedBlockAssets
description: #N/A

name: DividendsCommonStockCash
description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation
description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCost
description: Amount of net periodic benefit cost (credit) for defined benefit plan.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTaxBenefitFromCompensationExpense
description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions
description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

name: DerivativeAssets
description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: AssetsDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleInPeriodOfDispositionGainLossOnDisposition
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxRateDifferential
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

name: RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncludingAssessedTax
description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

name: AssetsFairValueDisclosureNonrecurring
description: #N/A

name: AssetsFairValueDisclosureRecurring
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: AssetsHeldForSaleCapitalLeasedAssetsNet
description: #N/A

name: AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent
description: #N/A

name: AssetsHeldForSaleLongLived
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanInterestCost
description: Amount of cost recognized for passage of time related to defined benefit plan.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxRateDifferential
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

name: ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse
description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

name: RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTransactionsWithRelatedParty
description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleOtherNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: AssetsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: #N/A

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInFourYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedNet
description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the identifiable assets acquired in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from accrued liabilities.

name: AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedGainBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards
description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributableToParent
description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: Amount of asset segregated and restricted to provide benefit under defined benefit plan. Asset includes, but is not limited to, stock, bond, other investment, earning from investment, and contribution by employer and employee.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther
description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

name: OtherIncome
description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

name: AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: AssetsOrLiabilitiesFromTransfersOfFinancialAssetsHavingNoReasonableEstimateOfFairValueCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedLossBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: Amount of intangible assets, excluding goodwill, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToCostAndExpense
description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: RestrictedCash
description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExpirationsInPeriod
description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsYearThree
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsYearTwo
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: RestructuringCharges
description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

name: AssumedPremiumsEarnedAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsEarnedFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsEarnedLife
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsEarnedOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsEarnedPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsLifeInsuranceInForce
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsYearFour
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: AssumedPremiumsWrittenAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsWrittenFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsWrittenLife
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsWrittenOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: AssumedPremiumsWrittenPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationsRecurringBasisLiabilityValue
description: Fair value of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: SellingAndMarketingExpense
description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesWeightedAverageLife
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsYearFive
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersDiluted
description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredGoodwillAndLiabilitiesAssumedNet
description: Amount recognized for assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOnSecuritizationDateOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesWeightedAverageLife
description: #N/A

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesDividendCumulativeUndistributed
description: #N/A

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesPerShare
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions
description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

name: DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingContributionPercent
description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingBenefitObligationDiscountRate
description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesAggregateRedemptionAmount
description: #N/A

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoodwill
description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesParValue
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsOfDividends
description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsFiveFiscalYearsThereafter
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in five fiscal years after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesRateSettingInterval
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromNotesPayable
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesValue
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYearFive
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationBenefitsPaid
description: Amount of payment to participant of defined benefit plan which decreases benefit obligation. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentAssetsReceivables
description: Amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretionaryContributionAmount
description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability
description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibles
description: The amount of identifiable intangible assets recognized as of the acquisition date.

name: StockIssued1
description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

name: OtherLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExpirationsInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultingFromSettlementsWithTaxingAuthorities
description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan
description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

name: TaxesPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts
description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldingGainLossOnSecuritiesArisingDuringPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeStockPurchasePlans
description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of an employee stock purchase plan.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities assumed at the acquisition date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost
description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesChangeInNetUnrealizedHoldingGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesChangeInNetUnrealizedHoldingGainLossNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrincipleInPeriodOfAdoption
description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets, resulting from the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue
description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther
description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedAssets
description: Amount of assets acquired at the acquisition date.

name: TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding
description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Securities outstanding equals securities issued minus securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedInPeriodFairValue1
description: Fair value of options vested. Excludes equity instruments other than options, for example, but not limited to, share units, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedReturnOnPlanAssets
description: Amount of expected return (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit, calculated based on expected long-term rate of return and market-related value of plan assets of defined benefit plan.

name: BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaNetIncomeLoss
description: The pro forma net Income or Loss for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue
description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInFiveYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedStockAwardNetOfForfeitures
description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAmortizedCost
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesFairValue
description: #N/A

name: DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedStockAwardGross
description: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

name: GoodwillForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset representing future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement
description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

name: SubleaseIncome
description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTaxRate
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

name: NotesPayable
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet
description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

name: PaymentsOfFinancingCosts
description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

name: CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid
description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAssets
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

name: InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriod
description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingNetPeriodicBenefitCostExpectedLongTermReturnOnAssets
description: Weighted average rate of return on plan assets, reflecting average rate of earnings expected on existing plan assets and expected contributions, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

name: BusinessAcquisitionEquityInterestsIssuedOrIssuableNumberOfSharesIssued
description: Number of shares of equity interests issued or issuable to acquire entity.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingNetPeriodicBenefitCostDiscountRate
description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThereafter
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RevenueFromRelatedParties
description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

name: PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets
description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWriteOffs
description: Amount of direct write-downs of accounts receivable charged against the allowance.

name: DebtInstrumentFairValue
description: Fair value portion of debt instrument payable, including, but not limited to, notes payable and loans payable.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit of defined benefit plan.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossGainsDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossGainsLossesNetDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossLossesDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChangeInEnactedTaxRate
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

name: RepaymentsOfNotesPayable
description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedGainsLossesSaleProceeds
description: #N/A

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingContributionPercentOfMatch
description: Percentage employer matches of the employee's percentage contribution matched.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransaction
description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedLosses
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedLosses1
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureNumberOfPositions
description: #N/A

name: ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesCalledByEachWarrantOrRight
description: Number of securities into which each warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, each warrant may be converted into two shares.

name: RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFinanceLeaseLiability
description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesIncomeTaxExpenseOnChangeInUnrealizedHoldingGainOrLoss
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability
description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesPledgedAsCollateral
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesShortTermInvestmentsAmortizedCost
description: #N/A

name: StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodShares
description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

name: AssetsNoncurrent
description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset
description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAggregateLosses1
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAggregateLosses2
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAggregateLosses1
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAggregateLosses2
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAggregateLosses1
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAggregateLosses2
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNumberOfAdditionalSharesAuthorized
description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsBenefitsPaid
description: Amount of payment to participant under defined benefit plan which decreases plan assets. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

name: LaborAndRelatedExpense
description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGain
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGainLoss1
description: #N/A

name: InventoryFinishedGoods
description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets
description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangements
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

name: MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByParent
description: The parent entity's interest in net assets of the subsidiary, expressed as a percentage.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapacity
description: Amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

name: NotesPayableCurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationLiability
description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesRestrictedCurrent
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesRestrictedNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremiumAndDebtIssuanceCostsNet
description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

name: AverageBalanceDuringPeriodOfLoansHeldInPortfolio
description: #N/A

name: AverageBalanceDuringPeriodOfLoansManagedAndSecuritized
description: #N/A

name: AverageBalanceDuringPeriodOfLoansSecuritized
description: #N/A

name: ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1
description: The number of shares converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: AverageProductionCostsPerBarrelOfOilEquivalentsBOE
description: #N/A

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount1
description: The value of the financial instrument(s) that the original debt is being converted into in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: InterestPaid
description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStockIssuedIssuanceCosts
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from direct costs associated with issuing stock. Includes, but is not limited to, legal and accounting fees and direct costs associated with stock issues under a shelf registration.

name: DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage
description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsInventory
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

name: InventoryFinishedGoodsNetOfReserves
description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarrantIssued
description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from the issuance of warrants. Includes allocation of proceeds of debt securities issued with detachable stock purchase warrants.

name: BankingFeesAndCommissions
description: #N/A

name: DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

name: StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorizedRepurchaseAmount1
description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltiesAndInterestExpense
description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

name: RestructuringReserve
description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants
description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesIssued1
description: The number of shares issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or payments in the period.

name: ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived
description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingCapitalNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets after deduction of operating liabilities classified as other.

name: ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeCurrentPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedNumberOfShares
description: Number of options vested.

name: MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistributionsToNoncontrollingInterestHolders
description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

name: InventoryWriteDown
description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

name: CashFDICInsuredAmount
description: The amount of cash deposited in financial institutions as of the balance sheet date that is insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentLiabilitiesAccountsPayable
description: Amount of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables, assumed at the acquisition date.

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod
description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseShareBasedCompensationCost
description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfClaimsOnMaterialContractsRejected
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAssets
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

name: InvestmentsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of investment securities, including, but not limited to, marketable securities, derivative financial instruments, and investments accounted for under the equity method.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsDeferredIncome
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred income.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsRiskFreeInterestRateMinimum
description: The minimum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

name: StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodValue
description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedOtherNoncurrentAssets
description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: AccountsReceivableNet
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

name: PaymentsForRestructuring
description: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsRiskFreeInterestRateMaximum
description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

name: FinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired1
description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets, lacking physical substance with a definite life, from an acquisition.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

name: NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurrent
description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebt
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferredEquityInterestsIssuedAndIssuable
description: Amount of equity interests of the acquirer, including instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityGainLossIncludedInEarnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsAllowanceForDoubtfulAccounts
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

name: InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVentures
description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardSharesIssuedInPeriod
description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

name: PaymentsToAcquireInvestments
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansAdjustmentNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxLiabilities
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences assumed at the acquisition date.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpense
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommitmentFeePercentage
description: The fee, expressed as a percentage of the line of credit facility, for available but unused credit capacity under the credit facility.

name: DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualContributionsPerEmployeePercent
description: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedStockAwardNetOfForfeitures
description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits
description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

name: PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage
description: The percentage rate used to calculate dividend payments on preferred stock.

name: BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice
description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks paid or offered to be paid in a business combination.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to employee service rendered, excluding assumptions about future compensation level.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: IncomeTaxesReceivable
description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

name: DeferredOfferingCosts
description: Specific incremental costs directly attributable to a proposed or actual offering of securities which are deferred at the end of the reporting period.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

name: BorrowedFunds
description: #N/A

name: BorrowingsToFinanceLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardPurchasePriceOfCommonStockPercent
description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

name: ShortTermInvestments
description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

name: BrokerDealerSecuritiesOwnedNotReadilyMarketableAtEstimatedFairValue
description: #N/A

name: StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversionRatio1
description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

name: BrokeredNaturalGasMarginCosts
description: #N/A

name: BrokeredNaturalGasMarginRevenue
description: #N/A

name: GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderationAtFairValue
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderationAtFairValueCurrent
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderationAtFairValueNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderationPotentialCashPayment
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderationSharesIssuable
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityCashPaid
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityEquityInterestsIssuedAndIssuable
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityLiabilitiesIncurred
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityOtherNoncashConsideration
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityPlannedRestructuringActivities
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityPurchasePrice
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithinOneYearFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BusinessAcquisitionEquityInterestIssuedOrIssuableNumberOfSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCredit
description: Amount of prior service cost (credit) recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill
description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

name: AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

name: BusinessAcquisitionPreacquisitionContingencyAmount
description: #N/A

name: DeferredRevenueCurrent
description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

name: BusinessAcquisitionPreexistingRelationshipGainLossRecognized
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStockPurchasePlan
description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeChangesInAccountingAndExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.

name: TemporaryEquitySharesIssued
description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been sold (or granted) to the entity's shareholders. Securities issued include securities outstanding and securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaNetIncomeLoss
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaRevenue
description: #N/A

description: Number of shares used to settle grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwardsStateAndLocal
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible state and local operating loss carryforwards.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetNet
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLosses
