name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorOtherCashFlowsReceivedOnRetainedInterests
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorProceedsFromCollectionsReinvestedInRevolvingPeriodSecuritizations
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorProceedsFromNewlySecuritizedAssets
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorPurchasesOfDelinquentOrForeclosedAssets
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorServicingAdvances
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPurposeEntitySPEAndTransferorServicingFeesReceived
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossBeforeReclassificationAndTax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: TemporaryEquityRedemptionPricePerShare
description: Amount to be paid per share that is classified as temporary equity by entity upon redemption. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt
description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanUltimateHealthCareCostTrendRate1
description: Ultimate trend rate for health care cost for defined benefit postretirement plan.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

name: AccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities.

name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet
description: Fair value of the assets less the liabilities of a derivative or group of derivatives.

name: CashForLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseOther
description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

name: CashPaidForCapitalizedInterest
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlansWithAccumulatedBenefitObligationsInExcessOfPlanAssetsAggregateFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: Amount of plan asset for defined benefit plan with accumulated benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

name: AccountsPayableTradeCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet
description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: CashProvidedByUsedInDiscontinuedOperationsFinancingActivities
description: #N/A

name: CashProvidedByUsedInDiscontinuedOperationsInvestingActivities
description: #N/A

name: CashProvidedByUsedInDiscontinuedOperationsOperatingActivities
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForSaleOfSecuritiesNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

name: RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt
description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationEarningsOrLossOfAcquireeSinceAcquisitionDateActual
description: This element represents the amount of earnings or loss of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated income statement for the reporting period.

name: DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposal
description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

name: AccruedSalariesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AreaOfLand
description: Area of land held.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfDiscontinuedOperation
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, tax expense (benefit) related to income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on disposal, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and tax expense (benefit) related to adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

name: AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesFromTransactionsWithRelatedParty
description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

name: GuaranteeObligationsMaximumExposure
description: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

name: CasinoExpenses
description: #N/A

name: CasinoRevenue
description: #N/A

name: CausesOfIncreaseDecreaseInLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseAmount
description: #N/A

name: CededCreditRiskAmount
description: #N/A

name: CededCreditRiskClaimsLossAdjustmentExpenseIncurred
description: #N/A

name: CededCreditRiskClaimsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: CededCreditRiskOtherRisks
description: #N/A

name: CededCreditRiskPremiumsEarned
description: #N/A

name: LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPeriod
description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

name: CededPremiumsEarnedAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsEarnedFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsEarnedLife
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsEarnedOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsEarnedPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsLifeInsuranceInForce
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentIncomeNet
description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

name: RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt
description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

name: CededPremiumsWrittenAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsWrittenFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsWrittenLife
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsWrittenOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsWrittenPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYield
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAccretion
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAdditions
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldDisposalsOfLoans
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsFromNonaccretableDifference
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsToNonaccretableDifference
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedContractCostNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossBeforeReclassificationAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansTax
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan.

name: OtherNonoperatingExpense
description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

name: EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensation
description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesArisingDuringPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncentiveAndShareBasedCompensationPlansIncludingStockOptions
description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceivableNet
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current liabilities classified as other.

name: ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNetOfTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdTradingDays
description: Threshold number of specified trading days that common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments must exceed threshold percentage within a specified consecutive trading period to trigger conversion feature.

name: FederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperations
description: Amount of current and deferred federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current and deferred national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases
description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedFiveYears
description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedCompensationGross
description: Number, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits
description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period deposits balances.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsNonvestedOptionsForfeitedWeightedAverageGrantDateFairValue
description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options forfeited.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCharges
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

name: SecuredDebt
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldToMaturityDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldDisposalsOfLoans
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldToMaturityDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsWeightedAverageVolatilityRate
description: Rate of weighted-average expected volatility for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShareBasedCompensationExcessTaxBenefitAmount
description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: ImpairmentOfInvestments
description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

name: LitigationSettlementExpense
description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedThereafter
description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwardsNotSubjectToExpiration
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.

name: GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax
description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

name: PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsNonvestedOptionsForfeitedNumberOfShares
description: Number of non-vested options forfeited.

name: AreaOfRealEstateProperty
description: Area of a real estate property.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationContributionsByPlanParticipant
description: Amount of contributions received by defined benefit plan from participant which increase benefit obligation.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetGainLossIncludedInEarnings1
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfUnits
description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

name: AvailableForSaleSecurities
description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.

name: FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluatedForImpairment
description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

name: CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities of discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

name: IncomeTaxReceivable
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

name: PaymentsForRent
description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

name: AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: CashAndDueFromBanks
description: For banks and other depository institutions: Includes cash on hand (currency and coin), cash items in process of collection, noninterest bearing deposits due from other financial institutions (including corporate credit unions), and noninterest bearing balances with the Federal Reserve Banks, Federal Home Loan Banks and central banks.

name: DecreaseInUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIsReasonablyPossible
description: Amount of decrease reasonably possible in the next twelve months for the unrecognized tax benefit.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment
description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassificationBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerAsset
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRelatedParty
description: Purchases during the period (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAllowanceForLoanLossesDecreases
description: #N/A

name: SecurityDeposit
description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsCapitalLossCarryforwards
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible capital loss carryforwards.

name: BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocationGoodwillExpectedTaxDeductibleAmount
description: The amount of goodwill arising from a business combination that is expected to be deductible for tax purposes.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOtherReconcilingItemsPercent
description: Percentage of the difference, between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, that is attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority interest income (expense), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, change in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, change in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

name: FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluatedForImpairment
description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesProvisionForLoanLosses
description: #N/A

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowance
description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

name: TimeDeposits
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOfContracts2
description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerBasicShare
description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

name: MarketableSecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnFairValueHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToOtherAccounts
description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsPlanAssets
description: Amount of payment, which decreases plan assets of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemInFairValueHedge
description: #N/A

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapital
description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemInForeignCurrencyFairValueHedge
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShareBasedCompensationStockOptionsRequisiteServicePeriodRecognition
description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for option under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueAmount
description: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesCollectivelyEvaluatedForImpairment
description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesIndividuallyEvaluatedForImpairment1
description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

name: ChemicalsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarrantsOrRights
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization1
description: Amount of expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityIssues
description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: CapitalToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: DividendsPayableAmountPerShare
description: The per share amount of a dividend declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid.

name: ClearingFeesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other obligations or expenses incurred but not yet paid.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer).

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions
description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

name: TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets
description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: ClosedBlockDividendObligation
description: #N/A

name: FurnitureAndFixturesGross
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Examples include, but are not limited to, desks, chairs, tables, and bookcases.

name: ClosedBlockDividendObligationEffectOfOperatingResults
description: #N/A

name: InventoryGross
description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableNet
description: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAmount
description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmount
description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsidiaryEquityIssuance
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

name: AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of liabilities incurred to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount
description: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAmortizationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetPriorServiceCostCreditBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt
description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax
description: Accumulated adjustment, net of tax, that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency from the functional currency of the reporting entity, net of reclassification of realized foreign currency translation gains or losses.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerDilutedShare
description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

name: TemporaryEquityStockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues
description: Value of new stock classified as temporary equity issued during the period.

name: AssetsHeldInTrust
description: The total amount of cash and securities held by third party trustees pursuant to terms of debt instruments or other agreements as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, which can be used by the trustee only to pay the noncurrent portion of specified obligations.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterestAccrued
description: The amount of estimated penalties and interest accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

name: PrepaidTaxes
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdConsecutiveTradingDays1
description: Threshold period of specified consecutive trading days within which common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instrument must exceed threshold percentage for specified number of trading days to trigger conversion feature.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanHealthCareCostTrendRateAssumedNextFiscalYear
description: Assumed rate, for next fiscal year, based on annual change in cost of health care cost benefits used to measure expected cost of benefits covered by defined benefit postretirement plan. Factors include, but are not limited to, estimate of health care inflation, change in health care utilization or delivery pattern, technological advances, and change in health status of participant. Excludes factors for change in composition of plan population by age and dependency status.

name: LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate
description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincipalBalance
description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansNetUnamortizedGainLossArisingDuringPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

name: DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentageOfPrincipalAmountRedeemed
description: Percentage of principal amount of debt redeemed.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetTransfersOutOfLevel3
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as an asset out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: CoalProductsAndServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherReceivables
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables classified as other.

name: CollateralHeldOnReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
description: #N/A

name: CollateralHeldOnReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExchangeCommissionRegulation
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBasicAndDilutedShare
description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAmendments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change in terms of existing plan or initiation of new plan.

name: RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPercentage
description: Percentage of remaining performance obligation to total remaining performance obligation not recognized as revenue.

name: TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalizedToAverageAssets
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalizedToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: DividendsPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: CommercialPaperCurrent
description: #N/A

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCallOptionsAndWarrants
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of call options and warrants using the treasury stock method.

name: DeferredCompensationLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable beyond one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

name: TierOneLeverageCapital
description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToParticipatingSecuritiesBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTaxBenefitFromExerciseOfStockOptions
description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalizedToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: CommodityFuturesContractsAndSpotCommoditiesProprietaryCapitalCharges
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability
description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelatedAllowanceRecordedInvestment
description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

name: OtherAssetsMiscellaneousNoncurrent
description: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpense
description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesNoParValue
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesParOrStatedValuePerShare
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesSharesAuthorized
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesValue
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockAdditionalSeriesValueOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: CapitalizedComputerSoftwareNet
description: The carrying amount of capitalized computer software costs net of accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGain
description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FairValueNetAssetLiability
description: Fair value of asset after deduction of liability.

name: CommonStockDividend
description: #N/A

name: LeaseholdImprovementsGross
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

name: OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToParent1
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

name: ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses
description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedStockAwardForfeited
description: Number of shares related to Restricted Stock Award forfeited during the period.

name: CommonStockIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapitalNetOfDiscount
description: #N/A

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeTaxesAccrued
description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

name: CapitalizedComputerSoftwareGross
description: Amount before accumulated amortization of capitalized costs for computer software, including but not limited to, acquired and internally developed computer software.

name: TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToAverageAssets
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: InterestExpenseDeposits
description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecordedInvestment
description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremiumNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount (premium).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsContributionsByPlanParticipant
description: Amount of contributions received by defined benefit plan from participant which increases plan assets.

name: CommonStockShareSubscriptionsButUnissuedValue
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsRecordedInvestment
description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

name: GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

name: PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPreferenceStock
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnrealized
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

name: EscrowDeposit
description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAllowanceRecordedInvestment
description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

name: CommonStockSharesSubscribedButUnissuedValue
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumulatedDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

name: DebtInstrumentIncreaseAccruedInterest
description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the debt instrument for the period.

name: PrepaidInsurance
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CommonStockholdersEquity
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsProvisionForLoanLosses
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUndistributedForeignEarnings
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of subsidiary and other recognized entity not within country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, other basis differences.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: This item represents an other than temporary decline in value that has been recognized against an investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting. The excess of the carrying amount over the fair value of the investment represents the amount of the write down which is or was reflected in earnings. The written down value is a new cost basis with the adjusted value of the investment becoming its new carrying value subject to the equity accounting method. Evidence of a loss in value might include, but would not necessarily be limited to, absence of an ability to recover the carrying amount of the investment or inability of the investee to sustain an earnings capacity which would justify the carrying amount of the investment.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForSaleOfSecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

name: DepositsAssetsNoncurrent
description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

name: NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesContinuingOperations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

name: DeferredRevenueNoncurrent
description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsForeign
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign tax credit carryforwards.

name: CompensatedAbsencesLiabilityVacationAndHoliday
description: #N/A

name: FairValueAssetsLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAmount
description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

name: FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90DaysPastDueAndStillAccruing
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: LoansPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

name: CompetitiveEnergyRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetTransfersIntoLevel3
description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentage
description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

name: PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments
description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be settled within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseOther
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ConcentrationRiskPercentage
description: #N/A

name: AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent
description: Noncurrent portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

name: ConcessionsCosts
description: #N/A

name: ConcessionsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockValueOutstanding
description: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrecognizedHoldingGain
description: Amount of accumulated unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DerivativeNumberOfInstrumentsHeld
description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular group held by the entity.

name: InterestBearingDepositsInBanks
description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

name: RepaymentsOfLongTermCapitalLeaseObligations
description: The cash outflow for the obligation for a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization (with maturities exceeding one year or beyond the operating cycle of the entity, if longer).

name: ProceedsFromStockPlans
description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PreferredStockLiquidationPreferenceValue
description: Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

name: ProceedsFromLoans
description: Cash received from principal payments made on loans related to operating activities.

name: ConstructionAndDevelopmentCosts
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaEarningsPerShareBasic
description: The pro forma basic net income per share for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: TreasuryStockCommonShares
description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConvertibleDebtWithConversionFeature
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.

name: RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossReclassifiedFromAccumulatedOCIIntoIncomeEffectivePortionNet
description: The effective portion of net gain (loss) reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments
description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToRedeemableNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest.

name: CashCashEquivalentsAndShortTermInvestments
description: Cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the customer may deposit additional funds at any time and effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid Investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Short-term investments, exclusive of cash equivalents, generally consist of marketable securities intended to be sold within one year (or the normal operating cycle if longer) and may include trading securities, available-for-sale securities, or held-to-maturity securities (if maturing within one year), as applicable.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleCarryingAmountOfTheEquityComponent
description: The carrying amount of the equity component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaEarningsPerShareDiluted
description: The pro forma diluted net income per share for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: ConstructionMaterialsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleBeneficialConversionFeature
description: Amount of a favorable spread to a debt holder between the amount of debt being converted and the value of the securities received upon conversion. This is an embedded conversion feature of convertible debt issued that is in-the-money at the commitment date.

name: DebtInstrumentDecreaseForgiveness
description: Decrease for amounts of indebtedness forgiven by the holder of the debt instrument.

name: ConstructionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: LongtermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableForSaleSecurities
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedNoncurrentLiabilitiesLongTermDebt
description: Amount of long-term debt due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

name: AccruedEmployeeBenefitsCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations, excluding pension and other postretirement benefits, incurred through that date and payable for perquisites provided to employees pertaining to services received from them. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: ContractAdministrationExpense
description: #N/A

name: ContractHolderReceivables
description: #N/A

name: CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy
description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: InterestExpenseDebtExcludingAmortization
description: Represents the portion of interest incurred in the period on debt arrangements that was charged against earnings, excluding amortization of debt discount (premium) and financing costs.

name: TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges
description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

name: CumulativeEffectOnRetainedEarningsNetOfTax1
description: Amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings net of related income tax effect.

name: ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss).

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShareBasedCompensationExcessTaxBenefitPercent
description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationAllocationOfRecognizedPeriodCostsCapitalizedAmount
description: Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCarryingAmount
description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

name: AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

name: CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalized
description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: CashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedWithinTwelveMonths
description: The estimated net amount of existing gains or losses on cash flow hedges at the reporting date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next 12 months.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTaxes
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCostsOfGoodsSold
description: Amount of costs of goods sold attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterestExpense
description: The sum of the amounts of estimated penalties and interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

name: PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsAggregateIntrinsicValueVested
description: Intrinsic value of vested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: UnsecuredDebt
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

name: AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusinessUnit
description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferredStock
description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

name: TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalized
description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationArrangementsRangeOfOutcomesValueHigh
description: For contingent consideration arrangements recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the high-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the consideration which may be paid.

name: CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred
description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsOther
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals, classified as other.

name: StockOptionPlanExpense
description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

name: ContractRevenueCost
description: #N/A

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalized
description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLoss
description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetPurchases
description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: ConvertibleLongTermNotesPayable
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Convertible Notes Payable, excluding current portion. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrecognizedHoldingLoss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtInstrumentFeeAmount
description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestments
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModificationRecordedInvestment2
description: Amount, after troubled debt restructuring, of modified financing receivable.

name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossRealized
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

name: PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesAndAffiliates
description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

name: DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsEmployeeBenefits
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee benefits, classified as other.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForSaleOfSecuritiesTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

name: ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeCurrentPeriodBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelatedParties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: AccountsReceivableRelatedParties
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

name: ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds
description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

name: ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistributionsReturnOfCapital
description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit
description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

name: PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardMaximumEmployeeSubscriptionRate
description: The highest percentage of annual salary that an employee is permitted to utilize with respect to the plan.

name: TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy
description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: InterestIncomeOperating
description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

name: NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of notes payable.

name: PrepaidExpenseCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAsset
description: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCompensationGross
description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations
description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

name: TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy
description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DerivativeLiabilityMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure derivative liability.

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperations
description: Amount of current and deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current and deferred regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

name: MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlansLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

name: RoyaltyExpense
description: Amount of expense related to royalty payments under a contractual arrangement such as payment for mineral and drilling rights and use of technology or intellectual property.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOperatingIncomeLoss
description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYearBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities
description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.
