name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingencies
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in income tax contingencies. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusinessCombination
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

name: NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome
description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

name: RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt
description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AssetsNet
description: Amount of net assets (liabilities).

name: ContractsInForceSubjectToParticipationThroughReinsuranceValue
description: #N/A

name: ContractsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlansWithAccumulatedBenefitObligationsInExcessOfPlanAssetsAggregateProjectedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of projected benefit obligation for defined benefit pension plan with accumulated benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardPercentageOfOutstandingStockMaximum
description: Maximum number of shares that may be issued in accordance with the plan as a proportion of outstanding capital stock.

name: InterestAndOtherIncome
description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

name: ConvertibleDebtCurrent
description: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

name: DerivativeAssetNotionalAmount
description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on the derivative asset.

name: ContractsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000OrMore
description: #N/A

name: LongTermPurchaseCommitmentAmount
description: The minimum amount the entity agreed to spend under the long-term purchase commitment.

name: SeniorNotes
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNet
description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationLiabilityTransfersOutOfLevel3
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: DebtInstrumentRepurchasedFaceAmount
description: Face (par) amount of the original debt instrument that was repurchased.

name: GuaranteeObligationsCurrentCarryingValue
description: The current carrying amount of the liability for the freestanding or embedded guarantor's obligations under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

name: AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties.

name: AccruedIncomeTaxesNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

name: PaidInKindInterest
description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs
description: Amount of loans and leases that have been written off from both loan receivables and allowance reserve for credit loss.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DividendsCash
description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsPensions
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from pension benefits.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOutstanding
description: Fair value of the amount outstanding under the credit facility.

name: NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNonredeemableNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

name: ContributionsFromNoncontrollingInterests
description: #N/A

name: NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: ContractualObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ConversionOfStockAmountConverted
description: #N/A

name: ProductWarrantyAccrual
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers.

name: ConversionOfStockAmountIssued
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be settled beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ConversionOfStockSharesConverted
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanSettlementsBenefitObligation
description: Amount of (increase) decrease to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Includes, but is not limited to, lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for right to receive specified benefits, purchase of nonparticipating annuity contract and change from remeasurement.

name: ConversionOfStockSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOnDisposal
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

name: RestructuringCosts
description: Amount, after cash payment, of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxExemptIncome
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost1
description: Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost.

name: CashUninsuredAmount
description: The amount of cash as of the balance sheet date that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

name: ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation1
description: Foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in functional currency to reporting currency.

name: NotesIssued1
description: The fair value of notes issued in noncash investing and financing activities.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount classified as cash and cash equivalents attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: OtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividendsInArrears
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

name: AccountsReceivableGross
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockParStatedValuePerShare
description: #N/A

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesAuthorized
description: #N/A

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualCompensationExpense
description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesSubscribedButUnissued
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: LongTermLineOfCredit
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

name: OtherDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: CorporateLifeInsuranceGuaranteedRate
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealizedLossPositionNumberOfPositions
description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

name: FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DerivativeLiabilityNotionalAmount
description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on the derivative liability.

name: TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreference
description: The aggregate liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount
description: Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsAggregateCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIncludingCurrentMaturities
description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentLiabilitiesDeferredRevenue
description: Amount of deferred revenue expected to be recognized as such within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

name: RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

name: ConvertibleDebtFairValueDisclosures
description: Fair value portion of borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.

name: ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOfInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

name: InterestAndDebtExpense
description: Interest and debt related expenses associated with nonoperating financing activities of the entity.

name: CostOfCoalProductsAndServices
description: #N/A

name: CostOfDomesticRegulatedElectric
description: #N/A

name: CostOfDomesticRegulatedGasRevenue
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoldProductsAndServices
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEquityComponentOfConvertibleDebt
description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

name: CostOfGoodsAndServicesEnergyCommoditiesAndServices
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost
description: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

name: BankOwnedLifeInsuranceIncome
description: Earnings on or other increases in the value of the cash surrender value of bank owned life insurance policies.

name: InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing
description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

name: NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesContinuingOperations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

name: RestructuringReserveCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and estimated obligations associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, which are expected to be paid in the next twelve months or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.

name: CostOfGoodsSold
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldAmortization
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDepletion
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciation
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationAndAmortization
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDepreciationDepletionAndAmortization
description: #N/A

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRecoveries
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDirectLabor
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDirectMaterials
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDirectTaxesAndLicensesCosts

name: CostOfGoodsSoldElectric

description: #N/A

name: BankOwnedLifeInsurance
description: The carrying amount of a life insurance policy on an officer, executive or employee for which the reporting entity (a bank) is entitled to proceeds from the policy upon death of the insured or surrender of the insurance policy.

name: CostOfGoodsSoldSubscription
description: #N/A

name: CostOfMerchandiseSalesBuyingAndOccupancyCosts
description: #N/A

name: CostOfNaturalGasPurchases
description: #N/A

name: CostOfOilAndGasProspects
description: #N/A

name: CostOfOtherAlternativeEnergy
description: #N/A

name: CostOfOtherManufacturedProducts
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingLeaseLiability
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for operating lease.

name: CostOfPurchasedOilAndGas
description: #N/A

name: CostOfPurchasedPower
description: #N/A

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare
description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

name: CostOfSecondaryProcessing
description: #N/A

name: CostOfServicesAmortization

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

name: CostOfTransmission
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

name: CostOfUtilities
description: #N/A

name: CostOfWorldwideUnregulatedElectric
description: #N/A

name: OtherIntangibleAssetsNet
description: Amount after accumulated amortization of finite-lived and indefinite-lived intangible assets classified as other.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncomeAccrualMethod
description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

name: OtherAssetImpairmentCharges
description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedParty
description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from adjustment.

name: ProceedsFromBankDebt
description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

name: AccretionExpense
description: Amount recognized for the passage of time, typically for liabilities, that have been discounted to their net present values. Excludes accretion associated with asset retirement obligations.

name: DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityAmount
description: Amount of unused borrowing capacity under the long-term financing arrangement that is available to the entity as of the balance sheet date.

name: AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSettled
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

name: ConversionOfStockAmountIssued1
description: The value of the financial instrument issued [noncash or part noncash] in the conversion of stock. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToConversionOfDebtSecurities
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible debt securities using the if-converted method.

name: OfficersCompensation
description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by officer. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

name: UnbilledReceivablesCurrent
description: Amount received for services rendered and products shipped, but not yet billed, for non-contractual agreements due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DepositsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of deposit liabilities held by the entity, including, but not limited to, foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing, demand deposits, saving deposits, negotiable orders of withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits.

name: DividendsPreferredStockCash
description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

name: CostsOfMetalsSold
description: #N/A

name: CostsOfRealEstateServicesAndLandSales
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIOnDerivativesNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet
description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

name: CreditDerivativeCurrentFairValue
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
description: Amount of general and administrative expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNetOfDividendsOrDistributions
description: This element represents the undistributed income (or loss) of equity method investments, net of dividends or other distributions received from unconsolidated subsidiaries, certain corporate joint ventures, and certain noncontrolled corporations; such investments are accounted for under the equity method of accounting. This element excludes distributions that constitute a return of investment, which are classified as investing activities.

name: LoansHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of loans held-for-sale including, but not limited to, mortgage loans and finance receivables.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases
description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

name: StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingNumberOfSharesAuthorizedToBeRepurchased
description: The remaining number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossRecoveryOfBadDebts
description: Amount of recovery of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially written-off as bad debts.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxAssets
description: Amount of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date.

name: DerivativeAssetsCurrent
description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetGainLossNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

name: GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet
description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

description: #N/A

description: #N/A

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: CumulativeEffectOnRetainedEarningsNetOfTax

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetSettlements
description: Amount of settlement of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankStock
description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

name: DeferredFederalStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of deferred federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national, regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOfCashDivested
description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualPayments
description: Amount of decrease in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from payments made in cash or in kind to satisfy claims under the terms of the standard and extended product warranty.

name: BusinessAcquisitionEquityInterestIssuedOrIssuableValueAssigned
description: Value of equity interests (such as common shares, preferred shares, or partnership interest) issued or issuable to acquire the entity.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelatedAllowanceUnpaidPrincipalBalance
description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

name: PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurities
description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAllowanceUnpaidPrincipalBalance
description: Unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

name: NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

name: SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTransaction
description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseImpairmentLosses
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecurities
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisWithUnobservableInputs
description: Fair value of financial instrument classified as derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModificationRecordedInvestment2
description: Amount, before troubled debt restructuring, of financing receivable to be modified.

name: NumberOfRealEstateProperties
description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

name: OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentAssets
description: Amount of assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDevelopment
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from in-process research and development costs expensed in connection with a business combination.

name: PreferredStockNoParValue
description: Face amount per share of no-par value preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: RestrictedStockExpense
description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

name: InterestBearingDepositLiabilities
description: The aggregate of all domestic and foreign interest-bearing deposit liabilities.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesCashReceived
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies
description: Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesRefundPayments
description: #N/A

name: DepositsAssetsCurrent
description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment within one year or during the operating cycle, if shorter.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesRevenueRecognized
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationFromAociToRetainedEarningsTaxEffect
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for reclassification to retained earnings of tax effect from remeasurement of deferred tax pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityPurchases
description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInterestRate
description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

name: AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstimate
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

name: BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquityInterestInAcquireePercentage
description: Percentage of equity in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingencies
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax contingencies. Includes, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

name: PaymentsForLegalSettlements
description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateAmortizedCost
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

name: DebtIssuanceCostsIncurredDuringNoncashOrPartialNoncashTransaction
description: The amount of debt issuance costs that were incurred during a noncash or partial noncash transaction.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfProperties
description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNonOptionEquityInstrumentsForfeitures
description: Number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements that were cancelled as a result of occurrence of a terminating event.

name: ProceedsFromOtherDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: SellingExpense
description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentWarrantsOrOptionsIssued
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic
description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

name: DebtConversionOriginalDebtAmount
description: #N/A

name: CurrentFederalStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of current federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current national, regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOperatingExpense
description: Amount of operating expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetSales
description: Amount of sale of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

name: FairValueOfAssetsAcquired
description: The fair value of assets acquired in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsSubsequentDefaultNumberOfContracts1
description: Number of financing receivable contracts modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

name: DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: #N/A

name: ForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperations
description: Amount of current and deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of other assets.

name: TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValueAdjustment
description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

name: DueToAffiliateCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice
description: #N/A

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitExpense
description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

name: DebtInstrumentRepurchaseAmount
description: Fair value amount of debt instrument that was repurchased.

name: DeferredCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionRatio
description: #N/A

name: LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleEffectiveInterestRate
description: #N/A

name: OtherInvestments
description: Amount of investments classified as other.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleInterestExpense
description: #N/A

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInTwoYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsPostretirementBenefits
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from postretirement benefits.

name: PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecurities
description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleRemainingDiscountAmortizationPeriod
description: #N/A

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfAssets
description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

name: DeferredRentCreditNoncurrent
description: Amount of excess of rental payment required by lease over rental income recognized, classified as noncurrent.

name: SignificantChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIsReasonablyPossibleAmountOfUnrecordedBenefit
description: The amount of the unrecognized tax benefit of a position taken for which it is reasonably possible that the total amount thereof will significantly increase or decrease within twelve months of the balance sheet date.

name: RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: ContractualObligationDueInSecondYear
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty
description: Costs of sales and operating expenses for the period incurred from transactions with related parties.

name: DebtInstrumentDecreaseRepayments
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCash
description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

name: PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense
description: Cash paid for expenses incurred during underwriting activities (the process to review insurance applications, evaluate risks, accept or reject applications, and determine the premiums to be charged) for insurance companies.

name: PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BusinessCombinationAcquisitionOfLessThan100PercentNoncontrollingInterestFairValue
description: This element represents the fair value of the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree at the acquisition date.

name: DebtInstrumentIncreaseAdditionalBorrowings
description: #N/A

name: CashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities of discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountCurrent
description: Amount of debt discount to be amortized within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateAtPeriodEnd
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseOther
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePercentageRateRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePercentageRateRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateIncrease
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUncertainTaxPositionsNoncurrent
description: Amount recognized for uncertainty in income taxes classified as noncurrent.

name: OtherOperatingIncome
description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentageRateRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentageRateRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: TreasuryStockCommonValue
description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostCreditArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: RepaymentsOfOtherDebt
description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

name: VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossExposureAmount
description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost
description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

name: DebtInstrumentPrincipalOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost
description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the specified type of restructuring cost.

name: CommonEquityTierOneCapital
description: Amount of Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

name: DueToRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Portion of the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties that is payable after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

name: DebtInstrumentSinkingFundAmount
description: #N/A

name: RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedDepreciation
description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

name: AccruedBonusesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedCompensation
description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfHeldToMaturitySecurities
description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

name: LiabilitiesAssumed1
description: The fair value of liabilities assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCurrent
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ConvertibleDebtNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date, net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle, if longer. The debt is convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Fair value, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset. Includes derivative not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedDuringNext12MonthsNet
description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges as of the balance sheet date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next twelve months.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredIncome
description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: LongTermLoansPayable
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

name: DebtIssuanceCosts
description: #N/A

name: AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncurred
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

name: NumberOfBusinessesAcquired
description: The number of businesses acquired by the entity during the period.

name: DebtInstrumentInterestRateIncreaseDecrease
description: Incremental percentage increase (decrease) in the stated rate on a debt instrument.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all taxes owed but not paid, including income, property and other taxes.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationTax
description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: AccruedPayrollTaxesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

name: RestructuringReserveAccrualAdjustment1
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) which increases (decreases) the restructuring reserve from an adjustment to a previously accrued restructuring liability.

name: SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTransaction
description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company after stock transaction.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive
description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsDeferredRent
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred rent.

name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate
description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

name: InventoryRawMaterialsAndSupplies
description: Gross amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed.

name: TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvisions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

name: AccountsPayableOtherCurrent
description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CommonEquityTierOneCapitalRatio
description: Ratio of Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: CostOfGoodsAndServiceExcludingDepreciationDepletionAndAmortization
description: Cost of product sold and service rendered, excluding depreciation, depletion, and amortization.

name: OtherNoncashExpense
description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

name: ImpairmentOfRealEstate
description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxable
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardSharesPurchasedForAward
description: Number of shares purchased for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInThreeYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesTaxDeferredIncome
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from tax deferred revenue or income classified as other.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiCost
description: Cost of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesTax
description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclassificationsBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

name: RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

name: DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1
description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

name: LossContingencyPendingClaimsNumber
description: Number of pending claims pertaining to a loss contingency.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedAmortizationOfGainLossNextFiscalYear
description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingCapital
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAssetsAcquired1
description: The amount of fixed assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture
description: The cash outflow associated with the investment in or advances to an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group.

name: SubordinatedDebt
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationAndTaxParent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

name: ContractualObligationDueInThirdYear
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossBeforeReclassificationTax
description: Amount, before reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: TransferToOtherRealEstate
description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

name: CapitalLeaseObligations
description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal through the balance sheet date.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsInvestments
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

name: DepositAssets
description: The carrying amount of the asset transferred to a third party to serve as a deposit, which typically serves as security against failure by the transferor to perform under terms of an agreement.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsSubsequentDefaultRecordedInvestment1
description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of expenditures made during the current reporting period for benefits that will be received over a period of years. Deferred charges differ from prepaid expenses in that they usually extend over a long period of time and may or may not be regularly recurring costs of operation.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesArisingDuringPeriodTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments, related to increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued
description: Amount of increase in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardPlanModificationIncrementalCompensationCost
description: An excess of the fair value of the modified award over the fair value of the award immediately before the modification.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsAggregateIntrinsicValueNonvested
description: Intrinsic value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangibleAssetsGoodwill
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from goodwill.

name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiabilityAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Fair value, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset. Includes derivative not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: AdjustmentsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities
description: The sum of adjustments which are added to or deducted from net income or loss, including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interest, to reflect cash provided by or used in operating activities, in accordance with the indirect cash flow method.

name: CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent
description: Amount of capital lease obligation due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DueToAffiliateCurrent
description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxExempt
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

name: PreferredStockValueOutstanding
description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

name: ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies
description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardAcceleratedCompensationCost
description: Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSingleMaturityDate
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationBalanceSheetAmount
description: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

name: DepositsSavingsDeposits
description: Amount of interest bearing deposits with no stated maturity, which may include passbook and statement savings accounts and money-market deposit accounts (MMDAs).

name: IndefinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired
description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with an indefinite life, from an acquisition.

name: LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProjectedBenefitObligationInExcessOfPlanAssetsPlanAssets
description: Amount of plan asset for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfAdoptionQuantification
description: Represents the quantification of the effect of adopting the new accounting standard or change in accounting principle expected by the entity to have a significant effect on the entity's financial statements.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherSundryLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer), from the balance sheet date.

name: DebtInstrumentAnnualPrincipalPayment
description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedPremium
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt premium.

name: OtherBorrowings
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date for the aggregate of other miscellaneous borrowings owed by the reporting entity.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrual
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupCurrent
description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentInterest
description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to interest.

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroup
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of financing receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

name: ManagementFeeExpense
description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

name: RelatedPartyTransactionRate
description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

name: TreasuryStockSharesRetired
description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period.

name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

name: InterestExpenseBorrowings
description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseForPeriodNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the credit facility.

name: MarketingExpense
