name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017Percent
description: Percentage of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRestrictedInvestments
description: The cash outflow to acquire investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

name: RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold
description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearTwoThroughFiveFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year through fifth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPrepaidAndOtherAssetsCurrent
description: Amount classified as prepaid and other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterTenYearsFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: InvestmentIncomeNonoperating
description: The aggregate amount of income from investments (for example, dividends) not considered a component of the entity's core operations.

name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOfParentEquityInterest
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIOnDerivativesTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: PensionExpense
description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension benefits. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinvestment
description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

name: ContractWithCustomerPerformanceObligationSatisfiedInPreviousPeriod
description: Amount of revenue recognized from performance obligation satisfied or partially satisfied in previous reporting periods. Includes, but is not limited to, change in transaction price.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAccumulatedLoss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for less than 12 months.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedLosses
description: This item represents the gross loss realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

name: CapitalizedContractCostNetCurrent
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerNumberOfPositions
description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

name: LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

name: OffBalanceSheetCreditLossLiability
description: Amount of expected credit loss for credit exposure on off-balance-sheet commitment, including but not limited to, loan commitment, standby letter of credit, financial guarantee not accounted for as insurance. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

name: StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValuePreferredStockAndWarrants
description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestmentInNoncontrolledAffiliates
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments in unconsolidated subsidiaries and investments in other affiliates which are not controlled nor consolidated.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: GainOnSaleOfInvestments
description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

name: InterestReceivableCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of current interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted
description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

name: DebtInstrumentMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure debt instrument, including, but not limited to, convertible and non-convertible debt.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetGainsLossesAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOtherAssets
description: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionTwelveMonthsOrLongerFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

name: PurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from effect of Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: CollateralAlreadyPostedAggregateFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value of assets that are already posted, at the end of the reporting period, as collateral for derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRestricted
description: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAssetsAcquired1
description: The value of an asset or business acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatchingContributionAnnualVestingPercentage
description: Percentage of employer's matching contributions to a defined contribution plan that vests in a given year.

name: DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualContributionsPerEmployeeAmount
description: Maximum amount the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

name: InterestRateDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities.

name: InventoryLIFOReserve
description: Amount by which inventory stated at last-in first-out (LIFO) is less than (in excess of) inventory stated at other inventory cost methods.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetGainLossTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Amount of cash outflow from the acquisition of or improvements to long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

name: PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedParties
description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFromTransactionsWithRelatedParty
description: Reflects the sum of all other revenue and income realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsFairValueOfShares
description: The fair value of shares that would be issued, determined under the conditions specified in the contract if the settlement were to occur at the reporting date.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBenefitPlan
description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

name: AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationPaymentForSettlement
description: Amount of payment, which decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract. Excludes decreases to benefit obligation for remeasurement due to settlement.

name: FinancingReceivableNonaccrualNoAllowance
description: Amortized cost of financing receivable on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
description: Amount of cash outflow for debt, mandatory redeemable security, and principal payment for finance lease obligation.

name: RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer
description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelatedAllowanceInterestIncomeAccrualMethod
description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables that are recognized as impaired, for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

name: TradingSecuritiesDebt
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: InvestmentOwnedAtCost
description: Cost of the investment.

name: LoansPledgedAsCollateral
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans that have been pledged as collateral for borrowings. If the secured party has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral, then the debtor reclassifies that asset and report that asset in its statement of financial position separately from other assets not so encumbered.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions
description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPrepaidPensionCosts
description: #N/A

name: RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowings
description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

name: SelfInsuranceReserve
description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions) of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCapitalizedInventoryCosts
description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from inventory.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MultiemployerPlanEmployerContributionCost
description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer plan. Multiemployer plan includes, but is not limited to, pension plan determined to be individually significant and insignificant and other postretirement benefit plan.

name: NetPeriodicDefinedBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseExcludingServiceCostComponent
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for net periodic benefit cost components, excluding service cost component, of defined benefit plan. Amount includes, but is not limited to, interest cost, expected (return) loss on plan asset, amortization of prior service cost (credit), amortization of (gain) loss, amortization of transition (asset) obligation, settlement (gain) loss, curtailment (gain) loss and certain termination benefits.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendReinvestmentPlan
description: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountOfUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiability
description: #N/A

name: StockholdersEquityOtherShares
description: Number of increase (decrease) in shares of stock classified as other.

name: ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount
description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherProductiveAssets
description: Amount of cash outflow for the purchase of or improvements to tangible or intangible assets, used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedCumulativeAmountOfTemporaryDifference
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent
description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

name: AlternativeInvestmentMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure alternative investment.

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentRate
description: Dividend or interest rate associated with the financial instrument issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash or part noncash transaction. Noncash are transactions that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments. Part noncash refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationIntangibleAssets
description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationMinorityInterestIncomeExpense
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAccumulatedLoss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for 12 months or longer.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAllowanceInterestIncomeAccrualMethod
description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables, for which there is a related allowance for credit losses and are recognized as impaired.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestIncomeExpense
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

name: DefinedBenefitPensionPlanNoncurrentLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowings
description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper and Federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase.

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedStock
description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

name: AdministrativeFeesExpense
description: Amount of expense for administrative services provided to the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) by the managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnFairValueHedgingInstruments1
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of derivative and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments recognized in the income statement.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAfterTax
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLiabilityAfterTax
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLiabilityBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeLiabilityCollateralRightToReclaimCashOffset
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative liabilities.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingEntity
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultingFromForeignCurrencyTranslation
description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationAndExerciseOfStockOptions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition and exercise of award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationGoodwill1
description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationGainLossIncludedInEarnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: InterestPaidCapitalized
description: Amount of cash paid for interest capitalized, classified as investing activity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIOnDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAccumulatedLoss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale in a continuous loss position.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepatriationOfForeignEarnings
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the repatriation of foreign earnings.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCostRemaining1
description: Amount of expected cost remaining for the specified restructuring cost.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialNetGainsLosses
description: #N/A

name: UndistributedEarnings
description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

name: DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuanceCosts
description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfNetGainsLosses
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfNetPriorServiceCostCredit
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfNetTransitionAssetObligation
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOtherExpense
description: Amount of other expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the equity method.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfTransitionObligationsAssets
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentTermsBalloonPaymentToBePaid
description: Amount of payment greater than the preceding installment payments to be paid at final maturity date of debt.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmountToBeAmortizedFromAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNextFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCostsCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: The carrying amount of deferred costs.

name: DerivativeNetLiabilityPositionAggregateFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value amounts of derivative instruments that contain credit-risk-related contingent features that are in a net liability position at the end of the reporting period. For nonderivative instruments that are designated and qualify as hedging instruments, the fair value amounts are the carrying value of the nonderivative hedging instrument, including the adjustment for the foreign currency transaction gain (loss) on that instrument.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmountsRecognizedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetGainLossBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans
description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmountsThatWillBeAmortizedFromAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossInNextFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: OciBeforeReclassificationsBeforeTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsForPlanBenefitsCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForSoftware
description: The cash outflow associated with the development, modification or acquisition of software programs or applications for internal use (that is, not to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed to others) that qualify for capitalization.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

name: ProceedsFromOtherEquity
description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

name: RatioOfIndebtednessToNetCapital1
description: Indebtedness divided by net capital.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEstateSold
description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationBalanceOnSecondAnniversary
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndOtherReceivables
description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountOfUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiabilityUndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiaries
description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanOtherChanges
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change, classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: The aggregate increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsAccruedBenefitLiability
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsMinimumPensionLiabilityAdjustment
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsNetAmountRecognized
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsNetGainsLossesNotYetRecognized
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsNetPriorServiceCostsCreditsNotYetRecognized
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsNetTransitionObligationsAssetsNotYetRecognized
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBeforeAdoptionOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsPrepaidBenefitCost
description: #N/A

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfLiabilitiesAssumed1
description: The total amount of [all] liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: OtherCommitmentDueInSecondYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: PremiumsEarnedNet
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

name: PurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecuritiesNetOfAdjustments
description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinalizationOfPensionAndNonPensionPostretirementPlanValuationBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitsPaid
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringReserveTranslationAdjustment
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the restructuring reserve.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentIntangibles
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to intangibles acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedNoncurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingBenefitObligationWeightedAverageInterestCreditingRate
description: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByPlanParticipants
description: #N/A

name: ExpenseRelatedToDistributionOrServicingAndUnderwritingFees
description: Expense related to distribution, servicing and underwriting fees.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanCostOfProvidingSpecialOrContractualTerminationBenefitsRecognizedDuringPeriod
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanCurrentAssets
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringSettlementAndImpairmentProvisions
description: Amount of restructuring charges, remediation cost, and asset impairment loss.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanDebtSecurities
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMonthsAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAssetsStillHeld
description: Amount, measured using unobservable inputs, of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) on assets still held.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointDecreaseOnAccumulatedPostretirementBenefitObligation
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeGainOnDerivative
description: Amount of increase in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointDecreaseOnServiceAndInterestCostComponents
description: #N/A

name: GoodwillTranslationAndPurchaseAccountingAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments and purchase accounting adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumAmountOutstandingDuringPeriod
description: Maximum amount borrowed under the credit facility at any time during the period.

name: LossContingencyAccrualPayments
description: Amount of cash outflow reducing loss contingency liability.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfPlanAmendmentOnAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfPlanAmendmentOnNetPeriodicBenefitCost
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfSettlementsAndCurtailmentsOnAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecurities
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyNumberOfPlaintiffs
description: Number of plaintiffs that have filed claims pertaining to a loss contingency.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEstimatedFutureEmployerContributionsInCurrentFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEstimatedFutureEmployerContributionsInNextFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUndistributedEarningsLossBasic
description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceived
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: CapitalLeasedAssetsGross
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of leased physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

name: DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimSecurities
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedContributionsInCurrentFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsForeign
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign tax credit.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsFiveRollingYearsThereafter
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInFiveFiscalYearsThereafter
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInYearFive
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInYearFour
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInYearOne
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInYearThree
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsInYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: #N/A

name: LeaseIncome
description: Amount of lease income from operating, direct financing, and sales-type leases. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments, interest income, profit (loss) recognized at commencement, and lease payments paid and payable to lessor.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsRollingYearFive
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsRollingYearFour
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsRollingYearThree
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsRollingYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue
description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

name: RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedParties
description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearTwoThroughFiveAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year through fifth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentWarrantsOrOptionsIssued1
description: The number of warrants issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: DeferredOtherTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of other deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations. For example, but not limited to, acquisition-date income tax benefits or expenses recognized from changes in the acquirer's valuation allowance for its previously existing deferred tax assets resulting from a business combination and adjustments to beginning-of-year balance of a valuation allowance because of a change in circumstance causing a change in judgment about the realizability of the related deferred tax asset in future periods.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedAmortizationNextFiscalYear
description: Amount of cost (credit) included in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisSubordinatedDebtObligations
description: Fair value of subordinated debt obligations including, but not limited to, subordinated loan, subordinated bond, subordinated debenture or junior debt.

name: ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowings
description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

name: RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis
description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: RestructuringReserveSettledWithoutCash2
description: Amount of decrease in the reserve for full or partial settlement through consideration other than cash.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanForeignCurrencyExchangeRateChangesPlanAssets
description: #N/A

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationBalanceOnThirdAnniversary
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AmortizationOfDeferredLoanOriginationFeesNet
description: The net increase(decrease) in interest income during the period representing the allocation of deferred loan origination fees less deferred loan origination costs using the effective interest method over the term of the debt arrangement to which they pertain taking into account the effect of prepayments.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFutureAmortizationOfGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFutureAmortizationOfPriorServiceCostCredit
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanGrossPrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsReceived
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanHealthCareCostTrendRateAssumedForNextFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsCharitableContributionCarryforwards
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible charitable contribution carryforwards.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueWithinOneYearOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LandAndLandImprovements
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of real estate held for productive use and additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use, examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots. Excludes land held for sale.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInTwoYears
description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanNoncurrentAssetsForPlanBenefits
description: #N/A

name: AlternativeInvestment
description: Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

name: DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangementsNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualRecordedLiability
description: The carrying amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date to an individual under a deferred compensation arrangement. This amount may be the result of periodic accruals made over the period of active employment, or reflect termination benefits resulting contractual terms or a death benefit.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanOtherPlanAssets
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpense
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowances, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences from reserves and accruals, compensation and benefit costs, and other provisions, reserves, and allowances.

name: DepositsAssets
description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment in the future.

name: DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSecurities
description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankBorrowingsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of borrowing from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAmount
description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansReceivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the collection, including prepayments, of loans receivable issued for financing of goods and services.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of investments classified as other.

name: RealEstateImprovements
description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeStockOwnershipPlan
description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

name: AccruedVacationCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for unused vacation time owed to employees based on the entity's vacation benefit given to its employees. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToReturnCashOffset
description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative assets.

name: GainLossOnContractTermination
description: Gain (loss) related to the termination of a contract between the parties. The termination may be due to many causes including early termination of a lease by a lessee, a breach of contract by one party, or a failure to perform.

name: GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSale
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive loss (OCI).

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteeCumulativePercentageOwnershipAfterAllTransactions
description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity method investee's stock owned by parent immediately after all stock transactions.

name: DeferredRentCreditCurrent
description: Amount of excess of rental payment required by lease over rental income recognized, classified as current.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount classified as accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlansWithBenefitObligationsInExcessOfPlanAssetsAggregateBenefitObligation
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlansWithBenefitObligationsInExcessOfPlanAssetsAggregateFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: #N/A

name: InventoryRawMaterialsAndSuppliesNetOfReserves
description: Aggregated amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed. This amount is net of valuation reserves and adjustments.

name: DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date, which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesOtherThanLongtermDebtNoncurrent
description: Aggregated carrying amounts of obligations as of the balance sheet date, excluding long-term debt, incurred as part of the normal operations that are expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Alternate captions include Total Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossDueToSettlements
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Net Increase or Decrease in balance of noncontrolling interest in the subsidiary during the reporting period.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossDueToSettlementsAndCurtailments
description: #N/A

name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToNonredeemableNoncontrollingInterest
description: Portion of net income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardDiscountFromMarketPriceOfferingDate
description: Discount rate from fair value on offering date that participants pay for shares.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToReceivable
description: Amount of decrease in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time from transfer to receivable due to right to consideration becoming unconditional.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsDebtSecurities
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsDebtSecuritiesRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsDebtSecuritiesRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsEquitySecurities
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsEquitySecuritiesRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsEquitySecuritiesRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsOther
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsOtherRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsOtherRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsRealEstateRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercentageOfAssetsRealEstateRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetPlanAssetAllocations
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetPlanAssetAllocationsRangeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTargetPlanAssetAllocationsRangeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets
description: The cash inflow from the sale assets received in full or partial satisfaction of a receivable including real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts. Foreclosed assets also include loans that are treated as if the underlying collateral had been foreclosed because the institution has taken possession of the collateral, even though legal foreclosure or repossession proceedings have not taken place.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanUltimateHealthCareCostTrendRate
description: #N/A

name: AcquisitionCosts
description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.

name: ContractWithCustomerRefundLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer, classified as current.

name: DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmployerContributionsInCurrentFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmployerContributionsInNextFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesFinancingArrangements
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from financing arrangements.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesMortgageServicingRights
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from mortgage servicing rights.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGain
description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueImpairmentLossAnnualAmount
description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInThreeYears
description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss of defined benefit plan.

name: DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualContributionPerEmployeeAmount
description: #N/A

name: DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualContributionPerEmployeePercent
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

name: AccruedRentCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DeferredRentReceivablesNet
description: Amount of excess of rental income recognized over rental payment required by lease.

name: DefinedContributionPlanNumberOfEmployeesCovered
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsImpairmentLosses
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated impairment losses.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsWarrantyReserves
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from warranty reserves.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAccumulatedLoss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

name: OperatingLeaseVariableLeaseIncome
description: Amount of operating lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

name: OtherRealEstate
description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

name: OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableNoncontrollingInterest
description: The cash outflow during the period for redemption of redeemable noncontrolling interests.

name: ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense
description: Professional and contract service expense includes cost reimbursements for support services related to contracted projects, outsourced management, technical and staff support.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCommonCarryingAmount
description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

name: DepletionNonproduction
description: #N/A

name: DueToOfficersOrStockholdersCurrent
description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: LossContingencyAccrualProvision
description: Amount charged against operating income increasing loss contingency liability, after adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

name: MembersEquity
description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC), attributable to the parent entity.

name: NetCashProvidedByUsedInDiscontinuedOperations
description: Increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's discontinued operations.

name: DepositAssetsOrLiabilitiesAmortizationExpenseFromExpirations
description: #N/A

name: DepositAssetsOrLiabilitiesEffectOfChangeInPresentValueAssumptionsRecordedAsExpense
description: #N/A

name: DepositAssetsOrLiabilitiesEffectOfChangeInPresentValueAssumptionsResultingInReductionsInExpectedRecoveries
description: #N/A

name: OtherCommitmentDueInThirdYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets
description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTermDebt
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearSixThroughTenFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in rolling sixth through tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualContributionsByEmployer
description: Amount of contributions made by employer into fund established for purposes of making future disbursement to individual in accordance with deferred compensation arrangement.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

name: DepositLiabilitiesReclassifiedAsLoansReceivable
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresCollateralPledged1
description: Amount of the collateral pledged in support of federal home loan bank advances outstanding.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivable
description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationGainLossBeforeReclassificationAndTax
description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

name: OtherLongTermInvestments
description: Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromDividendsReceived
description: Dividends received on equity and other investments during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedTwoYears
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TaxesOther
description: Amount of tax expense classified as other.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultingFromForeignCurrencyTranslation
description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

name: AmountOfRestrictedNetAssetsForConsolidatedAndUnconsolidatedSubsidiaries
description: Amount of restricted net assets of consolidated and unconsolidated subsidiaries as of the end of the most recently completed fiscal year.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedGainLossNet
description: This item represents the difference between the gross realized gains and losses realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities. Additionally, this item would include any losses recognized for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) of the subject investments in debt and equity securities.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleIfConvertedValueInExcessOfPrincipal
description: The amount by which the convertible debt's if-converted value exceeds its principle amount at the balance sheet date, regardless of whether the instrument is currently convertible. This element applies to public companies only.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAndPreferenceStock
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

name: SecuredLongTermDebt
description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendReinvestmentPlan
description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresentValueOfNetMinimumPayments
description: Present value of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, including amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountNoncurrent
description: Amount of debt discount to be amortized after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: MinimumNetWorthRequiredForCompliance
description: Amount of minimum net worth required for mortgage banking as defined by regulatory framework.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseDeferredFinancingCosts
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from debt issuance costs.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredLiabilities
description: Change during the period in carrying value for all deferred liabilities due within one year or operating cycle.

name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecurities
description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLossArisingDuringPeriodTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountContributions
description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

name: ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1
description: Cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNonOptionEquityInstrumentsForfeituresAndExpirations
description: Number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements that were either cancelled or expired.

name: DepreciationExpense
description: #N/A

name: Supplies
description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: FederalFundsSold
description: The amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements.

name: DepreciationPremisesAndEquipment
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseMealsAndEntertainment
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible meals and entertainment expense.

name: InventoryAdjustments
description: Amount of inventory reserves for last-in first-out (LIFO) and other inventory valuation methods.

name: PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoansHeldForSale
description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

name: PaymentsOfOrdinaryDividends
description: Cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests, generally out of earnings.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

name: DerivativeAssetDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentFairValue
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet
description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedThreeYears
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationBalanceOnFourthAnniversary
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueNet
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCompensation
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation created by employee agreements whereby earned compensation will be paid in the future.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstate
description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: OtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: DerivativeAssetNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentFairValue
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for net period benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: SelfInsuranceReserveCurrent
description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: DebtSecurities
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount
description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

name: DeferredIncome
description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPurchasesSalesAndSettlements
description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of increase (decrease) in plan asset of defined benefit plan from purchase, sale and settlement of trade associated with underlying investment.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesLongTerm
description: Including both current and noncurrent portions, Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndNotesReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the sum of amounts due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; and from note holders for outstanding loans.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInFourYears
description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments
