description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

name: SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

name: AccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

name: AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCosts
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemInFairValueHedge1
description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a fair value hedge recognized in the income statement.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOtherLiabilities
description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount
description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncomeCashBasisMethod
description: Amount of interest income recognized on a cash-basis method of accounting that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableCurrent
description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansAdjustmentBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, before reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedFourYears
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsOther
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards, classified as other.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingNetPeriodicBenefitCostWeightedAverageInterestCreditingRate
description: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

name: DerivativeAverageForwardExchangeRate
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDebentures
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

name: LitigationReserveCurrent
description: Carrying amount of reserve for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid within one year of the date of the statement of financial position.

name: PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitContributions
description: Amount of cash outflow for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNetIncomeAmount
description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

name: TimeDeposits100000OrMore
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedCurrentAssetsMarketableSecurities
description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities, including, but not limited to, held-to-maturity, trading and available-for-sale expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: CededPremiumsEarned
description: Amount of earned premiums ceded to other entities.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestments
description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpenseExcludingAcquiredInProcessCost
description: The costs incurred in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, excluding in-process research and development acquired in a business combination consummated during the period. Excludes software research and development, which has a separate concept.

name: AociLossCashFlowHedgeCumulativeGainLossAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsNumberOfPositions
description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossReclassificationFromAccumulatedOCIToIncomeEstimatedNetAmountToBeTransferred
description: The estimated value of gains (losses), net anticipated to be transferred in the future from accumulated other comprehensive income into earnings.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostsCreditArisingDuringPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentInProcess
description: The amount of purchased research and development assets that are acquired in a business combination have no alternative future use and are therefore written off in the period of acquisition.

name: CommonStockOtherSharesOutstanding
description: Total number of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

name: CommunicationsAndInformationTechnology
description: The amount of expense in the period for communications and data processing expense.

name: DerivativeExchangeRateCap
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAverageFixedInterestRate
description: Average fixed interest rate related to the group of interest rate derivatives.

name: DerivativeExchangeRateFloor
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GoodwillTransfers
description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToContingentlyIssuableShares
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of contingently issuable shares. Contingently issuable shares are those shares that are issuable for little or no cash contingent on certain conditions being met.

name: RestrictedStockValueSharesIssuedNetOfTaxWithholdings
description: Value, after value of shares used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement, of restricted shares issued. Excludes cash used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation.

name: TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes
description: All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.

name: DerivativeFairValueGrossAmountNotOffsetAgainstCollateralNet
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeChangesInAccountingAndExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of pro forma income from continuing operations as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: ContractWithCustomerRefundLiability
description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleNumberOfEquityInstruments
description: The number of equity instruments that the holder of the debt instrument would receive if the debt was converted to equity.

name: EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt
description: The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.

name: FairValueDisclosureOffbalanceSheetRisksAmountLiability
description: The fair value of financial liabilities, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

name: RealEstateOtherAcquisitions
description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreferencePerShare
description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: AccruedEnvironmentalLossContingenciesNoncurrent
description: Carrying value of the obligation (known or estimated) arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites, payable after twelve months or beyond the next operating cycle if longer.

name: DerivativeFinancialInstrumentsAssetsFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeFinancialInstrumentsLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentIncreaseDecreaseForPeriodNet
description: Net increase or decrease in the carrying amount of the debt instrument for the period.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBusinessCombinationsAndAcquisitionsBenefitObligation
description: Amount of increase in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from business combination.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanOtherCosts
description: Amount of defined benefit plan cost (credit), classified as other.

name: ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow for realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

name: DerivativeForwardExchangeRate
description: #N/A

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income for derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnits
description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate
description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable
description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate
description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

name: DerivativeHigherFixedInterestRateRange
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeHigherRangeOfBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeHigherVariableInterestRateRange
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfBusinessAffiliateAndProductiveAssets
description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions in which noncurrent assets are sold, which may include the sale of a business, an investment in an affiliate (including an equity method investee), property, plant and equipment and intangible assets. Excludes sales of trading, available-for-sale, and held-to-maturity securities.

name: AccruedEnvironmentalLossContingenciesCurrent
description: Carrying value of the obligation (known or estimated) arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites, payable in twelve months or in the next operating cycle if longer.

name: DirectPremiumsEarned
description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityTransfersNet
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: LinesOfCreditFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of contractual arrangement with a lender under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time.

name: RealEstateHeldforsale
description: Amount of investment in land and building held for sale. Excludes real estate considered inventory.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationBalanceOnFifthAnniversary
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedInIncomeNet
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeEffectivePortionNet
description: #N/A

name: AmortizationOfDeferredCharges
description: The amount of amortization of deferred charges applied against earnings during the period.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainRecognizedInIncome
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingAfterYearTenFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainRecognizedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeEffectivePortion
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearSixThroughTenAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in rolling sixth through tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRollingYearThree
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: InsuranceRecoveries
description: The amount recovered from insurance. These recoveries reduce costs and losses that are reported as a separate line item under operating expenses.

name: InvestmentInterestRate
description: Rate of interest on investment.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsLossRecognizedInIncome
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseClaimsPaidCurrentYear1
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle claims incurred in the current period and related claims settlement costs.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsLossRecognizedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeEffectivePortion
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAmortizationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetPriorServiceCostCreditTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: PreferredStockDividendRatePerDollarAmount
description: The amount per share used to calculated dividend payments on preferred stock.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholders
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

name: SecurityDepositLiability
description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue
description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationOtherIncome
description: Amount of other income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

name: InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of interest recognized on convertible debt instrument excluding interest on principal required to be paid in cash.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DerivativeLiabilityDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentFairValue
description: #N/A

name: NotesAndLoansPayable
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

name: OtherCommitmentDueInFourthYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ReclassificationsOfTemporaryToPermanentEquity
description: The difference between the carrying amount of a financial instrument subject to a registration payment arrangement recorded as temporary equity prior to adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2 and the carrying amount reclassified to permanent equity upon the adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2. Recorded as a cumulative effect adjustment to the beginning balance of retained earnings. Does not apply to registration payment arrangements that are no longer outstanding upon adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueNet
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueNet1
description: #N/A

name: StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAdjustedBalance1
description: Amount of stockholders' equity including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interests, after the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

name: BusinessCombinationBargainPurchaseGainRecognizedAmount
description: In a business combination in which the amount of net identifiable assets acquired and liabilities assumed exceeds the aggregate consideration transferred or to be transferred (as defined), this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity.

name: DepositLiabilitiesAccruedInterest
description: Amount of accrued but unpaid interest on deposit liabilities.

name: DerivativeLiabilityNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentFairValue
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountVolume
description: Nominal volume used to calculate payments on a derivative instrument.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfConsiderationReceived1
description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAcceleratedVestingNumber
description: Number of shares for which recognition of cost was accelerated for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividend
description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersCurrentYearClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

name: UnearnedPremiums
description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

name: BelowMarketLeaseNet
description: Amount after amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsOther
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from compensation and benefits, classified as other.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployerContributionsCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount of contributions received and expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in current fiscal year.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductions
description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetIssues
description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedCommitmentToLend
description: Amount of unfunded portion of contractual agreement to lend funds to borrower for financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

name: LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueCurrent
description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssumed1
description: The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPreferredCarryingAmount
description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

name: BenefitsLossesAndExpenses
description: The total amount of expense recognized during the period for future policy benefits, claims and claims adjustment costs, and for selling, general and administrative costs.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedNoncurrentAssets
description: Amount of assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: DerivativeLowerFixedInterestRateRange
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeLowerRangeOfBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeLowerVariableInterestRateRange
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleStockPriceTrigger
description: Price of the entity's common stock which would be required to be attained for the conversion feature embedded in the debt instrument to become effective.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetPriorServiceCostCreditAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: DerivativeBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the interest rate derivative.

name: DueToOtherRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurrent
description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsForeign
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign tax credit.

name: InterestCostsCapitalizedAdjustment
description: Amount of interest costs capitalized disclosed as an adjusting item to interest costs incurred.

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountPricePerBarrel
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountPricePerGallon
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredClaims1
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process.

name: NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees
description: Noninterest expense related to directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

name: OtherShortTermInvestments
description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

name: ProductWarrantyExpense
description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersPriorYearClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

name: WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedCurrencyLosses
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on foreign currency transactions.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInESOP
description: Sum of the allocated, committed-to-be-released and suspense shares of the entity held by the plan.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresAmountOfAvailableUnusedFunds
description: Amount of advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments
description: A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlements
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseClaimsPaidPriorYears1
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle claims incurred in prior periods and related claims settlement costs.

name: LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue
description: Amount of damages paid to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfShorttermInvestments
description: The cash inflow from maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

name: SalesCommissionsAndFees
description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

name: DevelopmentStageEnterpriseCumulativeExpense
description: #N/A

name: DevelopmentStageEnterpriseCumulativeRevenue
description: #N/A

name: DevelopmentStageEnterpriseDeficitAccumulatedDuringDevelopmentStage
description: #N/A

name: CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation
description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsLossReserves
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from loss reserves other than estimated credit losses.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvailableforSaleSecuritiesGross
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationSettlements
description: Amount of settlements of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability, measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

name: InterestRateDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets.

name: AccountsReceivableNetNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

name: DirectCostsOfHotels
description: #N/A

name: AssetsFairValueAdjustment
description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an asset could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

name: DirectCostsOfOwnedHotels
description: #N/A

name: DilutiveSecuritiesEffectOnBasicEarningsPerShareOther
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of dilutive convertible securities excluding adjustments related to ESOP convertible preferred stock, stock options, and restrictive stock units.

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

name: GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt
description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables arises from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

name: GeneralInsuranceExpense
description: The expense in the period incurred with respect to protection provided by insurance entities against risks other than risks associated with production (which are allocated to cost of sales).

name: NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent.

name: ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses
description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

name: RestructuringReserveTranslationAndOtherAdjustment
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the restructuring reserve related to foreign currency translation (gain) loss and other increases (decreases).

name: WarrantsNotSettleableInCashFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of warrants not settleable in cash classified as equity.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationAssets
description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

name: PreferredStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid
description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of preferred stock outstanding.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmountAvailableForDividendPaymentsWithoutRegulatoryApproval
description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

name: AccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of accrued expenses.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleLongLivedFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of assets classified as held for sale.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingAfterYearTenAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtConversionOriginalDebtInterestRateOfDebt
description: The rate of interest that was being paid on the original debt issue that is being converted in the noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: DerivativeAmountOfHedgedItem
description: Amount of hedged item in hedging relationship. Excludes hedged asset or liability.

name: FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRollingYearFour
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates
description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: DirectOperatingCostRoyaltyExpense
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPensionAndPostretirementObligations
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans.

name: LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedChangeInValue
description: The change in cash surrender or contract value during the period which adjusted the amount of premiums paid in determining the expense or income recognized under the contract for the period.

name: NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

name: DirectPremiumsEarnedAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsEarnedFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsEarnedLife
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsEarnedOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsEarnedPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsLifeInsuranceInForce
description: #N/A

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInFiveYears
description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

name: DirectPremiumsWrittenAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsWrittenFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsWrittenLife
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsWrittenPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueOfConsiderationGiven1
description: The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration given (for example, liability, equity) in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt
description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

name: TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldForSale1
description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueAfterFiveYears
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CashCashEquivalentsAndFederalFundsSold
description: The sum of cash and cash equivalents plus Federal Funds Sold. Cash and cash equivalents consist of short term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and are so near their maturity that they present negligible risk of changes in value due to changes in interest rates -- usually with an original maturity less than 90 days.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsSelfInsurance
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated losses under self insurance.

name: DirectOperatingCosts
description: The aggregate direct operating costs incurred during the reporting period.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseNet
description: Liability as of the balance sheet date for amounts representing estimated cost of settling unpaid claims under the terms of the underlying insurance policies, less estimated reinsurance recoveries on such claims. This includes an estimate for claims which have been incurred but not reported. Claim adjustment expenses represent the costs estimated to be incurred in the settlement of unpaid claims.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableThereafter
description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

name: OtherNotesPayable
description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfOtherIncomeLossFromDispositionOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfOtherIncomeLossFromDispositionOfDiscontinuedOperationsBeforeIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToAcquireFederalHomeLoanBankStock
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

name: SeniorLongTermNotes
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteoffsNet
description: Amount, after recoveries, of loans and leases that have been written-off.

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPropertyPlantAndEquipmentCurrent
description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeTaxHolidayAggregateDollarAmount
description: The amount of income taxes from which a reporting entity is exempt or for which it will receive a reduction in income taxes as a result of the income tax holiday granted by the taxing jurisdiction.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleCumulativeEffectOfChangeOnEquityOrNetAssets1
description: Amount of cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle or new accounting pronouncement on retained earnings or other components of equity or net assets in the statement of financial position as of the beginning of the earliest period presented.

name: OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRentals1
description: The total amount of sublease rental income recognized during the period that reduces the entity's rent expense incurred under operating leases.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankStock
description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition (sale) of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet
description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedFiveYears
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtDefaultLongtermDebtAmount
description: Amount of outstanding long-term debt or borrowing associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccountsPayable
description: Amount classified as accounts payable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: OtherNotesPayableCurrent
description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDividendsInExcessOfRetainedEarnings
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmountsWithDiscontinuedOperationBeforeDisposalTransactionCosts
description: #N/A

name: DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmountsWithDiscontinuedOperationBeforeDisposalTransactionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquityInterestInAcquireeRemeasurementGain
description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

name: EmbeddedDerivativeGainLossOnEmbeddedDerivativeNet
description: Net Increase or Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresMaximumAmountAvailable
description: Amount of maximum advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

name: IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssetsAndLiabilitiesNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating assets after deduction of noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

name: IntangibleAssetsCurrent
description: The current portion of nonphysical assets, excluding financial assets, if these assets are classified into the current and noncurrent portions.

name: NumberOfInterestRateDerivativesHeld
description: Number of interest rate derivative instruments held by the entity at the reporting date.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfOtherIncomeLossFromDispositionOfDiscontinuedOperation
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets
description: The cash inflow from disposal of asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReserves10PercentAnnualDiscountForEstimatedTimingOfCashFlows
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesEntitysShareOfEquityMethodInvesteesStandardizedDiscountedFutureNetCashFlows
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureCashInflows
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureDevelopmentCosts
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureDevelopmentCosts1
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureIncomeTaxExpense
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureIncomeTaxExpense1
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureNetCashFlows
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureProductionCosts
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesFutureProductionCosts1
description: #N/A

name: DiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesStandardizedMeasure
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupAssetsOfBusinessTransferredUnderContractualArrangement
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriodAdjustmentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for measurement period adjustment from accounting for tax effect pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to property, plant, and equipment acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: CertificatesOfDepositAtCarryingValue
description: A savings certificate entitling the Entity (that is, bearer) to receive interest at an established maturity date, based upon a fixed interest rate. A certificate of deposit may be issued in any denomination. Certificates of deposit are generally issued by commercial banks and, therefore, insured by the FDIC (up to the prescribed limit). Certificates of deposit generally restrict holders from withdrawing funds on demand without the incurrence of penalties. Generally, only certificates of deposit with original maturities of three months or less qualify as cash equivalents. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. As a related example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: DividendsPreferredStockStock
description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerShareUnfundedCommittments
description: The amount of unfunded commitments for which the entity is obligated, to those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments).

name: PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestInAffiliates
description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

name: ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

name: AssumedPremiumsEarned
description: Amount of earned premiums assumed from other entities.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureNumberOfPositions1
description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments in a continuous unrealized loss position for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes effect from exchange rate changes.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsOther
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeWriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost
description: Reflects the difference between the fair value of payments made to legally extinguish a debt and its carrying value at that time. This item excludes the write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance costs.

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConsolidatedSubsidiaries
description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or the sale of investment in consolidated subsidiaries (generally greater than 50 percent).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStockOwnershipPlan
description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: AdvancesToAffiliate
description: Long-Term advances receivable from a party that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. This does not include advances to clients.

name: CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldAmortization
description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of intangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualSharesIssued
description: Number of shares issued pursuant to the terms of a deferred compensation arrangement.

name: InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToEarningsNet
description: The amount of net gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmonetaryAssetsAcquiredLiabilitiesAssumed1
description: The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedThereafter
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityIncreaseDecreaseForContractAcquiredInBusinessCombination
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due, from business combination.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRefundAdjustmentFromSettlementWithTaxingAuthority
description: The amount of the additional liability or refund received or expected based on a final settlement with a taxing authority.

name: InsuranceCommissionsAndFees
description: Income from agency and brokerage operations (includes sales of annuities and supplemental contracts); service charges, commissions, and fees from the sale of insurance and related services; and management fees from separate accounts, deferred annuities, and universal life products.

name: NetAssetValuePerShare
description: Net asset value per share or per unit of investments in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Includes, but is not limited to, by unit, membership interest, or other ownership interest. Investment includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain hedge funds, venture capital funds, private equity funds, real estate partnerships or funds. Excludes fair value disclosure.

name: OtherCommitmentDueAfterFifthYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes pension plan.

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualPreexistingIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from changes in estimates attributable to preexisting product warranties.

name: ServicingAsset
description: Aggregate amount of servicing assets that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing assets that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriodGrantDateIntrinsicValue
description: The grant-date intrinsic value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

name: StraightLineRent
description: Difference between actual rental income due and rental income recognized on a straight-line basis.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as trading securities nor held-to-maturity securities and intended be sold or mature one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationGoodwill
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsEquityMethodInvestments
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from equity method investments.

name: InvestmentInFederalHomeLoanBankStockFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of investments in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

name: NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

name: OtherCommitmentDueInFifthYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherDeferredCostsNet
description: Net amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationIntangibleAssetsNet
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeVariableInterestRate
description: Variable interest rate in effect as of the balance sheet date related to the interest rate derivative.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfAllocatedShares
description: The shares or units in an ESOP trust that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula. IRS rules require allocations to be nondiscriminatory generally based on compensation, length of service, or a combination of both. For any particular participant such shares or units may be vested, unvested, or partially vested.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationInventory
description: #N/A

name: NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossCurrent
description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToRelatedParties
description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationLongLivedAssets
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationLongLivedAssetsCurrent
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationLongLivedAssetsNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: SponsorFees
description: Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentInventory
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to inventory acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: CashDividendsPaidToParentCompanyByConsolidatedSubsidiaries
description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationIntangibleAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationInventory1
description: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueUpwardPriceAdjustmentAnnualAmount
description: Amount of gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossNetOfTax
description: The difference between the reacquisition price and the net carrying amount of the extinguished debt recognized currently as a component of income in the period of extinguishment, net of tax.

name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

name: ImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties
description: The expense recorded to reduce the value of oil and gas assets consisting of proved properties and unproved properties as the estimate of future successful production from these properties is reduced.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInterestInAffiliates
description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

name: PaymentsOfLoanCosts
description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

name: PercentageOfLIFOInventory
description: The percentage of LIFO (last in first out) inventory to total inventory as of the balance sheet date if other than 100 percent.

name: PreferredStockRedemptionAmount
description: The redemption (or callable) amount of currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not currently declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransfersAndChanges
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, from reclassification, impairment, donation, or changes classified as other. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassAccumulatedDeprecation
description: The total charge for the use of long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetGross
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer, when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: FeesAndCommissionsMortgageBankingAndServicing
description: Income from mortgage banking activities (fees and commissions) and servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others net of any related impairment of capitalized service costs. Also includes any premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees on such loans only as earned over the life of the loans.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfBusiness
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

name: ProceedsFromLegalSettlements
description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet
description: #N/A

name: AdvancesOnInventoryPurchases
description: Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CommonStockShareSubscribedButUnissuedSubscriptionsReceivable
description: Amount of subscription receivable from investors who have been allocated common stock.

name: DeferredCompensationShareBasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

name: DisposalGroupLiabilitiesOfBusinessTransferredUnderContractualArrangement
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsGeneralBusiness
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible general business tax credit carryforwards.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxLiabilities
description: Amount classified as deferred tax liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromTwoToThreeYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DistributionAndServicingFees
description: #N/A

name: DistributionFees
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivablesImpairedTroubledDebtRestructuringWriteDown
description: Reflects the amount of the write-down related to a troubled debt restructuring.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverables
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

name: RestructuringReserveNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and estimated costs associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, which are expected to be paid after one year or beyond the next operating cycle, if longer. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.

name: AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncomeTaxEffectFromShareBasedCompensationNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit (deficiency) associated with an share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

name: CommonUnitOutstanding
description: Number of common units of ownership outstanding of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLossImmediateRecognitionAsComponentInNetPeriodicBenefitCostCredit
description: Amount of gain (loss), recognized immediately as component of net periodic benefit (cost) credit, for change in value of benefit obligation or plan assets from experience different from that assumed, change in actuarial assumption, or consequence of temporarily deviating from substantive plan. Includes, but is not limited to, amount in excess of 10 percent of greater of fair value of plan assets or benefit obligation.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationCashFlowEffectCashUsedToSettleAwards
description: Aggregate cash paid by the entity during the period to settle equity instruments granted under equity-based payment arrangements.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: IndefiniteLivedTradeNames
description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through registration of a trade name to gain or protect exclusive use thereof for a projected indefinite period of benefit.

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerCashDistribution
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerCashDistributionsDeclared
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerCashDistributionsPaid
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerDistributionsDeclaredPerUnit
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerDistributionsPaidPerUnit
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerPerUnitAmount
