description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerShareDistribution
description: #N/A

name: DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartnerShareDistributionDilutionPerShare
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: AssetsHeldInTrustCurrent
description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate within one year of the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCost
description: The amount as of the balance sheet date of the estimated future tax effects attributable to policy acquisition costs being expensed for tax purposes but capitalized in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles, which will reverse in future periods when amortization of such capitalized costs cannot be deducted for tax purposes.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from unrealized gains in other comprehensive income.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until disposal.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationGoodwillNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

name: TenantImprovements
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of improvements having a life longer than one year that were made for the benefit of one or more tenants.

name: DividendPaymentRestrictionsScheduleAmountsPaid
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesFairValue
description: Fair value of acquired receivable from business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in transfer.

name: CommonUnitIssued
description: Number of common units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

name: CostMethodInvestments
description: Amount, after adjustment, of cost-method investment. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, dividends received in excess of earnings after date of investment that are considered a return of investment and other than temporary impairments.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromOneToTwoYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterestLostOnNonaccrualLoans
description: Reflects the amount of additional interest income that would have been recorded if impaired or nonperforming loans were instead current, in compliance with their original terms, and outstanding throughout the reporting period or since origination (if held for part of the period).

name: OffBalanceSheetCreditLossLiabilityCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss for off-balance sheet credit exposure. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferredStock
description: The cash outflow for reacquisition of callable preferred stock.

name: RealEstateInvestments
description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

name: SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairValue
description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions.

name: DividendsPayable
description: #N/A

name: DividendsPayableAmount
description: #N/A

name: AmortizationOfAboveAndBelowMarketLeases
description: Amount of non-cash amortization of intangible asset (liability) for above and below market leases.

name: DevelopmentInProcess
description: The current amount of expenditures for a real estate project that has not yet been completed.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseResearchAndDevelopment
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research and development expense.

name: FairValueDisclosureOffbalanceSheetRisksFaceAmountLiability
description: The face amount of financial liabilities, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedSalaries
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in accrued salaries.

name: OperatingLeasePaymentsUse
description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

name: OtherEmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of obligations incurred for employer-related costs classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: PaymentsForRoyalties
description: The amount of cash paid for royalties during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

name: AccruedSalariesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided.

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on receivable, classified as other and current.

name: CustomerRefundLiabilityCurrent
description: Current regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

name: DepreciationAndAmortizationDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of deprecation and amortization expense attributable to property, plant and equipment and intangible assets of discontinued operations.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedInIncomeIneffectivePortionAndAmountExcludedFromEffectivenessTestingNet
description: The portion of gains and losses (net) on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments representing (a) the amount of the hedge ineffectiveness and (b) the amount, if any, excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseMealsAndEntertainment
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to meals and entertainment expense.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRollingYearFive
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of assets, excluding financial assets, that lack physical substance, having a limited useful life.

name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionLossBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized loss recognized in the income statement.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

name: InventoryNoncurrent
description: Inventories not expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle.

name: PrepaidAdvertising
description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAmortization1
description: Amount of amortization of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: AociTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationAsset
description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

name: CashDivestedFromDeconsolidation
description: Reduction in cash due to no longer including the former subsidiary's cash in the consolidated entity's cash.

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmount
description: Nominal number of units used to calculate payment on derivative.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationIssues
description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionOfShorttermInvestments
description: The cash inflow from sales, maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

name: TravelAndEntertainmentExpense
description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

name: CapitalUnitsAuthorized
description: Number of authorized capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountEnergyMeasure
description: Nominal energy measure used to calculate payments on a derivative instrument.

name: DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationLossGainOnWriteDown
description: Amount, before tax, of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

name: InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount
description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

name: LoanProcessingFee
description: Expenses paid for obtaining loans which includes expenses such as application and origination fees.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionIntangibleAssetsAcquired1
description: The amount of intangibles that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: DueToAffiliate
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, on foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

name: OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue
description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

name: CapitalizedContractCostGross
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

name: DueToEmployees
description: #N/A

name: CededPremiumsWritten
description: Amount of written premiums ceded to other entities.

name: ContractualObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsDueRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance
description: The aggregate costs of keeping the property in good condition but that do not appreciably prolong the life or increase the value of the property.

name: DueToOfficersOrStockholders
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDispositionOfBusiness
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersOutOfLevel3
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: GainLossOnFairValueHedgesRecognizedInEarnings
description: Total amount of gain (loss) derived from fair value hedges recognized in earnings in the period.

name: DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: DueToRelatedParties
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the balance sheet value of capitalized sales costs that are associated with acquiring a new insurance customers.

name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesOther
description: Amount of other operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued
description: The number of limited partner units issued.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForFees
description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

name: SecuredDebtCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

name: EarningsLossesOfMinorityInterestAndEquityMethodInvestments
description: #N/A

name: TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod
description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltiesExpense
description: Amount of expense for penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

name: IncomeTaxesReceivableNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

name: OtherLongTermDebtCurrent
description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment
description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

name: StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsReceivable
description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

name: TemporaryEquityDividendsAdjustment
description: Accretion of temporary equity during the period due to cash, stock, and in-kind dividends. This item is an adjustment to net income necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders and is to be distinguished from Temporary Equity, Accretion of Dividends (Temporary Equity, Accretion of Dividends).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYield
description: Amount of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: EffectOfChangeInCashFlowProjectionEstimate
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccruals
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from reserves and accruals.

name: ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedDuringNext12Months
description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges at the reporting date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next 12 months.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndConsumerNet
description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

name: NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners
description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

name: PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets
description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivities
description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.

name: ShorttermDebtMaximumMonthendOutstandingAmount
description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, maximum month-end borrowings during the period.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: EffectOfFourthQuarterEventsAmount
description: #N/A

name: DemandDepositAccounts
description: The amount of money in accounts that may bear interest and that the depositor is entitled to withdraw at any time without prior notice.

name: EffectOnAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDueToChangeInMeasurementDateBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDueToChangeInMeasurementDateNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDueToChangeInMeasurementDateTax
description: #N/A

name: LoansPayableToBank
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: MortgagesHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of mortgage loans held-for-sale.

name: EffectOnFutureEarningsAndCashFlowsAmount
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnFutureEarningsAndCashFlowsOffsetAmount
description: #N/A

name: OtherAmortizationOfDeferredCharges
description: Amount of amortization of other deferred costs recognized in the income statement.

name: EffectOnOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDueToChangeInMeasurementDateNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnRetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficitDueToChangeInMeasurementDateBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnRetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficitDueToChangeInMeasurementDateNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnRetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficitDueToChangeInMeasurementDateTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherRealEstateOwnedMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure real estate owned by financial institution by financial institution which is not directly related to its business.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment.

name: RealEstateTaxExpense
description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

name: RestrictedInvestments
description: Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

name: ServicingAssetMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure servicing asset.

name: WarrantExercisePriceIncrease
description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAdministrationExpenses
description: Amount of administration expense of defined benefit plan which decreases plan assets. Excludes plan administration expense paid by employer.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossLiabilityIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiRealizedGain
description: Amount of realized gain from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndOtherOperatingLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations incurred but not paid, and operating obligations classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current portion (due within one year or one business cycle) of obligations evidenced by formal promissory notes.

name: InvestmentIncomeNetAmortizationOfDiscountAndPremium
description: Amount of accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) on nonoperating securities.

name: JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrust
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateInterestRate
description: Interest rate of mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: NotesReduction
description: The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationTaxParent
description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

name: AccruedAdvertisingCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AccruedRentCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements.

name: DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsQualifiedProductionActivities
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for qualified production activity.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfLoansAndLeases
description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans and leases that were sold during the reporting period. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sales. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: ImpairmentOfLeasehold
description: The adjustment to reduce the value of existing agreements that specify the lessee's rights to use the leased property. This expense is charged when the estimates of future profits generated by the leased property are reduced.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidTaxes
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits in future periods.

name: InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets
description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category has a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

name: RetainedEarningsAppropriated
description: A segregation of retained earnings which is unavailable for dividend distribution. Includes also retained earnings appropriated for loss contingencies.

name: BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferredIncludingEquityInterestInAcquireeHeldPriorToCombination1
description: Fair value at acquisition-date of the assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interests issued by the acquirer, including but not limited to, instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

name: CapitalExpenditureDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of capital expenditure attributable to discontinued operations.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsInvestmentInSubsidiaries
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the entity's investment in its wholly-owned subsidiaries.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilitySales
description: Amount of sales of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease due in next rolling 12 months following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

name: LossContingencyNumberOfDefendants
description: Number of defendants named in a legal action.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabilityInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow, made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability.

name: ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncurredAmountCeded
description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustments
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

name: RetainedEarningsUnappropriated
description: A segregation of retained earnings which is available for dividend distribution. Earnings not paid out as dividends but instead reinvested in the core business or used to pay off debt. Unappropriated profit is part of shareholder equity. Also called cumulative distributions or earned surplus or accumulated earnings or unappropriated profit.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAdditions
description: Amount of additions from purchases, assumption or transfer to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of income tax expense from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit
description: Unused amount of commitments to extend credit to customers.

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesReservesOfBusinessesAcquired
description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from business combination.

name: AmortizationOfLeasedAsset
description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized leases. This element may apply to energy companies that lease mineral producing properties and to other enterprises that capitalize property, plant, or equipment obtained through capital leases.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of financial liabilities assumed (as defined) which have been recognized as of the acquisition date.

name: CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAccretion
description: Amount of accretion recognized for the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ConcentrationRiskCreditRiskFinancialInstrumentMaximumExposure
description: Maximum amount of loss due to credit risk that, based on the gross fair value of the financial instrument, the entity would incur if parties to the financial instruments that make up the concentration failed completely to perform according to the terms of the contracts and the collateral or other security, if any, for the amount due proved to be of no value to the entity.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DefinedBenefitPensionPlanCurrentAndNoncurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against an obligation to return collateral.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against the right to receive collateral.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxSettlements
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

name: EnvironmentalRemediationExpense
description: The charge against earnings in the period for known or estimated future costs arising from requirements to perform environmental remediation activities.

name: IncomeTaxHolidayIncomeTaxBenefitsPerShare
description: Per share amount effect of the income tax benefit resulting from the income tax holidays granted by taxing jurisdictions.

name: InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFederalReserveBankAdvancesLongTerm
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on long-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.

name: OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses
description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

name: PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

name: EffectsOfUnrealizedHoldingGainLossOnPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits
description: #N/A

name: PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment
description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

name: ElectricDomesticRegulatedRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricProductionExpense
description: #N/A

name: ElectricUtilityRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricWorldwideUnregulatedRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricalDistributionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricalGenerationRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricalTransmissionAndDistributionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ElectricalTransmissionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndInterestsInAffiliates
description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a business segment or subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled during the period (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsidiariesAndAffiliates
description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

name: RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt
description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangementsGross
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossAssetIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDistributionsPaid
description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

name: ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensationFinancingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow from realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

name: EmbeddedServiceCosts
description: #N/A

name: ExplorationExpense
description: Exploration expenses (including prospecting) related to oil and gas producing entities and would be included in operating expenses of that entity. Costs incurred in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: (i) Costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or "G&G" costs. (ii) Costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, and the maintenance of land and lease records. (iii) Dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions. (iv) Costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells. (v) Costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in carrying value of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

name: EmployeeRelatedLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnSaleOfEquityInvestments
description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of equity securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading or available-for-sale. This element includes investments in which the entity holds a small ownership stake (generally, less than 20 percent of the shares outstanding) and cannot exert significant influence.

name: LoansPayableFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of contractual obligation to pay money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesAssumed1
description: The amount of payables that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInThreeMonthsOrLess
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationCashReceivedFromExerciseOfStockOptions
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMaturitySecurities
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationEstimatedQuantityOfSharesToBeRepurchasedInFollowingPeriodMinimum
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfTradingSecuritiesHeldforinvestment
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition
description: #N/A

name: SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTransaction
description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company before stock transaction.

name: UnsecuredLongTermDebt
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

name: WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOutstanding
description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

name: AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesStockOptionsAndRestrictiveStockUnits
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTaxBenefitRealizedFromExerciseOfStockOptions
description: #N/A

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationUnrecognizedCompensationCostsOnNonvestedAwards
description: #N/A

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationUnrecognizedCompensationCostsOnNonvestedAwardsWeightedAveragePeriodOfRecognition
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedComputerSoftwareImpairments1
description: Amount of impairment loss from capitalized computer software costs.

name: DeferredRevenueAdditions
description: Amount of deferred revenue recognized for transactions arising during the current reporting period. Deferred revenue is a liability as of the balance sheet date related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an Entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBusinessCombinationsAndAcquisitionsPlanAssets
description: Amount of increase in plan assets of defined benefit plan from business combination.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointIncreaseOnAccumulatedPostretirementBenefitObligation
description: Amount of increase in accumulated postretirement benefit obligation from one-percentage-point increase in assumed health care cost trend rate.

name: DepositLiabilityCurrent
description: The current portion, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of deposits held other than customer deposits.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesLiabilities
description: Sum as of the balance sheet date of the (a) fair values of all liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, and (b) the carrying amounts of the liabilities arising from financial instruments or contracts used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be extinguished or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, net of the effects of master netting arrangements.

name: LossContingencyReceivable
description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

name: NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: OperatingLeasesRentExpenseContingentRentals
description: The increases or decreases in lease payments that result from changes occurring after the inception of the lease in the factors (other than the passage of time) on which lease payments are based, except that any escalation of minimum lease payments relating to increases in construction or acquisition cost of the leased property or for increases in some measure of cost or value during the construction or preconstruction period, are excluded from contingent rentals. Contingent rentals also may include amounts for which the triggering events have not yet occurred or the specified targets for which have not yet been achieved (such as sales based percentage rent), but which events are considered probable of occurring or which specified targets are considered probable of being achieved.

name: PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfWarrants
description: The aggregate amount paid by the entity to reacquire the right to purchase equity shares at a predetermined price, usually issued together with corporate debt.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment
description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from other long-term debt.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostNumberOfPositionsEliminatedPeriodPercent
description: The number of positions eliminated during the period as a percentage of total positions eliminated during the period in connection with the restructuring plan(s).

name: ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAtFairValueAssumptionsUsedToEstimateFairValueDiscountRate
description: Discount rate used to estimate the fair value of servicing assets and servicing liabilities.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsCumulativePaidClaimsAndAllocatedClaimAdjustmentExpenseNet
description: Amount, after reinsurance, of paid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the number of shares issued.

name: AdditionalCollateralAggregateFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value of additional assets that would be required to be posted as collateral for derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features if the credit-risk-related contingent features were triggered at the end of the reporting period.

name: AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: BilledContractReceivables
description: Amounts due for billed services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the Company and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts billed to customers under contracts or programs but not paid as of the balance sheet date.

name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: ExcessStockSharesIssued
description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromThreeToFourYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LongTermLoansFromBank
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.

name: OtherInventorySupplies
description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other supplies used within the manufacturing or production process expected to be consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalHomeLoanBankStock
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

name: ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable
description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

name: RentalIncomeNonoperating
description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

name: RestructuringReserveAcceleratedDepreciation
description: Amount of accelerated depreciation charged against earnings associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring plan.

name: StockholdersEquityPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) in stockholders' equity during the period.

name: TemporaryEquityValueExcludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Carrying amount of the par value of temporary equity outstanding. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncreaseInCarryingAmountOfRedeemablePreferredStock
description: Amount of decrease (increase) in additional paid in capital (APIC) for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of allowance reserve for credit loss.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedEquipment
description: Amount of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: DividendsCommonStockStock
description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoffAfterRecovery
description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: FiniteLivedPatentsGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of the costs pertaining to the exclusive legal rights granted to the owner of the patent to exploit an invention or a process for a period of time specified by law. Such costs may have been expended to directly apply and receive patent rights, or to acquire such rights.

name: GoodwillFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasLongLivedAssetsInEntitysCountryOfDomicile
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasLongLivedAssetsInForeignCountries
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasLongLivedAssetsInIndividualForeignCountriesAmount
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasRevenueFromExternalCustomersAttributedToEntitysCountryOfDomicile
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasRevenueFromExternalCustomersAttributedToForeignCountries
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideDisclosureOnGeographicAreasRevenueFromExternalCustomersAttributedToIndividualForeignCountriesAmount
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideInformationRevenueFromExternalCustomerAmount
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideRevenueMajorCustomerAmount
description: #N/A

name: EntityWideRevenueMajorCustomerPercentage
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalCostRecognizedCapitalizedInPeriod
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalCostRecognizedRecoveryCreditedToExpense
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalCostsOfPropertyForSaleDisposalOrAbandonmentAccruedExitCosts
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalCostsOfPropertyForSaleDisposalOrAbandonmentAnticipatedExitCosts
description: #N/A

name: HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged liability in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateNetCarryingAmount
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInTradingSecurities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in debt and equity securities, measured at fair value with changes in fair value recognized in net income.

name: NontradeReceivablesCurrent
description: The sum of amounts currently receivable other than from customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: RegulatoryAssetsNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are not expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: SettlementLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amounts payable for money transfers, money orders, and consumer payment service arrangements. Settlement liabilities include amounts payable to intermediaries for global payment transfers.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationArrangementsChangeInAmountOfContingentConsiderationAsset1
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of right to a contingent consideration asset.

name: Communication
description: The amount of expense incurred in the period for communication, which is the exchange of information by several methods.

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsReasonablyPossibleAdditionalLossesHighEstimate
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsReasonablyPossibleAdditionalLossesLowEstimate
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsAssetRetirementObligations
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from asset retirement obligations. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsReturnsAndAllowances
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated returns and sales allowances.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointDecreaseOnAccumulatedPostretirementBenefitObligation1
description: Amount of decrease in accumulated postretirement benefit obligation from one-percentage-point decrease in assumed health care cost trend rate.

name: EquityContributionsToFinanceLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: ForeclosedAssets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance; includes real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.

name: EquityFinancingForLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: EquityIssuanceDollarAmountPerShare
description: #N/A

name: EquityIssuanceNumberOfEquitySecuritiesIssuedForCash
description: #N/A

name: EquityIssuanceNumberOfEquitySecuritiesIssuedForNoncashConsiderations
description: #N/A

name: EquityIssuancePerShareAmount
description: #N/A

name: EquityIssuanceTotalDollarAmount
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInReinsuranceRecoverable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date for all guaranteed benefit types.

name: LoansPayableToBankCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

name: NetRentableArea
description: Net rentable area for properties owned.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinalizationOfPensionAndNonPensionPostretirementPlanValuationNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentNetSalesProceeds
description: #N/A

name: RegulatoryAssets
description: The amount for the individual regulatory asset as itemized in a table of regulatory assets as of the end of the period.

name: RegulatoryLiabilityNoncurrent
description: The amount for the individual regulatory noncurrent liability as itemized in a table of regulatory noncurrent liabilities as of the end of the period.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions
description: The value of new servicing assets, subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through purchases or from transfers of financial assets.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredClaimsAndAllocatedClaimAdjustmentExpenseNet
description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommodityContracts
description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: WarrantExercisePriceDecrease
description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationCostOfSalesOrRevenue
description: #N/A

name: AccumulatedDistributionsInExcessOfNetIncome
description: The amount as of the balance sheet date by which cumulative distributions to shareholders (or partners) exceed retained earnings (or accumulated earnings).

name: BelowMarketLeaseGross
description: Amount before amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanSpecialTerminationBenefits
description: Amount of increase in benefit obligation for benefits provided to employees payable from defined benefit plan or payable upon retirement.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLossFromDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperation
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestment
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to investment tax credit.

name: JuniorSubordinatedNotes
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciple
description: #N/A

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquityStrikePrice1
description: Exercise or strike price stated in the contract for options indexed to the issuer's equity shares.

name: PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProceedsFromInterestReceived
description: Interest received on loans and other debt instruments during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationNetSalesOrGrossRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers.

name: RedeemablePreferredStockDividends
description: Dividends paid to preferred stock holders that is redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

name: RestrictedCashAndInvestmentsCurrent
description: The current cash, cash equivalents and investments that are restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes current cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsExpectedDividendPayments
description: The estimated amount of dividends to be paid to holders of the underlying shares (expected dividends) over the option's term. Dividends are taken into account because payment of dividends to shareholders reduces the fair value of the underlying shares, and option holders generally do not receive dividends.

name: TemporaryEquityAggregateAmountOfRedemptionRequirement
description: Aggregate amount of redemption requirements for each class or type of redeemable stock classified as temporary equity for each of the five years following the latest balance sheet date. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

name: TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustments
description: Adjustments to temporary equity resulting from foreign currency translation adjustments.

name: BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquityInterestInAcquireeIncludingSubsequentAcquisitionPercentage
description: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination achieved in stages, including equity interests in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date and acquired at the acquisition date.

name: ConstructionInProgressExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid
description: Future cash outflow to pay for construction in progress expenditures that have occurred.

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityChangeInTimeframePerformanceObligationSatisfiedRevenueRecognized
description: Amount of revenue recognized arising from contract liability from change in timeframe for performance obligation to be satisfied.

name: CustomerDepositsCurrent
description: The current portion of money or property received from customers which is either to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or applied to customer receivables in accordance with the terms of the contract or the understandings.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: FixturesAndEquipmentGross
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of fixtures and equipment. Includes, but is not limited to, machinery, equipment, and engines.

name: InsuranceSettlementsReceivable
description: Amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetInvestmentHedgeGainLossBeforeReclassificationAndTax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed
description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabilityOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability exceeding amount recognized at acquisition date. Includes, but is not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffering
description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecurities
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedNumberOfPositionsEliminated
description: The expected number of positions to be eliminated as a result of restructuring activities.

name: SelfInsuranceReserveNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

name: AccruedPayrollTaxesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsCompensatedAbsences
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from compensated absences (includes, but not limited to, sick and personal days).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointIncreaseOnServiceAndInterestCostComponents
description: Amount of increase in service and interest cost components of net periodic postretirement benefit cost from one-percentage-point increase in assumed health care cost trend rate.

name: DerivativeCapInterestRate
description: Cap rate on an interest rate derivative such as an interest rate cap or collar. If market rates exceed the cap rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

name: IndefiniteLivedTrademarks
description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style for a projected indefinite period of benefit.

name: InterestExpenseTimeDeposits
description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRecognizedInEarnings
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.

name: PremiumsWrittenNet
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquity
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings
description: The cash inflow from sale of buildings.

name: EscrowDepositDisbursementsRelatedToPropertyAcquisition
description: #N/A

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockSplits
description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of a stock split.

name: SubsidiaryOfLimitedLiabilityCompanyOrLimitedPartnershipOwnershipInterest
