description: The number of units or percentage investment held in the subsidiary by the limited liability company or limited partnership.

name: AssetAcquisitionConsiderationTransferred
description: Amount of consideration transferred in asset acquisition. Includes, but is not limited to, cash, liability incurred by acquirer, and equity interest issued by acquirer.

name: CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Amount of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock issued.

name: FederalFundsPurchased
description: Amount of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedge
description: Amount of liability hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits
description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

name: InterestExpenseOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of interest expense incurred on long-term debt classified as other, including, but not limited to, interest on long-term notes and amortization of issuance costs.

name: InvestmentBankingAdvisoryBrokerageAndUnderwritingFeesAndCommissions
description: Amount of fees and commissions from banking, advisory, brokerage, and securities underwriting activities. Activities include, but are not limited to, underwriting securities, private placements of securities, investment advisory and management services, merger and acquisition services, sale and servicing of mutual funds, and other related consulting fees.

name: LossContingencyRangeOfPossibleLossPortionNotAccrued
description: The difference between the maximum amount of estimated loss and the amount recorded as of the balance sheet date.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount, before reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

name: PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledged
description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet
description: Percentage of assumed premium earned to premium earned after effects of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information.

name: PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperatingLeaseNet
description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation, of lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligation
description: Amount of the recorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

name: RegulatoryLiabilities
description: The amount for the individual regulatory liability as itemized in a table of regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

name: TransferToInvestments
description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

name: VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCarryingAmountAssets
description: Carrying amount of the assets in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsTransferredToFromPlan
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from assets transferred into (from) plan.

name: DerivativeAssetNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative asset.

name: ExpectedAmortizationExpenseOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearFive
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedAmortizationExpenseOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearFour
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedAmortizationExpenseOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearOne
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedAmortizationExpenseOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearThree
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedAmortizationExpenseOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: DirectPremiumsWritten
description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount classified as accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: ExperienceRatedRefundsPayable
description: #N/A

name: ExperienceRatedRefundsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationCurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of current liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: ExplorationAndProductionCosts
description: #N/A

name: ExplorationAndProductionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: GrantsReceivable
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductionsDividends
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend.

name: ExplorationExpenseMining
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in investment income that has been earned but not yet received in cash.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFaceAmountOfMortgages
description: Amount of contractual principal due at origination of mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: NumberOfUnitsInRealEstateProperty
description: The number of units in a real estate property owned as of the balance sheet date.

name: ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInterestRate
description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualCurrencyTranslationIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOutstandingDiluted
description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossNotPreviouslyRecorded
description: Amount of expense for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), for which no credit loss was previously recorded.

name: DirectCostsOfLeasedAndRentedPropertyOrEquipment
description: Amount of expense incurred and directly related to generating revenue by lessor from operating lease of rented property and equipment.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationCurrentAssets
description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationEquity
description: Amount of equity, including noncontrolling interest, reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainLossOnRepurchaseOfDebtInstrument
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the difference between the repurchase price of a debt instrument initially issued by the entity and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its repurchase.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBeforeOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount, before other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) accretion, of investment in debt securities measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions
description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInUnearnedPremiums
description: Amount of increase (decrease) unearned premiums written. Excludes portion of unearned premiums amortized into income.

name: LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate
description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of finance lease payments.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsCreditLossesOnDebtSecuritiesHeld
description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

name: ExtraordinaryItemEarningsPerShareImpactNet
description: #N/A

name: ExtraordinaryItemGainOrLossNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: #N/A

name: ExtraordinaryItemGainOrLossNetOfTaxAttributableToReportingEntity
description: #N/A

name: ExtraordinaryItemNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: ExtraordinaryItemOfInvestee
description: #N/A

name: ExtraordinaryItemsGross
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsOtherLossCarryforwards
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible loss carryforwards, classified as other.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentagePointDecreaseOnServiceAndInterestCostComponents1
description: Amount of decrease in service and interest cost components of net periodic postretirement benefit cost from one-percentage-point decrease in assumed health care cost trend rate.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as an asset.

name: DerivativeLiabilityNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and contract can be net settled by means outside contract or delivery of asset, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative liability.

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCash
description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankStockAndFederalReserveBankStock
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) and Federal Reserve Bank stock.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutstanding
description: The number of general partner units outstanding.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositDemand
description: Amount of money in interest-bearing domestic accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits.

name: InventorySuppliesNetOfReserves
description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of products used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process, which may or may not become part of the final product. May also include items used in the storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods.

name: FacilityMembershipAndOperationsCosts
description: #N/A

name: FacilityMembershipAndOperationsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentsAndOtherNoncurrentAssets
description: Amount of investments, and noncurrent assets classified as other.

name: NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

name: OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses
description: Amount of gain (loss) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEquipment
description: The cash inflow to dispose of long-lived, physical assets and mineral interests in oil and gas properties used for normal oil and gas operations.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivable
description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsShareBasedLiabilitiesPaid
description: Amount of cash paid to settle liability for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearOne
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the first year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisAccountsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisCashAndCashEquivalents
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsUnearnedPremiumsReserve
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the unearned premiums reserve.

name: FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLossIncludedInInvestmentIncome
description: #N/A

description: #N/A

description: #N/A

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquivalentsContinuingOperations
description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in continuing operations held in foreign currencies.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSingleMaturityDateAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingAssets
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of assets used to generate operating income.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableBeforeFeesGross
description: Amount, before allowance and fees, of loans and leases receivable. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLongtermInvestments
description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

name: ReceivablesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of receivables, including, but not limited to, trade account receivables, note receivables, and loan receivables.

name: RegulatoryLiabilityCurrent
description: The amount for the individual regulatory current liability as itemized in a table of regulatory current liabilities as of the end of the period.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearThree
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the third year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearTwo
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the second year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredButNotReportedIbnrClaimsLiabilityNet
description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred-but-not-reported (IBNR) liabilities plus expected development on reported claims, for claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

name: StockDividendsShares
description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

name: StockholdersEquityBeforeTreasuryStock
description: Total amount of stockholders' equity (deficit) items including stock value, paid in capital, retained earnings and including equity attributable to noncontrolling interests and before deducting the carrying value of treasury stock.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsAdditionalDisclosuresAcquisitionCostExpensed
description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of acquisition related costs which have been expensed.

name: ContributionOfProperty
description: Value of property contributed in noncash investing and financing activities.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

name: DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as current. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxAssets
description: Amount classified as deferred tax assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of noncurrent assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: FairValueDisclosureOffBalanceSheetRisksAmount
description: #N/A

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmentsAcquired1
description: The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent entity.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensation
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfCommercialPaper
description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from issuing (borrowing) and repaying commercial paper.

name: RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCostsCapitalizedSubsequentToAcquisitionImprovements
description: Amount of land and buildings and improvements made to real estate investments and capitalized after acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

description: #N/A

name: FairValueFinancialAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisCashSurrenderValue
description: #N/A

name: RegulatoryAssetsCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Such costs are capitalized if they meet both of the following criteria: a. It is probable that future revenue in an amount at least equal to the capitalized cost will result from inclusion of that cost in allowable costs for rate-making purposes. b. Based on available evidence, the future revenue will be provided to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost rather than to provide for expected levels of similar future costs. If the revenue will be provided through an automatic rate-adjustment clause, this criterion requires that the regulator's intent clearly be to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearFour
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the fourth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

description: #N/A

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsNumberOfReportedClaims
description: Cumulative number of reported claims for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: AmortizationOfDeferredSalesCommissions
description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period for the periodic realization of capitalized fees that were paid to salespeople, distributors, brokers, and agents at the time of the conclusion of the sale. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: ContingentConsiderationClassifiedAsEquityFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of contingent consideration in a business combination that is classified in shareholders' equity.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmountsRecognizedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetPriorServiceCostCreditBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income from prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

name: DepositLiabilitiesReclassifiedAsLoansReceivable1
description: Amount of deposits held by the entity that have been reclassified as loan balances receivable, for example, but not limited to, overdrafts receivable.

name: NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners
description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansAdjustmentBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsAndTax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense
description: Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

name: ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable
description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerShareSaleForOtherThanNAVAmount
description: #N/A

name: RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCostsCapitalizedSubsequentToAcquisitionCarryingCosts
description: Amount of cost capitalized subsequent to acquisition for real estate investment property, including, but not limited to, real estate tax and insurance, by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes initial purchase price and improvement, and real estate not held as investment or interest.

description: #N/A

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerShareUnobservableInputUnrealizedLossesIncludedInEarnings
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAmount
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAmount
description: #N/A

name: RedemptionPremium
description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisAccountsPayable
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisBorrowings
description: #N/A

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearFive
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the fifth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLossIncludedInInvestmentIncome
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLossIncludedInOtherIncome
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLossIncludedInTradingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisCommitments
description: #N/A

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualPreexistingIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the standard product warranty accrual from changes in estimates attributable to preexisting product warranties. Excludes extended product warranties.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisDerivativeFinancialInstrumentsLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisFederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInInvestmentIncome
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInOtherIncome
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInTradingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGuarantees
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisInvestmentContracts
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisMandatorilyRedeemablePreferredStock
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEquityComponentOfConvertibleDebtSubsequentAdjustments
description: The amount of subsequent adjustments to additional paid in capital for convertible financial instruments where a component of equity and a component of debt are recognized.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisSecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: #N/A

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisSecuritiesSoldNotYetPurchased
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShareBasedCompensationEmployeeStockPurchaseProgramRequisiteServicePeriodRecognition
description: Amount of increase in additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for employee stock purchase program (ESPP) award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisTradingLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGain
description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FairValueMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInEarnings
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasuredOnRecurringBasisInvestments
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecurities
description: Amount of equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor as trading.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedContingentLiability
description: The amount of liability arising from an inherited contingency (as defined) which has been recognized as of the acquisition date.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetAndLiabilityGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetGainLossIncludedInEarnings
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedLand
description: Amount of real estate acquired, at the acquisition date.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCostsAndOtherAssets
description: Amount of deferred cost assets and assets classified as other.

name: ExciseAndSalesTaxes
description: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.

name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossAndFee
description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, fee, and loan in process, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and net investment in lease.

name: ForeignEarningsRepatriated
description: Amount of foreign earnings repatriated from subsidiaries outside the country of domicile.

name: GrossInvestmentIncomeOperating
description: Amount, before investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationEstimateOfPossibleLoss
description: Estimated amount of loss resulting from an adverse tax position.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyAndOtherTaxesPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for non-income-related taxes.

name: InterestRateCashFlowHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: LongTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRateOverTime
description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

name: ManagementFeePayable
description: Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.

name: NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperations
description: The increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's continuing operating, investing, and financing activities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a debit balance consistent with its label.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityGainLossIncludedInEarnings
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityIssues
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityPurchases
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityPurchasesSalesIssuesSettlements
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquitySettlements
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityTransfersIntoLevel3
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityTransfersNet
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquityTransfersOutOfLevel3
description: #N/A

name: NoncontrollingInterestInVariableInterestEntity
description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a variable interest entity (VIE) not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity. That is, this is the portion of equity in a VIE that is attributable to the noncontrolling interest (previously referred to as minority interest).

name: PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActivities
description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentSalvageValuePercentage
description: Stated as a percentage, the estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose) divided by its [historical] capitalized cost.

name: PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperatingLeaseGross
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

name: RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense
description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

name: StandardAndExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the standard and extended product warranty accrual.

name: AccruedRoyaltiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties.

name: AssumedPremiumsWritten
description: Amount of written premiums assumed from other entities.

name: BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRiskBasedCapitalRatioCapitalAdequacyMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityValue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisValueOfInstrumentsClassifiedInShareholdersEquity
description: #N/A

name: BankingRegulationCommonEquityTierOneRiskBasedCapitalRatioWellCapitalizedMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesGrossContractualAmount
description: For receivables acquired in a business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in a transfer (as defined), this element represents the gross contractual amounts receivable, by major class of receivable, such as loans, direct finance leases (as defined), and any other class of receivables.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOtherFiniteLivedAssets
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from long-lived assets other than property, plant, and equipment.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUnrealizedCurrencyTransactionGains
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from unrealized gains on foreign currency transactions.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistributionsDeclaredPerUnit
description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions declared to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromFourToFiveYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancingReceivableRevolvingConvertedToTermLoan
description: Amortized cost of revolving financing receivable converted to term loan.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSingleMaturityDateFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

name: InterestIncomeFederalFundsSold
description: Interest income on federal funds sold. Federal funds sold represent the excess federal funds held by one commercial bank which it lends to another commercial bank, usually at an agreed-upon (federal funds) rate of interest. Such loans generally are of short-duration (overnight).

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherLiabilitiesAssumed1
description: Amount of liabilities, classified as other, assumed in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity
description: Amount of cash outflow to reacquire equity classified as other.

name: PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperatingLeaseAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

name: ReceivablesFromBrokersDealersAndClearingOrganizations
description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-deliver, certain deposits for securities borrowed, open transactions, good faith and margin deposits, commissions and floor brokerage receivables.

name: ReceivablesFromCustomers
description: Amount due from customers for fees and charges arising from transactions related to the entity's brokerage activities and operations.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationArrangementsRangeOfOutcomesValueLow
description: For contingent consideration arrangements and indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the low-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the consideration which may be paid.

name: DeferredCostsLeasingNet
description: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. This element is net of accumulated amortization.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsEmployeeBonuses
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee bonuses.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentUnderlyingEquityInNetAssets
description: This item represents the entity's ownership percentage in the investee multiplied by the investee's total equity.

name: FederalReserveBankStock
description: Federal Reserve Bank stock represents an equity interest in the Federal Reserve Bank. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

name: FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitIntraperiodTaxAllocation
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for continuing operations, discontinued operations, other comprehensive income, and items charged (credited) directly to shareholders' equity.

name: FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionDisclosuresRelatedToElectionItemsExistingAtEffectiveDateAccruedLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionDisclosuresRelatedToElectionItemsExistingAtEffectiveDateBorrowings
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionDisclosuresRelatedToElectionItemsExistingAtEffectiveDateCashSurrenderValue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionDisclosuresRelatedToElectionItemsExistingAtEffectiveDateCommitments
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionDisclosuresRelatedToElectionItemsExistingAtEffectiveDateNotesReceivable
description: #N/A

name: MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentRecovery
description: The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementAndPostemploymentBenefitPlansLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits, classified as noncurrent.

name: PreferredStockAccretionOfRedemptionDiscount
description: The amount of accretion of the preferred stock redemption discount during the period.

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJointVenture
description: The cash inflow from the sale of an investment interest in a joint venture that the reporting entity has not previously accounted for using consolidation or the equity method of accounting.

name: RealEstateOtherDeductions
description: Amount of other deductions to real estate investments, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndAllocatedClaimAdjustmentExpenseNet
description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

name: AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationGrossProfitLoss
description: The amount of gross profit (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesCashInflows
description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments
description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseReserve
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liability to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsRepaymentsOfPrincipalInNextTwelveMonths
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: NetInvestmentInLease
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossNoncurrent
description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: OtherCommitmentsFutureMinimumPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

name: OtherResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
description: Amount of other research and development expense.

name: PaymentsForCommissions
description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

name: SECScheduleIIIRealEstateWritedownOrReserveAmount
description: Amount of write-down or reserve recognized in the income statement on real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: SecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesPayments1
description: Amount of cash outflow to settle environmental loss contingencies.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeYearThree
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBBankInterestRateRangeFrom
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBBankInterestRateRangeTo
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBBankWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: #N/A

name: DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentGross
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as a liability.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxOnAccumulatedForeignEarningsAmount
description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesTenPercentAnnualDiscountForEstimatedTimingOfCashFlows
description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of 10 percent a year.

name: GainOnBusinessInterruptionInsuranceRecovery
description: The net amount (to the extent disclosed within this portion of the income statement) by which an insurance settlement exceeds incremental costs incurred from the event causing an interruption of business, plus the insurance award for earnings lost from the event, such as a natural catastrophe, explosion or fire.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductionsOther
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other deductions.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableAndOtherOperatingAssets
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables, and operating assets classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amounts due from borrowers for outstanding secured or unsecured loans evidenced by a note.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPremiumsReceivable
description: The change in the premium receivable balance on the balance sheet.

name: InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomestic
description: Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

name: InterestRevenueExpenseNet
description: Amount of interest revenue (income derived from investments in debt securities and on cash and cash equivalents) net of interest expense (cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest).

name: LIFOInventoryAmount
description: The amount of LIFO (last in first out) inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is also valued using different valuation methods.

name: NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomestic
description: Amount of domestic noninterest-bearing deposits held by the entity, which may include demand deposits, checking, brokered and retail deposits.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueFutureMinimumSubleaseRentals
description: Contractually required future rental payments receivable on noncancelable subleasing arrangements.

name: OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueOfConsiderationReceived1
description: The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration received in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: PreferredStockRedemptionPremium
description: The excess of (1) fair value of the consideration transferred to the holders of the preferred stock over (2) the carrying amount of the preferred stock in the registrant's balance sheet, during the accounting period.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresCollateralPledged
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfRedeemablePreferredStock
description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stock that is classified as callable.

name: RestrictedInvestmentsAtFairValue
description: The aggregate value of all restricted investments.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresInterestRateRangeFrom
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresInterestRateRangeTo
description: #N/A

name: SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetOfProductionCosts
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: #N/A

name: StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReserves
description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeYearFour
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummary
description: #N/A

name: CashReserveDepositRequiredAndMade
description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.

name: CostsIncurredDevelopmentCosts
description: Development costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiabilityAndObligationToReturnCashOffset
description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, and obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetPurchasesSalesIssuancesSettlements
description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBBankInterestRate
description: Discloses the single interest rate [if] applicable to the advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank, by branch, as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeInterestExpenseInterestIncomeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterestsNet
description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, nonoperating income (expense) and income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of interest income (expense).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateType
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductionsQualifiedProductionActivities
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for qualified production activity.

name: MembersCapital
description: Amount of member capital in limited liability company (LLC).

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitBasicNetOfTax
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

name: OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable
description: This element represents a liability associated with the acquisition of an off-market lease when the terms of the lease are unfavorable to the market terms for the lease at the date of acquisition.

name: PartnersCapitalAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Total of all Partners' Capital (deficit) items which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest).

name: PaymentsOfDebtRestructuringCosts
description: The cash outflow for cost incurred in the modification of term of existing debt agreement in order for the entity to achieve some advantage.

name: PaymentsOfMergerRelatedCostsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for financing costs associated with business combinations.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment
description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

name: SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivableUndiscountedExcessAmount
description: Amount of undiscounted lease receivable in excess of discounted receivable for sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNetCashFlowRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesAccretionOfDiscount
description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

name: SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate
description: Stated interest rate of the subordinated debt.

name: AdjustmentOfWarrantsGrantedForServices
description: Adjustment for noncash service expenses paid for by granting of warrants.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAccumulatedAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: DeferredIncomeCurrent
description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsRestructuringCharges
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from restructuring reserve.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTaxPerBasicAndDilutedShare
description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation, when the per share amount is the same.

name: DueToOfficersOrStockholdersCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsOther
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other deductions.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPurchases
description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FinancingInterestExpense
description: This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesNetCashFlows
description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesProductionCosts
description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in producing proved oil and gas reserves.

name: IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAssetRetirementObligations
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the carrying amount of asset retirement obligations.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearTwo
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNewMortgageLoans
description: Amount of increase in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from new investment.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesShortTerm
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution
description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDeductions
description: Amount of other deductions to accumulated depreciation, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYieldInterestRate
description: Yield on the receivable, on which interest has been imputed, as calculated from its issuance value or purchase price. The calculated effective interest rate considers factors such as the issued face value or price paid for the receivable, the time period between payments, and the time until maturity [full receipt] of the receivable.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TransferOfOtherRealEstate
description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

name: AffordableHousingTaxCreditsAndOtherTaxBenefitsAmount
description: Amount of affordable housing tax credits and other tax benefits recognized.

name: AmortizationMethodQualifiedAffordableHousingProjectInvestmentsAmortization
description: Amount of amortization expense of investment in qualified affordable housing projects.

name: CashDividendsPaidToParentCompany
description: This element represents disclosure of the total aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries, by unconsolidated subsidiaries, and by 50 percent or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesCarryingAmountNet
description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and allowance for loan losses). This relates to loans not accounted for debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetCreditLossExpense
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAdditions
description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized.

name: FIFOInventoryAmount
description: The amount of FIFO (first in first out) inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is also valued using different valuation methods.

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInEquitySecuritiesFvNi
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: OtherFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross
description: Amount before accumulated amortization of finite-lived intangible assets classified as other.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseNoncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

name: RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

name: UnsecuredDebtCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, uncollateralized debt obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredTaxAndOtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting, and liabilities classified as noncurrent and other.

name: FeesAndCommissions
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsCorrespondentClearing
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsCreditAndDebitCards
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsCreditCards
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsDebitCards
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsDepositorAccounts
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsFiduciaryAndTrustActivities
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsMortgageBanking
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCapitalizedSoftware
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized software.

name: FeesAndCommissionsOther
description: #N/A

name: FeesAndCommissionsTransferAgent
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAssetsSoldDuringPeriod
description: Amount, measured using unobservable inputs, of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) on assets sold.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

name: DepositsNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOW
description: Amount of deposits in interest-bearing transaction accounts at banks or savings and loans, that are restricted in regard to ownership and can usually only be held by individuals, nonprofit entities and governments. Negotiable order of withdrawal accounts differ from money market demand accounts as they typically have higher reserve requirements and no limit on the number of checks that can be written.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationForeignCurrencyTranslationGainsLosses
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) in the disposal group, including discontinued operation, recognized in the statement of income as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

name: DueToAffiliateNoncurrent
description: Amount of receivables owed to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle, if longer).

name: OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedParties
description: The cash outflow for a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

name: PaymentsForLoans
description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearingDepositsInBanks
description: The net cash inflow or outflow in Interest-bearing Deposits by banks in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits.

name: ProceedsFromPrincipalRepaymentsOnLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: The cash inflow from repayments of the balance excluding interest (principal) on loans receivable and leases held for investment purposes.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesNet
description: The net quantity of proved reserves as of the balance sheet date. Proved oil reserves are the estimated quantities of crude oil and natural gas liquids which geological and engineering data demonstrate with reasonable certainty to be recoverable.

name: QualifiedAffordableHousingProjectInvestmentsCommitment
description: Amount of commitment or contingent commitments to qualified affordable housing project investments.

name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount
description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

name: ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAtFairValueAssumptionsUsedToEstimateFairValuePrepaymentSpeed
description: Estimated rate of prepayments of principal on servicing assets and servicing liabilities.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsGrantsInPeriodIntrinsicValue
description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOperatingExpense
description: Amount of operating expense classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: SuppliesExpense
description: Amount of expense associated with supplies that were used during the current accounting period.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesAdjustmentsNet
description: Amount of other addition (reduction) in allowance reserve for credit loss.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate
description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeYearFive
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassNet
description: The total gross amount less the charge for the use of the long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueGrossAssetAndRightToReclaimCashOffset
description: Fair value of asset associated with financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, and right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements.

name: DistributedEarnings
description: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.

name: DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other.

name: EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensationNoncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for employee benefits and share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, pension, other postretirement, postemployment and termination benefits.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentQuotedMarketValue
description: This item represents the aggregate value of each identified investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting based on the quoted market price for those investments in common stock for which a quoted market price is available.

name: ForeclosedRealEstateExpense
