description: Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssetsAndLiabilitiesNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current operating assets after deduction of current operating liabilities classified as other.

name: LoansReceivableBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: Percentage added to reference rate used to compute variable rate on loan receivable.

name: NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

name: OtherLaborRelatedExpenses
description: Amount of labor-related expenses classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes
description: The cash inflow from a debt funding received on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueWithinOneYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RestrictedCashAndInvestmentsNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent cash, cash equivalents and investments that is restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits classified as long-term; that is not expected to be released from such existing restrictions within one year of the balance sheet date or operating cycle, whichever is longer. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes noncurrent cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.

name: TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoans1
description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

name: ValueAddedTaxReceivable
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities.

name: AmortizationOfAcquisitionCosts
description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of capitalized costs associated with acquisition of business. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: CapitalizedSoftwareDevelopmentCostsForSoftwareSoldToCustomers
description: Unamortized costs incurred for development of computer software, which is to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed, after establishing technological feasibility through to the general release of the software products. Excludes capitalized costs of developing software for internal use.

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDeferredSharesFairValue
description: Fair value of unearned shares held by the employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: EquityFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of the entity's equity.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationNoncurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of noncurrent liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateOfAmountsDueWithinOneYearOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInEstimatedFutureDevelopmentCosts
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in estimated future development costs.

name: IncreaseInUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIsReasonablyPossible
description: Amount of increase reasonably possible in the next twelve months for the unrecognized tax benefit.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities. Saving deposits bear interest and have no stated maturity.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentPrincipal
description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to principal.

name: LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loss contingency liability.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFinancialOrEquityInstrumentConsiderationSharesIssued1
description: The number of shares issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: PaymentsToAcquireTradingSecuritiesHeldforinvestment
description: The cash outflow to acquire securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes payments for trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

name: PremiumsReceivableAtCarryingValue
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, net of the allowance for doubtful accounts.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfFinanceReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: ProductionTaxExpense
description: A tax assessed on oil and gas production.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesProduction
description: Production of proved reserves.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedPartyCurrent
description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date within one year where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearSix
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the sixth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsInRelatedPartiesCarryingAmount
description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsBalance
description: Reflects the estimated amount of impairment as of the balance sheet date of recognized servicing assets that are being amortized in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxEffectFromShareBasedCompensation
description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

name: BrokerageCommissionsRevenue
description: Amount of commission revenue from buying and selling securities on behalf of customers.

name: CashSurrenderValueFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the entity, commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DerivativeAssetMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure derivative asset.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationLiabilitiesAndEquity
description: The amount of liabilities and equity reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfNotesReceivable
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

name: LandSubjectToGroundLeases
description: Area of land subject to a ground lease.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPayment
description: Amount of the required periodic payments of both interest and principal.

name: NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPricesAndProductionCosts
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

name: PreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividendsInArrears
description: Aggregate amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesRevisionsOfPreviousEstimatesIncreaseDecrease
description: Revisions represent changes in previous estimates of proved reserves, either upward or downward, resulting from new information (except for an increase in proved acreage) normally obtained from development drilling and production history or resulting from change in economic factors.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue
description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

name: TimeDepositsLessThan100000
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of less than $100,000.

name: AmortizationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSRs
description: The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistributionsPaidPerUnit
description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions paid to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxOnAccumulatedForeignEarningsPercent
description: Percentage of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBBankAmountOfAdvancesByBranch
description: Amount of advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearOneOriginatedCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearTwoOriginatedFiscalYearBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesDevelopmentCosts
description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeAssetsAndLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the net carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets and liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

name: InsuranceSettlementsReceivableCurrent
description: Amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits
description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of present value of future benefit to be paid to or on behalf of policyholder and related expense less present value of future net premium receivable under insurance contract.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCollectionsOfPrincipal
description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from collection of principal.

name: PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrganizations
description: Amount payable to other broker-dealer and clearing organization, including, but not limited to, security failed-to-receive, deposit received for security loaned, open transaction, and floor-brokerage payable.

name: PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease
description: The cash outflow for payments to acquire rented equipment which is recorded as an asset.

name: PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityNoncurrent
description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

name: ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstandingDiluted
description: The weighted average number of shares or units and dilutive common stock or unit equivalents outstanding in the calculation of proforma diluted earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuritiesNet
description: The cash inflow associated with security instrument that either represents a creditor or an ownership relationship with the holder of the investment security with a maturity of beyond one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes proceeds from (a) debt, (b) capital lease obligations, (c) mandatory redeemable capital securities, and (d) any combination of (a), (b), or (c).

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualAdditionsFromBusinessAcquisition
description: Amount of increase in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from a business acquisition.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsNumberOfShares
description: The number of shares that would be issued, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the settlement were to occur at the reporting date.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivablePremiumPaymentsReceived
description: #N/A

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearSeven
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the seventh year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsInRelatedPartiesCost
description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivedOverContractPeriodPremiumReceivableWeightedAverageCollectionPeriod
description: #N/A

name: TradingSecuritiesDebtAmortizedCost
description: Amortized cost of investments in debt securities classified as trading.

name: AccountsPayableTradeCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

name: AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment1
description: Amount of decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization as a result of sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment.

name: AdvancePaymentsByBorrowersForTaxesAndInsurance
description: Carrying amount of accumulated prepayments received by financial institutions from borrowers for taxes (for example, property taxes) and insurance (for example, property and catastrophe) which will periodically be remitted to the appropriate governmental agency or vendor on behalf of the borrower.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableAdjustmentAccretionOfDiscountOnPremiumReceivable
description: #N/A

name: AociBeforeTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, attributable to parent. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners).

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedFinancialAssets
description: The amount of financial assets (as defined) recognized as of the acquisition date.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableNewBusinessWritten
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedGainLossBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFundedPercentage
description: Percentage of plan assets to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanTransfersBetweenMeasurementLevels
description: Amount, measured using unobservable inputs, of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan, for assets transferred into (out of) Level 3 of fair value hierarchy. Includes, but is not limited to, transfer due to change in observability of significant inputs.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresInterestRateAtPeriodEnd
description: States the interest rate applicable to Federal Home Loan Bank advances outstanding as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearThreeOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvestee
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

name: GuaranteesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of guarantee, including, but not limited to, financial standby letter of credit, fair value guarantee, guarantee of collection of scheduled contractual cash flows from financial assets, and contracts that contingently require the guarantor to make payments or perform services.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeferredLiability
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred obligations classified as other.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityCapacityAvailableForSpecificPurposeOtherThanForTradePurchases
description: The maximum amount of borrowing capacity under a line of credit that is available as of the balance sheet date for a specific purpose other than for financing goods acquired for inventory or imminent delivery to a customer.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearThree
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LongtermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInterestAmount
description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: ProvedDevelopedReservesVolume
description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved developed reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

name: ReorganizationItems
description: Total amount of reorganization items.

name: RetainedEarningsUndistributedEarningsFromEquityMethodInvestees
description: Amount of consolidated retained earnings that represent undistributed (not yet received) earnings from 50 percent or less owned persons accounted for by the equity method (equity method investees).

name: SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsInRelatedPartiesFairValue
description: Fair value of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefitsClaimsLossesAndSettlementExpense
description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultingFromSettlementsWithTaxingAuthorities
description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

name: AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGains
description: Amount of unrealized gain before deducting unrealized loss on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

name: CashAcquiredInExcessOfPaymentsToAcquireBusiness
description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of a business when the cash held by the acquired business exceeds the cash payments to acquire the business.

name: CustomerAdvancesCurrent
description: The current portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsOtherTaxCarryforwards
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax carryforwards, classified as other.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueAfterFiveYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFourOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionNumberOfStockholders
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits
description: Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.

name: LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount
description: This item represents the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the Entity as of the date of the statement of financial position. Such Entity-owned life insurance policies are commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

name: OtherInventory
description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: PaymentForAdministrativeFees
description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) for administrative services provided to the LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

name: FinancialServicesCosts
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as operating activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as investing activities.

name: FinancialServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: FinancingReceivable
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisclosureOfCompositeDepreciationRateForPlantsInService
description: Composite depreciation rate for public utility plants in service.

name: ReinsurancePayable
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearNine
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the ninth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: FinancingReceivableAcquiredWithDeterioratedCreditQuality
description: #N/A

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInvestmentIncome
description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearnedPremiums
description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: UnearnedESOPShares
description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

name: AccruedEmployeeBenefitsCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations, excluding pension and other postretirement benefits, incurred through that date and payable for perquisites provided to employees pertaining to services received from them.

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValueIncludingDiscontinuedOperations
description: For the entity and the disposal group, cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the Entity may deposit additional funds at any time and also effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Compensating balance arrangements that do not legally restrict the withdrawal or usage of cash amounts may be reported as Cash and Cash Equivalents, while legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits are not generally reported as cash and cash equivalents.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetGrossCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueChangeInEstimateOfTransactionPrice
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in estimate of transaction price which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due. Includes, but is not limited to, change in assessment of whether estimate of variable consideration is constrained.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesAcquiredWithDeterioratedCreditQuality
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeFloorInterestRate
description: Floor rate on an interest rate derivative such as an interest rate floor or collar. If market rates falls below the floor rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

name: DueFromEmployeesCurrent
description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesIndividuallyEvaluatedForImpairment
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateTwoToThreeYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFiveOriginatedFourYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesProvisions
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesRecoveries
description: #N/A

name: HedgedAssetFairValueHedge
description: Amount of asset hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelatedAllowanceInterestIncomeCashBasisMethod
description: Amount of interest income, recognized on cash basis, on financing receivables, for which there is no related allowance for credit losses and are recognized as impaired.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsLossesOfUnconsolidatedSubsidiary
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableRelatedParties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed by the reporting entry in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarket
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

name: InvestmentsAndCash
description: Sum of investments and unrestricted cash as of the balance sheet date.

name: LiquidationBasisOfAccountingAccruedCostsToDisposeOfAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount of estimated accrued costs to dispose of assets or other items expected to be sold in liquidation.

name: LossContingencyClaimsDismissedNumber
description: Number of claims dismissed.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAssetsAcquired1
description: Amount of assets, classified as other, acquired in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

name: ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUndistributedEarningsLossDiluted
description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

name: PaymentsForPreviousAcquisition
description: Cash outflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

name: PensionExpenseReversalOfExpenseNoncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension benefits. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

name: PropertyManagementFeePercentFee
description: The percentage charged for managing real estate properties.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearEight
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the eighth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: AmortizationMethodQualifiedAffordableHousingProjectInvestments
description: Amount of investment in qualified affordable housing projects.

name: CompensationExpenseExcludingCostOfGoodAndServiceSold
description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit. Other employee benefit expense includes, but is not limited to, service component of net periodic benefit cost for defined benefit plan. Excludes compensation cost in cost of good and service sold.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsOtherComprehensiveLoss
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses in other comprehensive income.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount classified as accounts payable and accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount classified as accounts payable and accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsDividends
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesInterestRate
description: Interest rate of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateOneToTwoYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAtFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities. Includes both pledged and unpledged holdings.

name: FiniteLivedCustomerRelationshipsGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date to an asset acquired in a business combination representing a favorable existing relationship with customers having a finite beneficial life.

name: ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAllowanceInterestIncomeCashBasisMethod
description: Amount of interest income on financing receivables, for which there is a related allowance for credit losses, recognized on a cash-basis method of accounting that the financing receivables were impaired.

name: InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentures
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on junior subordinated debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

name: LongTermAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

name: MarginDepositAssets
description: The amount of cash or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivatives securities position which was partially obtained with funds provided by the broker dealer.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOfContracts
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOfContracts1
description: #N/A

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsOfferingCosts
description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the other unit holders.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModificationRecordedInvestment
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModificationRecordedInvestment1
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionRecognizedInEarningsNet
description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModificationRecordedInvestment
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModificationRecordedInvestment1
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForConstructionInProcess
description: The cash outflow from construction costs to date on capital projects that have not been completed and assets being constructed that are not ready to be placed into service.

name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGross
description: Amount, before effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsSubsequentDefaultNumberOfContracts
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForRelatedParties
description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.

name: FinancingReceivableModificationsSubsequentDefaultRecordedInvestment
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfRestrictedInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of investments that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions during the period.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsNonvestedIntrinsicValue
description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: FinancingReceivableNonaccrualPercentPastDue
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossUnrealizedLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss before deducting unrealized gain on investments in available-for-sale securities.

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueChangeInMeasureOfProgress
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in measure of progress which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualAllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense
description: Amount of expense recognized from equity-based compensation arrangements (for example, shares of stock, unit, stock options or other equity instruments), awarded to key employees or individuals. Excludes amount related to plans that cover generally all employees (for example, but not limited to, qualified pension plans).

name: DerivativeCapPrice
description: The cap rate on a price risk derivative such as a cap or collar. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate exceeds the cap rate on the contract.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestOriginatedMoreThanFiveYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: InterestRateDerivativesAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, net of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearFour
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToInvestInDecommissioningFund
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of investments that will be held in a decommissioning trust fund.

name: PreOpeningCosts
description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.

name: PreferredStockDividendsShares
description: Number of shares of preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

name: ProceedsFromCollaborators
description: Cash received from collaborators during the current period.

name: AccountsPayableOtherCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligations incurred and payable classified as other.

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax1
description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners).

name: FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment1To29DaysPastDue
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30To59DaysPastDue
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60To89DaysPastDue
description: #N/A

name: ClassOfWarrantOrRightUnissued
description: The number of warrants or rights which entitle the entity to receive future services in exchange for the unvested, forfeitable warrants or rights.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriod
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) on disposal and for provision for gain (loss) until disposal.

name: FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqualToGreaterThan90DaysPastDue
description: #N/A

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueDownwardPriceAdjustmentAnnualAmount
description: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueImpairmentLossCumulativeAmount
description: Amount of cumulative impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisObligations
description: Fair value of obligations measured on a recurring basis.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLoansHeldForSale
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of loans or securitized loans that are held with the intention to sell in the near future.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificatesOfDeposits
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperformingNonaccrualOfInterest
description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans deemed to be questionable as to collection on which no interest is continuing to be recognized.

name: LossOnSaleOfInvestments
description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

name: OtherLoansPayable
description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

name: OtherLongTermNotesPayable
description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: PaymentsToAcquireSoftware
description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition from vendors of software programs or applications for internal use (that is, not to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed to others) that qualify for capitalization.

name: ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity
description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

name: ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncurredAmountAssumed
description: Amount of policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseAsset
description: Amount of asset associated with funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualCurrent
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCapitalAndSurplusRequired
description: Amount of statutory capital required to be maintained as of the balance sheet date under prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsLossesClaimsAndLossExpenseReserves
description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: FiniteLivedCoalSupplyAgreementGross
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedComputerSoftwareGross
description: #N/A

name: AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer), including liabilities for compensation costs, fringe benefits other than pension and postretirement obligations, rent, contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

name: AccruedFeesAndOtherRevenueReceivable
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the amount of fees and other revenue, excluding investment income receivable, earned but not yet received, which were recognized in conformity with revenue recognition criteria based on estimates or specific contractual terms.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedBuildings
description: Amount of facility held for productive use including, but not limited to, office, production, storage and distribution facilities, acquired at the acquisition date.

name: CapitalizedCostsProvedProperties
description: Capitalized costs of proved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions; wells and related equipment; support equipment and facilities; and uncompleted wells and equipment and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

name: FiniteLivedFranchiseRightsGross
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCompensationEquity
description: Value of stock issued under share-based plans to employees or officers which is the unearned portion, accounted for under the fair value method.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other tax liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredRevenueCurrent
description: Amount classified as deferred revenue attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: DueFromAffiliateNoncurrent
description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: FinancingReceivableSignificantSales
description: Amount of decrease in financing receivable from sale and reclassification to held-for-sale. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in insurance liability balances during the period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit or defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

name: InventoryLIFOReservePeriodCharge
description: The change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods, which change has been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

name: LongTermDebtMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure long-term debt.

name: LongTermNotesAndLoans
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

name: MortgageBackedSecuritiesAvailableForSaleFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as available-for-sale.

name: NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

name: NetIncomeLossNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarnings
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security, recognized in earnings.

name: PaymentsForMergerRelatedCosts
description: The amount of cash paid during the reporting period for charges associated with the mergers.

name: ProceedsFromFeesReceived
description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAverageUsefulLife
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes tax exempt secured debt.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale and collection of receivables during the period.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionMonthlyRentalPayments
description: The amount of the monthly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFutureAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The net total number of shares (or other type of equity) under an equity-based award plan, other than a stock option plan, that were granted, vested and forfeited during the reporting period.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndAllocatedClaimAdjustmentExpenseNetNotSeparatelyPresented
description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts for accident years not separately presented in claim development information. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsSeveranceBenefits
description: Liability for amount due employees, in addition to wages and any other money that employers owe employees, when their employment ends through a layoff or other termination. For example, a company may provide involuntarily terminated employees with a lump sum payment equal to one week's salary for every year of employment.

name: TemporaryEquityAccretionOfDividends
description: Value of accretion of temporary equity during the period due to unpaid dividends.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAdjustments
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationOtherLongtermIncentivePlansRequisiteServicePeriodRecognition
description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement, classified as other.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsUsefulLife
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsUsefulLifeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsUsefulLifeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWeightedAveragePeriodPriorToNextRenewalOrExtension
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWeightedAverageUsefulLife
description: #N/A

name: CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShares
description: Number of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

name: FiniteLivedMediaContentGross
description: #N/A

name: CostDepreciationAmortizationAndDepletion
description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives, and reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: FiniteLivedRoyaltyGross
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualCommonStockReservedForFutureIssuance
description: Number of common shares reserved for future issuance related to deferred compensation arrangements with individuals.

name: FiniteLivedTradeSecretsGross
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanCostOfProvidingSpecialOrContractualTerminationBenefitRecognizedDuringPeriod
description: Amount of cost of providing special or contractual termination benefits payable from defined benefit plan.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentOfPrincipleInYearThree
description: #N/A

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentsOfPrincipalAfterYearFive
description: #N/A

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentsOfPrincipleInYearFive
description: #N/A

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentsOfPrincipleInYearFour
description: #N/A

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentsOfPrincipleInYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: FiveYearScheduleOfMaturitiesOfParentCompanyRepaymentsOfPrincipleWithinOneYear
description: #N/A

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLease
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSuspenseShares
description: Shares contributed to the ESOP that have not yet been released, committed to be released, or allocated to participant accounts. Suspense shares generally collateralize ESOP debt.

name: ExcessOfReplacementOrCurrentCostsOverStatedLIFOValue
description: The excess of replacement or current cost over the stated LIFO (last in first out) inventory value when the LIFO inventory method is utilized.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersNet
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: FlightEquipmentOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation
description: #N/A

name: FlightEquipmentOwnedGross
description: #N/A

name: FlightEquipmentOwnedNet
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvances
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquityCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciple
description: Amount of cumulative tax effect on beginning retained earnings from change in accounting principle.

name: FoodAndBeverageCostOfSales
description: #N/A

name: FoodAndBeverageRevenue
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesExpense
description: The amount of estimated penalties recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseResearchAndDevelopment
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible research and development expense.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerDeposits
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for a current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement.

name: InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: Gross expenses on securities sold coupled with an agreement to repurchase the same from the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price within a fixed or variable time period.

name: InterestRateCashFlowHedgeAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAtFairValue
description: Value of the investment at close of period. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans
description: Number of mortgage loans within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseBeforeAdjustmentsAndTax
description: Amount, before tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherNoncashIncome
description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits
description: Total units issued during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForTenantImprovements
description: Amount of cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy.

name: PrepaidReinsurancePremiums
description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: #N/A

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativesAtFairValueNet
description: #N/A

name: ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateRemeasurement
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromAccountsReceivableSecuritization
description: Proceeds from securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

name: ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation
description: #N/A

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RepaymentsOfMediumTermNotes
description: The cash outflow to pay off borrowing used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

name: RestrictedCashEquivalents
description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueChangesInFairValueResultingFromChangesInValuationInputsOrChangesInAssumptions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs, assumptions, or model used to calculate the fair value of the contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOtherIncreasesDecreasesInPeriod
description: The addition or reduction in the number of reserved shares that could potentially be issued under the option plan attributable to reasons other than grants, exercises, forfeitures, and expirations during the reporting period.

name: ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRateOverTime
description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

name: ShorttermDebtMaximumAmountOutstandingDuringPeriod
description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, the maximum amount borrowed at any time during the period.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremiumRevenue
description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentFinancialLiabilities
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to financial liabilities assumed in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsExpensesAndLossesRecognized
description: The expenses and losses recorded for each transaction with the acquiree that was recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

name: ForeignEarningsRepatriatedUnderAmericanJobsCreationActOf2004RepatriatedEarnings
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivitiesNet
description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

name: CommonUnitIssuanceValue
description: Stated value of common units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossSecuritiesSold
description: Amount of decrease in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from sale.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsHedgingTransactions
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from hedging transactions.

name: FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAcquiredInPlaceLeases
description: This element represents the amount of value allocated by a lessor (acquirer) to lease agreements which exist at acquisition of a leased property. Such amount may include the value assigned to existing tenant relationships and excludes the market adjustment component of the value assigned for above or below-market leases acquired.

name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperationsDiscontinuedOperationsExtraordinaryItems
description: Amount of current tax expense (benefit) and deferred tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations and income (loss) from discontinued operations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAssetsHeldForSale
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in book value of long-lived assets that the reporting entity plans to sell within one year (or one business cycle).

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquityRedeemableStockRedemptionRequirementsAmount
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash
description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoodwillFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

name: LossOnContractTermination
description: The loss recognized on termination of a contract.

name: FranchiseCosts
description: #N/A

name: FranchiseRevenue
description: #N/A

name: NoncashMergerRelatedCosts
description: Amount of expense (income) related to the increase (decrease) in reserve for business combination costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, and other costs incurred to consummate the merger.

name: FranchisorRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FreightCosts
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansBenefitPlanImprovementTaxEffect
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

name: PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquity
description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

name: ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentFinancingActivities
description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of tangible or intangible assets used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

name: PublicUtilitiesAllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionCapitalizedCostOfEquity
description: The component of the allowance for funds used during construction during the period based on an assumed rate of return on equity funds used in financing the construction of regulated assets.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsForfeituresAndExpirationsInPeriodWeightedAverageIntrinsicValue
description: The combined weighted average of the accumulated differences between the fair values on underlying shares and exercises prices to acquire such shares as of the grant date on options that were either forfeited or lapsed.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualDistributionPaid
description: Amount of distribution made to individual in accordance with deferred compensation arrangement.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsContingencies
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from contingent liabilities.

name: DerivativeExcludedComponentGainLossRecognizedInEarnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

name: DividendsReceivable
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but not received.

name: DividendsShareBasedCompensation
description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfCommittedToBeReleasedShares
description: The shares that, although not legally released, will be released by a future scheduled and committed debt service payment and will be allocated to employees for service rendered in the current accounting period. The ESOP documents typically define the period of service to which the shares relate. ESOP shares are released to compensate employees directly, to settle employer liabilities for other employee benefits, and to replace dividends on allocated shares that are used for debt service.

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueUpwardPriceAdjustmentCumulativeAmount
description: Amount of cumulative gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: ExtensionsDiscoveriesAdditionsAndImprovedRecoveryLessRelatedCosts
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationIncrease
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

name: FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees
description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

name: GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of loss recognized that results from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToNonvestedSharesWithForfeitableDividends
description: Number of additional shares included in diluted EPS for potentially dilutive effect of nonvested equity-based payment award containing forfeitable rights to dividends or dividend equivalents, whether paid or unpaid.

name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldToMaturity
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on held-to-maturity securities.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearFive
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LongTermInvestmentsAndReceivablesNet
description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle) and amount due to the Entity from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such investments and receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

name: NotesPayableToBankCurrent
description: Current portion of the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment with long term maturities. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

name: PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
