description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLand
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes land acquired for use by the owner.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOutstandingPeriodIncreaseDecreaseWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: Change in the weighted average exercise price of options outstanding.

name: StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedCompensationForfeited
description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRate
description: Reflects the effective interest rate as of the balance sheet date on interest-bearing trade payables.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesGross
description: Undiscounted amount of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesNoncurrent
description: Investments in debt and equity securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading and which are intended to be sold or mature more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer. Such securities are reported at fair value; unrealized gains (losses) related to Available-for-sale Securities are excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity (other comprehensive income), unless the Available-for-sale security is designated as a hedge or is determined to have had an other than temporary decline in fair value below its amortized cost basis. All or a portion of the unrealized holding gain (loss) of an Available-for-sale security that is designated as being hedged in a fair value hedge is recognized in earnings during the period of the hedge, as are other than temporary declines in fair value below the cost basis for investments in equity securities and debt securities that an entity intends to sell or it is more likely than not that it will be required to sell before the recovery of its amortized cost basis. Other than temporary declines in fair value below the cost basis for debt securities categorized as Available-for-sale that an entity does not intend to sell and for which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before the recovery of its amortized cost basis are bifurcated into credit losses and losses related to all other factors. Other than temporary declines in fair value below cost basis related to credit losses are recognized in earnings, and losses related to all other factors are recognized in other comprehensive income.

name: CapitalizedCostsAccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAmortizationAndValuationAllowanceForRelatingToOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and valuation allowance relating to oil and gas producing activities.

name: CostsIncurredExplorationCosts
description: Exploration costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsLegalSettlements
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the estimated loss from legal settlements.

name: DeferredTaxExpenseFromStockOptionsExercised
description: Amount of deferred tax expense from write-off of the deferred tax asset related to deductible stock options at exercise.

name: DerivativeCostOfHedge
description: The premium (cost) of a hedge, expensed during the period.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPrepaidAndOtherAssets
description: Amount classified as prepaid and other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: EmbeddedDerivativeLiabilityMeasurementInput
description: Value of input used to measure embedded derivative liability.

name: FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationDiscountPremium
description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

name: FutureNetCashFlowsRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReservesIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for income tax, based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

name: GainContingencyUnrecordedAmount
description: The amount or range of possible amounts of gain that could be realized upon the resolution of a contingency.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearTwoThroughFiveFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: MultiemployerPlansWithdrawalObligation
description: Amount of the obligation recognized by withdrawing from a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: OtherAdditionalCapital
description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

name: OtherPostretirementBenefitExpense
description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for other postretirement benefits. Excludes pension benefits.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromTenantAllowance
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from monetary allowance granted by the landlord to a tenant to entice tenant to move into landlords building which will enable the tenant to prepare the leased premises for tenants occupancy.

name: PostemploymentBenefitsPeriodExpense
description: Period expense related to postemployment benefits.

name: PreferredStockConvertibleConversionPrice
description: Per share conversion price of preferred stock.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfNotesReceivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale of notes receivable, as well as principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation (note receivable).

name: StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNetCashFlowOfProvedOilAndGasReservesOther
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

name: StraightLineRentAdjustments
description: Amount of the adjustment to rental revenues to measure escalating leasing revenues on a straight line basis.

name: SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice
description: A device of credit enhancement where a part of the purchase price for the receivable/ payable is retained to serve as a cash collateral.

name: AccountsReceivableFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties.

name: AdvanceRent
description: Amount at the balance sheet date that has been received by the entity that represents rents paid in advance.

name: BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquityInterestInAcquireeRemeasurementGainOrLoss
description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of net gain (loss) recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: GainLossOnInterestRateDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of interest rate derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMonthsFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseAfterYearFive
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFive
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseYearFour
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseYearOne
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseYearThree
description: #N/A

name: FutureAmortizationExpenseYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureNumberOfPositions
description: Disclosure regarding factors used to determine that the impairment of securities categorized as held-to-maturity where cost exceeds fair value is not an other than temporary impairment (OTTI). This item contains disclosure of the number of investment positions in the held-to-maturity investments determined to be temporarily impaired.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseRestructuringCharges
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible restructuring charges.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealers
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.

name: InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity). Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: InventoryPartsAndComponentsNetOfReserves
description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date for elements of machinery or equipment held for the purpose of replacing similar parts in the course of repair or maintenance.

name: LoansAssumed1
description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationBeforeTaxParent
description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

name: OtherInventoryNetOfReserves
description: Amount, after of valuation reserves and allowances, of inventory, classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsConverted
description: The number of units converted into shares of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesExtensionsDiscoveriesAndAdditions
description: Additions to proved reserves that result from (1) extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered (old) reservoirs through additional drilling in periods after discovery and (2) discovery of new fields with proved reserves or of new reservoirs of proved reserves in old fields.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidAndUnpaidLosses
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, policy benefits and policy reserves. Excludes premiums paid under reinsurance contracts.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOutstandingPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase or decrease in number of shares reserved for issuance under stock option agreements awarded under the plan that validly exist and are outstanding, including vested options.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxLiabilityIncomeTaxBenefit
description: Amount of income tax benefit for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsLiability
description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnInterestRateCashFlowHedgesPretaxAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the increase or decrease in fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which was recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge was determined to be effective.

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesContingentlyIssuable
description: Shares issuable for little or no cash consideration upon the satisfaction of certain conditions (contingently issuable shares) are considered outstanding common shares and included in the computation of basic Earnings Per Share as of the date that all necessary conditions have been satisfied (in essence, when issuance of the shares is no longer contingent). Outstanding common shares that are contingently returnable (that is, subject to recall) are treated in the same manner as contingently issuable shares. Contingently issuable shares include shares that (a) will be issued in the future upon the satisfaction of specified conditions, (b) have been placed in escrow and all or part must be returned if specified conditions are not met, or (c) have been issued but the holder must return all or part if specified conditions are not met. The number of contingently issuable shares is determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

name: AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetIncomeLossToCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities
description: The aggregate amount of adjustments to net income or loss necessary to remove the effects of all items whose cash effects are investing or financing cash flows. The aggregate amount also includes all noncash expenses and income items which reduce or increase net income and are thus added back or deducted when calculating cash provided by or used in operating activities.

name: AmortizationOfBelowMarketLease
description: Amount of amortization of acquired leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: AssetRetirementObligationForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) asset retirement obligations.

name: AssetsHeldByInsuranceRegulators
description: Carrying amount of cash and investment securities on deposit with state regulatory authorities in connection with capital requirements.

name: CreditDerivativeMaximumExposureUndiscounted
description: Maximum potential amount of future undiscounted payments that could be required under the credit derivative, before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DefinedContributionPlanAdministrativeExpenses
description: Amount of administrative expense incurred by defined contribution plan.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMemberCashDistributionsPaid
description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited liability company (LLC).

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationEquityInEarningsLossesOfUnconsolidatedSubsidiary
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiRealizedLoss
description: Amount of realized loss from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: GainLossFromAdjustmentsToPriorPeriodExtraordinaryItems
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLoansAndLongTermReceivables
description: This item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of loans and long-term receivables (other than securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale or held-to-maturity) that have contractual principal amounts and for which the fair value option has been elected.

name: FinancingReceivableDeferredIncome
description: Amount of fee received for commitment to originate or purchase financing receivable where likelihood of commitment being exercised is remote, to be recognized as service income.

name: FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAllowanceForCreditLossAtAcquisitionDate
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

name: FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtPurchasePrice
description: Amount at purchase price of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingenciesForeign
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in foreign income tax contingency.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFutureIncomeTaxExpenseEstimatesOnFutureCashFlowsRelatedToProvedOilAndGasReserves
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in the estimated future income tax on future pretax net cash flows related to the entity's proved oil and gas reserves.

name: GainLossFromSaleOfFinancialAssetsInSecuritizationsOrAssetBackedFinancingArrangement
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernment
description: Interest income on securities issued by US government agencies not including US Treasury Securities.

name: LifeInsuranceInForceGross
description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of life insurance issued and outstanding, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and adjustment to face value.

name: NoninterestExpenseOfferingCost
description: Includes offering costs of open-end investment companies, and closed-end funds with a continuous offering period.

name: NonoperatingGainsLosses
description: The aggregate amount of gains or losses resulting from nonoperating activities (for example, interest and dividend revenue, property, plant and equipment impairment loss, and so forth).

name: NotesPayableToBank
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable to banks, excluding mortgage notes, initially due beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: PreferredUnitsOutstanding
description: The number of preferred units outstanding.

name: ProvedUndevelopedReserveVolume
description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other renewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet
description: Period end amount of total net PPE.

name: RestrictedCashAndInvestments
description: Cash and investments whose use in whole or in part is restricted for the long-term, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

name: SecuritiesBorrowed
description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: GainLossOnCreditRiskDerivativesNet
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseCollateralRightToReclaimSecurities
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnCashFlowHedgingInstruments
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, recorded in results of operations to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be ineffective.

name: AcceleratedShareRepurchasesFinalPricePaidPerShare
description: Final price paid per share for the purchase of the targeted number of shares, determined by an average market price over a fixed period of time.

name: AssetsNoncurrentOtherThanNoncurrentInvestmentsAndPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets, excluding property, plant, and equipment and other property and investments, that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Alternate captions include Total Deferred Charges and Other Assets.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DeferredCostsLeasingAccumulatedAmortization
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the accumulated amortization, as of the reporting date, which represents the periodic charge to earnings of initial direct costs which have been deferred and are being allocated over the lease term in proportion to the recognition of rental income.

name: EffectOfLIFOInventoryLiquidationOnIncome
description: The effect of liquidating LIFO (last in first out) inventory layers on income.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYearAverageInterestRateForYear
description: The calculated weighted average interest rate for Federal Home Loan Bank advances for the period ended as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfOtherAssets
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfProperty
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearSixThroughTenFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAssets
description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestructuringReserve
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) of the liability pertaining to the exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan, excluding costs or losses pertaining to an entity newly acquired in a business combination and to asset retirement obligations.

name: LifeInsuranceInForceCeded
description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding ceded to other entity, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and adjustment to face value.

name: PaymentsToAcquireBuildings
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of buildings (properties) whether for investment or use.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInterests
description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

name: ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection of advance by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), classified as investing activity.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommercialPaper
description: The cash inflow from borrowing by issuing commercial paper.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation
description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity) that has been recognized in the income statement.

name: ReceivablesLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount to be collected within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from customers in accordance with the contractual provisions of long-term contracts or programs including amounts billed and unbilled as of the balance sheet date.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceAndOperations
description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance, repairs and operations of regulated operation.

name: VariableLeasePayment
description: Amount of cash outflow for variable lease payment excluded from lease liability.

name: AccountsAndFinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss of accounts and financing receivables. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesChargesToExpenseForNewLosses
description: Amount of expense for newly incurred environmental loss contingencies. Includes, but is not limited to, remediation expense and interest accretion.

name: AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeAfterYearFive
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CumulativeDividends
description: Amount of cumulative cash dividends distributed to shareholders.

name: CumulativeEffectOnRetainedEarningsTax1
description: Amount of the related income tax effect of a cumulative effect on retained earnings.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DerivativeInstrumentsInHedgesLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Aggregate fair value of all derivative liabilities designated as hedging instruments. Includes instruments designated as cash flow hedges, fair value hedges, and hedges of net investments in foreign operations.

name: DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against derivative liabilities.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCashContributionsToESOP
description: This item represents the amount of cash contributions during the period made by the entity to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestRevolving
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid, and redrawn.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInterestAndDividendsReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount due to the entity in the form of unpaid interest and dividends.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.

name: InterestReceivableAndOtherAssets
description: Amount of interest receivable and assets classified as other.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfEquityMethodInvestments
description: #N/A

name: InventoryLIFOReserveEffectOnIncomeNet
description: The difference between the change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods and any LIFO decrement which have been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

name: LifeInsuranceInForceNet
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of life insurance issued and outstanding, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and adjustment to face value.

name: NotesAssumed1
description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: OtherLoansPayableCurrent
description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherNonrecurringExpense
description: Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

name: OtherSundryLiabilities
description: The aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheets date, of obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements.

name: PaymentsToAcquireInProcessResearchAndDevelopment
description: The cash outflows from the purchase of net carrying value allocated to in-process research and development costs and materials acquired in a business combination.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvestment
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

name: PreferredUnitsIssued
description: The number of preferred units issued.

name: ProvedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethod
description: Oil and Gas properties with proved reserves under the successful effort method.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmountAvailableForDividendPayments
description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

name: TemporaryEquityIssuePeriodIncreaseOrDecrease
description: Change in the value of each type or class of stock classified as temporary equity during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStockSplit
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a stock split in which per-share par value or stated value is not changed proportionately.

name: BusinessCombinationLiabilitiesArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognized
description: The amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

name: CommonStockHeldInTrust
description: Value of common stock held in trust.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DeferredIncomeNoncurrent
description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount
description: Amount of investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

name: DerivativeLiabilityNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationIntangibleAssetsCurrent
description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet
description: #N/A

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationCostOfSales
description: The amount of the cost of sales reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeExtraordinaryItems
description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations reported by an equity method investee.

name: FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanCommitmentOriginationFeeAndPremiumDiscount
description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other costs (fees) and purchase premium (discount) on financing receivable recognized as adjustment to yield. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingAfterTenYearsFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxHolidays
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income exempt from income tax because of a tax holiday.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToParticipatingNonvestedSharesWithNonForfeitableDividendRights
description: This element represents nonvested share-based payment awards that contain non-forfeitable rights to dividends or dividend equivalents (whether paid or unpaid). Basic and dilutive earnings per share are generally disclosed for such shares using the two-class method.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldInPortfolio
description: Interest and fee income generated by loans the Entity intends and has the ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (1) industrial and agricultural; (2) real estate; and (3) real estate construction loans; (4) trade financing; (5) lease financing; (6) home equity lines-of-credit; (7) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (8) credit card and other revolving-type loans. Also includes interest income for leases held by the Entity.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnderlyingFaceAmountAtMarketValue
description: Nominal or face amount on the investment owned.

name: LongtermDebtPercentageBearingVariableInterestAmount
description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a rate subject to change from time to time.

name: LossContingencyClaimsSettledNumber
description: Number of claims settled.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeReclassificationAdjustmentsAndTax
description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEquipment
description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset for use in the normal oil and gas operations and to purchase mineral interests in oil and gas properties not intended for resale.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementAndPostemploymentBenefitPlansLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits, classified as current.

name: PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of allowance for doubtful accounts, of all premiums and other types of receivables due from other persons or entities.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffiliate
description: The cash inflow from the collection of money previously advanced to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

name: GainOnPurchaseOfBusiness
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Period end book value of accumulated depreciation on property, plant and equipment (PPE) that is owned by the regulated operations of the public utility.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsDiscountForPostvestingRestrictions
description: Restrictions on equity-based instruments during the vesting period, such as the inability to transfer unvested awards, are not taken into account in estimating the fair value of the award. However, restrictions that remain in effect after an award is vested, such as the inability to transfer or hedge vested options or a prohibition on the sale of outstanding vested shares (or other type of equity) for a period of time, affect the estimate of an award's fair value.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistoricalClaimsDurationYearTen
description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the tenth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortizationOfDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

name: VariableLeaseIncome
description: Amount of variable lease payments from operating, direct financing, and sales-type leases, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

name: AssetRetirementObligationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in asset retirement obligations.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureNumberOfPositionsGreaterThanOrEqualToOneYear
description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for greater than or equal to a year for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAdditions
description: Amount of additions to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ConstructionPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services pertaining to construction projects such as a housing development or factory expansion not classified as trade payables. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherAssets
description: #N/A

name: ContractuallySpecifiedServicingFeesAmount
description: All amounts that, per contract, are due to the servicer in exchange for servicing the financial asset and would no longer be received by a servicer if the beneficial owners of the serviced assets (or their trustees or agents) were to exercise their actual or potential authority under the contract to shift the servicing to another servicer. Depending on the servicing contract, those fees may include some or all of the difference between the interest rate collected on the asset being serviced and the rate to be paid to the beneficial owners of the asset.

name: GasAndOilAcreageDevelopedGross
description: #N/A

name: GasAndOilAcreageDevelopedNet
description: #N/A

name: GasAndOilAcreageUndevelopedGross
description: #N/A

name: GasAndOilAcreageUndevelopedNet
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationIncreaseDecreaseForRemeasurementDueToSettlement
description: Amount of (increase) decrease to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from remeasurement due to settlement. Excludes decrease to benefit obligation for settlement payment.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationPrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceipt
description: Amount, before benefit payment, of receipt from prescription drug subsidy which increases benefit obligation of defined benefit postretirement plan.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDistributionsDeclared
description: Amount of equity impact of cash distribution declared to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

name: DueFromBanks
description: A bank's noninterest bearing demand deposits in other banks (such as correspondents).

name: GasDomesticRegulatedRevenue
description: #N/A

name: GasGatheringTransportationMarketingAndProcessingCosts
description: #N/A

name: GasGatheringTransportationMarketingAndProcessingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ExcessStockSharesAuthorized
description: Maximum number of excess stock shares permitted to be issued.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYearAverageBalanceOfAgreementsOutstanding
description: The calculated average balance outstanding for the year for all Federal Home Loan Bank advances as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYearAverageInterestRateAtPeriodEnd
description: The calculated weighted average interest rate for Federal Home Loan Bank advances outstanding as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtParValue
description: Amount at par value of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

name: GasPurchaseContractNet
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseNet
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund lent to other financial institution arising from the excess in reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash inflow or outflow from investment sold under the agreement to reacquire such investment.

name: InventoryWorkInProcessAndRawMaterials
description: The aggregate carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items held by the entity which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. Includes supplies used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise
description: Total amount of liabilities subject to compromise.

name: OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodNet
description: Oil and gas properties net of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization, impairment, and abandonment, carried under the successful effort method.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasProperty
description: The cash outflow to purchase of mineral interests in oil and gas properties for use in the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

name: PaymentsToExploreAndDevelopOilAndGasProperties
description: The cash outflow for exploration and development of oil and gas properties. It includes cash payments related to development of oil and gas wells drilled at previously untested geologic structures (to determine the presence of oil or gas) and wells drilled at sites where the presence of oil or gas has already been established (to extract the oil or gas).

name: GeneralContractorCosts
description: #N/A

name: GeneralContractorRevenue
description: #N/A

name: GeneralFairValueHedgeInformationDollarOffsetThresholdMaximum
description: #N/A

name: GeneralFairValueHedgeInformationDollarOffsetThresholdMinimum
description: #N/A

name: PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecuritized
description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

name: ProceedsFromLeasePayments
description: Amount of cash inflow from lease payment, classified as operating activity.

name: ProceedsFromLicenseFeesReceived
description: Cash received from licensees for license fees during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageNotesReceivable
description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

name: RealEstateInvestmentsUnconsolidatedRealEstateAndOtherJointVentures
description: The carrying amount of investments in unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented. This includes direct and indirect investments.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value as of the reporting date of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

name: SecuritiesLoaned
description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOtherShareIncreaseDecreaseInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: Weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance.

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountValue
description: #N/A

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsAmount
description: Amount that would be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the holder of the share has the right to redeem the shares.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseAccumulatedUnallocatedClaimAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount of liability for unallocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: ValuationAllowancesAndReservesRecoveries
description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from recovery of amount previously written off or reestablishment of reserve previously utilized.

name: AccountsReceivableSale
description: Amount of decrease from sale of accounts receivable.

name: GoldProductsAndServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: BridgeLoan
description: Short-Term financing which is expected to be paid back relatively quickly, such as by a subsequent longer-term loan. Also called swing loan or bridge financing.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsLegalAndAdvisoryProfessionalFees
description: Amount of reorganization items related to legal and advisory professional fees related to entities in bankruptcy.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseOtherCapitalizedCosts
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs classified as other.

name: GoodwillAllocationAdjustment
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAssetFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of securities received as collateral against derivative assets.

name: GrantsReceivableCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInIntangibleAssetsCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in intangible assets (for example patents and licenses).

name: InducedConversionOfConvertibleDebtExpense
description: Consideration given by issuer of convertible debt to provide an incentive for debt holders to convert the debt to equity securities. The expense is equal to the fair value of all securities and other consideration transferred in the transaction in excess of the fair value of securities issuable pursuant to the original conversion terms.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

name: GoodwillImpairedAdjustmentToInitialEstimateAmount
description: #N/A

name: InterestCostsIncurredCapitalized
description: Amount of interest capitalized, including amount of allowance for funds used during construction.

name: InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOperating
description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.

name: JointlyOwnedUtilityPlantProportionateOwnershipShare
description: The proportionate share of interest (percent) in a jointly owned utility plant.

name: GoodwillOtherChanges
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueNoncurrent
description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositDemand
description: Amount of money in noninterest-bearing domestic accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsAdditionsNoPreviousImpairment
description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPrivatePlacement
description: The number of units sold in a private placement of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccounts
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.

name: GoodwillTranslationAdjustments
description: #N/A

name: ProvisionForOtherLosses
description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount
description: The principal amount of the receivable or note before consideration of the discount or premium.

name: ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained
description: Stated amount that is the upper retention limit per entity policy.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremiumsWritten
description: Amount, after premiums ceded and assumed, of premium written, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxAssetIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of income tax expense for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: BusinessCombinationIndemnificationAssetsAmountAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount of indemnification assets (amounts to be reimbursed if and when certain assumed liabilities are paid) recognized at the acquisition date of a business combination.

name: CommitmentsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of arrangements with third parties, including, but not limited to, operating lease arrangement and arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services, or has agreed to commit resources to supply goods or services.

name: CommonUnitAuthorized
description: Maximum number of common units of ownership permitted to be issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

name: CompensatingBalanceAmount
description: The amount of a specific compensating balance arrangement that is maintained under an agreement for a bank loan or future credit availability.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfTransitionAssetObligation
description: Amount of transition asset (obligation) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit of defined benefit plan.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProjectedBenefitObligationInExcessOfPlanAssetsAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountMass
description: Nominal mass used to calculate payments on a derivative instrument.

name: DividendsSharebasedCompensationStock
description: Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestment
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to investment tax credit.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxHolidays
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income exempt from income tax because of a tax holiday.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPWeightedAveragePurchasePriceOfSharesPurchased
description: Weighted average purchase price of capital shares purchased through an employee stock ownership plan.

name: FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue1
description: Percentage of financing receivable balance that is past due.

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative assets not designated as hedging instruments.

name: FuelCosts
description: Fuel costs incurred that are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseAmortization
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible amortization.

name: GuaranteedBenefitLiabilityGross
description: #N/A

name: IndefiniteLivedLicenseAgreements
description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the capitalized costs to acquire rights under a license arrangement (for example, to sell specified products in a specified territory) having an indefinite period of benefit.

name: InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVenturesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of investments in an entity not consolidated. Includes, but is not limited to, investments in an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group, an entity which the company has significant influence, but does not have control and subsidiaries that are not required to be consolidated and are accounted for using the equity or cost method.

name: GuaranteedBenefitsIncurred
description: #N/A

name: GuaranteedBenefitsPaid
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInOperatingPartnerships
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners in an operating partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

name: GuaranteedInvestmentContractInterestRateAssumptionsHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicOffering
description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets1
description: Amount of cash paid to purchase other assets as part of operating activities.

name: GuarantyFeeIncome
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfInvestmentProjects
description: The cash inflow from the sale of investment projects held by an entity in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

name: HaircutsOnContractualSecuritiesCommitments
description: #N/A

name: HaircutsOnStocksAndWarrants
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesApprovedRateIncreaseDecreaseAmount
description: Amount of public utility's approved rate increase (decrease) by regulatory agency.

name: RealEstateOtherAdditions
description: Amount of other additions excluding acquisition or improvement to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: HealthCareOrganizationAmountOfWriteOffsOfAllowanceForDoubtfulAccounts
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationCapitationRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOtherShareIncreaseDecrease
description: Other than shares newly issued, the number of additional shares issued (for example, a stock split) or canceled (for example, to correct a share issuance), during the period under the plan.

name: TimeDepositsAtCarryingValue
description: Any certificate of deposit or savings account held by a bank or other financial institution for a short-term specified period of time. Because of their short-term, time deposits are considered highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: HealthCareOrganizationLossContractsExpense
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationMedicalSuppliesAndDrugsExpense
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationOtherRevenue
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationPatientServiceRevenue
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCarryingAmountLiabilities
description: Carrying amount of the liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

name: AssetRetirementObligationCashPaidToSettle
description: Amount of cash paid during the period to settle an asset retirement obligation. Amounts paid to settle an asset retirement obligation are generally included in the operating section of the Statement of Cash Flows.

name: HealthCareOrganizationPremiumRevenue
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationResidentServiceRevenue
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationRevenue
description: #N/A

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeChangesInAccountingAndExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerShareDiluted
description: Per diluted share amount of pro forma income from continuing operations, after tax, as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: HealthCareOrganizationSignificantChangesInEstimates
description: #N/A

name: CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all liability derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: CommonStockOtherValueOutstanding
description: Value of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

name: HealthCareOrganizationUnusualTransactionsImpactingAllowanceForDoubtfulAccounts
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareTrustFundAdministrativeExpense
description: #N/A

name: CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasPropertiesWithProvedReserves
description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have proved reserves.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnTradingSecurities
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCapitalizedResearchAndDevelopmentCosts
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from research and development costs.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccruedIncomeTaxesPayable
description: Amount classified as income tax obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EscrowDepositDisbursementsRelatedToPropertyAcquisition1
description: Amount of escrow deposit disbursements related to property acquisition in noncash investing or financing transactions.

name: FinancingReceivableSignificantPurchases
description: Amount of increase in financing receivable from purchase. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsForeign
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax settlement.

name: InvestmentTaxCredit
description: The amount deducted from an entities' taxes, reflecting a percentage of an amount invested in certain assets spread over the useful life of those assets; includes deferred investment tax credits.

name: NumberOfPropertiesSubjectToGroundLeases
description: Number of separate real estate development properties located on land subject to ground leases.

name: OtherIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssets
description: Amount after impairment of indefinite-lived intangible assets classified as other. Excludes financial assets and goodwill.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsAdditionsAdditionalCreditLosses
description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

name: PaymentForManagementFee
description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

name: PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.

name: ProductionRelatedImpairmentsOrCharges
description: Nonrecurring impairment charges related to the write-off of production-related equipment and inventory. This tag is used when an Entity charges this cost to cost of goods sold.

name: PublicUtilitiesApprovedReturnOnEquityPercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's approved return on equity.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentPlantInService
description: Period end amount of total gross PPE.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: RestrictedInvestmentsNoncurrent
description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of fund outstanding borrowed in form of security repurchase agreement for sale and repurchase of identical or substantially same security at date certain for specified price. Includes security sold under agreement to repurchase not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf10PercentAdverseChangeInPrepaymentSpeed
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAggregateLosses
description: #N/A

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeIncreaseDecreaseNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in fair value of net investment hedge.

name: WorkersCompensationLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. Used to reflect the noncurrent portion of the liabilities (due beyond one year; or beyond one operating cycle if longer).

name: AccruedInsuranceCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees.

name: AccruedUtilitiesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: CapitalizedCostsOilAndGasProducingActivitiesGross
description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCashFlowsExpectedToBeCollectedAtAcquisition
description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ContractualObligationDueInSecondAndThirdYear
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in second and third fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DerivativeAssetNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsInHedgesAssetsAtFairValue
description: Aggregate fair value of all derivative assets designated as hedging instruments. Includes instruments designated as cash flow hedges, fair value hedges, and hedges of net investments in foreign operations.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesFairValue
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNetCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: DerivativePriceRiskOptionStrikePrice
description: The strike price on the price risk option contract such as a put option or a call option.

name: DividendsShareBasedCompensationCash
description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityPurchasesSalesIssuancesSettlements
description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersIntoLevel3
description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYearMaximumOutstandingAtAnyMonthEnd
description: The maximum balance outstanding at any month end during the period as of the Balance Sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateThreeToFourYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: GainLossOnInvestmentsExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: This item represents the net total realized and unrealized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling or holding marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, including the unrealized holding gain (loss) of held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category and the cumulative unrealized gain (loss) which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) for available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period.
