Additionally, this item would include any gains (losses) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationInterestAccrued
description: The amount of estimated interest accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationInterestExpense
description: The amount of estimated interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorrowersForTaxesAndInsurance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerAdvances
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRoyaltiesPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for compensation payments related to the use of copyrights, patents, trade names, licenses, technology. Royalty payments are also paid by the lease holders for oil, gas, and mineral extraction.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesGrossGainsDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesGrossGainsLossesDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesGrossLossesDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: InsuredEventGainLoss
description: Amount of excess (deficiency) of insurance recovery over the loss incurred from an insured event.

name: InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFederalReserveBankAdvancesShortTerm
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on short-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.

name: LandImprovements
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use. Examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesPledgedAsCollateral
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanContributionsByEmployer
description: Amount of contributions made to multiemployer plan by employer.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: NetCapital
description: Amount of net capital of broker-dealer.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredSecurityAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredSecurityDerivativeHedgeGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: NotesPayableToBankNoncurrent
description: The total amount due within more than 12 month, or the operating cycle if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredToAvailableForSaleSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementSubleaseRevenue
description: The amount of revenue recognized for the period under subleasing arrangements.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHoldingGains
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHoldingLoss
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHoldingLosses
description: #N/A

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPosition12MonthsOrLongerAggregateLoss
description: #N/A

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionAggregateLoss
description: #N/A

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnrealizedLossPositionLessThan12MonthsAggregateLoss
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeReclassificationForDiscontinuanceBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from discontinuance of cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConversions
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.

name: ProceedsFromPreviousAcquisition
description: Cash inflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

name: RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper
description: The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

name: RoyaltyIncomeNonoperating
description: Ancillary revenue earned during the period from the consideration paid to the entity for the use of its rights and property by another party. Examples include licensing the use of copyrighted materials and leasing the extraction of natural resources.

name: ShortTermLeasePayments
description: Amount of cash outflow for short-term lease payment excluded from lease liability.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesRestrictedCurrent
description: #N/A

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesRestrictedNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease
description: Per share increase in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationPurchases
description: The amount purchased during the period under an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation (for example, under the take-or-pay or throughput contract).

name: WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingProForma
description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHoldingGain
description: #N/A

name: HomeBuildingCosts
description: #N/A

name: HomeBuildingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: This item represents the difference between the gross realized gains and losses realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

name: BusinessDevelopment
description: Business development involves the development of products and services, their delivery, design and their implementation. Business development includes a number of techniques designed to grow an economic enterprise. Such techniques include, but are not limited to, assessments of marketing opportunities and target markets, intelligence gathering on customers and competitors, generating leads for possible sales, follow-up sales activity, formal proposal writing and business model design. Business development involves evaluating a business and then realizing its full potential, using such tools as marketing, sales, information management and customer service.

name: CapitalizationLongtermDebtAndEquity
description: This element represents the total consolidated (as applicable) capitalization of the entity which is comprised of its long-term debt and equity instruments. The table may be detailed by subsidiary (legal entity) and include information by type of debt or equity detailed by instrument.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueChangeInMeasureOfProgress
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in measure of progress which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: CostDirectLabor
description: Cost of labor directly related to good produced and service rendered. Includes, but is not limited to, payroll cost and equity-based compensation.

name: CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfUnprovedOilAndGasProperties
description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have unproved reserves.

name: ImmediateTerminalFundingAnnuitiesInterestRateLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer and noncurrent obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, noncurrent).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanDivestituresBenefitObligation
description: Amount of decrease in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from disposal or classification as held-for-sale.

name: DerivativeAverageVariableInterestRate
description: Average variable interest rate related to the group of interest rate derivatives.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseReceivable
description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term, guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from direct financing lease.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiAndWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValue
description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI) and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: ExcessStockSharesOutstanding
description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

name: FiniteLivedTrademarksGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style for a specified period of time.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfProperty
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMonthsAmortizedCost
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearSixThroughTenAmortizedCost
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingYearTwoThroughFiveAmortizedCost
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: LifeInsuranceInForceAssumed
description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding assumed from other entity, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and adjustment to face value.

name: LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest1
description: Amount of loan with fixed rate of interest.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalAfterYearFive
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsUnitbasedCompensation
description: Number of units issued for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

name: PaymentsToAcquireTrustPreferredInvestments
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of trust preferred securities, which possess characteristics of both equity and debt securities.

name: ProceedsFromHedgeInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartnersUnits
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStockDividendReinvestmentPlan
description: Amount of cash inflow from capital contributions to an entity associated with a dividend reinvestment plan.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentConstructionWorkInProgress
description: Period end amount of construction work in progress in public utility.

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedRateIncreaseDecreaseAmount
description: Amount of public utility's requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityRedemptionValue
description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

name: SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCostsCapitalizedSubsequentToAcquisitionBuildingsAndImprovements
description: Amount of building and improvement costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf20PercentAdverseChangeInPrepaymentSpeed
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: SeparateAccountAssets
description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

name: SeparateAccountsLiability
description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

name: ShortTermNonBankLoansAndNotesPayable
description: Amount of borrowings from a creditor other than a bank with a maturity within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualAdditionsFromBusinessAcquisition
description: Amount of increase in the standard product warranty accrual from a business acquisition. Excludes extended product warranties.

name: StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction
description: The change in equity as a result of a spin-off transaction (a regular or reverse spin-off) which is based on the recorded amounts.

name: AccountsReceivableBilledForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalMarkToMarket
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from changes in fair value of common and preferred stock issued to employee benefit trust but unearned.

name: AverageSalesPrices
description: Sales price per unit of oil and gas produced.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentFinancialAssets
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to financial assets acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: ContractualObligationDueInFourthAndFifthYear
description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in fourth and fifth fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockSharesReservedForFutureIssuance
description: Aggregate number of nonredeemable convertible preferred shares reserved for future issuance.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualCashAwardGrantedAmount
description: Amount of commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualFairValueOfSharesIssued
description: The total fair value of shares issued during the period under a deferred compensation arrangement.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoaned
description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: DerivativeSwapTypeAverageFixedPrice
description: Average fixed price related to the group of price risk swap derivatives.

name: IncentiveFeeAmountPaid
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationGoodwillCurrent
description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DueFromOtherRelatedParties
description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other.

name: EstimatedInsuranceRecoveries
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts expected to be recovered under the terms of insurance contracts.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsPurchaseAccountingAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life for purchase accounting adjustments.

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

name: IncomeLossBeforeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciple
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossBeforeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciplePerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossBeforeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciplePerDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciple
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciplePerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrinciplePerDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepreciation
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depreciation.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableLoansInProcess
description: Amount of undisbursed portion of the loan receivable balance (loans in process). Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: LossContingencyPatentsAllegedlyInfringedNumber
description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity has allegedly infringed.

name: NonRecourseDebt
description: Amount of debt for which creditor does not have general recourse to the debtor but rather has recourse only to the property used for collateral in the transaction or other specific property.

name: OilAndGasPropertyFullCostMethodNet
description: Oil and gas properties, net of depletion, carried under the full cost method.

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementMinimumLeaseRevenue
description: The total amount of lease revenue recognized for the period for which the lessee was obligated under leasing arrangements regardless of any other events or conditions. This amount excludes contingent revenue and sublease revenue.

name: ResidualValueOfLeasedAsset
description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsWeightedAverageExpectedDividend
description: Disclosure of the weighted average expected dividend for an entity using a valuation technique with different dividend rates during the contractual term.

name: TradingGainsLosses
description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

name: TransferOfInvestments
description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnCommodityContracts
description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: UnrealizedGainOnSecurities
description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a gain, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of trade and related party payables and accrued expenses.

name: AccumulatedCapitalizedInterestCosts
description: Amount of accumulated interest costs capitalized as part of property, plant and equipment cost basis.

name: ContractuallySpecifiedServicingFeesLateFeesAndAncillaryFeesEarnedInExchangeForServicingFinancialAssets
description: Amount of contractually specified servicing fee, late fee, and ancillary fee recognized as income for servicing asset and servicing liability.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityTransferAmount
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) transferred to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).

name: DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnit
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetsRegulatoryAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences derived regulatory assets and liabilities.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObligationIncreaseDecreaseForSettlementAndCurtailment
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in accumulated benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from effects of settlement and curtailment.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseLifeInsurance
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to life insurance expense.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSoldCarryingAmount
description: Amount of the entity's equity method investment which has been sold.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: FederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: Amount after offset of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

name: GuarantyLiabilities
description: This item represents a non-contingent liability for the fair value of an obligation to stand ready to perform over the term of a guaranty issued in the event that specified triggering events or conditions occur.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRollingAfterTenYearsAmortizedCost
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.

name: LeaseDepositLiability
description: Amount of liability for lease payments received, including variable lease payments, when collectability is not probable at commencement date for sales-type lease.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnit
description: #N/A

name: LoansInsurancePolicy
description: Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInJointVentures
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in joint ventures included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

name: IncomeLossFromDispositionOfDiscontinuedOperationsForOtherStockPerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantEmployerContributionCost
description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsBeforeTaxPerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerBasicAndDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsTaxEffectPerBasicShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromExtraordinaryItemsTaxEffectPerDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: NetRealizedOrUnrealizedGainLossOnTradingSecurities
description: The sum of the realized and unrealized net gain (loss) on trading securities during the period.

name: OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodAccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method. Oil and gas property include, but not limited to, the entity's wells and related equipment and facilities.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForHeldToMaturityTransferredToAvailableForSaleSecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsReductionsSecuritiesSold
description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

name: IncomeLossFromOperationsBeforeExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromOperationsBeforeExtraordinaryItemsPerBasicAndDilutedShare
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromOperationsBeforeExtraordinaryItemsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances
description: Amount of cash outflow for disbursement to borrower related to advance, made by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), classified as investing activity.

name: PaymentsToAcquireBusinessTwoNetOfCashAcquired
description: The cash outflow associated with a second acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

name: PaymentsToEmployees
description: Payments of cash to employees, including wages and salaries, during the current period.

name: PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInPortfolio
description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

name: ProceedsFromCustomers
description: Cash receipts from customers during the current period which are usually for sales of goods and services.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfEquitySecuritiesFvNi
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as investing activity.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace
description: Purchase of minerals in place.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpenseSoftwareExcludingAcquiredInProcessCost
description: Research and development expense during the period related to the costs of developing and achieving technological feasibility of a computer software product to be sold, leased, or otherwise marketed.

name: RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomerOther
description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606, classified as other.

name: SalesTypeLeaseRevenue
description: Amount of sales-type lease revenue.

name: SuppliesAndPostageExpense
description: The aggregate amount of expenses directly related to the supplies and postage.

name: WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature.

name: AcceleratedShareRepurchasesInitialPricePaidPerShare
description: The price paid per share to immediately purchase the targeted number of shares on the date of executing the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

name: AccountsReceivableFromSecuritization
description: The amount owed to the reporting entity by counterparties in securitized loan transactions.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrganizations
description: Amount payable to broker-dealers or clearing organizations for executing or clearing trades or orders.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationInterestFromExamination
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRecorded
description: #N/A

name: CostOfOtherPropertyOperatingExpense
description: Other operating costs incurred during the reporting period and may include amounts paid to maintain the property.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPresentValueExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from change in present value of expected cash flows.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedAsset
description: Amount of asset associated with derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

name: DevelopmentCosts
description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to obtain access to proved reserves and to provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering and storing the oil and gas.

name: DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesFromExamination
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxExaminationRangeOfPossibleLosses
description: #N/A

name: ExplorationAbandonmentAndImpairmentExpense
description: The adjustment to expense previously capitalized costs of drilling exploratory wells when proved reserves are not found or when the entity obtains information that raises substantial doubt about the economic or operational viability of the project.

name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperations
description: #N/A

name: FairValueHedgeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all derivative liabilities designated as fair value hedging instruments.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationSales
description: Amount of sales of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity and pledged to counterparties as collateral, including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities.

name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitExtraordinaryItems
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossForeignCurrencyTranslation
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: GainLossFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfCashFlowHedgeEffectivenessNet
description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on the cash flow hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of cash flow hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossOnCashFlowHedgeIneffectivenessNet
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

name: ImpairmentChargeOnReclassifiedAssets
description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and used from held-for-sale, the amount of impairment charge that is recognized on the reclassification date.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAccrued
description: The amount of estimated penalties accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInReinsurancePayables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to other insurance companies when the reporting entity has assumed a portion of the cedant's insurance risk which has resulted in insurance losses.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

name: LifeInsuranceInForcePercentageAssumedToNet
description: Percentage of assumed life insurance contract issued and outstanding to life insurance contract issued and outstanding after effect of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and adjustment to face value.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityCapacityAvailableForTradePurchases
description: The maximum amount of borrowing capacity under a line of credit that is available as of the balance sheet date for financing purchases of goods acquired for inventory or imminent delivery to a customer.

name: MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC) directly or indirectly attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: MineralPropertiesNet
description: Mineral properties, net of adjustments.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeFinalizationOfPensionAndNonPensionPostretirementPlanValuationTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

name: PayablesToCustomers
description: Amount payable to customer by broker-dealer.

name: PaymentsForDeposits
description: The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies
description: The net cash outflow or inflow for net proceeds and payments derived from carrying life insurance policies for which the entity is the beneficiary.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfConvertiblePreferredStock
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock originally issued and identified as a security that can be exchanged for another type of financial security. This repurchased stock is held in treasury.

name: PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncurred
description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

name: RentalProperties
description: Carrying amount of income producing properties held for rental.

name: RepaymentsOfAssumedDebt
description: The cash outflow from the repayments of a long-term debt originally issued by another party but is assumed by the entity.

name: SalesTypeLeaseLeaseReceivable
description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from sales-type lease.

name: SubordinatedLongTermDebt
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of collateralized/uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind the primary lender of the company.

name: AcceleratedShareRepurchasesSettlementPaymentOrReceipt
description: Amount of cash receipt from (payment to) bank; or stock received from (issuance to) bank in the settlement of the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

name: AmortizationOfESOPAward
description: Value of shares committed to be released under an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

name: AssetsUnderManagementCarryingAmount
description: The carrying amount of assets an investment adviser manages on behalf of investors.

name: BasicEarningsPerShareProForma
description: Pro forma basic earnings per share or earnings per unit, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

name: BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesEstimatedUncollectible
description: For receivables acquired in a business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in a transfer (as defined), this element represents the best estimate at the acquisition date of the contractual cash flows not expected to be collected, by major class of receivable, such as loans, direct finance leases (as defined), and any other class of receivables.

name: CashFlowHedgeDerivativeInstrumentAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all asset derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: CostDirectMaterial
description: Cost of material used for good produced and service rendered.

name: CostsIncurredOilAndGasPropertyAcquisitionExplorationAndDevelopmentActivities
description: Amount of costs incurred related to oil and gas property acquisition, exploration and development activities, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualSharesAuthorizedForIssuance
description: The maximum number of shares authorized for issuance under the deferred compensation arrangement as of the balance sheet date.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of derivative liability, security sold under agreement to repurchase, and security loaned. Includes liability not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDerivativeAsset
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as an asset.

name: ExcessCapital
description: Amount of total risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToEarningsNet
description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeAssets
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliatesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRegulatoryAssetsAndLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of assets that are created when regulatory agencies permits public utilities to defer costs (revenues) to the balance sheet. This element is a the increase (decrease) of regulatory assets and liabilities combined.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationRepatriationOfForeignEarningsJobsCreationActOf2004
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeDomesticDeposits
description: Interest earned on deposits in United States money market accounts and other United States interest earning accounts.

name: InvestmentOwnedBalanceContracts
description: Balance held at close of period in number of contracts.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCollateralForSecuredBorrowings
description: Reflects the aggregate value of loans, trade receivables, securities and financial instruments that serve as collateral for obligations arising from a transfer of financial assets recorded as a secured borrowing.

name: NumberOfRestaurants
description: Represents the number of restaurants.

name: OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost
description: Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

name: OtherPreferredStockDividendsAndAdjustments
description: Amount of preferred stock dividends and adjustments classified as other.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PrepaidRoyalties
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for royalties that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesSalesOfMineralsInPlace
description: Sales of minerals in place.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTaxes
description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

name: RoyaltyGuaranteesCommitmentsAmount
description: The amount the entity has committed to make for future royalty guarantees.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseCollateralRightToReclaimCash
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

name: TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsSalesAmountDerecognized
description: Amount of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction, at the date of derecognition.

name: AccountsReceivableGrossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStockIssuedOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCosts
description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from issuance costs from a share-lending arrangement entered into, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNonaccretableDifference
description: The amount of the loan's contractually required payments receivable in excess of the amount of its cash flows expected to be collected. This relates to loans with deteriorating of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsToFromNonaccretableDifference
description: Amount of reclassification (to) from nonaccretable difference (from) to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ContinuingInvolvementWithTransferredFinancialAssetsPrincipalAmountOutstanding
description: Principal amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction. Continuing involvement includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

name: CostmethodInvestmentsOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: This item represents an other than temporary decline in value that has been recognized against an investment accounted for under the cost method of accounting. The excess of the carrying amount over the fair value of the investment represents the amount of the write down which is or was reflected in earnings. The written down value is a new cost basis with the adjusted value of the investment becoming its new carrying value. Evidence of a loss in value might include, but would not necessarily be limited to, absence of an ability to recover the carrying amount of the investment or inability of the investee to sustain an earnings capacity which would justify the carrying amount of the investment.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossNotToSellBeforeRecoveryCreditLossPreviouslyRecordedExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), not intended to be sold and not more likely than not will be required to sell before recovery of amortized cost basis, with previously recorded allowance.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssetsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan.

name: DepreciationExpenseOnReclassifiedAssets
description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and use from held-for-sale, the depreciation expense recognized when the asset is reclassified. This represents the difference between the carrying value at the time the decision to reclassify is made and the carrying amount that the asset would have had if it had never been classified as held for sale (including consideration of depreciation expense).

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCash
description: Amount of currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits, held by a disposal group.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateFourToFiveYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: GainLossOnSaleOfAccountsReceivable
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of accounts receivable.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseLifeInsurance
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible life insurance expense.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivableCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of amounts due within one year (or one business cycle) from note holders for outstanding loans.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherLoans
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans classified as other.

name: InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits
description: Interest expense incurred on all money market deposits.

name: InventoryRawMaterialsAndPurchasedPartsNetOfReserves
description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

name: InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossPerShare
description: Per share or unit amount, after investment expense, of dividend and interest investment income (loss).

name: LandAvailableForDevelopment
description: Carrying amount of land available for development.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredButNotReportedIBNRClaimsAmount
description: Estimated costs as of the balance sheet date of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process for claims that have not yet been submitted to the insurance company for reimbursement.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLlcMembersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of ownership interest in a limited liability company (LLC), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherLoansPayableLongTerm
description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisitions
description: Cash outflow related to amounts given in advance to show or confirm an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemableConvertiblePreferredStock
description: The cash outflow to reacquire callable preferred stock which is identified as being convertible to another type of financial security.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateAndRealEstateAcquiredInSettlementOfLoans
description: The cash inflow from proceeds From Sales of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans.

name: PropertyManagementFeeRevenue
description: The amount of revenue derived from managing real estate properties.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAirTrafficLiability
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

name: ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1
description: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

name: QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFinancialStatementsAmount
description: Amount of each individual error being corrected in the correcting adjustment.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RecoveryOfDirectCosts
description: Return of or reimbursements received in relation to direct costs and expenses previously paid or incurred.

name: RevenueFromCollaborativeArrangementExcludingRevenueFromContractWithCustomer
description: Amount of revenue from collaborative arrangement. Excludes revenue from contract with customer under Topic 606.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellLiability
description: Amount of liability associated with funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBorrowedSecurities
description: #N/A

name: SeniorNotesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term notes having the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to debt holders having a lesser priority of repayment.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the standard product warranty accrual. Excludes extended product warranties.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCarryingValueOfAssetsReceivedAsConsiderationInDisposalOfBusiness
description: #N/A

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of operating expense for depreciation and amortization of regulated operation.

name: AssetsNeededForImmediateSettlementAggregateFairValue
description: The aggregate fair value of assets needed to immediately settle the derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features if the credit-risk-related contingent features were triggered at the end of the reporting period.

name: BankLoans
description: Amount of short-term bank loan secured by broker-dealer customer's security.

name: BusinessAcquisitionRevenueReportedByAcquiredEntityForLastAnnualPeriod
description: Total revenue reported by the acquired entity for its previous full fiscal year before the business acquisition.

name: CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortizationExpense
description: The charge for the use of long-lived depreciable capital leased assets for the period.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualCashAwardsGrantedPercentage
description: Commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration expressed as a percentage of the individual's base salary.

name: DerivativeCashReceivedOnHedge
description: The amount of cash received during the period on settlement of a hedge.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredRevenue
description: Amount classified as deferred revenue attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: EquityIssuedInBusinessCombinationFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of equity issued in a business combination.

name: EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminableFairValueDownwardPriceAdjustmentCumulativeAmount
description: Amount of cumulative loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidRent
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for rent that provides economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseDueToPurchasesOfMineralsInPlace
description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of purchases of minerals in place.

name: InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossRatio
description: Percentage of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

name: LitigationSettlementInterest
description: Interest expense (income) directly attributable to an award in settlement of litigation.

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsAndTax
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from resulting from payment, receipt or drawdown of cash deposit to guarantee a loan during the period.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedLoansReceivablePledgedForFederalHomeLoanBankDebt
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of FHLB debt obligations, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PreferredStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutureIssuance
description: Aggregate number of nonredeemable preferred shares reserved for future issuance.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsAfterYearFive
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLandHeldForUse
description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for use; excludes sales of land held as inventory or investments.

name: RestructuringReservePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the accrual for restructuring costs.

name: ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationAndValuationProvisions
description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

name: SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCostsCapitalizedSubsequentToAcquisitionLand
description: Amount of land costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardPlanModificationNumberOfEmployeesAffected
description: Number of grantees affected by modification of award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredPensionCosts
description: #N/A

name: TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRentReceivables
description: #N/A

name: UnprovedOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethod
description: Oil and Gas properties with unproved reserves under the successful effort method.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesCostMethodInvestmentsAndOtherInvestments
description: The aggregate net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of marketable securities categorized as trading held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period, which may have arisen from (a) securities classified as trading, (b) the unrealized holding gain (loss) on held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category, and (c) the cumulative unrealized gain (loss) which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) on available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period and/or any unrealized gains or losses on investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading or available-for-sale.

name: AccountsPayableFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables.

name: AccumulatedDeferredInvestmentTaxCredit
description: The noncurrent portion of the reserve for accumulated deferred investment tax credits as of the balance sheet date. This is the remaining investment credit, which will reduce the cost of services collected from ratepayers by a ratable portion over the investment's regulatory life.

name: AffiliateCosts
description: Costs associated with revenues arising from an entity that is an affiliate of the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

name: CapitalizedCostsUnprovedProperties
description: Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

name: CommonStockConvertibleConversionPriceIncrease
description: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: CostsIncurredAcquisitionOfOilAndGasProperties
description: Cost incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in acquisition of oil and gas properties.

name: CumulativeTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) in cumulative translation adjustment before transfers included in determining net income.

name: DebtInstrumentUnusedBorrowingCapacityFee
description: Amount of commitment fees for the unused borrowing capacity under the long-term financing arrangement that is available to the entity.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsDeferredGainOnSaleLeasebackTransaction
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from a gain reported for tax purposes on sale and leaseback transactions in accordance with enacted tax laws.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseUnguaranteedResidualAsset
description: Present value expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term, not guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor.

name: FairValueDisclosureOffbalanceSheetRisksAmountAsset
description: The fair value of financial assets, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedAtFairValue
description: Fair value of obligations incurred from short sales.

name: FiniteLivedCoreDepositsGross
description: Bank deposits belonging to an acquired bank that can be counted on as a stable source of lending funds. These deposits have the following attributes: predictable costs and low sensitivity to interest rates. This intangible asset is usually amortized over its estimated useful life.

name: HedgedLiabilityDiscontinuedFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged liability in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, remaining after discontinued hedge.

name: IncentiveFeeExpense
description: Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfInterestRateFairValueHedgingInstruments1
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusinessUnit
description: Amount of divestiture of an asset lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value. Excludes financial assets and goodwill.

name: InsuranceCommissions
description: The expense incurred by an insurance company to persons or entities for generating or placing insurance or investment contracts with the company, usually determined as a percentage of policy or contract premiums. Excludes advances or draws to be applied against commissions earned.

name: InvestmentCompanyGainLossOnInvestmentPerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

name: InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfPremium
description: Amount of amortization of purchase premium on nonoperating securities.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommitmentsFixedRates
description: Reflects the amount of cash required to fully fund agreements to provide advances to borrowers and lessees at stated interest rates.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments receivable in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

name: OtherRealEstateDisposals
description: Disposals of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

name: PaymentsToSuppliers
description: Payments of cash to suppliers for goods and services during the current period.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearFive1
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearFour1
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearThree1
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearTwo1
description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: The net cash inflow from (a) sales of loans held-for-investment, (b) sales of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both. Includes proceeds from securitizations of loans.

name: PublicUtilitiesAllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionAdditions
description: Total increase in earnings in the period representing the cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and/or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfHedgedItemInInterestRateFairValueHedge
description: #N/A

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfHedgedItemInPriceRiskFairValueHedge
description: #N/A

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinancingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfInterestRateFairValueHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: SalesTypeLeaseSellingProfitLoss
description: Amount of profit (loss) recognized at commencement from sales-type lease.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesInFairValue
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDerivativeInstruments
description: #N/A

name: TemporaryEquityOtherChanges
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in temporary equity from changes classified as other.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemInsuranceProceeds
description: Amount of insurance proceeds for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpense
description: Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFilmCosts
description: #N/A

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesIncreaseDecreaseForRevisionInEstimates
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) which increases (decreases) the accrual for environmental loss contingencies from revisions in estimates to existing obligations. Excludes changes related to business acquisitions, divestitures, or currency movement.

name: AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationPropertyPlantAndEquipmentExcludingCapitalLeasedAssets
description: Cumulative amount of depreciation, depletion and amortization (related to property, plant and equipment, but not including land or leased assets).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationPropertyPlantAndEquipmentPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of property, plant and equipment.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureNumberOfPositionsLessThanOneYear
description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments in a continuous unrealized loss position for less than one year or normal operating cycle, if longer, for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivable
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases.

name: CapitalUnits
description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockNonredeemableOrRedeemableIssuerOptionValue
description: Value of outstanding nonredeemable convertible preferred stock or outstanding convertible preferred stock that is redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

name: DebtInstrumentIncreaseDecreaseOtherNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in debt instruments, classified as other.

name: DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilities
description: Total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income in future periods and obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities).

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountOfUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiabilityBadDebtReserveForTaxPurposesOfQualifiedLender
description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to bad debt reserve for tax purposes of a qualified lender.

name: DividendsPreferredStockPaidinkind
description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).

name: FairValueAssetsAndLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisGainLossIncludedInEarnings
