description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from asset and liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCost
description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other costs (fees) on financing receivable recognized as adjustment to yield. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: FiniteLivedLicenseAgreementsGross
description: Gross carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of certain rights acquired to exercise a certain privilege or pursue a particular business or occupation and which is deemed to have a finite economic life.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfOilAndGasProperty
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of proven and unproven oil and gas properties.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDepositsOutstanding
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in monies given as security or collateral for items acquired or borrowed on a temporary basis. Deposits may also be paid as initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivableRelatedParties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: InvestmentBankingRevenue
description: Includes (1) underwriting revenue (the spread between the resale price received and the cost of the securities and related expenses) generated through the purchasing, distributing and reselling of new issues of securities (alternatively, could be a secondary offering of a large block of previously issued securities); and (2) fees earned for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, and other types of financial advisory services.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInIndustryFundObligation
description: #N/A

name: JointlyOwnedUtilityPlantOwnershipAmountOfPlantAccumulatedDepreciation
description: The period end amount of accumulated depreciation in a jointly owned electricity generation plant.

name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributionAmount
description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions
description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementAndPostemploymentBenefitPlansLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockPreferenceStockAndWarrants
description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholder, which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation and from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at a predetermined price.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveRevisionOfPreviousEstimateEnergy
description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas related to revision of a previous estimate resulting from new information, except for an increase in proved acreage, or change in economic factors, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesGross
description: Amount before valuation allowance recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

name: RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales
description: Amount included in cost of sales related to transactions with related parties incurred and recorded in the statement of operations for the period.

name: ReportingUnitAmountOfFairValueInExcessOfCarryingAmount
description: Amount of fair value of reporting unit in excess of carrying amount.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLease
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

name: TradingSecuritiesEquity
description: Fair value of investments in trading equity securities and other forms of trading securities that provide ownership interests.

name: UndistributedEarningsDiluted
description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesNetBeforeTax
description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBasis
description: This item represents the cost of equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments for other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsFromNonaccretableDifference
description: Amount of increase of reclassification from nonaccretable difference to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangeDueToNetIncomeAttributableToParentAndEffectsOfChangesNet
description: This element represents the total net income attributable to the parent for the period and the effect of net changes during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not result in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.

name: CumulativeEffectOnRetainedEarningsBeforeTax1
description: Amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings before related income tax effect.

name: DebtSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingAmountArranged
description: Amount debtor-in-possession financing arranged (but not necessarily all borrowed).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLossAndLossAdjustmentExpenseReserve
description: #N/A

name: DecreaseDueToSalesOfMineralsInPlace
description: Amount of decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales of minerals in place.

name: DeferredCostsLeasingGross
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, this element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. This amount is before considering accumulated amortization representing the periodic charge to earnings to recognize the deferred costs over the term of the related lease.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanDivestituresPlanAssets
description: Amount of decrease in plan assets of defined benefit plan from disposal or classification as held-for-sale.

name: Depletion
description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of natural resources.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Fair value of liability arising from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, financial instrument or contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), energy marketing activities (trading activities), expected to be settled after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Examples of energy marketing activities include, but are not limited to, trading of electricity, coal, natural gas and oil using financial instruments, including, but not limited to, forward contracts, options and swaps.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaimCash
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

name: DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGainOnDisposalBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMemberCashDistributionsDeclared
description: Amount of equity impact of cash distributions declared to unit-holder of limited liability company (LLC).

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesContributedToESOP
description: This item represents the number of shares provided to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) during the period.

name: GainLossOnDiscontinuationOfCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurringNet
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: HostingArrangementServiceContractImplementationCostCapitalizedAfterAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidReinsurancePremiums
description: The change in prepaid reinsurance premiums recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToEquityUnitPurchaseAgreements
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of equity unit purchase agreements using the treasury stock method.

name: InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: The aggregate expense incurred on federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase. If amounts recognized as payables under repurchase agreements have been offset against amounts recognized as receivables under reverse repurchase agreements and reported as a net amount on the balance sheet, the income and expense from these agreements may be reported on a net basis.

name: InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.

name: JointlyOwnedUtilityPlantGrossOwnershipAmountOfPlantInService
description: The period end amount owned by the reporting utility of a jointly owned utility plant in service.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsAndUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: The aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

name: LossContingencyReceivableProceeds
description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables related to a loss contingency.

name: MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementDepreciationExpenseOnPropertySubjectToOrHeldForLease
description: Amount of depreciation expense for lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetInvestmentHedgeGainLossReclassificationBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

name: OtherInventoryMaterialsSuppliesAndMerchandiseUnderConsignment
description: Gross amount of inventory owned by the entity but in the hands of a customer, typically a reseller.

name: OtherRealEstateValuationAdjustments
description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLandHeldForUse
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of land for use; excludes purchases of land held as inventory or as investments.

name: PostageExpense
description: Amount of expense associated with postage.

name: PreferredStockPerShareAmountsOfPreferredDividendsInArrears
description: Per share amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt, including capital lease obligations and mandatory redeemable capital securities.

name: PublicUtilitiesAllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionCapitalizedInterest
description: Amount capitalized of allowance for funds used during construction.

name: RiskWeightedAssets
description: Amount of risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: SecuritiesHeldAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of securities held that had been pledged by counterparties under financing and lending arrangements, pursuant to which the entity has the right by agreement or custom to sell or re-pledge such securities.

name: SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueDisposals
description: Decrease in servicing assets subsequently measured at fair value resulting from conveyance of servicing rights to unrelated parties.

name: ShortTermLeaseCommitmentAmount
description: Amount of short-term lease commitment.

name: SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPolicyClaimsAndBenefitsPayable
description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

name: UnrealizedLossOnSecurities
description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a loss, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeStockOwnershipPlanSharesNotCommittedToBeReleased
description: Number of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares that have not been committed to be released determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

name: AccretionExpenseIncludingAssetRetirementObligations
description: Amount of accretion expense, which includes, but is not limited to, accretion expense from asset retirement obligations, environmental remediation obligations, and other contingencies.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInThreeYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesNet
description: The increase (decrease) during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not arise in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.

name: ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueModificationOfContract
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from contract modification which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

name: ConvertiblePreferredStockConvertedToOtherSecurities
description: Value of convertible preferred stock that was converted to other securities.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsWriteOffOfDeferredFinancingCostsAndDebtDiscounts
description: Amount of write-off of debt issuance costs and debt discounts related to prepetition debt obligations.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsLevel3ReconciliationIncreaseForPurchase
description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of increase in plan asset of defined benefit plan from purchase.

name: DerivativeForwardExchangeRate1
description: Contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold.

name: DilutedEarningsPerShareProForma
description: Pro forma diluted earnings per share, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseDeferredSellingProfit
description: Amount of deferred selling profit from direct financing lease.

name: DividendsPaidinkind
description: Amount of paid and unpaid paid-in-kind dividends (PIK) declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxSettlementsStateAndLocal
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax settlement.

name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssets90DaysOrMorePastDue
description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of loans held as assets that are 90 days or more past due for which the fair value option has been elected.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetOffMarketLeaseFavorableGross
description: This element represents the identifiable intangible asset established upon acquisition based on a favorable difference between the terms of an acquired lease and the current market terms for that lease at the acquisition date.

name: GainLossOnForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeDerivatives
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments which were recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfCommodityContracts
description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds.

name: IncentiveToLessee
description: Amount of incentive granted by lessor to lessee.

name: IncreaseDecreaseOfRestrictedInvestments
description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePrincipalAmountOfDelinquentLoans
description: Amount of principal due on delinquent mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: NoninterestExpenseTransferAgentAndCustodianFees
description: Fees paid to an agent employed by a corporation or mutual fund to maintain shareholder records, including purchases, sales, and account balances. Also includes custodian fees incurred during an accounting period from an agent, bank, trust company, or other organization that holds and safeguards an individual's, mutual fund's, or investment company's assets for them. These fees will be billed back to the client and are a component of noninterest expense.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidGasDelivery
description: #N/A

name: OilAndGasPropertyFullCostMethodGross
description: Oil and gas properties, gross, carried under the full cost method.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidPensionCosts
description: #N/A

name: OtherRealEstateAdditions
description: Additions of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

name: PartnersCapitalOther
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherLoansAndLeases
description: The net cash outflow or inflow for other changes, net, in the loan and lease balances held for investment purposes that are not separately disclosed. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

name: ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestments
description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfOtherInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity (principal being due), prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfSecuritiesOperatingActivities
description: Cash received from sale of investments in debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

name: RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosures
description: Amount of real estate investments acquired through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount
description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the discount on the note or receivable which is deducted from the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is the difference between the present value and the face amount.

name: RepaymentsOfAccountsReceivableSecuritization
description: Repayments of securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

name: ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCosts
description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

name: ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

name: SECScheduleIIIRealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet
description: Amount after accumulated depreciation of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome
description: Amount of lease income from variable lease payments, interest income from net investment on sales-type lease, and profit (loss) recognized at commencement.

name: StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNetCashFlowOfProvedOilAndGasReservesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptionsExercisedNetOfTaxBenefitExpense
description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options, after deduction of related income tax (expense) benefit.

name: UnitsOfPartnershipInterestAmount
description: The number of units or equivalent units outstanding for all classes.

name: ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitOutstandingBasicAndDiluted
description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.

name: AccruedRentNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for contractual rent under lease arrangements.

name: AmortizationOfLeaseIncentives
description: Amount of amortization of lease incentive costs incurred by the lessor for the benefit of the lessee.

name: AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseInterestRate
description: Interest rate on the amount to be repaid to the counterparty to the repurchase agreement when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under the repurchase agreement exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

name: AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseRepurchaseLiability
description: Amount to be repaid to the counterparty to the repurchase agreement when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under the repurchase agreement exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedGainLossBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

name: BusinessAcquisitionProFormaIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeChangesInAccountingAndExtraordinaryItemsNetOfTaxPerShareBasic
description: Per basic share amount of pro forma income from continuing operations, after tax, as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

name: CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderFederalAndOtherRegulations
description: Amount of cash subject to withdrawal restrictions, restricted deposits held as compensating balances, and cash and securities segregated in compliance with regulations (such as cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccretableYield
description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan. This relates to loans with deteriorating of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRetainedInterestInSecuritizedReceivables
description: #N/A

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

name: CumulativeEarningsDeficit
description: Amount of cumulative earnings (deficits) for relevant time periods.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesRegulatoryAssets
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from regulatory assets.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedLiability
description: Amount of liability associated with derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaimSecurities
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

name: DirectTaxesAndLicensesCosts
description: Amount of tax incurred and cost of license directly related to good produced or service rendered.

name: FederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesBorrowedOrPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of federal funds sold and securities borrowed or purchased under agreements to resell.

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepletion
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depletion.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositTimeDeposits
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic time deposits. Time deposits bear interest for a fixed, stated period of time and include certificate of deposits and individual retirement accounts.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutstandingAmount
description: Maximum month-end amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

name: LitigationReserveNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount of estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

name: LossFromCatastrophes
description: The charge against earnings in the period for the uninsured portion of a loss from a fire, explosion, or natural disaster (hurricane, earthquake).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurchases
description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

name: PaymentsForHedgeInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentFinancingActivities
description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisition
description: The net cash inflow or outflow associated with the aggregate amount of adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

name: ProceedsAndExcessTaxBenefitFromSharebasedCompensation
description: The aggregate cash inflow comprised of the amount received from (a) employees to acquire the entity's shares under incentive awards, including stock option exercises and restricted stock arrangements, and (b) the excess tax benefit arising from such transactions.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets1
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets as part of operating activities.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveExtensionAndDiscoveryEnergy
description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentArrangementContractToPerformForOthersCostsIncurredGross
description: The amount of costs incurred under a research and development arrangement accounted for as a contract to perform research and development for others.

name: RestrictedInvestmentsPercentOfNetAssets
description: The percent of net assets of the aggregate value of all restricted investments.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueValuationAllowance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the amortized amount from a decrease (increase) in the valuation allowance applied to the servicing asset for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionValuationMethodRiskFreeInterestRate
description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

name: AccountsReceivableChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable from change in methodology.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesDiscountRate
description: Rate applied to the undiscounted amount of environmental loss contingencies to arrive at the present value recorded as of the balance sheet date.

name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncomeTaxDeficiencyFromShareBasedCompensation
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax deficiency associated with a share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesForeignCurrencyTranslation
description: Amount of gain (loss) from converting allowance reserve for credit loss to currency of reporting entity from amount denominated or measured in a different currency, which decreases (increases) the allowance for loan and lease losses.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsNetGainsAndLosses
description: The net gains or losses recognized for each transaction with the acquiree that was recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInTwoYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: IncrementalEffectOnBalanceSheetAssetLineItemChangeDueToAdditionalMinimumPensionLiabilityAMLAdjustmentPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: IncrementalEffectOnBalanceSheetAssetLineItemChangeDueToApplicationOfSFAS158RecognitionProvisionsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: IncrementalEffectOnBalanceSheetLiabilityOrEquityLineItemChangeDueToAdditionalMinimumPensionLiabilityAMLAdjustmentPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ConstructionPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services pertaining to construction projects such as a housing development or factory expansion not classified as trade payables.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetIncreaseDecreaseForContractAcquiredInBusinessCombination
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from business combination.

name: CustomerAdvancesAndDeposits
description: Refundable consideration, usually cash, held by the entity pending satisfactory completion of the entity's obligations or pending the closing of a contract.

name: DepositContractsLiabilities
description: Carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts received by the insurer or reinsurer from the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.

name: DepositLiabilitiesCollateralIssuedFinancialInstruments
description: Amount of securities, mortgage loans, or other financial instruments pledged as collateral for deposits.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssets
description: #N/A

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAcquiredDuringPeriod
description: #N/A

name: EquityFairValueAdjustment
description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an instrument classified in shareholders' equity could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAverageInterestRateAfterFiveYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancingReceivableChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) on financing receivable from change in methodology. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsImpairmentLosses
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredLeasingFees
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of deferred leasing fees. Amortization of these fees over the terms of the leases reduces deferred leasing fees. Originating new leases increases the balance of deferred leasing fees.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOtherRelatedParties
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAdjustments
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidSupplies
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseInCarryingAmountOfRedeemablePreferredStock
description: Adjustment to retained earnings for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock that is classified as temporary equity.

name: InterestCreditedToPolicyholdersAccountBalances
description: Amount of interest expense for allocation to policyholder account balance.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedAppreciationDepreciationNet
description: This element represents the net excess or deficiency of the fair value of an investment (security, contract) over or under its cost (face amount, notional amount), respectively, which excess value or deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCostOfMortgagesSold
description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from sale.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: IndefiniteLivedTradeSecrets
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperatingActivities
description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPrivatePlacement
description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

name: PaymentsToAcquireEquitySecuritiesFvNi
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as investing activity.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfTrustPreferredSecurities
description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetEnergy
description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProductionEnergy
description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceProvision1
description: Amount of expense recognized in the income statement for a decrease in valuation of real estate owned (REO).

name: ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyReinsuredRiskPercentage
description: Percentage of risk undertaken originally by insurer ceded to reinsurer.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentAssetAcquiredOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationWrittenOff
description: The amount of the write-off for research and development assets that were acquired in a transaction other than a business combination.

name: RestrictedInvestmentsCurrent
description: This element represents the current portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

name: SecuritiesLoanedGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueFairValue
description: Fair value of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the standard product warranty accrual. Excludes extended product warranties.

name: TangibleCapital
description: Amount of tangible capital as defined by regulatory framework.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingProvisionalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount
description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentsRelatedToPreviousPeriod
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in income that would have been recognized in previous periods if the adjustments to provisional amounts were recognized as of the acquisition date.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesPurchaseOfInterestByParent
description: Represents the purchase by the parent of an additional equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The purchase of the additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingAcquiredInBusinessCombinationEstimatedAmountAmortizedYearOne
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombination
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAdditions
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseNextTwelveMonths
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseRollingYearFour
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseRollingYearThree
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseYearFive
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseYearFour
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseYearThree
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpenseYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationEstimatedAmountAmortizedYearFive
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationEstimatedAmountAmortizedYearFour
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationEstimatedAmountAmortizedYearThree
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationEstimatedAmountAmortizedYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationImpairmentWritedown
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationIncreases
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPercentageOfAmountAmortizedYearFive
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPercentageOfAmountAmortizedYearFour
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPercentageOfAmountAmortizedYearOne
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPercentageOfAmountAmortizedYearThree
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPercentageOfAmountAmortizedYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: IntangibleAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationUnrealizedInvestmentGains
description: #N/A

name: DeferredGainOnSaleOfProperty
description: Amount of gain on the sale of property that does not qualify for gain recognition as of the balance sheet date.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetTransitionAssetsObligationsBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryPercentage
description: Percentage of investment to total investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

name: IntangiblesAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: IntangiblesAssetsArisingFromInsuranceContractsAcquiredInBusinessCombinationAmortizationExpense1
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAverageFloorPrice
description: The average floor rate on a group of price risk derivatives such as floors or collars. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate falls below the floor rate on the contract.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingenciesForeign
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in foreign income tax contingency.

name: FairValueOfSecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralThatCanBeResoldOrRepledged
description: Fair value of collateral permitted, by contact or custom, to be sold or re-pledged.

name: FinanceLeaseImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of impairment loss from right-of-use asset from finance lease.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedUSGovernmentAndAgencyObligationsAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseRetainedEarningsDeficit
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to retained earnings or deficit.

name: GainLossOnOilAndGasHedgingActivity
description: Gain (loss) incurred in hedging activities.

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued
description: The number of general partner units issued.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

name: InterestAndDividendsPayable
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesRestricted
description: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: HostingArrangementServiceContractImplementationCostExpenseAmortization
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deposit liabilities classified as other.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateForeclosures
description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from foreclosure.

name: NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

name: NoncashContributionExpense
description: Noncash charitable contributions made by the entity during the period.

name: PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedOnStatementOfFinancialPosition
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of all assets that are pledged as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation primarily arising from secured borrowings, repurchase agreements or other current or potential obligations, where the secured party does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral and therefore are not reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position.

name: ProceedsFromHedgeFinancingActivities
description: The cash inflow from a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

name: ProceedsFromOtherDeposits
description: Amount of cash inflow for receipts of deposits classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromUnsecuredLinesOfCredit
description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

name: ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1
description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

name: RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue
description: The amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. For cash flows, this element primarily pertains to amortization of deferred credits on long-term arrangements. As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionValuationMethodExpectedVolatilityRate
description: The estimated measure of the percentage amount by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

name: ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease
description: Percentage increase in the stated interest rate on a short-term debt instrument.

name: WarrantDownRoundFeatureIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in equity for down round feature triggered for warrant classified as equity.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInFourYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorProceedsFromNewTransfers
description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to newly transferred assets related to either a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAllowanceForLoanLosses
description: Reserve for loans impairments recorded after acquisition as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be less than previously expected or because actual cash flows are less than cash flows previously expected. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingBorrowingsOutstanding
description: Amount of debtor-in-possession borrowings outstanding.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesRegulatoryAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from regulatory assets and liabilities.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAmountOfEmployerAndRelatedPartySecuritiesIncludedInPlanAssets
description: Amount of employer security in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, security issued or managed by related party of employer.

name: DepositContractsAssets
description: Carrying amount of assets as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts paid by the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.

name: DerivativeFloorPrice
description: Floor rate on a price risk derivative such as a floor or a collar. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate falls below the floor rate on the contract.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxSettlementsForeign
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax settlement.

name: InterestBearingDepositsAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDerivativeNet
description: Net fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as assets, net of those classified as liabilities.

name: FairValueHedgesAtFairValueNet
description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments.

name: FinancingReceivableAfterDeferredIncomeOffset
description: Amount, after fee received for commitment to originate or purchase, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: FiniteLivedTradeNamesGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of the rights acquired through registration of a trade name to gain or protect exclusive use thereof for a reasonably expected period of economic benefit.

name: ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsAsset
description: Amount of the reinsurer's funds held on its behalf by the ceding insurer, including funds held in trust, under reinsurance treaties or contracts with the assuming insurer as security for the payment of the obligations thereunder.

name: GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsHeldForTradingPurposesNet
description: Aggregate net gain and losses (whether realized or unrealized) on all derivative instruments held for trading purposes whether or not settled physically.

name: HostingArrangementServiceContractImplementationCostCapitalizedBeforeAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCommodityContractAssetsAndLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the assets (liabilities) created through trading commodity-based derivative instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceSettlementsReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in insurance settlements receivable, which are amounts due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy. The expectation is that such reimbursement will be received within one year of the balance sheet date.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInMaterialsAndSupplies
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, or both, which are not included in inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherEmployeeRelatedLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in employer-related costs classified as other and current.

name: InterestExpenseDemandDepositAccounts
description: Interest expense incurred on demand deposit accounts that represent borrowings rather than outstanding drafts.

name: InterestExpenseNOWAccountsMoneyMarketAccountsAndSavingsDeposits
description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on the following for deposits in domestic offices: (1) transaction accounts (NOW, and telephone and preauthorized transfer accounts), (2) money market deposits and (3) savings deposits.

name: InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossFromOperationsPerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of investment income (loss) and realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommitmentsVariableRates
description: Reflects the amount of cash required to fully fund agreements to provide advances to borrowers and lessees at interest rates that increase or decrease depending on certain facts or circumstances.

name: MarketableSecuritiesGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetTransitionAssetObligationBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

name: PremiumsWrittenGross
description: Amount of direct and assumed premiums written.

name: PrepaidExpenseOtherNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

name: PresentValueOfFutureMinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactions
description: Present value of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansHeldforsale
description: The cash inflow from sale proceeds and collection of repayments from borrowers on loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

name: ProceedsFromSecuredLinesOfCredit
description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

name: InterestCreditedToPolicyOwnerAccounts
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

name: PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperatingLeaseNumberOfUnits
description: The number of units (items of property) under operating lease arrangements.

name: ProvisionForLossOnContracts
description: Cumulative provision for contract losses not offset against related costs accumulated on the balance sheet.

name: PublicUtilitiesAllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionRate
description: Effective rate, including composite rate, of cost of financing additions to qualifying regulated assets, commonly called allowance for funds used during construction.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

name: RestrictedStockAwardForfeitures
description: The total value of forfeitures related to restricted stock awards forfeited during the period.

name: SalesTypeLeaseInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income from net investment in sales-type lease.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellCollateralObligationToReturnSecurities
description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities purchased under agreement to resell.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualNoncurrent
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersReservesForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount of reserve, policy claim payable and loss expense incurred by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableCurrent
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CashFlowHedgesDerivativeInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which is ordinarily reflected within other comprehensive income.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAccretion
description: Current period recognition due to accretion of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CommercialPaperAtCarryingValue
description: Unsecured short-term debt instrument issued by corporations which are highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: CreditRiskDerivativesAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value of credit risk derivative asset after deduction of credit risk derivative liability.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostUnrealizedInvestmentGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred policy acquisition cost.

name: DerivativeAverageCapPrice
description: The average cap rate on a group of price risk derivatives such as caps or collars. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate exceeds the cap rate on the contract.

name: DerivativeFairValueAmountOffsetAgainstCollateralNet
description: The net amount as of the balance sheet date of the fair value of derivative assets and derivative liabilities that in accordance with the entity's accounting policy were offset against collateral under a master netting arrangement.

name: DividendsStock
description: Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

name: EscrowDepositsRelatedToPropertySales
description: Escrow deposits related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

name: FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on financing receivable recognized by reversing interest income.

name: ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerageReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due to the entity related to activities and operations with other broker dealers, and clearing organizations, including deposits.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInventoriesAndOtherOperatingAssets
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in inventory, and assets classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion (due within one year or one business cycle, whichever is longer) of the amount owed by the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesAvailableForSale
description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on available-for-sale securities.

name: InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchased
description: Gross expenses on the purchase of Federal funds at a specified price with a simultaneous agreement to sell the same to the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price at a future date.

name: InventoryRealEstate
description: Total of (1) improvements, (2) held-for-sale, (3) land and land under development, (4) construction-in-process, (5) mortgage loans held-in-inventory, and (6) other real estate investments which are considered inventory due to being held for sale or disposition.

name: InventoryWorkInProcessAndRawMaterialsNetOfReserves
description: The aggregate carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.

name: InterestExpenseForeignDepositLiabilitiesDemand
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseForeignDepositLiabilitiesWithdrawalPenalties
description: #N/A

name: JointlyOwnedUtilityPlantOwnershipAmountOfConstructionWorkInProgress
description: The period end amount of construction work in progress at a jointly owned electricity generation plant.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityCollateralFeesAmount
description: Amount of the fees associated with providing collateral for the credit facility.

name: OilAndGasJointInterestBillingReceivablesCurrent
description: Current portion of accounts receivable attributable to joint interest partners in oil and gas properties. These are billings to the non-operators associated with the operation of wells and are based on those owners' working interests in the wells. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTransfersFromHeldToMaturityToAvailableForSaleSecuritiesNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: OtherInventoryInTransit
description: Gross amount of merchandise or supplies to which the entity holds the title but does not hold physical possession because the goods are currently being transported.

name: PaymentsForLeasingCosts
description: Amount of cash outflow for costs that are essential to originate the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement. Amount includes, but is not limited to, cash outflows to evaluate the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and cash outflows for costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisitions
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the acquisition piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromHedgeFinancingActivities
description: The net cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromHedgeInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

name: PaymentsToAcquireAndDevelopRealEstate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land and anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth, and payments to develop real estate assets by adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements. Including real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excluding real estate acquired for use by the owner.

name: RealEstateInvestmentsJointVentures
description: The book value of investments in real estate joint ventures including direct and indirect investments.
