name: ResearchAndDevelopmentArrangementContractToPerformForOthersCompensationEarned
description: The amount of compensation earned (contract income) under a research and development arrangement accounted for as a contract to perform research and development for others.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFinancingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsVestedInPeriodIntrinsicValue
description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award vested under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsAmountNoncurrent
description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable after one year from the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

name: UndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiaries
description: Amount of undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries or domestic joint ventures intended to be permanent.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemNetGainLoss
description: Amount of (gain) loss for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or occurs infrequently, or both.

name: VariableInterestEntityFinancialOrOtherSupportAmount
description: The amount of financial or other support the reporting entity has provided (explicitly or implicitly) to the Variable Interest Entity (VIE) that it was not previously contractually required to provide or that the reporting entity intends to provide, including, for example, situations in which the reporting entity assisted the VIE in obtaining another type of support.

name: AccruedLiabilitiesForCommissionsExpenseAndTaxes
description: The carrying amount for commissions, taxes and other expenses that were incurred but unpaid as of the balance sheet date.

name: AccruedSalesCommissionCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for sales commissions.

name: AccumulatedAmortizationOfOtherDeferredCosts
description: Accumulated amortization of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs, deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies, or deferred leasing costs for real estate operations.

name: AdditionsToContractHoldersFunds
description: The cash inflow from a segregated fund account during the period.

name: AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseCarryingAmounts
description: Carrying amount of assets sold under agreements to repurchase when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under repurchase agreements exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationArrangementsChangeInTheRangeOfOutcomesContingentConsiderationLiabilityValueHigh
description: This element represents the amount of any change recognized during the period in the high-end of the estimated range of outcomes (undiscounted) of a liability assumed in a business combination arising from an item of contingent consideration.

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCosts
description: The amount of capitalized exploratory well costs that is pending the determination of proved reserves. This does not include amounts that were capitalized and subsequently expensed in the same annual period.

name: ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000OrMoreThreeMonthsOrLess
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within three months or fewer from the balance sheet date.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostCurrent
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DeconsolidationRevaluationOfRetainedInvestmentGainOrLossAmount
description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement to fair value of retained investment in former subsidiary and group of assets constituting business or nonprofit activity deconsolidated and derecognized, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of product or service in contract with customer.

name: DeferredSalesInducementsAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred sales inducement cost.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowed
description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the assets arising from derivative contracts and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DueFromOfficersOrStockholders
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmployeeStockOwnershipPlanDividends
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

name: FairValueAssetRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfLeasedAssetsNetOperatingLeases
description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's sale of assets held- or available-for-lease under contractual arrangements classified as operating leases.

name: HedgedAssetDiscontinuedFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, remaining after discontinued hedge.

name: IncentiveFromLessor
description: Amount of incentive received by lessee from lessor.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquity
description: The sum of the tax effects of all items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to other comprehensive income or to related components of shareholders' equity.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDividendsReceivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in cash disbursements due from investments, representing the shareholders' portion of profits.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsUsedInOperatingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of financial instruments used in operating activities, including trading securities, risk management instruments, and other short-term trading instruments.

name: InsuranceServicesRevenue
description: Revenue from insurance services, including net premiums earned, gain on sale of insurance block, agency management fees and insurance contract fees and commissions.

name: InvestmentCompanyTotalReturn
description: Percentage increase (decrease) in fund net asset value, assuming reinvestment of dividends and capital gain distributions.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedDepreciation
description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAmountOfEquity
description: Amount of Equity in net profit and loss for the period. Give totals for each group. If operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates (1) within divisions and (2) by type of activities.

name: LeaseIncentiveReceivable
description: This item represents a receivable for an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentInterest
description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to interest.

name: LongTermDebtMaturingInYearsFourAndFive
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth and fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePriorLiens1
description: Amount of prior lien on real estate securing mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: NetChangeInterestBearingDepositsDomestic
description: The increase (decrease) in interest-bearing deposits domestic.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFinancialOrEquityInstrumentConsiderationWarrantsIssued1
description: The number of warrants issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: NonfinancialLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of obligations not classified as financial liabilities. Includes, but is not limited to, accounts payable and accrued liabilities, commitments, obligations, and other liabilities.

name: NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense
description: Amount of fees incurred for commissions on mutual funds and insurance products.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsAndTaxParent
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherMinorityInterests
description: Carrying amount of equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than joint ventures, limited partnerships, operating partnerships or interests held by preferred unit holders.

name: PaymentsToAcquireFurnitureAndFixtures
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of furniture and fixtures.

name: PaymentsToPurchaseLoansHeldForSale
description: The aggregate cash outflow used to purchase all loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedLoansReceivablePledgedAsCollateral
description: The sum of the carrying amounts, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and for which the transferees are not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PreferredStockShareSubscriptions
description: The number of nonredeemable preferred stock (shares) (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of preferred stock before they are offered to the public. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from sales and purchases of trading securities.

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedReturnOnEquityPercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's requested return on equity.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowance
description: For each period for which an income statement is required, disclosure of the changes in the allowance, including balances at end of period.

name: ReinsuranceLossOnUncollectibleAccountsInPeriodAmount
description: Amount of the write-down or write-off of a receivable from a reinsurer.

name: ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingActivitiesNetIncomeExcludingCorporateOverheadAndInterestCosts
description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsForfeituresIntrinsicValue
description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award forfeited under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersPaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount of loss reported and paid for claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: InterestPayable
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityInitialConsolidationGainOrLoss
description: The gain (loss) recognized on initial consolidation of a variable interest entity (VIE) when the VIE is not a business (as defined).

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDeposit
description: Weighted average interest rate calculated at point in time for domestic deposit liability.

name: AccountsPayableUnderwritersPromotersAndEmployeesOtherThanSalariesAndWagesCurrent
description: Amount of obligation to underwriters, promoters, and employees excluding salaries, wages and amount to related party, classified as current.

name: AmortizationOfDeferredHedgeGains
description: The amount of expense charged against earnings by an Entity to record deferred gains and losses on hedge instruments. Examples include gain on economic hedges, amortization of gain on designated fair value hedge and so forth.

name: AssetAcquisitionConsiderationTransferredTransactionCost
description: Amount of transaction cost incurred as part of consideration transferred in asset acquisition.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesDiscountRate
description: Discount rate which is used to value residual cash flows generated by financial assets of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer regardless of when the transfer occurred.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesPrepaymentSpeed
description: Estimated rate of prepayment of principal on financial assets regardless of when the transfer occurred.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYield
description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: ConstructionLoan
description: This element represents the carrying value of a short-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project, usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property. Note that there are separate concepts for the current and noncurrent portions of long-term construction loans.

name: ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000OrMoreSixMonthsThrough12Months
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within six to twelve months after the balance sheet date.

name: ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000OrMoreThreeMonthsThroughSixMonths
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within three to six months after the balance sheet date.

name: CostMaintenance
description: Cost of maintenance incurred and directly related to good produced and service rendered.

name: CreditCardReceivables
description: Amounts receivable from issuing a card to individuals or businesses that allows someone to make a purchase on borrowed money.

name: DebtDefaultShorttermDebtAmount
description: Amount of outstanding short-term debt or borrowing associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

name: InterestRateExclusiveOfImmediateTerminalFundingAnnuitiesHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: InterestRateExclusiveOfImmediateTerminalFundingAnnuitiesLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsDebtorInPossessionFacilityFinancingCosts
description: Amount of reorganization items related to debtor-in-possession facility financing costs.

name: DeferredCompensationCashBasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

name: DeferredCompensationCashbasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

name: DeferredSalesInducementsNet
description: Amount of deferred sale inducement cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

name: DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGainOnDisposalNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

name: DueToCorrespondentBrokers
description: Amount payable to correspondent broker-dealer.

name: DueToOfficersOrStockholdersNoncurrent
description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

name: InterestRevenueExpense
description: #N/A

name: EarnestMoneyDeposits
description: A deposit made by a purchaser of real estate to evidence good faith. It is customary for a buyer to give the seller earnest money at the time a sales contract is signed. The earnest money generally is credited to the down payment at closing, which is applied at closing as a component of payment against the purchase price.

name: InterestSensitiveLifeInterestRateAssumptionsHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: InterestSensitiveLifeInterestRateAssumptionsLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestRevolvingConvertedToTermLoan
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, of revolving financing receivable converted to term loan.

name: FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHeldForSale
description: Amount of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale.

name: FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsLiability
description: Amount of funds held as security for payments to be received under reinsurance contracts.

name: GainLossOnSecuritizationOfFinancialAssets
description: A gain (loss) realized on a transfer, accounted for as a sale, of all or a portion of financial assets in which the transferor surrenders control and receives consideration other than a beneficial interest in the assets transferred. Reflects the amount of sales proceeds in excess of, or deficient from, the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs.

name: InventoriesPropertyHeldForSaleCurrent
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmployeeStockOwnershipPlanDividends
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

name: IncreaseDecreaseDueFromOtherRelatedParties
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables due from related parties classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOfficersAndStockholders
description: The increase (decrease), during an accounting period, in total obligations owed to the reporting entity's executives and owners.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other, due within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: InterestIncomeFederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: The aggregate interest income earned from (1) the lending of excess federal funds to another commercial bank requiring such for its legal reserve requirements and (2) securities purchased under agreements to resell.

name: InterestRateCashFlowHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: InterestRateFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsGuaranteedBenefitLiabilityGross
description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantEmployerContributionCost
description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: NontradeReceivablesNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of the receivable other than from customers, that is amounts expected to be collected after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: NotionalAmountOfNonderivativeInstruments
description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on a nonderivative instrument.

name: NumberOfForeignCurrencyDerivativesHeld
description: Number of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives held by the entity at the reporting date.

name: OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodGross
description: Oil and Gas properties, gross, carried under the successful effort method.

name: OtherIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperations
description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

name: OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan. Excludes pension plan.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed
description: Units contributed by each class of partners during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMineralRights
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a mineral right which is the right to extract a mineral from the earth or to receive payment, in the form of royalty, for the extraction of minerals.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherRealEstate
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of other real estate investments held by the entity for investment purposes not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

name: PrincipalTransactionsRevenue
description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) resulting from the difference between acquisition price and selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, and from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, including, but not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.

name: ProceedsFromRealEstateAndRealEstateJointVentures
description: The cash inflow from the sale of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

name: ProceedsFromRoyaltiesReceived
description: Cash received for royalties during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBSCategorizedAsAvailableForSale
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the standard and extended product warranty liability.

name: ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations
description: The net cost of operation of other real estate (including provisions for real estate losses, rental income, and gains and losses on sales of real estate).

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCosts
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest costs that were capitalized to properties under development during the land development and construction period of a project, and which are included in inventory.

name: RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesCostMethodInvestmentsAndOtherInvestments
description: This item represents the total realized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity and any gains or losses realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and/or investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. Additionally, this item would include any losses recognized for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) of the subject investments in debt and equity securities.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf10PercentAdverseChangeInDiscountRate
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: SettlementAssetsCurrent
description: Cash received or short term receivables for unsettled money transfers, money orders, consumer payments, or business to business payments. Settlement assets include clearing and settling customers payments due to and from financial institutions and may include cash and cash equivalents.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersEarnedPremiums
description: Amount of premium revenue earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: InventoryPartsAndComponents
description: #N/A

name: WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds
description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

name: AcquiredFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetResidualValue
description: The aggregate expected value at the end of their useful life of a major finite-lived intangible asset class acquired during the period either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

name: InventoryRawMaterialsAndPurchasedParts
description: #N/A

name: AmortizationOfDeferredLeasingFees
description: This element represents the amortization of deferred leasing fees incurred by the lessor and amortized over the term of the lease. Such fees represent (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableInFiveYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

name: DeferredGainLossOnDiscontinuationOfInterestRateFairValueHedge
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the unamortized adjustment to the carrying value of an interest-bearing hedged item made under an effective interest rate fair value hedge that is amortized upon discontinuation of the interest rate fair value hedge.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReservesAndAccrualsPolicyholderLiabilities
description: The tax effect as of the balance sheet date of the amount of the estimated future tax deductions arising from estimated policyholder reserves, which will be deductible from future taxable income when actual costs are incurred, and which can only be realized if sufficient tax-basis income is generated in future periods to enable the tax deduction to be taken.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxExpenseBenefitFromProvisionForGainLossOnDisposal
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit on (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

name: DueToOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Amount payable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasInStorage
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas in storage, which is a mixture of gases (liquefied or otherwise), used for fuel and manufacturing purposes, which is ready for sale.

name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssetsAggregateAmountInNonaccrualStatus
description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of loans held as assets that are in nonaccrual status for which the fair value option has been elected, if the entity's policy is to recognize interest income separately from other changes in fair value.

name: FederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

name: FiniteLivedNoncompeteAgreementsGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of payments made to third parties in exchange for their agreement not to engage in specified competitive practices in specified geographic territories for a specified period of time.

name: InventoryRealEstateRentalFurnitureNet
description: #N/A

name: GovernmentContractReceivable
description: The amount of receivables that are derived from government contracts.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingenciesOther
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in other income tax contingencies.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsStateAndLocal
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax settlement.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLoansDeferredIncome
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in net unamortized loan origination fees and other fees that are collected at origination but recorded as income over the life of the loan.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRegulatoryLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in regulated liabilities. Regulated liabilities are created when regulatory agency permits an entity to defer revenues to the balance sheet.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInUnearnedPremiumsNet
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of decrease (increase) in unearned premiums.

name: InventoryFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProcessNetOfReserves
description: The aggregated amount of merchandise or goods held by the entity and readily available for future sale plus items held by the entity which are partially complete or in the process of being readied for future sale. This amount is net of valuation reserves and adjustments.

name: LoanPortfolioExpense
description: The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

name: MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: InvestmentAdvisoryFees
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentAdvisoryManagementAndAdministrativeFees
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForWritedownOfSecuritiesNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

name: PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedOtherFinancialInstruments
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PolicyholderContractDeposits
description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

name: PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrent
description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable within one year of the balance sheet date.

name: PreferredStockRedemptionDiscount
description: The excess of (1) the carrying amount of the preferred stock in the registrant's balance sheet over (2) the fair value of the consideration transferred to the holders of the preferred stock, during the accounting period, which will be added to net earnings to arrive at net earnings available to common shareholders in the calculation of earnings per share.

name: PremiumReceivableCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on premium receivable.

name: ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable
description: The cash inflow from borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

name: ProceedsFromDecommissioningFund
description: The cash inflow from the sale of assets held in a decommissioning trust fund.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfTradingSecuritiesHeldforinvestment
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturities, repayments and calls of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInPartnershipUnit
description: The proceeds from the sale of an interest in a unit of partnership.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Period end book value of other property, plant and equipment (PPE) owned (but not classified elsewhere) by the public utility.

name: PurchaseObligationDueInSecondAndThirdYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second and third fiscal years following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RealEstateTaxesAndInsurance
description: The aggregate total of real estate taxes and insurance expense.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionDeferredGainNet
description: The portion of the gain that will be recorded as income or a reduction in rent expense in future periods less amounts recognized in the current period.

name: SecuritiesLoanedFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf20PercentAdverseChangeInDiscountRate
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNonOptionEquityInstrumentsOther
description: Other increase (decrease) in number of shares reserved for issuance under non-option equity instrument agreements that is not separately disclosed.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersPremiumsWritten
description: Amount of premium written by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersUnearnedPremiums
description: Amount of premium written but not yet earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of time deposit maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit.

name: ValueAddedTaxReceivableNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle), if longer of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositSavings
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic savings deposit liabilities.

name: AociIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: AssetRetirementObligationLegallyRestrictedAssetsFairValue
description: Carrying amount of an asset that is legally restricted for purposes of settling an asset retirement obligation.

name: BusinessAcquisitionsPurchasePriceAllocationYearOfAcquisitionNetEffectOnIncome
description: The net effect on income before taxes of the amortization and accretion of premiums, discounts and intangible assets in the year of acquisition, when the assets of the acquired institution exceed 10 percent of the consolidated assets at the end of the most recent period.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsRevenuesAndGainsRecognized
description: The revenues and gains recognized recorded for each transaction with the acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueThereafter
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueChangeInEstimateOfTransactionPrice
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in estimate of transaction price which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time. Includes, but is not limited to, change in assessment of whether estimate of variable consideration is constrained.

name: ContractualInterestExpenseOnPrepetitionLiabilitiesNotRecognizedInStatementOfOperations
description: The amount of contractual interest expense on prepetition liabilities not included in the statement of operations.

name: ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000OrMoreAfter12Months
description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing after twelve months from the balance sheet date.

name: CreditRiskDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of credit risk derivative liability.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationIncrease
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and beneficial interest, purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturity
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DepositsMoneyMarketDepositsAndNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOW
description: Amount of deposits in accounts that offer many of the same services as checking accounts although transactions may be somewhat more limited, share some of the characteristics of a money market fund and are insured by the Federal government, also known as money market accounts. Also includes amount of deposits in interest-bearing transaction accounts at banks or savings and loans, that are restricted in regard to ownership and can usually only be held by individuals, nonprofit entities and governments. Negotiable order of withdrawal accounts differ from money market demand accounts as they typically have higher reserve requirements and no limit on the number of checks that can be written.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of derivative asset, security purchased under agreement to resell, and security borrowed. Includes asset not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsLossReclassifiedFromAccumulatedOCIIntoIncomeEffectivePortion
description: The effective portion of loss reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

name: DueFromOfficersOrStockholdersCurrent
description: Amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationEquityOrCapital
description: Amount of equity, excluding noncontrolling interest, attributable to the equity method investment of the entity.

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesEffectOfChangeInMethod
description: The effect of a change in method or methods for calculating the allowance for credit losses on the current period provision.

name: GainLossFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfFairValueHedgeEffectivenessNet
description: Net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesRecordedInEarningsNet
description: Aggregate impact of foreign currency derivatives on earnings for the period. Includes impact of foreign currency cash flow hedge ineffectiveness and the ineffectiveness of fair value hedging derivatives and full change in fair value of the foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBookOverdrafts
description: The increase (decrease) in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in book overdrafts.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToCustomers
description: The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in amounts payable to customers. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInWorkersCompensationLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due for insurance (or actual expenses) to cover the medical expenses and lost income for employees that are injured during the course of doing work-related activities.

name: InsuranceSettlementsReceivableNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) of amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy.

name: InterestExpenseLesseeAssetsUnderCapitalLease
description: The amount, during the lease term, of each minimum [capital] lease payment allocated to interest expense so as to produce a constant periodic rate of interest on the remaining balance of the capital lease obligation.

name: InventoryFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProcess
description: Amount before valuation reserves of merchandise or goods held by the entity that are readily available for sale and items held by the entity which are partially complete or in the process of being readied for sale.

name: InventoryRealEstateLandAndLandDevelopmentCosts
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of valuation allowances and impairment losses, of costs of land expected to be developed in the near term plus capitalized costs of development, for purposes of selling completed units to home buyers or commercial or industrial entities..

name: InvestmentCompanyCommittedCapital
description: Amount of funds committed to investment company from investors.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedAppreciation
description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsPaymentForBenefits
description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholders and contract holders for guaranteed minimum benefit payments.

name: LoansReceivableWithVariableRatesOfInterest1
description: Amount of loan with variable or adjustable rate of interest.

name: LongTermDebtMaturingInYearsTwoAndThree
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second and third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: MaterialsSuppliesAndOther
description: The carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, and other assets, which are not included in inventory but used in production.

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeNetAmountAtRisk
description: Net amount at risk, representing the guaranteed benefit in excess of the current account balance corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

name: NetChangeNoninterestBearingDepositsDomestic
description: The increase (decrease) in domestic noninterest bearing deposits.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOperatingPartnershipsRedeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling partner in an operating partnership.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: PaymentsToAcquireFederalReserveStock
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesForRepurchaseAgreements
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for repurchase agreements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PreferredUnitsPreferredPartnersCapitalAccounts
description: The amount of the preferred partners' ownership interests.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseYearOne
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: InvestmentOwnedOtherThanSecuritiesLoanedForShortSalesAtFairValue
description: #N/A

name: PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManagedAndSecuritized
description: This is the sum of principal amount outstanding for both securitized and unsecuritized loans of all types.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesSaleOfMineralInPlaceEnergy
description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from sale of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: RealEstateInvestmentsOther
description: Amount of real estate owned for income production and capital accretion potential, not otherwise specified in the existing taxonomy. Such real estate excludes that which is occupied or used in the business, for entertainment purposes, or held in inventory for specific purposes.

name: RecapitalizationCosts
description: Amount of recapitalization costs for professional fees associated with restructuring debt and equity mixture that do not qualify for capitalization.

name: ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyExcessRetentionAmountReinsured
description: Amount of risk reinsured in excess of stated retention per company policy.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrealizedAppreciation
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrealizedAppreciationDepreciationNet
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrealizedDepreciation
description: #N/A

name: ReorganizationValue
description: Amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

name: RestrictedCashEquivalentsCurrent
description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: RestrictedCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of fund outstanding loaned in form of security resale agreement for purchase and resale of identical or substantially same security at date certain for specified price. Includes security purchased under agreement to resell not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimAdjustmentExpenseOtherReconcilingItem
description: Amount of reconciling item for the reconciliation of the liability in the disclosure of claims development (in excess of) less than the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts, classified as other.

name: SignificantSupplyCommitmentRemainingMinimumAmountCommitted
description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity must commit resources to supply goods or services to one or more customers.

name: StockOptionExercisePriceDecrease
description: Per share decrease in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersAmortizationOfDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: Amount of amortization expense on deferred policy acquisition cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedNumberOfInvestmentsSoldShortShares
description: #N/A

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersDeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts
description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost related to property-casualty insurance policy written.

name: USGovernmentSecuritiesAtCarryingValue
description: Debt (bills, notes or bonds) that are issued by the government of the United States which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpensePurchasedPower
description: Amount of operating expense for purchased power of regulated operation.

name: AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Increase (decrease) in the accrual for environmental loss contingencies during the reporting period.

name: AccruedInsuranceNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due beyond one year (or beyond one operating cycle if longer) to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverages to employees.

name: CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementInterestExpense
description: The financing charge for leasing arrangements meeting the criteria for capitalization.

name: ConsiderationReceivedForBeneficialInterestObtainedForTransferringFinancialAsset
description: Amount of beneficial interest received as consideration for transferring noncash financial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, trade receivable in securitization transaction.

name: ConvertibleSubordinatedDebt
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt, as of the balance sheet date, initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingRestricted
description: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentGross
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndValueOfBusinessAcquired
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesNet
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of deferred lease income. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossNoncurrent
description: Gross amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities, which result from applying the applicable tax rate to taxable temporary differences pertaining to each jurisdiction to which the entity is obligated to pay income tax.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsLevel3ReconciliationDecreaseForSale
description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of decrease in plan asset of defined benefit plan from sale.

name: DerivativeAverageForwardExchangeRate1
description: Average contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLoss
description: Amount of realized and unrealized loss of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

name: DerivativeLiabilityNumberOfInstrumentsHeld
description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular derivative liability or group of derivative liabilities held by the entity.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDispositionOfAssets
description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

name: InvestmentsNetAssetValue
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseRestructuringCharges
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to restructuring charges.

name: ItemsIncludedInConsolidatedStatementOfFinancialCondition
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingenciesOther
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax contingencies.

name: FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLongTermDebtInstruments
description: This item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of long-term debt instruments that have contractual principal amounts and for which the fair value option has been elected.

name: GainLossOnFairValueHedgeIneffectivenessNet
description: Amount of gain (loss)recognized in the income statement from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

name: IncomeTaxExaminationIncreaseDecreaseInLiabilityFromPriorYear
description: The amount the liability recorded for the income tax examination increased or decreased in the current year/accounting period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchased
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund borrowed from other financial institution arising from the insufficient reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLoansFromOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToEquityForwardAgreements
description: Additional shared included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of equity forward arrangements using the reverse treasury stock method.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeOtherLoans
description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans classified as other.

name: InterestRateFairValueHedgeAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAtFairValueGrossAdditions
description: Gross additions to the investment in and advance to the affiliate.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseOtherLiabilities
description: The amount of other obligations included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsInterestRate
description: Rate of interest used to calculate the liability for future policy benefits.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInterest
description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the credit facility for the period.

name: LoanRestructuringTrialModificationsAmount
description: Amount of financing receivable modified on trial basis.

name: ManufacturingCosts
description: The aggregate costs incurred in the production of goods for sale.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsReceivableAcquired1
description: The amount of accounts receivable that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: OtherInventoriesSpareParts
description: Gross amount of components of assembled products that can be sold directly or indirectly through sales of assembled products.

name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayments
description: Amount of cash outflow for other postretirement benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes pension benefit.

name: PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits
description: Cash outflows for payments of postemployment benefits (such as severance pay and health insurance benefits) recognized during the period. Postemployment benefits are benefits paid to employees after employment but before retirement.

name: PreferredStockConvertibleConversionRatio
description: Number of common shares issuable upon conversion for each share of preferred stock to be converted.

name: LandSales
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockConvertibleSharesIssuable
description: Number of common shares issuable upon conversion of preferred stock.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpense1
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseYearFour
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseYearThree
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredLimitedPartnersUnits
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of preferred limited partners units during the period.

name: LeaseConcessions
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: The net cash flow from purchases followed by sales of securities under terms of reverse repurchase agreements.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNetExcludingCapitalLeasedAssets
description: Amount, net of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization, of long-lived physical assets excluding assets held under lease agreements used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

name: LeaseIncentivePayable
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesBorrowedGross
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesLoanedAsset
description: Amount of asset associated with securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersNetInvestmentIncome
description: Amount of net investment income earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsSalesCashProceedsReceivedForAssetsDerecognizedAmount
description: Amount, before counterparty netting, of cash proceeds received in transfers of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction.

name: TransfersAccountedForAsSecuredBorrowingsAssociatedLiabilitiesCarryingAmount
description: Carrying amount of liabilities associated with financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss), allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: LeaseOperatingExpense
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCarryingAmountAssetsAndLiabilitiesNet
description: Net carrying amount of the assets and liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), when the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

name: LeasesReceivableCommercialLeaseFinancing
description: #N/A

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesLoansAcquired
description: Amount of addition to allowance reserve for credit loss arising from purchase of loan and lease portfolios.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYearFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BadDebtReserveForTaxPurposesOfQualifiedLender
description: Amount of bad debt reserves for tax purposes of qualified lenders excluded in calculating deferred taxes.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMinimumPayments1
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, which include amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

name: CapitalUnitsOutstanding
description: Number of capital units or capital shares outstanding. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostAdditionsPendingDeterminationOfProvedReserves
description: Additions to capitalized exploratory well costs that were added during the reporting period pending the determination of proved reserves.

name: CollateralizedFinancings
description: The value of the collateral (typically cash) that the entity receives in a financing transaction in exchange for securities lent. This item represents a liability in the financial statements of the lender of the securities.

name: CompensationAndBenefitsTrust
description: The value of a trust established to hold the stock of an employee compensation and benefits plan as of the balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainage
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: CostsIncurredAssetRetirementObligationIncurred
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations (ARO) costs incurred (whether capitalized or charged to expense) during the period.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DeferredCompensationCashbasedArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherTaxReceivableCurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other tax receivables expected to be realized or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred revenue.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceNoncurrent
description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountOfUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiabilityUndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiaries
description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObligationIncreaseDecreaseForPlanAmendment
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated benefit obligation from change in existing term of defined benefit plan or initiation of new defined benefit plan.

name: DepositsDomestic
description: The aggregate of all domestic interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing deposit liabilities.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationToReturnSecurities
description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed.

name: DueFromEmployees
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers.

name: FairValueOfSecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralThatHaveBeenResoldOrRepledged
description: Fair value of the collateral, or portion thereof, that has been re-pledged, delivered, or otherwise used.

name: FundsHeldForClients
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the funds held on behalf of others and that are expected to be liquidated within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. This does not include funds held under reinsurance agreements.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSale
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of mortgage loans that are held with the intention to sell or be securitized in the near future.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherRegulatoryAssets
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of other assets that are created when regulatory agencies permits public utilities to defer costs to the balance sheet.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
