description: Amount of increase (decrease) of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercial
description: Interest and fee income related to commercial loans including industrial and agricultural, real estate (commercial and residential, construction and development), trade financing, and lease financing.

name: LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpensePropertyCasualtyLiability
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to casualty insurance insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date) and the amount needed to provide for the estimated ultimate cost required to investigate and settle claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date), whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseBusinessAcquisitions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cost of settling unpaid claims after deduction of reinsurance recoveries related to the acquisition of a business. Includes, but is not limited to, claims which have been incurred but not reported.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseReportedClaimsAmount
description: Costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process for the specified year specifically for claims that have already been submitted to the insurance company for reimbursement.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherAdditions
description: Amount of addition to investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

name: NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees
description: This represents the company's cost incurred during an accounting period for managing the money in a fund, which will be billed back to the client and is a component of noninterest expenses.

name: NontradeReceivables
description: Carrying amounts due as of the balance sheet date of the sum of amounts receivable other than from customers.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury
description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsMoneyMarket
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedFinanceReceivables
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of finance receivables which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PrepaidInterest
description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseYearFive
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LeveragedBuyoutContinuingOwnershipInterestByContinuingStockholders
description: #N/A

name: LeveragedBuyoutOwnershipInterestOfNewInvestors
description: #N/A

name: LeveragedBuyoutPrepaymentPenaltiesOnRetiredDebt
description: #N/A

name: LeveragedBuyoutProfessionalFeesAndOther
description: #N/A

name: LeveragedBuyoutRepaymentOfExistingDebt
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfLeaseReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterestInSecuritizedReceivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.

name: PublicUtilitiesInventory
description: The period end amount for a type of inventory held by the utility in a schedule of inventories.

name: RepaymentsOfLongtermLoansFromVendors
description: Cash outflows under financing arrangements with vendors (seller-financed debt), which had a maturity date at inception of more than one year (or more than one operating cycle, if longer); such debt may have arisen from purchases of property, plant and equipment or other productive assets.

name: RetailRelatedInventoryMerchandise
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise inventory purchased by a retailer, wholesaler or distributor and held for future sale.

name: RetainedInterestFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of interest continued to be held by a transferor after transferring financial assets to a third party.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedLiability
description: Amount of liability associated with securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

name: TemporaryEquityShareSubscriptions
description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been allocated to investors to buy. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceOperationsAndOtherCostsAndExpenses
description: The amount of operating expenses for the period that are associated with the utility's normal revenue producing operation; including selling, general, and administrative expenses, costs incurred for routine plant repairs and maintenance, and operations.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositMoneyMarket
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueWithinOneYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

name: CommonStockDiscountOnShares
description: Discount on common shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.

name: ContractWithCustomerRightToRecoverProduct
description: Amount of right to recover product from customer on settling refund liability.

name: ConvertiblePreferredDividendsNetOfTax
description: The after-tax amount of any dividends on convertible preferred stock.

name: CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldOverhead
description: Indirect cost incurred related to good produced and service rendered.

name: LiabilitiesAndPartnersCapital
description: #N/A

name: CreditAndDebitCardReceivablesAtCarryingValue
description: Amount due the Entity as a result of customers utilizing point of sale debit or credit cards in exchange transactions with the entity which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossSellBeforeRecovery
description: Amount of decrease in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from intent to sell or more likely than not will be required to sell before recovery of amortized cost basis.

name: LiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading), classified as current.

name: DerecognizedAssetsSecuritizedOrAssetbackedFinancingArrangementAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherPrincipalAmountOutstanding
description: Amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction that have been derecognized. Continuing involvement includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

name: DerivativeAssetNumberOfInstrumentsHeld
description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular derivative asset or group of derivative assets held by the entity.

name: DerivativeNetHedgeIneffectivenessGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the ineffectiveness of the hedge.

name: DerivativeSwaptionInterestRate
description: Fixed interest rate that will be received or paid upon exercise of the interest rate swaption contract.

name: LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureNonrecurring
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureRecurring
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsBenefitsPaid
description: #N/A

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrual
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate extended product warranty liability. Does not include the ending balance for the standard product warranty liability.

name: FederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: Includes: (1) the amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements (Federal Funds Sold) and (2) the dollar amount outstanding of funds lent in the form of security resale agreements regardless of maturity, if the agreement requires the bank to resell the identical security purchased or a security that meets the definition of substantially the same in the case of a dollar roll. Also include purchases of participations in pools of securities, regardless of maturity (Securities Purchased Under Agreements to Re-sell).

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsIncurredBenefits
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnCondemnation
description: The gain (loss) is the pre-tax difference between the net condemnation award and the entity's adjusted basis of the condemned property.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfDebtInvestments
description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of debt securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueAdjustmentsOnAssetsAndLiabilitiesCarriedAtFairValueUnderFairValueOption
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value adjustment on other assets (liabilities) carried at fair value under the fair value option on the statement of cash flows of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansHeldForSaleMortgages
description: Interest and fee income from mortgage loans considered to be held-for-sale.

name: InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesOperating
description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

name: LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale
description: #N/A

name: InterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorFairValue
description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of the transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (typically securitized receivables, generally not involved in the collection of principal) following transfer of significant portions of such financial instruments to other parties. Such interests could be ancillary cash flows and interest-only strips.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseDebtAndAccruedInterest
description: The amount of debt and related accrued interest included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the cost of settling unpaid claims after deduction of reinsurance recoveries. Includes, but is not limited to, claims which have been incurred but not reported.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayment
description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

name: LossContingencyClaimsSettledAndDismissedNumber
description: The number of claims settled and dismissed during the period.

name: ObligationToReturnSecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral
description: The fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset that appears on the balance sheet called Securities Received as Collateral.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherForeclosedAssets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of assets other than real property that were received in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseAircraftObligationsAndDeferredGains
description: #N/A

name: OtherPolicyholderFunds
description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseBalanceAtBankruptcyEffectiveDate
description: #N/A

name: OtherSellingAndMarketingExpense
description: Amount of selling and marketing expense classified as other.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseCashDisbursementsAndReclassificationIncreaseDecreaseUnderBankruptcyCourtOrderOtherLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseCashDisbursementsAndReclassificationIncreaseDecreaseUnderBankruptcyCourtOrderResolutionsOfContingenciesSubjectToChapter11
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseCashDisbursementsAndReclassificationsUnderBankruptcyCourtOrders
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAcquisitions
description: Change in the number of units for each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PartnersCapitalDistributionAmountPerShare
description: The distribution amount per share for all classes of units.

name: PaymentsForOtherDeposits
description: Amount of cash outflow for deposits classified as other.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEndOfPeriod
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsWriteOffsAgainstAllowance
description: Amount of writeoff of premium receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseExpenseIncomeItems
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndPrincipalCollections1
description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

name: PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStructurePercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's approved equity to capital, including debt and equity.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeRelatedAccruals
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseInEnvironmentalContingencies
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxContingencies
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseInInterestOnPrepetitionLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseInOtherLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: ReceivablesFromClearingOrganizations
description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with clearing organizations. Clearing organizations perform post trade processing and trade comparisons among numerous broker-dealers and act as settlement agents between buying and selling broker-dealers.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOtherCarryingAmount
description: Amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity, classified as other equity.

name: RegulatedAndUnregulatedOperatingRevenue
description: The total amount of operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RemainingAmountsOfRegulatoryAssetsForWhichNoReturnOnInvestmentDuringRecoveryPeriodIsProvided
description: Remaining balance of regulatory assets for which no return on investment during recovery is provided. In some cases, a regulator may permit an enterprise to include a cost that would be charged to expense by an unregulated enterprise as an allowable cost over a period of time by amortizing that cost for rate-making purposes, but the regulator does not include the unrecovered amount in the rate base.

name: ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense
description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionCurrentPeriodGainRecognized
description: The portion of the deferred gain that was recognized in the current period.

name: ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingVariableInterestRate
description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, which accrues interest at a rate subject to change from time to time.

name: SupplementaryLeverageRatio
description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure as defined by regulatory framework.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGrossClaimsPaid
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGrossIncurredLoss
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateProvisionalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TemporaryEquityEliminationAsPartofReorganization
description: Redemption of temporary equity as the result of a triggering event associated with the temporary equity.

name: UnderwritingIncomeLoss
description: The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseTaxes
description: Amount of operating expense for taxes other than income taxes of regulated operation.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNetClaimsPaid
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNetIncurredLoss
description: #N/A

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentNotCreditLossNetOfTaxAvailableforsaleDebtSecurities
description: Accumulated other comprehensive loss related to portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized as available-for-sale that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

name: CapitalizedComputerSoftwarePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized computer software costs.

name: CapitalizedCostsAssetRetirementCosts
description: The amount of asset retirement costs previously incurred and capitalized separately from the capitalized amount of the associated long-lived assets.

name: CommodityContractAssetCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from commodity contracts such as futures contracts tied to the movement of a particular commodity, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmounts
description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts.

name: CooperativeAdvertisingAmount
description: Total amount received by an entity from a vendor under a cooperative advertising arrangement that has been offset against advertising expense.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsGainLossOnSettlementOfOtherClaimsNet1
description: Amount of net gain (loss) on settlement of other claims for entities in bankruptcy, reported as a reorganization item.

name: DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualExercisePrice
description: The per share price that the individual must pay to acquire shares under the deferred compensation arrangement.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitByProductSegmentDiscountedLiabilityAmount
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanNumberOfSharesOfEquitySecuritiesIssuedByEmployerAndRelatedPartiesIncludedInPlanAssets
description: Number of shares of employer stock in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, stock issued or managed by related party of employer.

name: DepletionOfOilAndGasProperties
description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of oil and gas reserves that are part of an entities' assets.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income from net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseIncome
description: Amount of lease income from variable lease payments, interest income on direct financing lease and after offset of loss recognized at commencement.

name: DiscontinuedOperationEquityMethodInvestmentRetainedAfterDisposalOwnershipInterestAfterDisposal
description: Percent, after disposal, of ownership interest of a discontinued operation in which an equity method investment is retained.

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsBenefitsPaid
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsContractTerminations
description: #N/A

name: ExcessTierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets
description: Ratio of Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ExplorationCosts
description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or "G&G" costs. Exploration costs also include costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, the maintenance of land and lease records, dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions, costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells and costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: GoodFaithAndMarginDepositsWithBrokerDealers
description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with broker-dealers to demonstrate an intention to complete a purchase (good faith deposit) and collateral deposited by counterparty to cover the credit risk assumed (margin deposit).

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsLiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: IncentiveDistributionDistributionPerYear
description: Amount of incentive obligation paid in cash or stock during the period to a limited liability corporation managing member or limited partnership general partner.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingenciesStateAndLocal
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in state and local income tax contingency.

name: IncurredClaimsPropertyCasualtyAndLiability
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for property and casualty insurance contracts.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDeposits
description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on all domestic deposits.

name: InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesTradingOperating
description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

name: InterestRateDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

name: InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfDiscount
description: Amount of accretion of purchase discount on nonoperating securities.

name: LiabilityForPolicyholderContractDepositsInterestRateDeferredAnnuityHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForPolicyholderContractDepositsInterestRateDeferredAnnuityLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesBalanceShares
description: Number of shares of affiliates held for management investment companies.

name: LiabilityForTitleClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredButNotReportedIBNR
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForTitleClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseKnownClaims
description: #N/A

name: LeaseIncentivePayableCurrent
description: This item represents an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LimitedPartnersContributedCapital
description: The amount of capital contributed by the limited partners.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseClaimsPaid
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseClaimsPaidCurrentYear
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGainLossOnSalesNet
description: Reflects the net positive or negative amount derived from subtracting from net proceeds of sale and the carrying amounts, net of allocated reserves, of financial assets transferred to third parties in transactions that qualify for sales treatment.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseClaimsPaidPriorYears
description: #N/A

name: MandatorilyRedeemablePreferredStockFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of shares that an entity is required to redeem for cash or other assets at a fixed or determinable date or upon the occurrence of an event.

name: MineReclamationAndClosingLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of a reclamation and mine closing liability that is associated with a legal obligation for the closure and reclamation of a mine including the removal of buildings, equipment, machinery and other physical remnants of mining, closure of tailings impoundments, leach pads and other mine features, and contouring, covering and revegetation of waste rock piles and other disturbed areas.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseForeignExchange
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseGross
description: #N/A

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis1
description: Amount of federal income tax basis of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredClaims
description: #N/A

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOtherNoncontrollingInterestsRedeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other redeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredClaimsCurrentYear
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseIncurredClaimsPriorYears
description: #N/A

name: OperatingLeaseInitialDirectCostExpenseOverTerm
description: Amount of operating lease initial direct cost recognized as expense over lease term.

name: OperatingLeaseResidualValueOfLeasedAsset
description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee under operating lease. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAdjustmentsAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseReportedAndIncurredButNotReportedIBNRClaims
description: #N/A

name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability for retirement benefits, classified as other.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsNetOfOfferingCosts
description: Amount, after offering cost, from issuance of new unit of limited partnership interest in public offering.

name: PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet
description: Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservePurchaseOfMineralInPlaceEnergy
description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from purchase of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentGenerationOrProcessing
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to generation or processing owned by public utility.

name: LicenseAndMaintenanceRevenue
description: #N/A

name: LicenseAndServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: LicenseCosts
description: #N/A

name: LicensesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: PurchaseObligationDueInFourthAndFifthYear
description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth and fifth fiscal years following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: SalesTypeLeaseUnguaranteedResidualAsset
description: Present value expected to be derived from underlying asset following end of lease term not guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor.

name: SettlementOfAssetRetirementObligationsThroughNoncashPaymentsAmount
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled through noncash transactions. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionValuationMethodExpectedDividendRate
description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

name: AdditionsToOtherAssetsAmount
description: Amount of significant additions in the period in other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

name: AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComputationOfNetIncomePerOutstandingUnitAmount
description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic net Income or Loss per outstanding limited partnership unit in the future and that were not included in the computation of diluted net income per limited partnership unit, because to do so would increase net income per unit amounts or decrease loss per unit amounts for the period presented.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeases
description: The net investment in direct financing leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldAdditions
description: Increases in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan due to the acquisition of similar loans accounted for as debt securities during the period. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: LifeInsuranceInForcePremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldDisposalsOfLoans
description: Amount of reduction, resulting from a sale or transfer of a loan, in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesIssuanceOfEquityBySubsidiaryToNoncontrollingInterests
description: Represents a sale (new stock issuance) by a subsidiary to noncontrolling interests (third parties, parties directly or indirectly unrelated to parent) during the period. The capital transaction by subsidiary does not result in a loss of control by the parent, but does effect a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsOriginalCost
description: Original amount of cost-method investments at the acquisition date.

name: CreditRiskDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value of credit risk derivative asset.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingInterestRateOnBorrowingsOutstanding
description: Interest rate on outstanding borrowings under debtor-in-possession financing arrangement.

name: DeferredDiscountsFinanceChargesAndInterestIncludedInReceivables
description: Unearned discounts (other than cash or quantity discounts and the like), finance charges, and interest included in the face amount of receivables, that are shown as a deduction from the related receivables. For example, 1) finance charges booked as a receivable when a loan is made and recognized as income at a later date; and 2) interest charges deducted from the face loan amount, resulting in a discounted amount actually advanced to the borrower (wherein the receivable includes the amount actually advanced to the borrower and the as yet unearned interest income).

name: DeferredGainLossOnDiscontinuationOfFairValueHedge
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the unamortized adjustment to the carrying value of an interest-bearing hedged item made under an effective fair value hedge that is amortized upon discontinuation of the fair value hedge.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceCurrent
description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as current.

name: EarningsPerShareBasicDistributed
description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security.

name: EarningsPerShareBasicUndistributed
description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepletion
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depletion.

name: FairValueHedgeAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all derivative assets designated as fair value hedging instruments.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAmountEligibleToBeRepledgedByCounterparty
description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions where counterparty has the right to re-pledge such.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedMortgagesMortgageBackedAndAssetBackedSecuritiesAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in mortgages, mortgage backed securities (investment instruments that represent ownership of an undivided interest in a group of mortgages, where principal and interest from the individual mortgages are used to pay investors' principal and interest on the mortgage backed security) and asset-backed securities that are primarily paid from the cash flows of a discrete pool of receivables or other financial assets (such as credit-card receivables), either fixed or revolving, that by their terms convert into cash within a finite time period. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancingReceivableUnamortizedPurchasePremiumDiscount
description: Amount of unamortized purchase premium (discount) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: GainLossOnSalesOfMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBS
description: Net gain (loss) resulting from the sales of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans (mortgages).

name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depreciation and amortization.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsSold
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund lent to other financial institution arising from the excess in reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPostretirementObligations
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans. Excludes pension benefits.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRetailRelatedInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of merchandise inventory held by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor for future sale; includes packaging and other supplies used to store, transport, or present merchandise inventory.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldForSale
description: The amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including mortgage loans, and interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale.

name: InterestExpenseTrustPreferredSecurities
description: The amount of interest incurred to a trust which has issued trust-preferred securities. In order to issue trust preferred securities, a sponsor forms a trust by investing a nominal amount of cash to purchase all of the voting common stock of the trust. The trust issues nonvoting, mandatorily redeemable preferred securities to outside investors in exchange for cash. The proceeds received from the issuance of the preferred securities, together with the cash received for issuing the common stock to the sponsor, is then loaned to the sponsor in exchange for a note which has the same terms as the trust preferred securities. Trust preferred securities possesses characteristics of both equity and debt issues and are generally issued by bank holding companies.

name: InterestRateDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets not designated as hedging instruments.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearThree
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
description: The amount of trade accounts payable included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForPolicyholderContractDepositsInterestRate
description: Rate of interest credited to policyholder deposits.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended.

name: LossContingencyUndiscountedAmountOfInsuranceRelatedAssessmentLiability
description: The liability as of the balance sheet date representing required funding mandated by statute or regulatory authority that is related directly or indirectly to underwriting activities, including pools for self-insurance and excluding premium taxes and income taxes. The funds derived from the assessments generally enable a government guarantor to pay insurance claims in the event that the underwriting insurer is insolvent or otherwise unable to meet its payment obligations.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantPlanContribution
description: Amount of contribution received by multiemployer pension plan from all employers participating in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnNetIncome
description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on net income.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossJointVenturePartnersNonredeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling shareholder, unit holder, partner, or other equity holder of a joint venture.

name: NonredeemableNoncontrollingInterest
description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity which is not redeemable by the parent entity.

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementContingentRevenue
description: Amount of contingent rental revenue recognized for the period under lease, based on the occurrences of an event or condition.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsSavings
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PreferredStockSharesSubscribedButUnissuedValue
description: Amount of subscription received from investors who have been allocated nonredeemable preferred stock or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

name: PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansHeldForSaleOrSecuritization
description: This is the principal amount outstanding for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

name: ProceedsFromAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertificates
description: The cash inflow from an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

name: ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferredStock
description: Cash inflows (outflows) from issuing and redeeming redeemable preferred stock; includes convertible and nonconvertible redeemable preferred stock.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageServicingRightsMSR
description: The cash inflow from the sale of servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

name: ProceedsFromSubordinatedShortTermDebt
description: The cash inflow from an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

name: ReclassificationToWellFacilitiesAndEquipmentBasedOnDeterminationOfProvedReserves
description: Previously capitalized costs of the drilling of wells that were reclassified as part of the costs of the enterprise's wells and related equipment and facilities at the time that proved reserves were found.

name: ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGasProperties
description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties.

name: SECScheduleIIIRealEstateNumberOfUnits
description: Number of units of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income from net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements
description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities sold under agreements to repurchase where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets, accounting for them as secured debt.

name: SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaimCash
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

name: SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaimSecurities
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

name: TangibleCapitalToTangibleAssets
description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets as defined by regulatory framework.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingTransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsProvisionalIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TreasuryStockCarryingBasis
description: Cost basis for treasury stock acquired for purposes other than retirement.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInSecondYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AdditionalPaidInCapitalPreferredStock
description: Value received from shareholder in nonredeemable preferred stock-related transaction in excess of par value, value contributed to entity and value received from other stock-related transaction. Includes, but is not limited to, preferred stock redeemable solely at option of issuer. Excludes common stock.

name: AlternativeExcessNetCapital
description: Amount of net capital in excess of minimum required net capital, calculated under Alternative Standard.

name: AociIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income.

name: BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBufferCapitalConservedMinimum
description: Minimum capital conservation buffer percentage required to avoid restriction on payout amount of eligible retained income as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BorrowingsUnderGuaranteedInvestmentAgreements
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the sum of the obligations to contract holders to provide to them an agreed upon rate of return pursuant to the terms of the underlying contract. These contracts represent lending by the contract holders to the entity in return for a guaranteed (primarily fixed) interest rate until maturity, unless called earlier if the contracts provide that option to the contract holders (usually institutions). There is little or no insurance risk for the entity.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary difference assumed at the acquisition date that are classified as noncurrent.

name: CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrust
description: Value of common stock issued to a trust (for example, but not limited to, rabbi trust) set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAccumulatedAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetCumulativeCatchUpAdjustmentToRevenueModificationOfContract
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from contract modification which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSalePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtPurchasePrice
description: Amount at purchase price of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingAndEquitySecuritiesFvNiCost
description: Cost of investment in debt investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

name: DecommissioningFundInvestments
description: Decommission fund to pay for the costs of decontaminating and decommissioning of facilities through collection of revenues derived from utility assessments and government appropriations. Decommission fund investment for the process whereby a power station, at the end of its economic life, is taken permanently out of service and its site made available for other purposes. In the case of a nuclear station this comprises three different states of clearance. Immediately after the final closure, radioactive material such as nuclear fuel and operational waste is removed and the buildings surrounding the reactor shield are dismantled and finally the reactor itself is dismantled.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsNet
description: Amount of issuance costs recognized in a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, after deduction of accumulated amortization or the effects of subsequent adjustments.

name: DeferredSalesInducementsAdditions
description: Amount of deferred sale inducement cost capitalized.

name: DeferredTaxAssetIntraEntityTransferAssetOtherThanInventory
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from intra-entity transfer of asset within consolidated group. Excludes intra-entity transfer of inventory.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationToReturnCash
description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed.

name: DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentDerivativeLiabilities
description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative liabilities to properly reflect the credit quality of the entity.

name: EarlyRepaymentOfSubordinatedDebt
description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets before its maturity.

name: EffectOnFutureEarningsAmount
description: The quantified amount of the future effect on earnings.

name: EmbeddedDerivativeNoLongerBifurcatedAmountReclassifiedToStockholdersEquity
description: The amount of the liability for the conversion option reclassified to stockholders' equity when the embedded option no longer required separation from the host instrument.

name: EnergyRelatedInventory
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies relating to a source of usable power held for future sale or future use in manufacturing or production process.

name: EquitySecuritiesFVNINoncurrent
description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as noncurrent.

name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiRestricted
description: Amount of restricted investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquityForwardRate
description: The per share price of the Company's stock at which the contract holder of the freestanding contract has the right to purchase or sell the Company's stock at a future date.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertiesNetOfApplicableIncomeTaxes
description: This element represents the amount of gain (loss) on sale of properties during the reporting period net of the applicable income taxes realized.

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountDistributionAmount
description: The total amount of distributions to the general partner during the period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDemandDeposits
description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all demand deposits, including checking and negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts, classified as cash flows from financing activities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProcessInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of finished goods inventory and work in process inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreements
description: The change in funds held under reinsurance agreements or treaty (contract between the reinsurer and the ceding entity stipulating the manner in which insurance written on various risks is to be shared).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOutstandingChecksFinancingActivities
description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearFour
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedTroubledDebtInterestIncome
description: The gross interest income that would have been recorded in the period on troubled debt restructurings, if the loans had been current in accordance with their original terms and had been outstanding throughout the period or since origination, if held for part of the period.

name: LossOnDerivativeInstrumentsPretax
description: Aggregate loss on all derivative instruments charged against earnings during the period, before tax effects.

name: MaturitiesOfSeniorDebt
description: The cash outflow for the settlement of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, as it matures.

name: MortgageBackedSecuritiesHeldToMaturityFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as held-to-maturity.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue
description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates, classified as other. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

name: OtherPayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrganizations
description: Amount of other payables due to broker-dealers or clearing organizations.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsReductionsCashFlows
description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held due to increases in cash flows expected to be collected and recognized over the remaining life of the security.

name: PaymentsForEnvironmentalLiabilities
description: Cash outflows made during the period for environmental remediation activities.

name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountValue
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForOperatingActivities
description: Total amount of cash paid for operating activities during the current period.

name: PaymentsForOtherOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow for operating activities classified as other.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRestrictedCertificatesOfDeposit
description: The cash outflow from temporary investment with specific maturity and interest rate that are prohibited for current use.

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesRepaymentsAndCallsOfTradingSecuritiesHeldforinvestment
description: The cash inflow associated with maturities (principal being due), repayments and calls (payments before maturities) of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

name: ProceedsFromOtherOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow from operating activities classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansByEmployeeStockOwnershipPlans
description: The cash inflow from the financed defined contribution plan to acquire shares of the entity. The plan initially holds the shares in a suspense account, which is collateral for the loan. As the plan makes payment on the debt, the shares are released from the suspense account and become available to be allocated to participant accounts.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedRateIncreaseDecreasePercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

name: ReceivableFromShareholdersOrAffiliatesForIssuanceOfCapitalStock
description: Amount due from owner or affiliate of reporting entity for issuance of shares. Includes, but is not limited to, amount due for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount due from officer or director.

name: RepaymentsOfAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertificates
description: The cash outflow for an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

name: RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomerExcludingInterestIncome
description: Amount, excluding interest income, of revenue not accounted for under Topic 606.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationToReturnSecurities
description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities borrowed.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionModificationOfTermsIncrementalCompensationCost
description: The excess of the fair value of the modified award over the fair value of the award immediately before the modification.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsNumberOfSharesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Number of increase (decrease) of non-vested options.

name: TaxBasisOfInvestmentsCostForIncomeTaxPurposes
description: The aggregate cost of investments for Federal income tax purposes.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness
description: #N/A

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleAmount
description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of accounts receivable held for sale.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseRepayments
description: #N/A

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyNetOfTax
description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), after tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsProvisionsRecoveries
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from expenses (recoveries) recognized.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAdditionalBorrowings
description: #N/A

name: AffordableHousingProgramObligation
description: Amount of obligation related to Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

name: AmortizationOfRegulatoryAsset
description: The expense charged against earnings during the period to allocate the capitalized costs of regulatory assets over the periods expected to benefit from such costs.

name: AssetAtFairValueChangesInFairValueResultingFromChangesInAssumptions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the assumptions or model used to calculate the fair value of a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupOther
description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

name: AssumedLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: Liability as of the balance sheet date for the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims and claim adjustment expense relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date for those liabilities owed to another party as a result of assuming another insurer's primary obligation.

name: AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedGainBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfClaimsFiled
description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed with bankruptcy court.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsAdditionalDisclosuresAcquisitionCosts
description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of acquisition related costs.

name: BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquityInterestInAcquireeRemeasurementLoss
description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of loss recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostChargedToExpense1
description: Amount of expense for capitalized exploratory well costs for which proved reserves were not found at the exploratory well.

name: CommonStockConvertibleConversionPriceDecrease
description: Per share decrease in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the cost method.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from recovery.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureProfitsAmortization1
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredRentAssetNetCurrent
description: Amount of excess of rental income recognized over rental payment required by lease, classified as current.

name: DeferredRentReceivablesNetNoncurrent
description: Amount of excess of rental income recognized over rental payment required by lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsGrossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompensationAndBenefitsSeverancePayments
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from severance costs.

name: LiquidityDisclosureFutureObligationsNotExpectedToBeRepaidAmount
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCapitalizedInterest
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized interest.

name: DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentDerivativeAssets
description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative assets to properly reflect the credit quality of the counterparties.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsInHedgesAtFairValueNet
description: Aggregate net fair value of all derivative instruments designated as hedging instruments. Includes instruments designated as cash flow hedges, fair value hedges, and hedges of net investments in foreign operations.

name: LitigationSettlementAmount
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsGain
description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

name: ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssetsAggregateDifference
description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are 90 days or more past due, in nonaccrual status, or both.

name: LitigationSettlementGross
description: #N/A

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsCostIncurredToRenewOrExtend
description: The amount of capitalized costs incurred in the period to renew or extend the term of a recognized finite-lived (amortizing and amortizable) intangible asset.

name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAndPurchaseAccountingAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life for foreign currency translation adjustments and purchase accounting adjustments.

name: FranchisorCosts
description: Aggregate costs incurred that are directly related to activities, including but not limited to, generating franchise revenues from franchisor owned outlets and franchised outlets.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductionsExtraterritorialIncomeExclusion
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsOther
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

name: InterestExpenseNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOWDeposits
description: Interest expense incurred on the amount of Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW). Interest-bearing transaction account that combines the payable on demand feature of checks and investment feature of savings accounts. A NOW account is functionally an interest paying checking account.

name: InterestExpenseTimeDeposits100000OrMore
description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, of $100,000 or more in domestic offices.

name: InterestExpenseTradingLiabilities
description: Interest expense incurred on short positions arising from sales of securities and other assets, which the entity does not own, to other parties. Trading liabilities includes the fair value of derivative contracts held for trading that are in loss positions.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialAllowance
description: #N/A
