name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialGovernments
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialLoansInProcess
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialNetOfDeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeFederalHomeLoanBankAdvances
description: Amount of interest income from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

name: InvestmentRelatedLiabilities
description: The aggregate amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date for obligations incurred in connection with the entity's investments.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesDividendOrInterestCreditedToIncome
description: At the close of the period, the dividends or interest included in caption 1 of the statement of operations. In addition, show as the final item the aggregate of dividends and interest included in the statement of operations in respect of investments in affiliates not held at the close of the period. The total of this column would be expected to agree with the correlative amount shown on the related statement of operations.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerAllowance
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerConstruction
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerHomeEquity
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerInstallmentAndRevolving
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerInstallmentDurableGoods
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerInstallmentOther
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerInstallmentStudent
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerLeaseFinancing
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerLoansInProcess
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerMortgage
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerNetOfDeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerOther
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRevolvingCreditCard
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRevolvingOther
description: #N/A

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearFive
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncomeCommercial
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncomeConsumer
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncomeOther
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGross
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of reserves for the costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims, before estimated recoveries from reinsurers.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableForeign
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableForeignCommercial
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableForeignNetOfDeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsLife
description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under long-term life insurance contracts.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseOtherNet
description: Amount of increase (decrease), classified as other, of the credit facility.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountCommercial
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountConsumer
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperformingAccrualOfInterest
description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans deemed to be questionable as to collection on which interest is continuing to be earned or accrued.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountForeign
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountOther
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAllowanceForLoanLosses
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAtCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAverageInvestment
description: #N/A

name: MineralRights
description: Carrying amount at the balance sheet date of mineral rights, or rights to extract a mineral from the earth or to receive payment in the form of a royalty for the extraction of minerals, net of amortization.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPeriodInAllowanceForLoanLoss
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPeriodNotInAllowanceForLoanLoss
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterestIncomeCashBasisMethod
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterestIncomeRecognized
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInLimitedPartnerships
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners of a limited partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

name: MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1
description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

name: OilAndGasPropertyFullCostMethodDepletion
description: Depletion of oil and gas property carried under the full cost method.

name: OtherRevenueExpenseFromRealEstateOperations
description: Amount of other revenue (expense) derived from real estate investments partnerships.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperformingOver90DaysAccrualOfInterest
description: #N/A

name: ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObligationsAmount
description: The aggregate amount of the participating mortgage obligation at the end of the accounting period.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedTroubledDebtRestructuringAmount
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForOtherTaxes
description: Amount of cash outflow for taxes classified as other.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLongtermInvestments
description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of long-term investments which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstateJointVentures
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountCommercial
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountConsumer
description: #N/A

name: PercentageOfDebtHedgedByInterestRateDerivatives
description: Percentage of an entity's outstanding debt that is designated as a hedged item in cash flow, fair value, or net investment hedge.

name: ProceedsFromAdvancesForConstruction
description: The cash inflow from borrowing by the entity from developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for construction that are repaid in cash, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountForeign
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountOther
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableOther
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableOtherAllowance
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableOtherLoansInProcess
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableOtherNetOfDeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfFirstMortgageBond
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt instrument secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.

name: ProductionAndDistributionCosts
description: Amount of expense related to the production and distribution of goods or services to customers and clients.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentSalvageValue
description: The estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose).

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesCollections
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesApprovedRateIncreaseDecreasePercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's approved rate increase (decrease) by regulatory agency.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransmission
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to utility transmission owned by public utility.

name: LoansAssumed
description: #N/A

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCostsIncurred
description: The amount of interest capitalized to an operative builder's inventory during the period.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceAmountsApplied
description: Amount of the valuation allowance for real estate owned that was applied in the period against the carrying amount of real estate owned that was sold, written down or written off.

name: LoansHeldForSaleCommercialAndIndustrial
description: #N/A

name: LoansHeldForSaleCommercialRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: LoansHeldForSaleConsumerCreditCard
description: #N/A

name: LoansHeldForSaleConsumerHomeEquity
description: #N/A

name: LoansHeldForSaleConsumerInstallmentStudent
description: #N/A

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenue
description: The total amount of regulated operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: LoansHeldForSaleMortgages
description: #N/A

name: LoansHeldForSaleOther
description: #N/A

name: SecuredBorrowingsGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral and funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a financial asset repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same financial assets at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of security loaned to entity in exchange for collateral. Includes security loaned not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellCollateralObligationToReturnCash
description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities purchased under agreement to resell.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of servicing assets that are subsequently measured at fair value.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionQuantityOfSecuritiesIssued
description: The number of shares or units of entity securities issued in the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

name: TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy
description: Amount of minimum tangible capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: TradingLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of liabilities pertaining to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include, but are not limited to, short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemLossGross
description: Amount, before deduction of insurance proceeds, of loss recognized in the income statement for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: WarehouseAgreementBorrowings
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the outstanding short-term borrowings under a revolving line of credit used by mortgage bankers to finance the origination or purchase of loans.

name: LoansReceivableCommercialAcquisition
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialAgricultural
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialAndIndustrial
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialConstruction
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialDevelopment
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialFinancialAndAgricultural
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialFinancialInstitutions
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialMortgage
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableCommercialTradeFinancing
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositTimeDeposits
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic time deposit liabilities.

name: AccumulatedAmortizationOfNoncurrentDeferredFinanceCosts
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent.

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNet
description: #N/A

name: BankAcceptancesExecutedAndOutstanding
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of drafts and bills of exchange that have been accepted by the reporting bank, or by others for its own account, as its liability to holders of the drafts.

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupCommercialAndIndustrial
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupCommercialRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupConsumerHomeEquity
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupConsumerStudent
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupMortgage
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroupOther
description: #N/A

name: CustodyFees
description: Those fees charged for services related to holding, advising, and managing customer investment assets. These account fees usually charged annually or semi-annually, on a per security basis, for the costs of services.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAfterFiveThroughTenYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: LoansReceivableMortgageWarehouseLending
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableNet
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGain
description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: LoansReceivableWithVariableRatesOfInterest
description: #N/A

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsLevel3ReconciliationDecreaseForSettlement
description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of decrease in plan asset of defined benefit plan from settlement of trade associated with underlying investment.

name: LoansToFinanceLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeSwapTypeFixedPrice
description: Fixed price related to the price risk swap derivative.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeDiscountRateHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeDiscountRateLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal
description: The excess amount received or due over net assets in a transaction accounted for as a divestiture where a subsidiary, business or operating assets are "sold" by the entity to a newly formed, thinly capitalized, highly leveraged buyer. This gain is not yet recognized and is disclosed on the balance sheet as an offset against the carrying amount of the securities received.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccruedIncomeTaxPayable
description: Amount classified as income tax obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: DividendsAndInterestPaid
description: The contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the current period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends).

name: DueFromJointVentures
description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingenciesStateAndLocal
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax contingency.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeVolatilityRateHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeVolatilityRateLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: LongLivedAssetsHeldForSaleGainLossOnSale
description: #N/A

name: LongLivedAssetsHeldForSaleImpairmentCharge
description: #N/A

name: LongLivedAssetsHeldForSaleProceedsFromSale
description: #N/A

name: LongLivedAssetsToBeAbandonedCarryingValueOfAsset
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxSettlementsOther
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStructureDirectLoanAmount
description: The amount reported as a liability as of the balance sheet date by the entity (the employer) of the loan made by a third-party lender directly to the ESOP.

name: ExcessCapitalToRiskWeightedAssets
description: Ratio of total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: FinancingReceivableLoanInProcess
description: Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: ForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAssets
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to assets.

name: ImpairedAssetsToBeDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleCarryingValueOfAsset
description: The carrying amount on the books of the entity of the impaired asset to be disposed of by a method other than sale.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerAdvancesAndDeposits
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of (a) prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date, (b) the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for a current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement, or (c) a combination of (a) and (b).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchaseAgreements
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability under agreements to repurchase securities that were sold.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSelfInsuranceReserve
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's' compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

name: InventoryRealEstateConstructionInProcess
description: Cost of real estate projects incurred for projects for eventual sale or transfer (condominium or time share projects, vacation clubs).

name: InvestmentCompanyRealizedAndUnrealizedGainLossOnInvestmentAndForeignCurrency
description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment, foreign currency translation and foreign currency denominated asset and liability.

name: LiabilitiesRelatedToInvestmentContractsFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of liability related to investment contracts for example, but not limited to, guaranteed investment contract or annuities.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNet
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of reserves for the costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims, net of estimated reinsurance recoveries.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsPeriodExpense
description: Amount of expense (income) recognized due to changes in the accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events.

name: LineOfCreditAssumed1
description: The fair value of line of credit assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: MineralPropertiesGross
description: Carrying amount at the balance sheet date of mineral properties, gross of adjustments.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateAmortizationOfPremium
description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from amortization of premium.

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeSeparateAccountValue
description: Value of the separate accounts corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

name: LongTermDebtComponentsCommercialLoansCurrent
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtComponentsConvertibleDebt
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtComponentsMortgageLoans
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtComponentsNotesPayable
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtComponentsOtherDebt
description: #N/A

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasic
description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInterestAcquired1
description: The level of ownership or equity interest acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: OperatingInsuranceAndClaimsCostsProduction
description: Insurance and claims costs directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInFourAndFiveYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth and fifth fiscal years following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherInventoryCapitalizedCosts
description: Amount, before valuation and last-in first out (LIFO) reserves, of costs capitalized in inventory classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: PaymentsForBrokerageFees
description: The amount of cash paid for brokerage fees during the current period. This element is intended to represent the brokerage fees paid by and between financial industry participants.

name: PaymentsForLeasingCostsCommissionsAndTenantImprovements
description: Net cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy; for costs that are essential to originating the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including but not limited to, evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement; and for any commission(s) incurred.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits
description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from deposits classified as other.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMortgageServicingRightsMSR
description: The cash outflow to obtain servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledgedForRepurchaseAgreementsAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesForFederalHomeLoanBank
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for FHLB debt obligations, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PolicyholderFunds
description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

name: PreconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockDiscountOnShares
description: Discount on preferred shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeUnrealizedGainLossToBeReclassifiedDuringNext12Months
description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on price risk cash flow hedges as of the balance sheet date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next twelve months.

name: ProceedsFromDistributionsReceivedFromRealEstatePartnerships
description: The cash inflow from earnings received from real estate partnerships.

name: ProceedsFromLongTermCapitalLeaseObligations
description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to a long-term capital lease obligation.

name: ProceedsFromRecoveriesOfLoanPreviouslyChargedOff
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of financing receivable, previously written off.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfFinanceReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale or collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLandHeldforinvestment
description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for investment; excludes sales of land held as inventory or productive use.

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingAfterYearFive
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearFive
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearFour
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearThree
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtOfRegistrantMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfTrustAssetsToPayExpenses
description: Amount of cash inflows from the sale of trust assets to pay trust expenses.

name: ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet
description: Amount of recovery (expense) related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed and ceded.

name: RepaymentsOfFirstMortgageBond
description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument issued, secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.

name: ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletionAmortizationAndAccretion
description: Depreciation, depletion, amortization, and accretion related to oil and gas producing activities.

name: ResultsOfOperationsTransportationCosts
description: Includes the cost to prepare and move liquid hydrocarbons and natural gas to their points of sale.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionAmountDueUnderFinancingArrangement
description: The liability due as of the balance sheet date for leasebacks accounted for using the deposit method.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionAnnualRentalPayments
description: The yearly payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionDeferredGainGross
description: The amount of the gain recorded in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller to be recognized in future periods.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

name: ScheduleOfFairValueOfSeparateAccountsByMajorCategoryOfInvestmentFairValue
description: Fair value amount of the specified investment category of assets maintained in separate accounts as of the balance sheet date.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCollateral
description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement and deduction of obligation to return financial collateral not offset and financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not offset, of security borrowed from entity in exchange for collateral. Includes security borrowed not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueChangesInFairValueResultingFromChangesInValuationInputsOrChangesInAssumptions
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs, assumptions, or model used to calculate the fair value of the contract to service financial assets under which the estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

name: SurplusNotes
description: Financial instruments issued by insurance entities (surplus notes) that are includable in surplus for statutory accounting purposes as prescribed or permitted by state laws and regulations that are liabilities of the issuer.

name: TransfersAccountedForAsSecuredBorrowingsAssetsCarryingAmount
description: Carrying amount of financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cumulative translation adjustment, after tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultingFromAcquisition
description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from acquisitions.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryingAmountAssets
description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositCertificatesOfDeposit
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

name: AcceleratedShareRepurchaseProgramAdjustment
description: The amount needed to adjust previously recorded stockholders' equity balances to the actual aggregate amounts paid, whether in cash or other consideration, to acquire all of the shares purchased under an Accelerated Share Repurchase arrangement.

name: AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of accounts payable to related parties, due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueAfterFifthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInFifthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInFourthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInThirdYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BelowMarketLeaseAcquired
description: Amount of acquired leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: CapitalizedCostsOfUnprovedPropertiesExcludedFromAmortizationCumulative
description: The sum of the capitalized costs incurred, as of the balance sheet date, of unproved properties excluded from amortization including acquisition costs, exploration costs, development costs, and production costs.

name: ContractWithCustomerRightToRecoverProductCurrent
description: Amount of right to recover product from customer on settling refund liability, classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAfter10YearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityWithinOneYearWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPastDue
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), past due.

name: LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePayments
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvision
description: #N/A

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsOtherExpenseIncome
description: Amount of expense (income) related to reorganization items classified as other.

name: DecommissioningTrustAssetsAmount
description: The fair value of investments held in a trust fund to pay for the costs of decontaminating and decommissioning facilities, whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure on the balance sheet. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizationExpenseOther
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to amortization expense of deferred policy acquisition cost (DAC).

name: DueToEmployeesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amounts due to employees, not to include stockholders or officers.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseAmortization
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to amortization.

name: EmbeddedDerivativeGainOnEmbeddedDerivative
description: Increase in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtObligationsDisclosuresRepaymentAndPenalties
description: Amount of repayments and penalties incurred in the satisfaction or roll-over of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advance.

name: FinancialAssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a financial asset repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same financial asset at a date certain for a specified price. Includes repurchase-to-maturity transactions and liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to additional paid-in capital.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCommonStock
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to common stock.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCurrentLiabilities
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to current liabilities.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseStockholdersEquity
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to stockholders' equity.

name: GainContingencyPatentsAllegedlyInfringedUponNumber
description: Number of entity's patents that another entity has allegedly infringed.

name: GainLossOnInterestRateCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) during the reporting period due to ineffectiveness in interest rate cash flow hedges. Recognized in earnings.

name: HedgingLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquityEquityTransactions
description: The tax effect of an increase or decrease in contributed capital (for example, deductible expenditures reported as a reduction of the proceeds from issuing capital stock) during the period charged or credited directly to shareholders' equity.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfHedgedItemInInterestRateFairValueHedge1
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) included in earnings related to the fair value of the hedged item in an interest rate fair value hedge, offset by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumer
description: Interest and fee income generated from consumer loans. Consumer loans are loans to individuals for household, family, and other personal expenditures. Such loans include residential mortgages, home equity lines-of-credit, automobiles and marine transport loans, credit card transactions, and others.

name: InterestIncomeMoneyMarketDeposits
description: Interest earned on funds deposited in US domestic money market accounts.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: Interest income derived from securities purchased under agreements to resell. The difference in the price at which the institution buys the securities and resells the securities represents interest for the use of the funds by the other party. Most repurchase and sale agreements involve obligations of the federal government or its agencies, but other financial instruments, such as commercial paper, banker's acceptances and negotiable certificates of deposits are sometimes used in such transactions.

name: LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinancialAssetsAmount
description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset as a result of the debt holder not meeting the monthly payment terms.

name: LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in period after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseOpeningBalanceAdjustments
description: Sum of adjustments to the estimated reserve for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableRatioOfNonperformingLoansToAllLoans
description: Reflects the percentage derived from dividing impaired loans on which interest has ceased to be accrued by total loans.

name: NetRegulatoryAssets
description: The net amount of all regulatory assets less all regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

name: NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking
description: Amount of noninterest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquityShares
description: The maximum number of shares that could be issued to net share settle a contract, if applicable. If a contract does not have a fixed or determinable maximum number of shares that may be required to be issued, disclose the fact that a potentially infinite number of shares could be issued to settle the contract.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAdjustmentsBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionUnrealizedGainLossArisingDuringPeriodAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, before reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: LossContingencyRangeOfPossibleLossMaximum
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyRangeOfPossibleLossMinimum
description: #N/A

name: OtherLiabilitiesAndDeferredRevenueNoncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of noncurrent obligations and noncurrent portion of deferred revenue not separately disclosed in the balance sheet. Noncurrent liabilities are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized, and is not expected to be recognized in the next twelve months.

name: OtherRestrictedAssets
description: Total assets that cannot be used for operating purposes because of contract or regulatory requirements that are in effect for a period that extends beyond one year.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the return of partner's capital. That is, excess distributions over earnings to partners. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans
description: Net amount paid or received by the entity associated with issuance or collection of loans made to policy holders, principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMiningAssets
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of mining and mining related assets during the period.

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValue
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToAcquireReceivables
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of all receivables.

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValueCurrent
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValueNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedLoansPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation primarily arising from secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValueReceipts
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencySettlementAgreementConsideration1
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherReceivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables classified as other.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentDistribution
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to utility distribution.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherAdditions
description: Amount of other additions to accumulated depreciation other than depreciation expense for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCostsCostOfSales1
description: Amount of interest cost charged to cost of sales that had been previously capitalized to inventory.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueGas
description: The amount of regulated gas operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionHistoricalCost
description: The historical cost of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: SecuritiesLoanedIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementAndAssetsOtherThanSecuritiesTransferred
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and financial assets transferred other than securities that qualify as secured borrowings.

name: SecuritizationFinancialAssetForWhichTransferIsAccountedAsSaleGainLossOnSale
description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

name: SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanAllocated
description: Number of allocated shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Allocated shares are shares that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula.

name: ShortTermDebtRefinancedAmount
description: Amount of a short-term obligation that has been excluded from current liabilities in the balance sheet because of a refinancing of the obligation.

name: StockholdersEquityChangeInReportingEntity
description: Impact on total stockholders' equity of cumulative effect of change in reporting entity. A change in reporting entity is considered as follows: (1) presenting consolidated statements in place of the financial statements of individual reporting entities; (2) changing the combination of subsidiaries that make up the group for which the consolidated financial statements are presented; and (3) changing the entities included in the combined financial statements. A business combination accounted for under the purchase method and the consolidation of a variable interest entity are not considered a change in reporting entity.

name: TradingLiabilities
description: The carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date that pertain to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities, obligations under repurchase agreements, and securities borrowed arrangements.

name: TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingLoss
description: Amount of unrealized holding loss before gain recognized in the income statement for investments in trading securities.

name: UnregulatedOperatingRevenue
description: The amount of unregulated operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: LossesGainsOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpairmentCharges
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The net increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for servicing assets subsequently measured using the amortization method.

name: MaintenanceCosts
description: #N/A

name: MaintenanceRevenue
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityOperatingIncomeOrLoss
description: The amount of income (loss) from operations derived by the reporting entity during the period from the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesTreasuryStock
description: Number of shares of treasury stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that treasury shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Treasury stock is stock that the Entity has issued but subsequently reacquired.

name: MalpracticeInsuranceDeductible
description: #N/A

name: AdvancesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances carried under the fair value option.

name: AmountAvailableForDividendDistributionWithoutAffectingCapitalAdequacyRequirements
description: The amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without affecting the banking or savings institution's regulatory capital position.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualAdjustment
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesGrossUnrealizedLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss before deducting unrealized gain on investments in available-for-sale equity securities.

name: BusinessAcquisitionPreacquisitionContingencyAmountOfSettlement
description: Amount paid or received to resolve the preacquisition contingency.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualNotRecognized
description: #N/A

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualNotRecognizedHighEndOfLossRange
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedCostsOfUnprovedPropertiesExcludedFromAmortization
description: The sum of the capitalized costs incurred during the period of unproved properties excluded from amortization including acquisition costs, exploration costs, development costs, and production costs.

name: CededPremiumsPayable
description: The consideration due to the assuming enterprise as of the balance sheet date under the terms of the reinsurance contract in exchange for the right to receive reimbursement from such entity for covered claims and expenses.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsFromNonaccretableDifference
description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, after acquisition of a loan, which results in an increase in accretable yield (for example, if actual cash flows are significantly greater than previously expected). This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CommonStockIssuedEmployeeStockTrust
description: Value of common stock issued to a trust (for example, a 'rabbi trust') set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees. This trust does not allow employees to immediately or after a holding period diversify into nonemployer securities. The deferred compensation plan for which this trust is set up must be settled by the delivery of a fixed number of shares of employer stock.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetGrossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

name: CostOfGoodsSoldSalesTypeLease
description: Cost of goods sold for sales-type financing lease.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostNoncurrent
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAfterOneThroughFiveYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

name: DefinedContributionPlanNumberOfEmployees
description: Number of employees eligible to participate in defined contribution plan.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseRevenue
description: Amount of direct financing lease revenue.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMemberDistributionsPaidPerUnit
description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions paid to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: DividendIncomeEquitySecuritiesOperating
description: Amount of dividend income on investment in equity security, classified as operating.

name: EarningsPerShareDilutedUndistributed
description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security, after giving effect to all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencySettlementOfClaims
description: #N/A

name: ManagementFeeAmountPaid
description: #N/A

name: EffectOnFutureCashFlowsAmount
description: The quantified amount of the future effect on cash flows.

name: ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapital
description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ManagementFeesBaseRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ManagementFeesIncentiveRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ManagementFeesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskInvestments
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAssets
description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesCurrent
description: The current portion of Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesParValue
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: MarineServicesCosts
description: #N/A

name: MarineServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedCorporateDebtAtFairValue
description: Fair value of firm holdings in corporate fixed income securities. Includes pledged and unpledged holdings.

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquityShares
description: The maximum number of shares that could be issued to net share settle a contract, if applicable. If a contract does not have a fixed or determinable maximum number of shares that may be required to be issued, disclose the fact that a potentially infinite number of shares could be issued to settle the contract.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseLiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to liabilities and stockholders' equity.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfTrustAssetsToPayExpenses
description: Gain (loss) related to the sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.

name: MarketValueOfStockDividendsOutstandingOverThirtyDays
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitBasicNetOfTax
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAllowanceForEquityFundsUsedDuringConstruction
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the capitalized cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and / or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments. As a result of this capitalization, net income is increased. This element pertains to certain regulated industries, such as public utilities.

name: MarketableSecuritiesEquitySecurities
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesEquitySecuritiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesFixedMaturities
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesFixedMaturitiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFuturePolicyBenefitReserves
description: The change in the future policy benefit reserve balance on the balance sheet.

name: LandAvailableForSale
description: Amount of investment in land held for sale.

name: LeaseIncentivePayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: This item represents an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

name: LeaseIncentiveReceivableCurrent
description: This item represents the current receivable for an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease. The receivable is due within one year. For classified balance sheets, this element represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsIncurredBenefits1
description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

name: MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLossOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentsAmount
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesRestricted
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesRestrictedCurrent
description: #N/A

name: MarketableSecuritiesRestrictedNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEarlyContractTerminationFees
description: The amount of early contract termination fees included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthorized
description: The number of limited partner units authorized to be issued.

name: LongTermPurchaseCommitmentMinimumQuantityRequired
description: Number of units of goods that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

name: LongtermConstructionLoanCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: This element represents the current and noncurrent portions of a long-term real estate loan with an initial maturity beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

name: MediumTermNotes
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value at the balance sheet date of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetTransitionAssetObligationNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

name: MaximumPotentialFutureExposureOnCreditRiskDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOfUnits
description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

name: PaymentsToSuppliersAndEmployees
description: Cash payments to suppliers for goods and services provided and to employees for services provided.

name: PercentageRent
description: This element represents the rental revenue earned during the period from lessee-operators based on revenues generated in their operations, generally in excess of a base amount. Such rental revenue is generally stipulated in the lease agreement, usually will provide for a fixed percentage of revenue to be paid as additional (or possibly only) rent due the lessor, and may be based on gross revenues, net revenues, or multiple variations thereof. Percentage rent is often required under leases with retail outlets located on premises owned by hoteliers, cruise lines, others in the hospitality industry, and shopping mall operators, among others.

name: PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedRealEstate
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of real estate owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PostconfirmationStockholdersEquity
description: Total stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: MembersOrLimitedPartnersSubsequentDistributionAmount
description: #N/A

name: MembershipDuesRevenueOnGoing
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Amount of additional paid-in capital at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: MerchantDiscountFees
description: #N/A

name: MergerAndAcquisitionCosts
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationRetainedEarningsDeficit
description: Amount of retained earnings or deficit at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: MineralExtractionProcessingAndMarketingCosts
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossExcludingCapitalLeasedAssets
description: Gross amount of long-lived physical assets excluding assets held under lease agreements used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

name: RecordedThirdPartyEnvironmentalRecoveriesReceivable
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and reasonably estimable amounts of recoveries from third-parties pertaining to an entity's environmental remediation obligations. An entity's balance sheet may include several assets that relate to an environmental remediation obligation. Among them are the following: a. Receivables from other potentially responsible parties that are not providing initial funding; b. anticipated recoveries from insurers; and c. anticipated recoveries from prior owners as a result of indemnification agreements.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCommonRedemptionValue
description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for common shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

name: RepaymentsOfConstructionLoansPayable
description: The cash outflow from repayment of borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

name: RepurchaseAgreementCounterpartyAmountAtRisk
description: The amount at risk under repurchase agreements is defined as the excess of carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount or if there is no carrying amount) of the securities or other assets sold under agreement to repurchase, including accrued interest plus any cash or other assets on deposit to secure the repurchase obligation, over the amount of the repurchase liability (adjusted for accrued interest).

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentArrangementWithFederalGovernmentCustomerFundingToOffsetCostsIncurred
description: The amount of customer funding recorded as an offset to costs incurred for a fixed-price, best-efforts research and development cost-sharing arrangement with the Federal Government.

name: RetainageDeposit
description: The amount of assets, typically cash, provided to suppliers of goods in advance of receipt and acceptance, or services (such as research facilities, lawyers or consultants), which is held by such parties until the entity either effects full payment (including applying the retainer) or obtains release from liability.

name: RevenueRecognitionSalesReturnsReserveForSalesReturns
description: Amount of estimated sales returns.

name: SecuredDebtOther
description: Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAmount
description: Fair value of a liability representing servicing arrangements under which the estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueOtherChangesInFairValue
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmountAvailableForDividendPaymentsWithRegulatoryApproval
description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid with approval of regulatory agency.

name: StockholdersEquityNoteChangesInCapitalStructureSubsequentChangesToNumberOfCommonShares
description: Change in number of shares issued and outstanding as a result of capital structure change to a stock dividend, stock split or reserve split occurring after the balance sheet date but prior to the later of the issuance of financial statements or the effective date of registration statement.

name: TradingSecuritiesCost
description: Cost of investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyGainLossReclassifiedToEarningsNetOfTax
description: Amount of reclassification from other comprehensive income (loss) to earnings, after tax, related to translation from the functional currency to reporting currency, as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

name: TreasuryStockReissuedAtLowerThanRepurchasePrice
description: In cases when treasury stock is reissued at a price lower than the cost to repurchase, the excess difference between the selling price and cost to repurchase is charged against retained earnings (assuming that all APIC arising from treasury stock transactions has first been exhausted).

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsProvisions
description: Amount of increase in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from charges to expense.

name: AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationReclassificationsFromPropertyPlantAndEquipment1
description: Amount of decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization as a result of reclassifications from property, plant and equipment.

name: AncillaryFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinancialAssetsAmount
description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset, excluding contractually specified servicing fees and late fees.

name: MinimumNetCapitalRequired
description: #N/A

name: AssetAcquisitionConsiderationTransferredContingentConsideration
description: Amount of contingent consideration recognized as part of consideration transferred in asset acquisition.

name: MinimumNetCapitalRequiredForBrokerDealerSubsidiary
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesAccumulatedGrossUnrealizedLossBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

name: AvailableForSaleEquitySecuritiesGrossUnrealizedGain
description: Amount of unrealized gain before deducting unrealized loss on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

name: BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBufferTotalRiskBasedCapitalActual
description: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as total risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum total risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

name: MinimumRemainingTermsOfLeasesAndConcessionsOnUndevelopedAcreage
description: #N/A

name: MinimumRents
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationAssetCurrent
description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be realized within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostsThatHaveBeenCapitalizedForPeriodGreaterThanOneYear
description: The amount of exploratory well costs that have been capitalized for a period of greater than one year after the completion of drilling.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorServicingFees
description: Cash Flows between a transferee and a transferor attributable to servicing fees related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CashPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash. Cash is the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes effect from exchange rate changes.

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: MinorityInterestExpenseIncomeRealEstateInvestments
description: #N/A

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedPremiumCurrent
description: Amount of debt premium to be amortized within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain
description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossJointVenturePartners
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossLimitedPartnerships
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossOfConsolidatedEntities
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossOperatingPartnerships
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossOtherMinorityInterests
description: #N/A

name: MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossPreferredUnitHolders
description: #N/A

name: DeferredLongTermLiabilityCharges
description: The total amount of long-term liability charges that are being deferred beyond one year.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred policy acquisition cost.

name: MinorityInterestIncreaseFromStockIssuance
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuationAllowanceAvailableToReduceIncomeTaxExpense
description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's income tax expense (after such benefits are first being applied to reduce goodwill and then other noncurrent intangible assets to zero).

name: DerivativeFairValueHedgeIncludedInEffectivenessGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as fair value hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, recognized in earnings.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredRevenueNoncurrent
