description: Amount classified as deferred revenue attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: MinorityInterestPreferredStockAmount
description: #N/A

name: EmbeddedDerivativeLossOnEmbeddedDerivative
description: Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsAnticipatedCost
description: Total anticipated costs associated with remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs that may occur on the sale, disposal, or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationMinorityInterest
description: Amount of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests of an equity method investment of the entity.

name: MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales
description: #N/A

name: FairValueAssetLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFixedRate
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advances which have fixed interest.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingInRollingYearFour
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingInRollingYearThree
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountOfMortgages
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingInRollingYearTwo
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to cash and cash equivalents.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCurrentAssets
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to current assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePropertyAndEquipmentNet
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to property and equipment, net.

name: GuaranteeObligationsLiquidationProceedsPercentage
description: Indicates, if estimable, (as a percentage) the approximate extent to which the proceeds from liquidation of any assets held either as collateral or by third parties would be expected to cover the maximum potential amount of future payments under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis
description: #N/A

name: ImpairedAssetsToBeDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleAmountOfImpairmentLoss
description: Loss recognized as a result of the initial and subsequent write-down of a long-lived asset's carrying amount to fair value.

name: IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) on income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperationsGovernmentGrants
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit from continuing operations attributable to government grants to the extent recognized as a reduction of income tax expense.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingenciesDomestic
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in domestic income tax contingency.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateMaximumInterestRateInRange
description: #N/A

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateMinimumInterestRateInRange
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenueAndCustomerAdvancesAndDeposits
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of (a) prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date, (b) the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of an acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement, (c) the increase (decrease) during the reporting period, excluding the portion taken into income, in the liability reflecting services yet to be performed by the reporting entity for which cash or other forms of consideration was received or recorded as a receivable, or (d) some combination of (a), (b), and (c).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLoanedTransactions
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability arising from securities loaned transactions.

name: InterestRateFairValueHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value of all derivatives designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

name: InventoryCrudeOilProductsAndMerchandise
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of finished goods inventories for petroleum products, crude oil, petrochemical products, and other oil and gas inventories.

name: InventoryLandHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
description: Carrying amount net of impairment reserves as of the balance sheet date primarily consisting of deposits for land purchases (including option payments), related acquisition costs, and land which is not expected to be developed in the next two years.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPaymentTermsBalloonPaymentAmount
description: #N/A

name: InventoryRealEstateHeldForSale
description: Represents properties which were acquired directly or through foreclosure for which a committed plan to sell exists and an active program to market such properties has been initiated.

name: LessorOperatingLeaseLeaseNotYetCommencedAssumptionAndJudgmentValueOfUnderlyingAssetAmount
description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of operating lease term for lease that has not yet commenced.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePriorLiens
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterestIncomeRecognizedChangeInPresentValueAttributableToPassageOfTime
description: The amount of interest income on impaired and nonperforming loans that is due to the change in present value attributable to the passage of time.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateRenewedAndExtendedAmount
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountCoveredAndNotCovered
description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateWriteDownOrReserveAmount
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyReceivableCurrent
description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

name: LossOnContracts
description: Losses recognized in the current period on contracts which are expected to generate losses, which are probable and can be reasonably estimated, in a future period.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossPreferredUnitHoldersRedeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling preferred unit holders.

name: OciEquityMethodInvestmentAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

name: OfferingCostsPartnershipInterests
description: Costs incurred in connection with the offering and selling of additional partner interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseBeforeAdjustmentsAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherReceivablesFromBrokerDealersAndClearingOrganizations
description: Amount of other receivables due from broker-dealers or clearing organizations.

name: PaymentsToAcquireBusinessThreeNetOfCashAcquired
description: The cash outflow associated with a third acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBSCategorizedAsAvailableForSale
description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: PercentageOfFIFOInventory
description: The percentage of FIFO (first in first out) inventory to total inventory as of the balance sheet date if other than 100 percent.

name: PreconfirmationAccountsPayable
description: Amount of accounts payable at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCurrentAssets
description: Total current assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCurrentLiabilities
description: Total current liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationLiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity
description: Total liabilities and stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationLiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise
description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsReceivableGross
description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, before deducting the allowance for doubtful accounts.

name: PrincipalInvestmentGainsLosses
description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss), from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, and includes, but is not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.

name: ProceedsFromInterestAndDividendsReceived
description: Cash received for dividends and interest on the entity's equity and debt investments during the current period.

name: ProductionCosts
description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to operate and maintain wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities. They become part of the cost of oil and gas produced. Examples of production costs (sometimes called lifting costs) are: costs of labor to operate the wells and related equipment and facilities; repairs and maintenance; materials, supplies, and fuel consumed and supplies utilized in operating the wells and related equipment and facilities; property taxes and insurance applicable to proved properties and wells and related equipment and facilities; severance taxes; some support equipment or facilities may serve two or more oil and gas producing activities and may also serve transportation, refining, and marketing activities. To the extent that the support equipment and facilities are used in oil and gas producing activities, their depreciation and applicable operating costs become exploration, development or production costs, as appropriate. Depreciation, depletion, and amortization of capitalized acquisition, exploration, and development costs are not production costs but also become part of the cost of oil and gas produced along with production (lifting) costs identified above.

name: RepaymentsOfDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes repayments of short-term and long-term debt.

name: SecuritiesForReverseRepurchaseAgreements
description: The carrying value of securities purchased to be resold in reverse repurchase transactions as of the balance sheet date.

name: SecuritizedAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherPrincipalAmountOutstanding
description: Amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction that continue to be recognized in the statement of financial position. Includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesThatAffectBalance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimAdjustmentExpenseAggregateReconcilingItems
description: Amount of aggregate reconciling items for the reconciliation of the liability in the disclosure of claims development (in excess of) less than the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts.

name: TaxBasisOfInvestmentsUnrealizedAppreciationDepreciationNet
description: The net unrealized appreciation or depreciation.

name: TaxesAndLicenses
description: Amount of tax expense, excluding income, excise, production and property taxes, and licenses and fees not related to production.

name: MultiemployerPlanPeriodContributions
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanWithdrawalObligation
description: #N/A

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MultiemployerPlansCollectiveBargainingArrangementPercentageOfContributions
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlansCollectiveBargainingArrangementPercentageOfEmployersContributions
description: #N/A

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TradeAndLoansReceivablesHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroup
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of accounts and financing receivables held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

name: MultiemployerPlansContributionRateIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: TransferMortgagePayable
description: The fair value of transfer of mortgage payable in noncash investing or financing activities.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyIncreaseDecreaseGrossOfTax
description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), before tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseFuelUsed
description: Amount of operating expense for fuel used by regulated operation.

name: MultiemployerPlansPlanContributions
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityRevenues
description: The amount of income between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: WeightedAverageNumerDilutedLimitedPartnershipUnitsOutstandingAdjustment
description: The sum of dilutive potential limited partnership units used in the calculation of the diluted per-unit computation.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the accrual for environmental loss contingencies.

name: AdjustmentForLongTermIntercompanyTransactionsNetOfTax
description: Current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature because settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Resulting from the entities to the transaction being consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements.

name: AircraftMaintenanceMaterialsAndRepairs
description: Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. Includes the cost of inspections and repairs, materials and routine maintenance costs for all aircraft and engines.

name: NaturalGasMidstreamCosts
description: #N/A

name: NaturalGasMidstreamRevenue
description: #N/A

name: NaturalGasProductionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: NaturalGasStorageRevenue
description: #N/A

name: AircraftRental
description: Expenses incurred related to the lease of aircraft from outside third parties that are used in the entity's business operations.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesUnguaranteedResidualValuesOfLeasedProperty
description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the direct financing lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeNetAmountAtRiskAtAnnuitization
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedCostsMineralInterestsInUnprovedProperties
description: Capitalized costs of unproven properties that include fee ownership or a lease, concession, or other interest representing the right to extract oil or gas subject to such terms as may be imposed by the conveyance of that interest.

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeWeightedAverageAttainedAge
description: #N/A

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeWeightedAveragePeriodRemaining
description: #N/A

name: CollateralizedAgreements
description: The total of collateralized agreements including securities purchased under agreements to resell (repos), borrowed securities, and secured demand notes.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsRealizedGainLoss
description: This item represents the gain (loss) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and any losses recognized thereon for impairments of other than a temporary nature.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturitySoldAmount
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), sold.

name: NetCapitalAsReportedInEntitysPartIIUnauditedFOCUSReport
description: #N/A

name: NetCapitalBeforeHaircutsOnSecuritiesPositions
description: #N/A

name: DelinquentAmountAtEndOfPeriodOnLoansManagedAndSecuritized
description: This is the principal amount of loans (across all types of loans) that are overdue in payment by a set number of days.

name: DepositsReceivedForSecuritiesLoanedAtCarryingValue
description: The amount of cash received as security in return for loaning securities to another party.

name: DerivativeAveragePriceRiskOptionStrikePrice
description: The average strike price on the group of price risk option contracts such as put options or call options.

name: DerivativeLiabilityNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative liabilities.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationRentalIncome
description: Amount of rental income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

name: DistributionsPerLimitedPartnershipUnitOutstanding
description: Cash dividends declared or paid to each outstanding limited partnership unit during the reporting period.

name: DueFromJointVenturesCurrent
description: Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDividendsPaidToESOP
description: Dividends paid on stock held by an employee stock ownership plan.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPFairValueOfSharesSubjectToRepurchaseObligation
description: Fair value of the shares allocated that are subject to a repurchase obligation.

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryCoal
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of coal, which is a combustible rock or minerals which are extracted from the ground and used as fuel.

name: EnvironmentalExpenseAndLiabilities
description: The adjustment to exclude the noncash portion of, and include cash payments for environmental costs when calculating operating cash flows under the indirect method. The adjustment can include the increase (decrease) during an accounting period in total estimated obligations recorded for probable future loss attributable to environmental contamination issues.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingAfterRollingYearFive
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingInNextTwelveRollingMonths
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturingInRollingYearFive
description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FinancingReceivableChangeInPresentValueExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on financing receivable, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

name: ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateRemeasurement1
description: Foreign exchange rate used to remeasure amounts denominated in a currency other than functional currency into functional currency.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherNoncurrentObligations
description: The total of the amount of fresh-start adjustments to other noncurrent obligations.

name: NetCreditLossesDuringPeriodOnLoansManagedOrSecuritized
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnDispositionOfOtherFinancialAssets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on disposal of other assets utilized in financial service operations.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStockBySubsidiaryOrEquityInvesteeNonoperatingIncome
description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries or equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInConstructionPayables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of obligations, not classified as trade payables, incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies, and services pertaining to construction projects.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInUnbilledReceivables
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amount of revenue for work performed for which billing has not occurred, net of uncollectible accounts.

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAndPurchaseAccountingAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit, from foreign currency translation and purchase accounting adjustments.

name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesTradingOrMeasuredAtFairValue
description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on trading securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumerRealEstate
description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by one- to four-family residential properties. This item excludes home equity lines-of-credit.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesCertificatesOfDeposit
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

name: InterestReceivableNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of noncurrent interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

name: LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpensePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of increase (decrease) in the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMembersEquityUnitBasedCompensation
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in members' equity for unit-based payment arrangement issued by limited liability company (LLC).

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommitmentsToPurchaseOrSell
description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans and leases for which agreements to acquire or dispose exist.

name: LongtermFederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: LossContingencyAccrualInsuranceRelatedAssessmentPremiumTaxOffset
description: The amount of insurance-related assessment liability that is expected to be recovered through a premium tax offset based on current laws applied to in-force policies.

name: LossOnDiscontinuationOfCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurring
description: The amount of loss reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: NonInvestmentAssetsLessNonInvestmentLiabilitiesPercentOfNetAssets
description: The percent of net assets of non investment assets and liabilities. This represents the percentage difference between the investments, including long and short positions, and net assets.

name: NoncashProjectAbandonmentCosts
description: The expense charged against earnings to eliminate the capitalized costs of projects that have been terminated during the reporting period, which is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by (used in) operations using the indirect method.

name: OtherDeferredCostsGross
description: Gross amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayableNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability, classified as noncurrent, for retirement benefits, classified as other.

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartnershipUnit
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsReductionsChangeInStatus
description: This item represents reductions in the amount of cumulative losses recognized in earnings for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) for which a portion of the impairment had been recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity) due to a change in status of the impaired security because of a change in the entity's intent to either sell the impaired security or it has become more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the security before recovery of its cost basis.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Changes in the ownership interest during the period of each class of partners. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PolicyholderDividends
description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnit
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: #N/A

name: NetIncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorrowersForTaxesAndInsurance
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationCurrentLiabilities
description: Total current liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: NetInterestIncomeLossAfterProvisionForLoanLosses
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationLiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity
description: Total liabilities and stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationAssets
description: Total assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: ProceedsFromGrantors
description: Cash received from grantors during the current period related to operating activities. This element represents receipts from a guarantor for the amount of guarantee provided.

name: ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionOfLongtermInvestments
description: The cash inflow from sales, maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

name: ReinsuranceReceivablesIncurredButNotReportedClaims
description: Estimated amount after valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables, due from reinsurers for incurred claims not yet reported, and claims settlement expenses.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesGross
description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

name: RevenueRecognitionMilestoneMethodRevenueRecognized
description: The amount of consideration recognized during the period for the milestone or milestones.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionImputedInterestRate
description: The financing cost related to leases that have been recorded under the deposit method, as a financing or as a capital leases in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: SalesTypeLeaseInterestIncomeLeaseReceivable
description: Amount of interest income from lease receivable of sales-type lease.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationToReturnCash
description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities borrowed.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedCostOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) applied to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueDisposals
description: Amount conveyed to unrelated parties of contract to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: SubordinatedDebtCurrent
description: The portion of the carrying value of subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle, if longer. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesRollingYearThree
description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TrusteeFees
description: Fees charged annually for the professional services of a trustee, usually quoted as a percentage of the funds being managed. The fee for appointing an offshore Trustee is included in the trust price.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseGasAndPetroleumPurchased
description: Amount of operating expense for purchased gas and petroleum of regulated operation.

name: AccruedLiabilitiesForUnredeeemedGiftCards
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for outstanding gift cards. Retail customers purchase gift cards or gift certificates that can be redeemed at a later date for merchandise or services; those unredeemed represent a liability of the entity because the revenue is being deferred.

name: AcquisitionCostsCumulative
description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.

name: AdvanceRoyalties
description: The amount paid to music publishers, record producers, songwriters, or other artists in advance of their earning royalties from record or music sales. Such an amount is based on contractual terms and is generally nonrefundable.

name: AssetsDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleInPeriodOfDispositionGainLossOnDisposition1
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the disposal of an asset through means other than sale, for example, but not limited to, abandonment, spin-off, and expropriation.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOnSecuritizationDateOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesDiscountRate
description: Discount rate which is used to value residual cash flows generated by financial assets of the securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer for initial fair value measurement.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOnSecuritizationDateOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesPrepaymentSpeed
description: Estimated rate of prepayment of principal on financial assets for initial fair value measurement.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAndHeldToMaturitySecurities
description: Amount of debt and equity financial instruments classified as either held-to-maturity or available-for-sale.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesMinimumPaymentsToBeReceived
description: Amount of remaining payments as of the balance sheet date that lessees are obligated to make or can be required to make under direct financing leases, including any guarantee of residual value and executory costs. The amount also includes any guaranteed rental payments by an unrelated third-party provided that are financially capable of making such payments.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from recovery.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityNonaccrual
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) on nonaccrual status.

name: DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsCurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredRevenueAndCreditsCurrent
description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date on potential earnings that were not recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP, and which are expected to be recognized as such within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsGrossCurrent
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

name: DepositsOnFlightEquipment
description: Carrying amount, at the balance sheet date, of deposits made to the manufacturer for new flight equipment still under construction. May include capitalized interest.

name: DepositsWithClearingOrganizationsAndOthersSecurities
description: The amount of securities on deposit with clearing organizations and other entities which provide services necessary to operations of the Company. This item would include, for instance, securities advanced as refundable collateral for securities borrowed.

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntity
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityEquitySecurities
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityFixedMaturities
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityInvestmentRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityMortgageLoansOnRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityOtherLongTermInvestments
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityPolicyLoans
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentIncomeInsuranceEntityShortTermInvestments
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAssetNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative assets.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainReclassifiedFromAccumulatedOCIIntoIncomeEffectivePortion
description: The effective portion of gain reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMemberDistributionsDeclaredPerUnit
description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions declared to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: DueFromCorrespondentBrokers
description: Amount receivable from correspondent broker-dealer.

name: EnergyMarketingContractLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Current liabilities attributable to energy marketing activities (trading activities). Current energy marketing (trading activities) are when entities engage in both financial and physical trading to increase profits, manage their commodity price risk and enhance system reliability. They may trade electricity, coal, natural gas and oil. These entities typically use a variety of financial instruments, including forward contracts, options and swaps.

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryPetroleum
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of petroleum or crude oil.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleCumulativeEffectOfChangeOnEquityOrNetAssets
description: #N/A

name: ExcessTierOneLeverageCapital
description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleCurrentPeriodDisclosuresDeferredRevenueAmount
description: #N/A

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleCurrentPeriodDisclosuresRevenueRecognizedAmount
description: #N/A

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued
description: Amount of increase in the extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued. Excludes standard product warranties.

name: FairValueDisclosureOffbalanceSheetRisksFaceAmountAsset
description: The face amount of financial assets, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPurchasesSalesIssuesSettlements
description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnIncomeFromContinuingOperations
description: #N/A

name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssets90DaysOrMorePastDueAggregateDifference
description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are 90 days or more past due.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnNetRevenue
description: #N/A

name: FilmCosts
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and films predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements as group.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedOtherAtFairValue
description: Fair value of firm holdings in securities classified as other. Includes pledged and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancingReceivableNonaccrualPercentPastDue1
description: Percentage of nonaccrual financing receivable balance outstanding that is past due.

name: FinancingReceivableTroubledDebtRestructuringIncreaseDecreaseFromModification
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in financing receivable modified from troubled debt restructuring.

name: NoncashCommissionAndClosingCosts
description: #N/A

name: ForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets designated as foreign currency fair value hedging instruments.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseLiabilities
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to liabilities.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsReceivableAcquired
description: #N/A

name: GeneralPartnersOfferingCosts
description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the general partner.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssumed
description: #N/A

name: ImpairmentOfOngoingProject
description: Amount recognized as an operating expense or loss during the period to reduce the carrying amount of a project that has been impaired but not abandoned.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionEmployeeBenefitLiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToParentBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to parent. Excludes discontinued operations.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAssetsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsDomestic
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to domestic income tax settlement.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionIntangibleAssetsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchased
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability Securities Sold, Not yet Purchased. Proprietary securities transactions entered into by the broker-dealer for trading or investment purposes are included in "Securities Owned and Securities Sold, Not Yet Purchased." Although proprietary trading is frequently thought of as purchasing securities for sale to others, trading securities for the broker-dealer's own account sometimes leads to a liability for the fair value of securities sold but not yet purchased, that is, sold short. The broker-dealer is then obliged to purchase the securities at a future date at the then-current market price.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPostemploymentObligations
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion of the liability that represents various benefits due to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInventoryAcquired
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesBorrowed
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due the entity arising from securities borrowed transactions.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmentsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOW
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) demand deposit liabilities.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmonetaryAssetsAcquiredLiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesSavings
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic savings deposit liabilities.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesStateAndMunicipal
description: Interest income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, derived from debt securities issued by municipal governments, local taxing districts and US state government agencies.

name: InventoryForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves, and progress payments, of inventory associated with long-term contracts, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFinancialOrEquityInstrumentConsiderationSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesBalancePrincipalAmount
description: Amount of principal loans outstanding to affiliates for management investment companies.

name: LoansFromOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans from another FHLBank.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAssetsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: MinimumNetCapitalRequired1
description: Minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by broker-dealer and its subsidiary, calculated under Aggregate Indebtedness Standard.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherLiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeGeneralAccountValue
description: Value of the general accounts corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOtherNoncontrollingInterestsNonredeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other nonredeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAssetsAcquired
description: #N/A

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquityIndexedShares
description: The number of issuer's shares to which the option contract is indexed.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfLiabilitiesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: OtherCommitmentDueInSecondAndThirdYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second and third fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfConsiderationReceived
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionUnrealizedGainLossArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForHeldToMaturityTransferredToAvailableForSaleSecuritiesTax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: OtherEmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligations incurred for employer-related costs classified as other.

name: OtherNoncashIncomeTaxExpense
description: The portion of the noncash component of income tax expense for the period other than the portion from the net change in the entity's deferred tax assets and liabilities.

name: OtherRestrictedAssetsCurrent
description: Amount of current assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountDistributionPerUnitOfLimitedPartnerInterest
description: The amount of the distribution per unit of limited partner interest.

name: PaymentsForAffordableHousingPrograms
description: Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

name: PaymentsForRemovalCosts
description: Cash outflow related to disposal costs of plants, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfTrustPreferredSecurities
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stocks issued by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

name: PaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: The cash outflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

name: PaymentsOfDerivativeIssuanceCosts
description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of a derivative security.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasEquipment
description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset use for the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

name: PaymentsToAcquireProjects
description: The cash outflow from the amount invested for projects in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedOtherDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOrHeldForInvestment
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of other securities classified as available for sale or held for investment which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesForLetterOfCreditFacilities
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for letter of credit arrangements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PostconfirmationAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Amount of additional paid-in capital at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationCurrentAssets
description: Total current assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPropertyAndEquipmentNet
description: Total property and equipment, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationPropertyAndEquipmentNet
description: Total property and equipment, net at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationStockholdersEquity
description: Total stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: NondebtorReorganizationItemsNetGainLossOnSettlementOfOtherClaims
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockConversionsInducements
description: The excess of (1) the fair value of all securities and other consideration transferred in transactions by the registrant to the holders of the convertible preferred stock over (2) the fair value of securities issuable pursuant to the original conversion terms, during the accounting period.

name: ProceedsFromContributionInAidOfConstruction
description: The cash inflow from developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities that provide the entity with cash to extend its construction services to their properties.

name: ProceedsFromDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes proceeds from long-term and short-term debt.

name: ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales
description: Cash inflow related to amounts received in advance from a potential buyer showing or confirming an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

name: ProceedsFromInsurancePremiumsCollected
description: Cash received as payments for insurance premiums during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForFederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellNet
description: The cash flow from the funds lent to and (borrowed from) other financial reporting institutions arising from excess or shortfall in reserve deposited at the Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirements. This lending and borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash outflow or inflow from investments purchased under the agreement to resell such investment.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalReserveStock
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

name: ProgramRightsObligationsCurrent
description: Amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements that will be paid within the next twelve months.

name: NoninterestBearingForeignDepositChecking
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedEquityCapitalStructurePercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's requested equity to capital, including debt and equity.

name: ReceivablesHeldForSaleAmount
description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of accounts and financing receivables held for sale.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueOther
description: The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RepaymentsOfAdvancesForConstruction
description: The cash outflow for the payments made by the entity, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years to developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for borrowings received in construction.

name: NoninterestExpenseDistributionAndServicingFees
description: #N/A

name: RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmount
description: This is the amount of interest expense incurred during the reporting period as a result of repurchase agreements.

name: ResultsOfOperationsAccretionOfAssetRetirementObligations
description: Accretion expense of asset retirement obligations related to oil and gas producing activities.

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteeCumulativeNumberOfSharesIssuedForAllTransactions
description: Cumulative number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee on all stock transactions.

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteeCumulativeProceedsReceivedOnAllTransactions
description: Cumulative amount of cash and other consideration received by subsidiary or equity method investee in exchange for shares or stock issued or sold. Include amounts of cash received, fair value of non-cash assets received, fair value of liabilities assumed, and fair value of any other forms of consideration.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesRollingYearFour
description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGain
description: Amount of unrealized holding gain before loss recognized in the income statement for investments in trading securities.

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeIncreaseDecreaseGrossOfTax
description: Amount, before tax, of increase (decrease) in the cumulative translation adjustment from gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of cumulative translation adjustment attributable to gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsRecoveries
description: Amount of decrease in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from recoveries recognized.

name: NonmonetaryNotionalAmountOfPriceRiskCashFlowHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NonmonetaryNotionalAmountOfPriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NonmonetaryNotionalAmountOfPriceRiskDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NonmonetaryNotionalAmountOfPriceRiskFairValueHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryingAmountLiabilities
description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

name: WeightedAverageNumberBasicSharesOutstandingAdjustmentProForma
description: Adjustment to the weighted average number of basic shares outstanding to convert this to a pro forma presentation.

name: AccruedAdvertisingCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services.

name: AccumulatedAmortizationOfCurrentDeferredFinanceCosts
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as current.

name: AssetAcquisitionContingentConsiderationLiability
description: Amount of liability recognized from contingent consideration in asset acquisition.

name: AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupCurrentOther
description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYearAmortizedCostBasis
description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBufferCommonEquityTierOneRiskBasedCapitalActual
description: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BusinessAcquisitionsPurchasePriceAllocationSubsequentYearsRemainingAdjustments
description: Total remaining unamortized or unaccreted amounts of premiums, discounts, and intangible assets, in years subsequent to the year of acquisition, when the total amounts of remaining discounts, premiums, and intangible assets exceed 30 percent of stockholders' equity.

name: CapitalLeasedAssetsNumberOfUnits
description: The number of units (items of property) under capital lease arrangements.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesDeferredIncome
description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a direct financing lease and the cost or carrying amount, if different, of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.

name: CapitalizedCostsWellsAndRelatedEquipmentAndFacilities
description: Capitalized costs which include those incurred to (1) to drill and equip those exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells that have found proved reserves and (2) obtain access to proved reserves and provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering, storing the oil and gas, including the drilling and equipping of development wells and development-type stratigraphic wells and service wells.

name: CashDividendsPaidToParentCompanyByUnconsolidatedSubsidiaries
description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by unconsolidated subsidiaries.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetPurchase
description: Amount of increase from purchase of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on passage of time.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizationExpenseAssumptionChange
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to amortization expense of deferred policy acquisition cost (DAC) due to assumption change.

name: NotesAssumed
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeForwardInterestRate
description: Stated rate on an interest rate forward or futures contract.

name: NotesIssued
description: #N/A

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountsOfMaterialContingentLiabilitiesRemaining
description: Amounts of material contingent liabilities, for example, but not limited to, product or environmental liabilities or litigation, that remain with the entity despite the disposal of the disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepreciation
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depreciation.

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryOtherFossilFuel
description: Amount of fossil fuel included in inventory classified as other.

name: EnvironmentalCostsRecognizedCapitalizedInPeriod
description: Amount of environmental remediation costs capitalized. These expenditures may relate to long-lived improvements in operating facilities.

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsCostsAccruedToDate
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

name: NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsReasonablyPossibleAdditionalLoss
description: Estimate of reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of amount accrued for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

name: ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossIncomeTax
description: Current period income tax expense or benefit pertaining to a gain (loss) on an extinguishment of debt.

name: FairValueAssetLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: FairValueLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: FederalFundsPurchasedFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesFixedRate
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearThree
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankConsolidatedObligations
description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of consolidated obligation bonds and discount notes issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: FiniteLivedCustomerListsGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an asset comprised of customer information, acquired in a business combination or other transaction, having a finite beneficial life.

name: FlightEquipmentGross
description: The gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAccountsPayable
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accounts payable.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseLiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to liabilities subject to compromise.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactions
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals to be received by the seller-lessee for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

name: NotionalAmountOfCashFlowHedgeInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfCreditRiskDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfDerivativeInstrumentsDesignatedAsNetInvestmentHedges
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfFairValueHedgeInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyDerivativePurchaseContracts
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyDerivativeSaleContracts
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfInterestRateCashFlowHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfInterestRateDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfInterestRateDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfInterestRateFairValueHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfNetInvestmentHedgeInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfNetInvestmentHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: GainOnDerivativeInstrumentsPretax
description: Aggregate gain on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

name: NotionalAmountOfNonderivativeInstrumentsDesignatedAsNetInvestmentHedges
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfOtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfPriceRiskCashFlowHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfPriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfPriceRiskDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: NotionalAmountOfPriceRiskFairValueHedgeDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: GroundLeasesNet
description: Net long-term land leases which are capitalized as part of real property.

name: HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerAmount
description: Amount of asset hedged in last of layer, expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

name: IncreaseDecreaseCashCollateralFromCounterparties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash held either as collateral directly or provided to third parties associated with derivative instruments. Upon the occurrence of any specified triggering event or condition associated with the derivative, these amounts can be utilized to recover all or a portion of the amounts due or payable under the derivative.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDebtSecuritiesTrading
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party receivables classified as other, due within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLongTermReceivablesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) of receivables that were originally due beyond one year (or one business cycle).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInMarginDepositsOutstanding
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in money or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivative position.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInsurance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCashAndInvestments
description: The net cash inflow or outflow during the period for the aggregate increase (decrease) associated with funds and investments that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as assets held in escrow or contractually limited as to use or disposition) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasury
description: Interest income on US treasury securities. US treasury securities are negotiable debt obligations of the US government, secured by its full faith and credit and issued at various schedules and maturities. The income from treasury securities is exempt from state and local, but not federal, taxes. There are three types of securities issued by the US treasury (bonds, bills, and notes), which are distinguished by the amount of time from the initial sale of the bond to maturity.

name: InterestPaidDiscontinuedOperations
description: The amount of cash paid during the current period for interest owed on debt associated with discontinued operations.

name: InventoryFirmPurchaseCommitmentLoss
description: Amount of loss recognized on firm purchase commitment for inventory.

name: InventoryNetOfAllowancesCustomerAdvancesAndProgressBillings
description: Amount, after deduction of valuation reserves, other allowances, and customer advances received on long-term contracts or programs, of inventory expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle.

name: InventoryRecallExpense
description: Reflects the amount charged against earnings comprised of the costs to announce and effect a recall of defective merchandise.

name: InvestmentCompanyContractualFeeWaived
description: Amount of fee contractually waived by investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioAfterIncentiveAllocation
description: Percentage of expense, after incentive allocation, to average net assets.

name: InvestmentCompanyGeneralPartnerAdvisoryService
description: Amount of payment or allocation for advisory service from general partner.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAtFairValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the investments in and advances to affiliates.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCPreferredUnitOutstanding
description: Number of preferred units of ownership outstanding of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: LossRatio
description: Ratio of non-life losses and loss expenses to non-life net premiums earned.

name: MinorityInterestAmountRepresentedByPreferredStock
description: The amount of noncontrolling interest in subsidiary represented by preferred securities issued by the subsidiary.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateWritedownOrReserveAmount1
description: Amount of mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, written down.

name: OccupancyCosts
description: #N/A

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnOperatingResults
description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on operating profit or loss.

name: OccupancyRevenue
description: #N/A

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossJointVenturePartnersRedeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling shareholder, unit holder, partner, or other equity holder of a joint venture.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOperatingPartnershipsNonredeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling partner in an operating partnership.

name: NondebtorReorganizationItemsNetGainLossOnSettlementOfOtherClaims1
description: Amount of gain (loss) on settlement of other claims for entities not in bankruptcy, reported as a reorganization item.

name: OffBalanceSheetCreditLossLiabilityChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on off-balance sheet commitment, from change in methodology. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInTwoAndThreeYears
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second and third fiscal years following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterTaxAndReclassificationAdjustment
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements classified as other.

name: OtherInventoryPurchasedGoods
description: Gross amount of components used by the entity which are bought from another entity rather than produced by the entity.

name: OtherSecuredFinancings
description: Secured financing other than securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementSharesIssued
description: The number of shares issued in connection with an own-share lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

name: PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans that are secured with real estate mortgage and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDeposits
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedMortgageRelatedSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOrHeldForInvestment
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of mortgage-related securities classified as available for sale or held for investment which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PostconfirmationAccountsPayable
description: Amount of accounts payable at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.
