name: PostconfirmationAssets
description: Total assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: OilAndCondensateRevenue
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationCommonStock
description: Amount of common stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCommonStock
description: Amount of common stock at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationReceivablesNet
description: Amount of receivables, net at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockConvertibleConversionPriceIncrease
description: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: ProceedsFromCommissionsReceived
description: Cash received for commissions during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfAccountsReceivableSecuritization
description: Proceeds from (repayments of) securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInCorporateUnit
description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of an interest in a corporate unit during the period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLeaseReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

name: OilAndGasProductionExpense
description: #N/A

name: ProvisionForLeaseLosses
description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss to be realized from lease transactions.

name: PurchaseOptionsLand
description: Carrying amount of an option or options to acquire real property.

name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestPremium
description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the premium on the note or receivable which is added to the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is defined as the difference between the present value and the face amount.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOtherFairValue
description: Fair value of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity and classified as other equity.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueElectricNonNuclear
description: The amount of regulated power revenues recognized during the period.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostNumberOfPositionsEliminatedInceptionToDatePercent
description: Percentage of the total number of positions eliminated as of the balance sheet date since inception of the restructuring plan(s).

name: ResultsOfOperationsExpenseFromOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: The amount of expenses related to oil and gas producing activities.

name: SaleOfTrustAssetsToPayExpenses
description: Amount of sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionSharesApprovedForIssuance
description: The maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) that have been approved for issuance in the equity-based payment transaction.

name: OilAndGasRevenue
description: #N/A

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesDividendsPaidWithApprovalOfRegulatoryAgency
description: Amount of dividends paid subject to regulatory approval.

name: TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToTangibleAssets
description: Ratio of minimum tangible capital to tangible assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: OilAndGasSalesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriodAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseInEffectiveTaxRate
description: Percentage of increase (decrease) in effective tax rate for measurement period adjustment from accounting for tax effect pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesRollingYearFive
description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TimeDepositsNoncurrent
description: Amount of time deposit maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesYearOne
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities of one year or less.

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesYearThree
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than two years, but three years or less.

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesYearTwo
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than one year, but two years or less.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemNetOfInsuranceProceeds
description: Amount, after deduction of insurance proceeds, of loss recognized in the income statement for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseOther
description: Amount of other operating expense of regulated operation.

name: VariableInterestDifferenceBetweenCarryingAmountAndMaximumExposure
description: Difference between the carrying amount of assets and liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the variable interest entity (VIE) and the reporting entity's maximum exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the VIE, where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

name: VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiaryMaximumLossExposureAmount
description: Amount of maximum exposure to loss from involvement with consolidated variable interest entity (VIE).

name: WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitsOutstandingBasic
description: Weighted average number of limited partnership and general partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership and general partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Includes, for example, the number of units distributed to unit holders whereby unit holders have the ability to elect to receive the unit holders' entire distribution in cash or units of equivalent value or there is a potential limitation on the total amount of cash that all unit holders can elect to receive in aggregate.

name: AccountsPayableInterestBearingCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AccumulatedAmortizationOfDebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangements
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements.

name: AffordableHousingProjectInvestmentWriteDownAmount
description: Amount of write-down from impairment of an investment in a qualified affordable housing project.

name: AmortizationOfValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA
description: The adjustment that represents the periodic charge against earnings to reduce the value of business acquired (VOBA) over the expected life of the underlying insurance contracts. VOBA reflects the estimated fair value of a life insurance business in force and represents the portion of the cost to acquire the business that is allocated to the value of the right to receive future cash flows from insurance contracts existing at the date of acquisition. Such value is the present value of the actuarially determined projected cash flows for the acquired policies. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

name: AociDerivativeQualifyingAsHedgeExcludedComponentAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative hedge.

name: AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseMarketValue
description: Market value of assets sold under agreements to repurchase when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under repurchase agreements exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

name: BusinessCombinationAssetsAndLiabilitiesArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognized
description: The net amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired and liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationAssetNoncurrent
description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be realized beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorPurchasesOfPreviouslyTransferredFinancialAssets
description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to purchases of previously transferred financial assets (or its underlying collateral) related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ClearanceFees
description: The amount of expense in the period for clearance fees.

name: CombinedRatio
description: Ratio of non-life losses and loss expenses, non-life acquisition expenses and non-life general and administrative expenses, to non-life net premiums earned.

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableRetainage
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional.

name: CooperativeAdvertisingExpense
description: Amount of expense under a cooperative advertising arrangement.

name: CrudeOilAndNaturalGasLiquids
description: The aggregate carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unrefined petroleum and the liquid hydrocarbon components recovered from natural gas.

name: CustomerLoyaltyProgramLiabilityCurrent
description: Value of deferred revenue or cost to provide products or services, which is expected to be recognized in income or incurred within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, resulting from customer loyalty program. Excludes liability associated with frequent flier programs. Includes liability associated with customer loyalty programs for other businesses, for example, but is not limited to, hotels, supermarkets, credit card companies, automobile rental companies, and book sellers.

name: CustomerSecuritiesForWhichEntityHasRightToSellOrRepledgeFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of customer securities accepted as collateral by the entity that it is permitted by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge to counterparties as collateral.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSalePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtParValue
description: Amount at par value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfter10YearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityWithinOneYearWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedLoss
description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DecreaseInRestrictedCash
description: Amount of cash inflow associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

name: DeferredTaxAssetParentsBasisInDiscontinuedOperation
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the parent entity's basis in a discontinued operation.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as current.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsPrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceipt
description: Amount of receipt from prescription drug subsidy which increases plan assets of defined benefit postretirement plan.

name: DerivativeAverageForwardPrice
description: The average forward price on the group of price risk forward or futures contracts, such as gas futures contracts.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerUnitDistribution
description: Number of units distributed for payment of a unit distribution to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

name: EarningsPerShareDilutedDistributed
description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security, taking into account all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsExtraterritorialIncomeExclusion
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.

name: ExchangeFees
description: The amount of expense in the period for fees charged by securities exchanges for the privilege of trading securities listed on that exchange. Some fees vary with the related volume, while others are fixed.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskAccountsReceivable
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskCashAndCashEquivalents
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearFive
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearFour
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearTwo
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankRegulatoryCapitalRequired
description: Minimum amount of regulatory capital required for Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent deferred income tax liabilities.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseLongTermDebt
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to long-term debt.

name: GainLossOnSalesOfConsumerLoans
description: The gains (losses) included in earning that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of consumer loans. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: GasImbalanceAssetLiability
description: The value of gas balancing asset or liability as of the end of the period.

name: GeneralPartnersContributedCapital
description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

name: GoodwillSubsequentRecognitionOfDeferredTaxAsset
description: Amount of (increase) decrease to an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from the subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets.

name: GroundLeasesAccumulatedAmortization
description: Accumulated amortization on long-term land leases capitalized as part of real property.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: HostingArrangementServiceContractImplementationCostCapitalizedAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

name: IncomeLossFromAffordableHousingProjectsEquityMethodInvestments
description: Amount of investment income (loss) of qualified affordable housing project investments accounted for using the equity method.

name: OperatingLeasesRentExpense
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entry (during the current year or operating cycle) in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

name: InterestCreditedToPolicyOwnerAccount
description: Amount of expense for unpaid portion of interest credited to policy owner account.

name: OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRentals
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseCapitalSecurities
description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on capital securities issued by the reporting entity.

name: InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowingsExcludingFederalFundsAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances and other short term borrowings.

name: InterestRateDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: InventoryLandHeldForSale
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of parcels of land held for sale, and on which the entity has no intention or no further intention to perform construction activities.

name: InventoryOperativeBuilders
description: The net carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the sum of the various components of an operative builder's inventory, including finished homes. Operative builders primarily consist of entities that develop land, construct residential homes and commercial and industrial buildings thereon, and sell them to home buyers and operators of the commercial and industrial properties.

name: InvestmentCompanyIncentiveFeeToAverageNetAssets
description: Percentage of incentive fee expense to average net assets.

name: InvestmentCompanyRedemptionFeePerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of fee charged to investor for redemption of shares before permitted period.

name: InvestmentCompanyTotalReturnAfterIncentiveFees
description: Percentage increase (decrease), after deduction of incentive fee, in fund net asset value. Includes, but is not limited to, interest and dividend income (loss) and realized and unrealized gain (loss).

name: InvestmentInPhysicalCommodities
description: Investments held in physical commodities, such as gold, silver, platinum, crude oil, coal, sugar, rice, wheat.

name: InvestmentInPhysicalCommoditiesFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value of investment held in physical commodities, for example, but not limited to, gold, silver, platinum, crude oil, coal, sugar, rice, wheat.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsIndividualAndGroupAnnuitiesAndSupplementaryContracts
description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under individual and group annuities and supplementary insurance contracts.

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquityStrikePrice
description: #N/A

name: MinimumNetCapitalRequiredForBrokerDealerSubsidiary1
description: Minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by broker-dealer subsidiary to engage in security transaction, calculated under Aggregate Indebtedness Standard.

name: NetSharesReclassifiedToMandatorilyRedeemableCapitalStockShares
description: Net number of shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock.

name: OriginationAndPurchasesOfMortgageBankingAssets
description: #N/A

name: NonInvestmentAssetsLessNonInvestmentLiabilities
description: The net of non investment assets and liabilities. This amount represents the difference between the aggregate value of the investments, including long and short positions, and net assets.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInventoryAcquired1
description: The amount of inventory that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: OriginationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSRs
description: #N/A

name: OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToHeldToMaturityAdjustmentFromAociForAmortizationOfGainLossAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationAndTaxNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherAccruedLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionUnrealizedGainLossArisingDuringPeriodTax
description: Amount, before reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk on financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForWritedownOfSecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

name: OtherRealEstatePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Change in carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed. The change includes for example, but is not limited to, additions, improvements, disposals and valuation adjustments.

name: OtherRestrictedAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

name: OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItemsIncludedInIncomeLossFromContinuingOperations
description: #N/A

name: ParticipatingMortgageLoansParticipationLiabilitiesAmount
description: The aggregate amount of the participation liability at the end of the accounting period.

name: OtherAlternativeEnergySalesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits
description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalReserveBankStock
description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition or sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLeaseReceivables
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

name: PreconfirmationLiabilities
description: Total liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationLongTermDebt
description: Total long-term debt at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: OtherAssetsHeldForSale
description: #N/A

name: OtherAssetsHeldForSaleCurrent
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationPrepaidAndOtherCurrentAssets
description: Amount of prepaid and other current assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsEarnedNetPropertyAndCasualty
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of property and casualty premiums earned.

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBS
description: The cash inflow from the maturity (principal due), prepayment and call (request of early payment) of a loan financed by home mortgage payments classified as held to maturity.

name: ProductiveOilWellsNumberOfWellsNet
description: Number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production representing summation of fractional ownership working interest to whole.

name: OtherAssetsNotAllowed
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransmissionAndDistribution
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to transmission and distribution owned by public utility.

name: RealEstateOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation for real estate owned (REO).

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPreferredRedemptionValue
description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for preferred shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

name: RepaymentsOfMandatoryRedeemableCapitalSecurities
description: The cash outflow related to equity securities that embody an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the securities by transferring the assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) that is (or are) initially more than one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date, or upon an event that is certain to occur beyond one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostNumberOfPositionsEliminatedInceptionToDate
description: The number of positions eliminated as of the balance sheet date since inception of the restructuring plan(s).

name: ResultsOfOperationsDryHoleCosts
description: Dry hole costs from oil and gas producing activities.

name: ResultsOfOperationsExplorationExpense
description: Exploration costs from oil and gas producing activities.

name: RevenuesExcludingInterestAndDividends
description: Revenues from operations, excluding interest and dividend income. Includes revenues from the following sources: investment banking (underwriting and financial advisory), principal transactions (sales and trading, and investment gains and losses), commissions, asset management, and investment advisory and other services.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionRentExpense
description: The amount of the current period expense recorded for use of the property in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesProfitLoss
description: Amount of profit (loss) for sales-type lease and (loss) for direct financing lease recognized at commencement.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, offset against a right to receive collateral.

name: ServicingLiability
description: Aggregate amount of servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAmortizationOfDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostCreditRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAmortizationOfDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostRecognizedInNetPeriodicPensionCostNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAmortizationOfDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostRecognizedInNetPeriodicPensionCostTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSaleSecuritiesTax
description: #N/A

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsMaximumNumberOfShares
description: The maximum number of shares that the issuer could be required to issue to redeem the instrument, if applicable.

name: ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesDiscountRate
description: Discount rate used to obtain present value of liability for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense for short-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedBestEstimate
description: Best estimate of the loss exposure for reasonably possible environmental contingencies at an individual site for which no accrual has been recorded.

name: SpecialAssessmentBond
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersDiscountDeductedFromReserves
description: Amount of discount deducted from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxAssetProvisionalIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrincipleBeforeTaxes
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrincipleNetOfTaxes
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeCumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrincipleTaxes
description: #N/A

name: TemporaryEquitySharesSubscribedButUnissued
description: Amount of a new issue of securities classified as temporary equity that are allocated to investors for them to buy. When securities are sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the securities to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlanNetPriorServiceCostsArisingDuringPeriodTax
description: #N/A

name: TierTwoRiskBasedCapital
description: Amount of Tier 2 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentBeforeTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesYearFive
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than four years, but five years or less.

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesYearFour
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than three years, but four years or less.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsAggregateWriteDowns
description: Amount of decrease in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from write-downs charged against the allowance.

name: WeightedAverageGeneralPartnershipUnitsOutstanding
description: Weighted average number of general partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that general partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansNetUnamortizedGainLossArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: AccruedVacationCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for unused vacation time owed to employees based on the entity's vacation benefit given to its employees.

name: AdvanceRoyaltiesNoncurrent
description: The amount paid to music publishers, record producers, songwriters, or other artists in advance of their earning royalties from record or music sales. Such an amount is based on contractual terms and is generally nonrefundable. This amount is expected to be consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansTax
description: #N/A

name: AffordableHousingProgramAssessments
description: Amount of expense for Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

name: AlternativeNetCapitalRequirement1
description: Minimum amount of net capital of broker-dealer and its subsidiary, calculated under Alternative Standard.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesBeforeTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: AssetAcquisitionConsiderationTransferredEquityInterestIssuedAndIssuable
description: Amount of acquirer's equity interest issued and issuable as part of consideration transferred in asset acquisition.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuritiesNoncurrent
description: Equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading which are intended be sold more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationProvisionalInformationInitialAccountingIncompleteAdjustmentEquityInterests
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to equity interests acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

name: CapitalizedCostsMineralInterestsInProvedProperties
description: Capitalized costs of proved properties that include fee ownership or a lease, concession, or other interest representing the right to extract oil or gas subject to such terms as may be imposed by the conveyance of that interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesTaxEffectPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostsThatHaveBeenCapitalizedForPeriodOfOneYearOrLess
description: The amount of exploratory well costs that have been capitalized for a period of one year or less after the completion of drilling.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorProceedsFromCollectionsReinvestedInRevolvingPeriodTransfers
description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to collections reinvested in revolving period transfers related to either a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeFinalizationOfPensionAndNonPensionPostretirementPlanValuationBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeFinalizationOfPensionAndNonPensionPostretirementPlanValuationNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentBeforeTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: CompensatedAbsencesLiability
description: Amount of liability accrued for the employer's obligation related to an employee's right to receive compensation for future absences that have been earned by employee.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesSaleOfInterestByParent
description: Represents a sale by the parent of a portion of its equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The sale of the equity interest represented by this element does not result in a loss of control by the parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ConvertibleSubordinatedDebtNoncurrent
description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

name: DebtInstrumentCollateralFee
description: Amount of fees associated with providing collateral for the debt instrument.

name: DebtInstrumentSinkingFundPayment
description: Amount paid into a fund, which is used to retire the debt instrument.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSalePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAllowanceForCreditLossAtAcquisitionDate
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentTax
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfterOneThroughFiveYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsNetGainLossOnRejectionOfLeasesAndOtherExecutoryContracts1
description: Amount of gain (loss) on rejection of leases and other executory contracts, reported as a reorganization item.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationTax
description: #N/A

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizationExpenseNetInvestmentGainsLosses
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) of deferred policy acquisition costs from realized net investment gain (loss).

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesCurrent
description: Amount of deferred lease income, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedAmortizationOfTransitionAssetObligationNextFiscalYear
description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAmortizationPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetPriorServiceCostRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAmortizationPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetPriorServiceCostRecognizedInNetPeriodicPensionCostNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAmortizationPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetPriorServiceCostRecognizedInNetPeriodicPensionCostTaxEffect
description: #N/A

name: DefinedContributionPlanIncreaseDecreaseCost
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cost for defined contribution plan.

name: DepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowedAtCarryingValue
description: This is the amount of cash advanced as security in return for borrowing securities from another party.

name: DepositsWithOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: DerivativeCostOfHedgeNetOfCashReceived
description: The premium (cost) of a hedge, net of any cash received on settlement during the period.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, offset against a right to receive collateral.

name: DerivativeNonmonetaryNotionalAmountPercentOfRequiredNeedCoverage
description: The percentage of expected requirements covered by the aggregate notional amount of derivative contracts expressed in nonmonetary units. For example, the number of barrels specified in a fuel oil forward purchase contract as a percentage of expected need.

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposalNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfContinuingCashFlowsAfterDisposal
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) the discontinued operation after the disposal transaction.

name: DiscontinuedOperationEquityMethodInvestmentRetainedAfterDisposalOwnershipInterestPriorToDisposal
description: Percent, prior to disposal, of ownership interest of a discontinued operation in which an equity method investment is retained.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIntraEntityAmountsDiscontinuedOperationAfterDisposalRevenue
description: Amount of revenue in continuing operations related to continuing involvement in a discontinued operation after disposal that before the disposal was eliminated as intra-entity transactions.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPensionPlanBenefitObligation
description: Amount classified as defined benefit plan benefit obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: DistributionsPayableToRealEstatePartnerships
description: The cash outflow or inflow increase (decrease) in distribution due to real estate partnership based upon payments and accruals.

name: EquityRestrictions
description: Disclosure of the amount of equity that is restricted to use by regulation or agreement.

name: ExcessNetCapitalAt1500Percent
description: Amount of net capital in excess of minimum required net capital, calculated under Aggregate Indebtedness Standard.

name: ExciseTaxesCollected
description: The excise taxes collected by a public utility and reported in revenues if the amount of excise taxes is equal to 1 percent or more of such total.

name: FairValueEquityLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAmount
description: Amount of transfers of financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity measured on a recurring basis out of level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into level 2.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense reversal of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-sale classification.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePrepaidAndOtherCurrentAssets
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to prepaid and other current assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseReceivablesNet
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to receivables.

name: GainLossOnDiscontinuationOfInterestRateCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurringNet
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when interest rate cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfOtherLoansAndLeases
description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of other loans and leases that were sold during the reporting period; excludes gains (losses) on sales of consumer and mortgage loans. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sales. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertiesBeforeApplicableIncomeTaxes
description: This element represents the amount of gain (loss) on sale of properties during the reporting period gross of the applicable income taxes realized.

name: HedgingLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Fair value of liability arising from a financial instrument or contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), expected to be settled after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ImpairmentLossesRelatedToRealEstatePartnerships
description: Impairment losses measured as the amount by which the carrying amount of the business or real estate partnerships exceeds the fair value of the business or partnership.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquityEmployeeStockOptions
description: The tax effects of employee stock option transactions that are recognized differently for financial reporting and tax purposes, occurring during the period and charged or credited directly to shareholders' equity.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerDealerRelatedReceivablesPayablesNet
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables or payables that result from buying and selling securities for the firm's own account or from acting as an agent or intermediary in the sale of securities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLeaseAcquisitionCosts
description: The increase (decrease) in the balance of capitalized lease acquisition costs during the period. The cost usually covers a variety of administrative costs, such as the cost of obtaining a credit report, verifying insurance coverage, lease commission charges, checking the accuracy and completeness of the lease documentation, and entering the lease in data processing and accounting systems.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLifeInsuranceLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in life insurance liability balances during the period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInLoansToFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans to another FHLBank.

name: IndefiniteLivedFranchiseRights
description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through a franchise arrangement having an indefinite period of benefit.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesMoneyMarket
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOtherUSGovernment
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on U.S. Treasury securities and other U.S. government securities.

name: InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistributionPerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of capital distribution in excess of tax basis earnings.

name: InvestmentOwnedBalanceOtherMeasure
description: Quantity of the investment. Indicate the measure in the unit of measure. This is commonly used for investments other than securities. For example, if the investment is gold, the balance would be the number of ounces and the unit of measure would indicate "ounces".

name: LeasingCommissionsExpense
description: Amount of commissions expense incurred because the lessor of real estate obtained a lessee for a rental property through a real estate agent.

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsGuaranteedBenefitLiabilityNet
description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, net of reinsurance recoverables, as of the balance sheet date.

name: LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness1
description: Amount of decrease in line of credit facility from forgiveness by the holder of the line of credit.

name: LongtermCommercialPaperCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

name: LossContingencyPatentsFoundNotInfringedNumber
description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity was found not to have infringed.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactions
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinOneYear
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinTwoYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantPlanContribution
description: Amount of contribution received by multiemployer pension plan from all employers participating in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantEmployeesCoveredByCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllParticipantsPercentage
description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: NetInvestmentHedgeDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all derivative assets designated as hedges of net investment in foreign operations.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NoninterestExpensePrintingAndFulfillment
description: Amounts expended for printing of marketing and compliance communications and fulfillment services.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansPlanAmendmentsTaxEffect
description: Tax effect of plan amendments that occurred that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForWritedownOfSecuritiesTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

name: OtherInvestmentNotReadilyMarketableFairValue
description: Value of the other investment not readily marketable determined by management based upon fair value methods, including pricing of similar securities and valuation techniques, that was used to record the investment for financial reporting purposes.

name: OtherOilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethod
description: Amount of oil and gas properties accounted for using the successful effort method, classified as other.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsValue
description: The amount of capital contributed by other unit holders.

name: ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGrossInsuranceInForce
description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherReceivables
description: Amount of cash outflow from the purchase of receivables classified as other.

name: PaymentsToAcquirePartnersInterestInRealEstatePartnershipNetOfCashAcquired
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of ownership in a partnership, the purpose of which is to construct, sell, hold or invest in real estate.

name: PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans
description: The initial funding or additional funding of loans receivable to policy holders principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedOtherAssetsPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedRealEstatePledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of real estate which is owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that is reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge it.

name: PostconfirmationReceivablesNet
description: Amount of receivables, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: Aggregate issuance value of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: PreferredUnitsAuthorized
description: The number of preferred units authorized to be issued.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTranslationReclassificationAdjustmentRealizedUponSaleOrLiquidationTax
description: #N/A

name: PreferredUnitsOfferingCosts
description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the preferred partners.

name: PriceRiskDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets on the balance sheet.

name: PriceRiskDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities on the balance sheet.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFinancingActivities
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from cash and cash items that are not available for withdrawal or usage.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans (other than mortgage loans) that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedNet
description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedRateIncreaseDecreaseAmendedAmount
description: Amount of public utility's amended requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCommonFairValue
description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableAllowanceForCreditLossRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from recovery.

name: RestrictedStockAwardForfeituresDividends
description: The value of dividends forfeited related to restricted stock awards forfeited.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansCurtailmentTaxEffect
description: #N/A

name: ResultsOfOperationsRevenueOther
description: Other revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepreciation
description: The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of securities borrowed from other entities.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForWriteDownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForWritedownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentForWritedownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesLoanedOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, offset against a right to receive collateral.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of securities received as collateral against securities purchased under agreement to resell.

name: ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAtFairValueAssumptionsUsedToEstimateFairValueExpectedCreditLosses
description: Percentage of contractually collectible principal associated with a financial asset expected not to be collected due to default by the borrower.

name: TerminationLoans
description: Definite liabilities to third parties under a termination loan agreement, whether or not guaranteed in whole or in part by the government.

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesGreaterThanFiveYears
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than five years.

name: TransfersOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsSaleInitialFairValueOfAssetsObtainedAsProceeds
description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for assets received on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

name: WorkersCompensationDiscountAmount
description: Current year monetary amount of the change in worker's compensation reserve liability resulting from the discount applied to reduce the reserve to present value.

name: AccountsReceivablePurchase
description: Amount of increase from purchase of accounts receivable.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesIncreaseDecreaseForAcquisitionsAndDivestitures
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the obligation for environmental loss contingencies from business acquisitions (divestitures).

name: AccruedExchangeFeeRebateCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for rebates of an exchange fee some mutual funds impose on shareholders if they exchange (transfer) to another fund within the same fund group. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeFederalHomeLoanBankAssessments
description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, before Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners). Includes, but is not limited to, foreign currency translation, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gain (loss) on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss related to factors other than credit loss on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, and increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

name: AssetBackedSecuritiesAtCarryingValue
description: Investments in notes or bonds that are collateralized by a specific group of underlying assets owned by the issuer of the notes or bonds which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesRestricted
description: The carrying amount of securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading which serve as security for borrowings or other arrangements.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountPaidToSettleClaims
description: Amount paid to settle bankruptcy claim.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsLiabilitiesRecognized
description: The amount of liabilities recognized recorded in a transaction with the acquiree for each transaction that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsExecutoryCosts
description: Amounts to be paid by lessee to lessor for maintenance, insurance, and tax expenses related to the leased asset.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassPropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation on leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesInitialDirectCosts
description: Remaining unamortized costs as of the balance sheet date that were essential to acquiring the lease, and that would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred negotiating, processing, and closing the lease agreement.

name: CarryingValueOfSecuritiesSoldUnderRepurchaseAgreementsAndDepositsReceivedForSecuritiesLoaned
description: Carrying value of securities sold under agreements to repurchase and deposits received for securities loaned.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetGainLossRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansNetTransitionAssetObligationRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostTax
description: #N/A

name: CashAvailableForDistributions
description: Amount of cash eligible for distribution to members or limited partners of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP), subject to reserves to be maintained as defined in operating or partnership agreement, or in a credit facility agreement.

name: CashIncludingDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Includes cash within disposal group or discontinued operation.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: #N/A

name: CashSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgingInstruments1
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments which were recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLiabilityNetAdjustmentBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLiabilityNetAdjustmentNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLiabilityNetAdjustmentTax
description: #N/A

name: CommunicationsInformationTechnologyAndOccupancy
description: The aggregate amount of communications, data processing and occupancy expenses.

name: ComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfFederalHomeLoanBankAssessmentsAttributableToParent
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources attributable to the reporting entity. Includes changes in equity except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Excludes transactions directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForHeldToMaturityTransferredToAvailableForSaleSecuritiesNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableDueOneYearOrLess
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForSaleOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForWriteDownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForWriteDownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentForWriteDownOfSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A
