name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentOnDerivativesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationAdjustmentOnSecuritiesIncludedInNetIncomeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlanNetTransitionAssetObligationRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlanNetTransitionAssetObligationRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlansNetGainLossRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostBeforeTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlansNetGainLossRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlansNetGainLossRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostTax
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassificationOfDefinedBenefitPlantNetTransitionAssetObligationRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCostTax
description: #N/A

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

name: ContributionsInAidOfConstruction
description: Developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities will provide the entity with cash, or in some cases property, to extend its services to their properties. Nonrefundable contributions are recorded as contributions in aid of construction ("CIAC").

name: ConvertibleSubordinatedDebtCurrent
description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment upon liquidation of the entity's assets.

name: CustomerAdvancesAndDepositsCurrent
description: The current portion of aggregate prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future, as well as the current portion of money or property received from customers that are to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

name: CustomerFunds
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts received from and refundable to customers unless used by them to obtain goods and services from the entity.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSalePurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationDiscountPremium
description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfterFiveThroughTenYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingLettersOfCreditOutstanding
description: Amount of letters of credit outstanding under debtor-in-possession financing arrangement.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureProfitsAdditions
description: Amount of addition in deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredSalesInducementCostUnrealizedGainLossOnInvestment
description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred sales inducement cost.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetTransitionAssetsObligationsAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

name: DepositsForeign
description: The aggregate of all foreign interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing deposit liabilities.

name: DerivativeForwardPrice
description: The forward price on the price risk forward or futures contract, such as a gas futures contract.

name: DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposalBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTaxPerBasicShare
description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations.

name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTaxPerDilutedShare
description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations.

name: DividendPaymentsRestrictionsScheduleStatutoryCapitalAndSurplus1
description: Amount of statutory capital and surplus computed using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practice.

name: OtherConstructionCosts
description: #N/A

name: OtherConstructionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: DueToEmployeesCurrent
description: Amounts due to employees, not to include stockholders or officers. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depreciation and amortization.

name: OtherCostOfServices
description: #N/A

name: OtherDeductionsAndCharges
description: #N/A

name: OtherDeductionsOrAllowableCredits
description: #N/A

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryGasStoredUnderground
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet seasonal and peak load demands, and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a current asset because it is expected to be used within twelve months or in the normal operating cycle.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualCurrent
description: Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year of the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssetsAggregateAmountInNonaccrualStatusAggregatedDifference
description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are in nonaccrual status.

name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: OtherDeferredCostAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAfterRollingYearFive
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivatives designated as foreign currency fair value hedging instruments.

name: ForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities designated as foreign currency fair value hedging instruments.

name: ForeignFinancialInstitutionsActualDeposits
description: The amount of deposits held by branches of foreign institutions.

name: OtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAssetsAtFairValue
description: #N/A

name: FormerGainContingencyRecognizedInCurrentPeriod
description: Amount of gain recognized in the period that had been disclosed in prior periods as a contingent gain.

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquityIndexedShares
description: The number of issuer's shares to which the forward contract is indexed.

name: OtherDirectCostsOfHotels
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to total other noncurrent assets.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinOneYear
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherExpenseCapitalizationToDeferredAcquisitionCostDAC
description: #N/A

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinTwoYears
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherExpenseOfInsuranceEntities
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredSecurityUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: OtherExtraordinaryGainLoss
description: #N/A

name: OtherFinancialServicesCosts
description: #N/A

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTradingSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Includes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: IncentiveDistributionDistributionPerUnit
description: Per-share or per-unit amount of incentive dividend declared and paid to managing member or general partner.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInMarketableSecuritiesRestricted
description: The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRawMaterialsPackagingMaterialsAndSuppliesInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of raw materials, packaging materials and supplies held in inventory.

name: OtherHotelOperatingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToWrittenPutOptions
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of outstanding written put options using the reverse treasury stock method.

name: InsuranceAgencyManagementFee
description: Fees earned during the period for providing management services.

name: InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesForeign
description: Amount of foreign interest-bearing deposits held by the entity.

name: OtherIncreaseDecreaseInProvisionForRestructuring
description: #N/A

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositOtherTimeDeposit
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities classified as other. Excludes certificates of deposit.

name: InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits
description: Interest expense incurred on other deposits in domestic offices.

name: InterestExpenseTimeDepositsLessThan100000
description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, less than $100,000 in domestic offices.

name: InterestPortionOfMinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactions
description: Amount necessary to reduce minimum lease payments to present value for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

name: InventoryNoncurrentFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of inventory expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioIncludingVoluntaryFeeWaiver
description: Percentage, after deduction of voluntary fee waiver, of expense to average net assets.

name: InvestmentOwnedRestrictedCost
description: The cost of the restricted investment.

name: LandingFeesAndOtherRentals
description: Direct costs incurred at airports in which the entity conducts flight operations. The costs primarily consist of fees paid to the airport authority for takeoff and landing, gate space and facilities, allocations of common space such as security and other terminal costs and fuel storage facilities.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGrossPaymentForClaims
description: Amount of cash outflow to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNetIncurredLoss1
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNetPaymentForClaims
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountCovered
description: Aggregate gross carrying amount of loans and leases receivable covered by loss sharing agreements.

name: MediumtermNotesNoncurrent
description: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

name: NetInvestmentHedgeDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all derivative liabilities designated as hedges of net investment in foreign operations.

name: NuclearFuelNetOfAmortization
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet of nuclear fuel held as property plant and equipment. This amount is net of amortization based on the energy produced over the life of the fuel.

name: OpenOptionContractsWrittenAtFairValue
description: The fair value of the open option contracts written for the investment.

name: OtherCommitmentDueInFourthAndFifthYear
description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth and fifth fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForInvestmentTransferredFromAvailableForSaleToEquityMethodAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLossesRecognizedInEarningsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (loss).

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in earnings.

name: PaymentsForReinsurance
description: Cash payments made for reinsurance during the current period.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsCertificatesOfDeposit
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic certificates of deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledgedForFederalHomeLoanBankAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the FHLB debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PolicyLoansReceivable
description: Carrying amount of loans made to policyholders against the cash surrender value (CSV) or other policyholder funds, and secured by the CSV, policyholder funds or the death benefit provided by the insurance contracts.

name: PostconfirmationLongTermDebt
description: Total long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPrepaidAndOtherCurrentAssets
description: Amount of prepaid and other current assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsCurrent
description: Amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationOtherNoncurrentObligations
description: Total other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansToPurchaseCommonStock
description: Cash inflow from repayment of loans for purchasing common stock.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansReceivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and collection of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

name: OtherMarketableSecuritiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: OtherMarketableSecuritiesNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: OtherMarketableSecuritiesRestrictedCurrent
description: #N/A

name: OtherMaterialNoncashItems
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityAccrualPeriodExpense
description: The amount of loss reported during the period pertaining to product liability.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesGross
description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.

name: ReportingUnitZeroOrNegativeCarryingAmountAmountOfAllocatedGoodwill
description: Amount of goodwill allocated to reporting unit with zero or negative amount of net assets.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

name: SecuritiesFailedToDeliver
description: Amount receivable as the result of a fail-to-deliver. A fail-to-deliver is a securities sale to another broker-dealer that has not been delivered to buying broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

name: OtherNoncurrentLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesFailedToReceive
description: Amount payable as the result of fail-to-receive. A fail-to-receive is a securities purchase from another broker-dealer not received from the selling broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, offset against an obligation to return collateral.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf10PercentAdverseChangeInOtherAssumption
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the specified assumption on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNonOptionEquityInstrumentsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Increase (decrease) in the number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements.

name: SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanCommittedToBeReleased
description: Number of committed-to-be-released shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Committed-to-be-released shares are shares that will be released in the future and will be allocated to employees for services rendered in an accounting period. These shares are legally released from suspense and from serving as collateral for ESOP debt as a result of payment of debt service.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesPermittedPracticeAmount
description: Amount of each item listed to reconcile the differences as of the balance sheet date resulting from applying state permitted statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices permitted by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesRetainedEarningsNotAvailableForDividends
description: The amount of retained earnings as of the balance sheet date that cannot be distributed to stockholders pursuant to statutory rules and regulations.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsSalaryContinuation
description: Liability for agreement to continue an employee's salary after termination of employment (but before retirement) including death, disability, or other event. For example, a company may agree to continue a disabled employee's salary for six months.

name: TemporaryEquityAccretionOfInterest
description: Value of accretion of temporary equity during the period due to unpaid interest.

name: TemporaryEquityInterestInSubsidiaryEarnings
description: Subsidiary earnings portion attributable to temporary equity.

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityExpense
description: The amount of expense between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityIncomeOrLossBeforeTax
description: Description of the amount of pre-tax income (loss) derived by the reporting entity from the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: WeightedAverageCostInventoryAmount
description: The amount of weighted average cost inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is valued using different valuation methods.

name: WorkersCompensationDiscountPercent
description: Percent discount applied to worker's compensation reserve liability to reduce the reserve to present value.

name: AcquisitionCostRatio
description: Ratio of non-life acquisition costs to non-life net premiums earned.

name: AmountOfDeferredCostsRelatedToLongTermContracts
description: Amount of deferred costs for long-term contracts and programs. Includes, but is not limited to, initial tooling costs and deferred production costs.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedLossesExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of loss realized on the sale of debt or equity securities classified as available-for-sale. Excludes other than temporary impairments (OTTI).

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesSoldAtPar
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with interest rate reset through auction process, sold at par value.

name: BankruptcyClaimsNumberClaimsFiled
description: The aggregate number of claims filed with the bankruptcy court.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementDirectFinancingLeaseRevenue
description: Revenue realized in the period on direct financing leases.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTypeLeasesNoncurrent
description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalizedCostsSupportEquipmentAndFacilities
description: Capitalized costs incurred for support equipment and facilities used in oil and gas producing activities (such as seismic equipment, drilling equipment, construction and grading equipment, vehicles, repair shops, warehouses, supply points, camps, and division, district, or field offices).

name: CashPassThroughReserveFederalHomeLoanBank
description: Amount of pass-through reserves deposited with Federal Reserve Banks from member institutions of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: ClosedPortfolioAndBeneficialInterestLastOfLayerAmortizedCost
description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset and beneficial interest secured by prepayable financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

name: ConstructionLoanNoncurrent
description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

name: ContractReceivableDueOneToTwoYears
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractWithCustomerRefundLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer, classified as noncurrent.

name: ContractsInForceSubjectToParticipationThroughReinsurancePercentage
description: Ratio of insurance contracts that are subject to reinsurance participation to all contracts in force.

name: ConversionGainsAndLossesOnForeignInvestments
description: Represents gains or losses resulting from transactions conducted in foreign currencies.

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities. Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsAdjustment
description: The amount of any adjustment recognized to the balance of unamortized issuance costs associated with a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, due, for example, to default by the share borrower.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalculatingNetPeriodicBenefitCostChangeDueToSubsequentInterimMeasurementWeightedAverageExpectedLongTermRateOfReturnOnPlanAssets
description: Weighted average rate of return on plan assets, used to determine net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan, in subsequent interim measurement.

name: DerivativeAverageCapInterestRate
description: Average cap rate on a group of interest rate derivatives, such as interest rate caps or collars. If market rates exceed the cap rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

name: OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanNoncurrentLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: DerivativesUsedInNetInvestmentHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToEarningsNetOfTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification from other comprehensive income (loss) to earnings from the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

name: OtherPremiumRevenueNet
description: #N/A

name: DerivativesUsedInNetInvestmentHedgeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from transactions on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPensionPlanBenefitObligationNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as defined benefit plan benefit obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DueFromCustomerAcceptances
description: Amounts receivable from customers on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by the institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions) that are outstanding on the reporting date.

name: DueFromJointVenturesNoncurrent
description: Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquivalentsDiscontinuedOperations
description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in discontinuing operations held in foreign currencies.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingenciesDomestic
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in domestic income tax contingency.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxSettlementsDomestic
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to domestic income tax settlement.

name: EffectsOfUnrealizedHoldingGainLossOnPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits1
description: Amount of adjustment to reflect the effect that would have been recognized had the unrealized holding gain (loss) actually been realized on the present value of future insurance profits being amortized using the gross profit method and the present value of future profits recognized as a result of a purchase of an insurance entity holding long-duration contracts.

name: ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossPerShareNetOfTax
description: Per share impact of the gain (loss) on the extinguishment of debt, net of applicable taxes.

name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFixedRateUnderOneYear
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankConsolidatedObligationsDiscountNotes
description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of discount notes issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankLeverageCapitalActual
description: Amount of leveraged capital of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankLeverageRatioActual1
description: Leverage ratio of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), calculated per regulations of the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquitySettlementAlternativesCashAtFairValue
description: Amount that would be paid upon settlement of forward contract indexed to equity.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accrued liabilities.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAccumulatedDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accumulated depreciation and amortization.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other current liabilities.

name: GainContingencyPatentsFoundInfringedUponNumber
description: Number of entity's patents that another entity was found to have infringed.

name: OtherRealEstateRevenue
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) during the reporting period due to ineffectiveness in foreign currency cash flow hedges. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossRecognizedOnAssetsTransferredToSeparateAccount
description: Amount of net gains or losses recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

name: GainsLossesOnRecourseDebt
description: Amount represents the difference between the cash acquisition price of the debt and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its extinguishment.

name: GasAndOilAreaUndevelopedNet
description: Leased area representing summation of fractional ownership working interest to whole on which oil and gas wells have not been drilled or completed that would permit production of economic quantities of oil and gas. Excludes area of undrilled acreage held by production under terms of lease.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInClientFundsHeld
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the carrying amount of client funds held and maintained in custodial and separate accounts, and which are owned by clients or contract holders.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidRoyalties
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for royalties that provide economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInTradingLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of trading liabilities from the reporting entity's trading activities. This include liabilities resulting from sales of assets that the reporting entity does not own and revaluation losses.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialAndResidentialRealEstate
description: Interest and fee income from commercial and residential real estate loans.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialRealEstate
description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by commercial properties. Examples of properties commonly securing commercial real estate loans may include office buildings, apartment buildings, shopping centers, industrial property, and hotels.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesChecking
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic checking deposit liabilities.

name: InterestExpenseMediumTermNotes
description: Interest expense on medium-Term notes.

name: InterestIncomeAndFeesBankersAcceptancesCertificatesOfDepositAndCommercialPaper
description: Interest and fee income derived from banker's acceptances, certificates of deposit and commercial paper.

name: OtherSalesRevenueNet
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentCompanyFinancialCommitmentToInvesteeFutureAmount
description: Amount of financial support to be provided in future by investment company to investee.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesDividendsOrInterest
description: Amount of dividends or interest. Give totals for each group. If operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates (1) within divisions and (2) by type of activities.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValue
description: Face value (death benefits) of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCPreferredUnitIssued
description: Number of preferred units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearTwoAndThree
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the second and third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueOfConsiderationGiven
description: #N/A

name: LongTermPurchaseCommitmentMinimumVolumeRequired
description: Volume that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

name: OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueOfConsiderationReceived
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityNet
description: Present value of the estimated aggregate accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product(s) or process(es) as of the balance sheet date (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

name: MediumtermNotesCurrent
description: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the current portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

name: MineralPropertiesAccumulatedDepletion
description: The accumulated decrease in the carrying value of the mineral properties as a result of mine or mineral production.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherDeductions
description: Amount of reduction in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

name: OtherTaxCarryforwardDeferredTaxAsset
description: #N/A

name: OtherTaxCarryforwardGrossAmount
description: #N/A

name: OtherTaxCarryforwardValuationAllowance
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantEmployerContributionUnderCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllParticipatingEmployerContributionsPercentage
description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total contribution from all participating employers in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentNetOfFederalHomeLoanBankAssessments
description: Amount of profit (loss) after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments attributable to the parent.

name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingGeneralPartnershipUnitNetOfTax
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

name: NetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTypeLeases
description: The net amount due as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: NetSharesReclassifiedToMandatorilyRedeemableCapitalStockValue
description: Value of net shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock.

name: NonmonetaryTransactionGainLossRecognizedOnTransfer
description: Disclosure of the difference in values (gain (loss)) between the nonmonetary assets or liabilities exchanged with another entity inclusive of boot (small monetary consideration).

name: NonmonetaryTransactionGrossOperatingRevenueRecognized
description: The amount of gross operating revenue recognized in a nonmonetary transaction.

name: NumberOfAircraftOperated
description: Number of aircraft operated by the carrier.

name: NumberOfCreditRiskDerivativesHeld
description: Number of credit risk derivative instruments held.

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementInitialDirectCosts
description: Amount of incremental cost of lease that would not have been incurred if lease had not been obtained.

name: OperatingLeasesOfLesseeContingentRentalsBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessee's operating lease.

name: OriginationOfLoansToEmployeeStockOwnershipPlans
description: The cash outflow to finance the entity's defined contribution plan to acquire shares of the entity. The plan initially holds the shares in a suspense account, which is collateral for the loan. As the plan makes payment on the debt, the shares are released from the suspense account and become available to be allocated to participant accounts.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsBeforeTaxParent
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsTaxParent
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseBeforeAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount, before adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIPensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitPlansForNetTransitionAssetObligationTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

name: OtherNonrecurringGain
description: Amount of gain that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseNoncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for other postretirement benefits. Excludes pension benefits.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLimitedPartnership
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from limited partnership investments held by the entity for investment purposes.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromRemovalCosts
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the costs of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

name: PaymentsToAcquireResidentialRealEstate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of residential property intended to generate income for the owner.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRoyaltyInterestsInMiningProperties
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of royalty interests in mining properties is the amount of cash the mineral producer pays the owner of the mine or mineral resource.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsChecking
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic checking demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsTimeDeposits
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic time deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedFinanceReceivablesPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of finance receivables which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position.

name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredHealthCare
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for health insurance contracts.

name: PostconfirmationLiabilities
description: Total liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationLiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise
description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherNoncurrentObligations
description: Total other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfLongTermDebt
description: Amount of current maturities of long-term debt at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of other noncurrent assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsRecoveries
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable from recovery.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfPolicyLoans
description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of policy loans receivable.

name: ProceedsFromDepositsFromCustomers
description: Cash received from customers for deposits on goods or services during the period; excludes deposits with other institutions and time deposits, which pertain to financial services entities.

name: ProceedsFromSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: The cash inflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

name: PublicUtilitiesApprovedDebtCapitalStructurePercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's approved debt to capital, including debt and equity.

name: PublicUtilitiesInterimRateIncreaseDecreaseAmount
description: Amount of public utility's interim rate increase (decrease) allowed while waiting final decision of regulatory agency.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfAcquisitionAdjustments1
description: Amount of acquisition adjustments included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

name: RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale by the consolidated entity.

name: RegistrationPaymentArrangementMaximumPotentialConsideration
description: Describes the maximum potential amount of consideration, undiscounted, that could be transferred under the registration payment arrangement.

name: RegulatedEntityOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Total of noncurrent other assets held by public utility entities.

name: ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis
description: The sum for all reinsurance arrangements of the known and estimated amount recoverable as of the balance sheet date from a given reinsurer for claims paid or incurred by the ceding insurer and associated claims settlement expenses for each reinsurance arrangement (or, the sum of all cases determined individually, probably applying different assumptions to each arrangement).

name: RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesCurrent
description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

name: ReorganizationValuePresentValueOfDiscountedCashFlowsOfEmergingEntity
description: Amount of reorganization value related to present value of discounted cash flows of the emerging entity. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

name: RepaymentsOfSubordinatedShortTermDebt
description: The cash outflow for an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

name: ReplacementReserveEscrow
description: This element represents those amounts set aside for the repair and replacement of real or personal property in the foreseen future. Such amount may be funded from sales revenue (for example; timeshare sales) or operating revenues; in a lump sum or installments (such as monthly); as per internal policy (for example: hotel operators), as required by contractual agreement (for example: sales contract); or by the terms of debt agreements.

name: SecuredBorrowingsGrossDifferenceAmount
description: Amount of secured borrowings in excess of (less than) the liability for repurchase agreements and securities lending transactions, before offset, included in offsetting disclosures.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral, offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement.

name: ServicingAssetAtFairValueChangesInFairValueResultingFromChangesInValuationInputs
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs used to calculate the fair value of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesAggregateDiscount
description: Amount of cumulative discount related to the time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesPrescribedPracticeAmount
description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of each item listed to reconcile the differences resulting from applying state prescribed statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices prescribed by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

name: OtherUnrecordedAmounts
description: #N/A

name: OtherUtilityCosts
description: #N/A

name: OwnedPropertyManagementCosts
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxLiabilityProvisionalIncomeTaxBenefit
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax benefit for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeNetOfTaxPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cumulative translation adjustment from gain (loss), after tax, on foreign currency derivatives, that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

name: TreasuryStockPreferredShares
description: Number of previously issued preferred shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

name: UnderwritingExpenseRatio
description: Ratio of non-life acquisition expenses and certain non-life general and administrative expenses, to non-life net premiums earned.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpensePurchasedPowerUnderLongTermContracts
description: Amount of operating expense for purchased power procured under arrangements extending beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, by regulated operation.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositChecking
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic checking deposit liabilities.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositDemand
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic demand deposit liabilities.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositNoticeOfWithdrawal
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities.

name: ParkingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesDiscount
description: Amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the undiscounted amount of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies to the present value.

name: AccruedCappingClosurePostClosureAndEnvironmentalCostsNoncurrent
description: The estimated amount of costs required as of the balance sheet date to comply with regulatory requirements pertaining to the retirement of a waste management facility, which will be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AccruedReclamationCostsCurrent
description: Current portion of reclamation reserve to restore a mining or drilling site to the condition agreed upon within the mining or drilling contract.

name: AccruedUtilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water.

name: AirlineRelatedInventoryNet
description: Net carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers and freight.

name: AllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionInvestingActivities
description: Cash inflow due to change during the period in the allowance for other funds used during construction classified as an investing activity.

name: AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesLoansSold
description: Amount of reduction of allowance reserve for credit loss arising from sale of loan and lease portfolios.

name: BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBufferTierOneRiskBasedCapitalActual
description: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUndistributedEarnings
description: #N/A

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfClaimsSettled
description: Amount of bankruptcy claim settled.

name: BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationArrangementsChangeInTheRangeOfOutcomesContingentConsiderationLiabilityValueLow
description: This element represents the amount of any change recognized during the period in the low-end of the estimated range of outcomes (undiscounted) of a liability assumed in a business combination arising from an item of contingent consideration.

name: CapitalUnitsNetAmount
description: Net amount applicable to investors of capital units or shares.

name: CashSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActRegulation
description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCashFlowsExpectedToBeCollectedAtAcquisition
description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesCarryingAmountNet
description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and other-than-temporary impairments), for loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAndDebtSecuritiesAcquiredInTransferAllowanceForCreditLossesDueToSubsequentImpairment
description: For loans and debt securities, 1) for which at acquisition it was probable that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable, and 2) for which it is further probable that the investor will not be able to collect all cash flows expected at acquisition (plus any additional cash flows expected due to changes in estimate after acquisition), the allowance for credit losses recorded to reflect the impairment since acquisition.

name: ClosedBlockLiabilities
description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets backing them (known as a closed block), the total of future policy benefits, policyholder account balance, policyholder dividend obligation and any other closed block liabilities.

name: ClosedBlockLiabilitiesFuturePolicyBenefitsAndPolicyholderAccountBalances
description: The liability as of the balance sheet date for future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and expenses, less the present value of future net premiums payable under the insurance contracts and the policy cash accumulations, for the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as a closed block.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsResultsBeforeIncomeTaxes
description: The revenues less expenses from operations of the closed block during the period, before income taxes allocated thereto.

name: ContractReceivableDueThreeToFourYears
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractReceivableDueTwoToThreeYears
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueOneYearOrLess
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetSale
description: Amount of decrease from sale of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time and other income.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountRestatementAdjustment
description: #N/A

name: CostsInExcessOfBillingsOnUncompletedContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.

name: CustomerSecuritiesForWhichEntityHasRightToSellOrRepledgeFairValueOfSecuritiesSoldOrRepledged
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of customer securities accepted as collateral by the entity that it has sold or re-pledged to counterparties as collateral.

name: DebtInstrumentUnamortizedPremiumNoncurrent
description: Amount of debt premium to be amortized after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsDischargeOfClaimsAndLiabilities
description: Amount of reorganization items related to discharge of claims and liabilities upon emergence from bankruptcy.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnShareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsAmortizationExpense1
description: Amount of expense for amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsDisposition
description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition costs disposed or classified as held-for-sale.

name: DeferredSalesCommission
description: Carrying amount of advanced commission payments.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetCurrent
description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, netted by jurisdiction and classified as current.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesParentsBasisInDiscontinuedOperation
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from the entity's basis in a discontinued operation.

name: DevelopmentCostsCumulative
description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to obtain access to proved reserves and to provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering and storing the oil and gas.

name: DirectCommunicationsAndUtilitiesCosts
description: The aggregate costs of direct communications and utilities incurred during the reporting period.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseResidualValueOfLeasedAsset
description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee under direct financing lease. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

name: DividendsCommonStockPaidinkind
description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).

name: EnergyMarketingContractsAssetsCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from energy trading activities that involves the purchase and sale of energy under forward contracts at fixed and variable prices and the buying and selling of financial energy contracts that include exchange futures and options and over the counter options and swaps, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualPayments
description: Amount of decrease in the extended product warranty accrual from payments made in cash or in kind to satisfy claims under the terms of the extended product warranty. Excludes standard product warranties.

name: FairValueEquityLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAmount
description: Amount of transfers of financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity measured on a recurring basis out of level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into level 1.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextPutOrConvertDateInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesFloatingRate
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFloatingRate
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advances which have floating interest rates.

name: PartnersCapitalDeferredCompensation
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalDeferredCompensationOnRestrictedUnit
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FinancialInstrumentSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionParValuePerShare
description: Par value per share of mandatory redeemable financial instrument classified as liability.

name: PartnersCapitalOtherDeferredCompensation
description: #N/A

name: PassengerRevenue
description: #N/A

name: PassengerRevenueMainline
description: #N/A

name: PassengerRevenueRegional
description: #N/A

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndNotPledgedAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities. Excludes financial instruments and other positions owned and pledged as collateral to counterparties.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedCorporateEquitiesAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in corporate stocks (common and preferred), stock options, warrants and any other financial instrument which represents, or provides the ability to obtain, ownership rights in a corporation. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionRedeemableInYearThree
description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCurrentMaturitiesOfLongTermDebt
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current maturities of long-term debt.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsCurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current restricted cash and cash equivalents.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinThreeYears
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GasPurchasePayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for purchases of natural gas. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: GuaranteeObligationsLiquidationProceeds
description: Indicates, if estimable, the approximate extent to which the proceeds from liquidation of any assets held either as collateral or by third parties would be expected to cover the maximum potential amount of future payments under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

name: GuarantyAssets
description: The carrying amount of the contractual right to receive fees, as compensation in exchange for providing a guarantee to a third party, over life of the guarantee.

name: HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerCumulativeIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, in last-of-layer hedging relationship.

name: HedgingAssetsCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseCharitableContributions
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible charitable contributions expense.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableFromSecuritization
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity by counterparties in securitized loan transactions.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash that is pledged as security when borrowing securities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOfficersAndStockholdersCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to reporting entity's executives and owners.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherFinancialInstrumentsUsedInOperatingActivities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value of other financial instruments used in operating activities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherPolicyholderFunds
description: The change in other policyholder funds recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCashForOperatingActivities
description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities. This may include cash restricted for regulatory purposes.

name: IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToAcceleratedShareRepurchaseAgreements
description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of accelerated share repurchase agreements. An accelerated share repurchase program is a combination of transactions that permits an entity to purchase a targeted number of shares immediately with the final purchase price of those shares determined by an average market price over a fixed period of time.

name: IndefiniteLivedContractualRights
description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date of rights with an indefinite period of benefit that arose from a contractual arrangement with a third party (not including franchise rights and license agreements).

name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsPurchaseAccountingAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit, from purchase accounting adjustments.

name: InterestExpenseCustomerDeposits
description: The interest expense recognized during the period on customer deposits or security deposits held in interest bearing accounts.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilities
description: Aggregate amount of all interest expense on domestic deposit liabilities.

name: InterestIncomeOtherDomesticDeposits
description: Amount of interest earned on US domestic deposits classified as other. Excludes money market accounts.

name: InterestbearingDomesticDepositOther
description: Amount of other interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities.

name: InventoryHomesUnderConstruction
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized construction costs of homes for future sale.

name: PaymentsForExploitationLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributionToShareholdersPerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of distribution to shareholders. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

name: InvestmentCompanyDividendDistribution
description: Amount of dividend distribution from ordinary income and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

name: InvestmentCompanyShareholderServiceFeeExpense
description: Amount of expense for shareholder services. Includes, but is not limited to, fee and expense for transfer and dividend disbursing agent.

name: JuniorSubordinatedLongTermNotes
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments, excluding current portion.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesNet
