description: The net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as leveraged leases including deferred taxes.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromisePensionAndOtherPostretirementObligations
description: Amount classified as pension and other postretirement obligations included in liability subject to compromise.

name: LifePremiumsAsPercentageOfGrossPremiums
description: Ratio with total life insurance premiums in numerator and total GAAP premiums in the denominator.

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowDeductionsFromHeldForSale
description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of deductions to loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeDiscountRate
description: Percentage discount rate used to calculate present value of an expected stream of future payments, which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

name: MalpracticeInsuranceAnnualCoverageLimit
description: Annual coverage limit provided by the insurance arrangement for malpractice claims.

name: MalpracticeInsuranceMaximumCoveragePerIncident
description: Maximum coverage per malpractice claim provided by the insurance arrangement.

name: NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesForeign
description: Amount of foreign noninterest-bearing deposits held by the entity which may include demand deposits, checking, brokered and retail deposits.

name: NoninterestExpenseRelatedToPerformanceFees
description: Incentive fees which are compensation paid to a trading advisor or to any practitioner who achieves investment results above a specified contractual level.

name: ObligationWithJointAndSeveralLiabilityArrangementAmountOutstanding
description: Amount outstanding, before the effects of recovery, of obligation under the joint and several liability arrangement.

name: PaymentsForMergerRelatedCostsAndRestructuringCosts
description: #N/A

name: OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContractsDailyProduction
description: Amount of daily production of the applicable energy source.

name: OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContractsRemainingContractualVolume
description: Quantity of oil and gas subject to delivery commitment.

name: OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodAccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAmortizationAndImpairment
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherNonrecurringIncome
description: Amount of other income that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParentAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParentAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsReclassificationAdjustmentOfNoncreditPortionIncludedInNetIncomeAvailabeforsaleSecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss on a previously impaired investment in available-for-sale debt security.

name: PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of other noncurrent assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount of accrued liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsCurrent
description: Amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapitalNetOfDiscount
description: Aggregate par value plus amounts in excess of par or issuance value (in cases of no-par value stock) for nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding, net of discount on shares. Aggregate for preferred stock issued and outstanding.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAdditionsFromAcquisitions
description: Amount of addition for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: ProceedsAccountsReceivablePreviouslyWrittenOffRecovery
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of accounts receivable previously written off.

name: ProceedsFromMortgageDeposits
description: Cash inflow received in association with a commitment to issue a mortgage.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

name: ProductLiabilityAccrualComponentAmount
description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of a product liability contingency.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivatives
description: #N/A

name: ProductionBarrelsOfOilEquivalents1
description: Energy measure of oil and natural gas production reserves.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentVehicles
description: Period end book value of vehicles owned by the public utility.

name: RealEstateLiabilitiesAssociatedWithAssetsHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
description: For banks, amount of all liabilities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowancePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Total Increase or Decrease in the real estate owned valuation allowance for period.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPreferredFairValue
description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

name: RegulatorExpensesCostAssessedOnFederalHomeLoanBank
description: Amount of fees or assessments to fund the operations of the regulator of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesAllowance
description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

name: ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyExcessRetentionPercentage
description: Percentage of risk ceded to reinsurer in excess of risk undertaken originally by insurer that is not ceded to reinsurer.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedPartyNoncurrent
description: Amount of receivables to be collected from related parties net of obligations owed to related parties after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party including, but not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families and pension trusts.

name: SalvageAndSubrogationRecoveriesValue
description: The estimated amount as of the balance sheet date to be received by an insurer from the sale of property (usually damaged) on which the insurer has paid a total claim to the insured and has obtained title to the property and the right of an insurer to pursue any course of recovery of damages, in its name or in the name of the policyholder, against a third party who is liable for costs relating to an insured event that have been paid by the insurer. Estimated salvage and subrogation is generally deducted from the liability for unpaid claims.

name: SecuritiesLoanedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementToRepurchaseGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral and funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecurityOwnedNotReadilyMarketableFairValue
description: Value of the not readily marketable security or category which has been determined by management based upon fair value methods, including pricing of similar securities and valuation techniques and is included in the schedule of financial condition or the balance sheet.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf10PercentAdverseChangeInExpectedCreditLosses
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the expected credit losses, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf20PercentAdverseChangeInOtherAssumption
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the specified assumption on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionStockholdersEquity
description: The amount by which stockholders' equity was increased by the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsAmountCurrent
description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable within one year of the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

name: StockOptionDownRoundFeatureIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in equity for down round feature triggered for stock option classified as equity. Excludes stock option granted for share-based compensation.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount of time deposits maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsSalesFairValueOfDerecognizedAssets
description: Fair value of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction.

name: UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount of unrealized loss recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income pertaining to the decrease in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments to the extent that a cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsPledged
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of VIE.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesNoRecourse
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that do not have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary.

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOnOverdrawnDemandDeposit
description: Weighted average interest rate on overdrawn demand deposit.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentPastDue
description: Amount of accounts receivable past due, classified as noncurrent.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesComponentAmount
description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of an environmental loss contingency.

name: AdjustmentForLongTermIntercompanyTransactionsGrossOfTax
description: Current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, that is, settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Resulting from the entities to the transaction being consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements.

name: PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets
description: #N/A

name: AdvanceRoyaltiesCurrent
description: The amount paid to music publishers, record producers, songwriters, or other artists in advance of their earning royalties from record or music sales. Such an amount is based on contractual terms and is generally nonrefundable. This amount is expected to be consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AociDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleWithAllowanceForCreditLossCumulativeGainLossAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) with allowance for credit loss.

name: AssetAcquisitionPriceOfAcquisitionExpected
description: Purchase price of expected asset acquisition prior to consideration being transferred. Excludes business acquisition.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlock
description: The sum of cash, cash equivalents, investments and other assets allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockFixedMaturityAvailableForSaleAtFairValue
description: Fair value of investments in debt securities that are deemed to be available for sale that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block. Change in fair of such securities is a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockPolicyLoans
description: Carrying amount of loans to policy holders secured by benefits under insurance policies that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStockForEmployeeTaxWithholdingObligations
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationIndemnificationAssetsRangeOfOutcomesValueHigh
description: For indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the high-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the indemnification benefit which may be realized.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedRestructuringLiabilities
description: This item represents liabilities associated with restructuring or exit activities of the acquiree, existing at the acquisition date (present liabilities of the acquiree).

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsAssetsRecognized
description: The assets recognized for each amount of assets recorded in a transaction with the acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

name: CapitalLeasesContingentRentalPaymentsDue
description: Amount due based upon the occurrence of an event specified in the contractual terms.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransferorAndTransfereeBeneficialInterest
description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in payment of the transferor's beneficial interest related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsIncomeTaxes
description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit allocated to the operations of the closed block for the period.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsNetInvestmentIncome
description: Income for the period from the investments allocated to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts (known as a closed block), net of investment expenses, which are typically reported in a table of closed block operations.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsRealizedInvestmentGainsLosses
description: Gains and losses realized for the period from the investments allocated to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts (known as a closed block).

name: ClosedBlockOperationsRevenue
description: Total revenues from an insurance company's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block).

name: CommercialPaperNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesAdditionalInterestIssuedToParent
description: Represents a (noncash) issuance of additional equity interests to the parent by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAccumulatedAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsRealizedGains
description: For investments in debt and equity securities accounted for at cost, the excess of net sale proceeds over the carrying amount of investments disposed of during the period.

name: CostsInExcessOfBillingsOnUncompletedContractsOrProgramsExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings which is expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from investment in debt and equity securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income, and recognized from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInterestWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized by reversing interest income.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityRollingAfter10YearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing after tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityRollingAfterFiveThroughTenYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityRollingAfterOneThroughFiveYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityRollingWithinOneYearWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesTradingAndAvailableForSale
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsRevaluationOfAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount recognized from the revaluation of assets and liabilities.

name: DecommissioningLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of a decommissioning liability associated with a legal obligation that a firm incurs when it constructs or operates an asset that must eventually be withdrawn from active service. This may include operating assets such as nuclear power plants or shipping vessels.

name: DeferredCostsLeasingNetNoncurrent
description: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. The costs represented by this element are those costs not expected to be recognized in (amortized to) earnings within one year from the date of the statement of financial position or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredLeasingCommissions
description: Amount of unrecognized fee revenue received at the inception of a lease that is deferred and recognized over the life of the lease.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCapitalizedPatentCosts
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from patent costs.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditIncreaseDecreaseForPlanAmendment
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net periodic benefit cost from effect of change in substantive term of existing defined benefit plan or initiation of new defined benefit plan.

name: DepositsWholesale
description: The aggregate amount of all wholesale deposit accounts including certificates of deposits.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of derivative liability, security sold under agreement to repurchase, and security loaned, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative liability, security sold under agreement to repurchase, and security loaned.

name: DirectOperatingMaintenanceSuppliesCosts
description: Costs of maintenance supplies used that are directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposal
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

name: DueFromOtherRelatedPartiesNoncurrent
description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EffectOnFutureEarningsOffsetAmount
description: The amount that will be offset against future earnings by anticipated increases or decreases in other expenses or revenues.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDeferredShares
description: Represents the carrying amount of shares held by the ESOP as of the balance sheet date in which no ESOP participant has a vested interest and no lender has a claim.

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsAssetsPreviouslyDisposedLiabilityForRemediation
description: Carrying amount of the liability for remediation of environmental damage pertaining to assets or businesses previously disposed.

name: FDICIndemnificationAsset
description: Carrying amount of receivable assets originating from the indemnification agreement with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), in which the FDIC is to partially cover losses.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerShareRedemptionRestrictionPercentage
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that cannot be redeemed because of a redemption restriction as of the statement of financial position date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesDiscount
description: Amount of unamortized discount on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateAfterRollingYearFive
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateInRollingYearFive
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateInRollingYearFour
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateInRollingYearThree
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesEarlierOfContractualMaturityOrNextCallDateInRollingYearTwo
description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesFixedRateAfterOneYear
description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostReleased
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for released film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FinancialAssetAmortizedCostAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financial asset measured at amortized cost.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedDerivativesAndOtherContractualAgreementsAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in all assets resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments. Their value is derived from the values of one or more underlying assets, reference rates, or indices of asset values. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FloorBrokerage
description: Broker-dealers often use other brokers to execute trades on their behalf. The trading broker-dealer becomes a customer of the executing broker-dealer and pays a floor brokerage fee. Such fees are paid periodically either directly to the executing broker-dealer or through a clearing house.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherPropertyAndEquipment
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other property and equipment.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsThereafter
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinFourYears
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfInterestRateCashFlowHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) included in earnings for the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on interest rate cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness.

name: GainLossOnPriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstruments
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of price risk derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: GasImbalancePayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: GeneralPartnerDistributions
description: Distributions from earnings to the general partner of a partnership included in the consolidated financial statements.

name: GuaranteedBenefitLiabilityGrossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the liability for guaranteed minimum benefits on long-duration contracts.

name: ImpairmentEffectOnEarningsPerShareAfterTax
description: After tax earnings per share or per unit impact arising from asset impairment.

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseLeases
description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible lease expense.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBillingInExcessOfCostOfEarnings
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability reflecting cash payments received before the related costs have been incurred.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInReceivablesUnderRepurchaseAgreements
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due the entity under agreements to sell and repurchase securities.

name: InvestmentCompanyContributedCapitalToCommittedCapitalRatio
description: Percentage of capital contributed to capital committed by investment company's investors.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAtFairValueGrossReductions
description: Gross reductions to the investment in and advance to the affiliate.

name: JointlyOwnedUtilityPlantNetOwnershipAmount
description: The total period end amount of plant in service and construction in progress net of accumulated depreciation for the utility's share of jointly owned electricity generation plant.

name: LandUnderPurchaseOptionsRecorded
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land not owned but under a contract in which the entity has an option to purchase the land.

name: LeaseIncentiveReceivableNoncurrent
description: Noncurrent portion of receivables for an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureDeferredIncome
description: The estimated portion of pretax income and investment tax credit remaining to be allocated to income over the lease term.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureRentalReceivablesNet
description: This element represents leveraged lease rentals receivable, net of that portion of the rental applicable to principal and interest on the nonrecourse debt.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsOtherContracts
description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under other insurance contracts.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCPreferredUnitIssuanceValue
description: Stated value of preferred units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeEstimatedAverageInvestmentYield
description: Estimated average rate of return on investments which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

name: LongtermPollutionControlBondCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Represents the current and noncurrent portions of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityGross
description: Undiscounted amount of the accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product or process.

name: LossContingencyDiscountedAmountOfInsuranceRelatedAssessmentLiability
description: The present value of the liability as of the balance sheet date representing required funding mandated by statute or regulatory authority that is related directly or indirectly to underwriting activities, including pools for self-insurance and excluding premium taxes and income taxes. The funds derived from the assessments generally enable a government guarantor to pay insurance claims in the event that the underwriting insurer is insolvent or otherwise unable to meet its payment obligations.

name: LossContingencyReceivableNoncurrent
description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

name: MalpracticeInsuranceCoverageFloor
description: Amount at the low end of the range in which the insurance begins to cover losses and costs associated with malpractice claims.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinThreeYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantFutureEmployerContributionAmount
description: Amount of cost for employer contribution required to be made in future period to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA), statutory obligation, and other contractual obligation.

name: OilAndGasJointInterestBillingReceivables
description: Portion of accounts receivable attributable to joint interest partners in oil and gas properties. These are billings to the non-operators associated with the operation of wells and are based on those owners' working interests in the wells.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForDerecognitionAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForDerecognitionBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityAdjustmentFromAociForAccretionOfNoncreditPortionOfOttiBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherInterestEarningAssets
description: Amount of interest earning assets classified as other.

name: OtherInventoryInventoryAtOffSitePremises
description: Gross amount of merchandise or materials to which the entity holds the title, but physically at another entity's facilities (for example, but not limited to, work in process may be temporarily at the site of a subcontractor).

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsUnitsOutstanding
description: The number of units of other ownership interests outstanding in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PaymentsForFlightEquipment
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of long-lived depreciable flight assets, including owned aircraft or capital improvements.

name: PaymentsForLeaseCommissions
description: Amount of cash outflow for lease commissions incurred.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromHeldtomaturitySecuritiesShortterm
description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term held-to-maturity securities.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromMortgageServicingRights
description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with acquisition or sale of mortgage servicing rights which is the net carrying value of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstatePartnershipInvestmentNet
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the sale or purchase of and distributions from real estate partnership investment during the period.

name: PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBSCategorizedAsHeldToMaturity
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of securities issued by a governmental agency or corporation (for example, GNMA or FHLMC) or by private issuers (for example, banks and mortgage banking enterprises) secured by and repaid from underlying mortgages, which were designated as held to maturity when acquired.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedLoansPledgedForFederalHomeLoanBankAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans that are restricted as collateral for the payment of the FHLB debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledgedUnderLetterOfCreditFacilitiesAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral under letter of credit agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PostconfirmationAccumulatedDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfLongTermDebt
description: Amount of current maturities of long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationRetainedEarningsDeficit
description: Amount of retained earnings or deficit at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationAccumulatedDepreciationAndAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationInventories
description: Amount of inventories at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockConvertibleConversionPriceDecrease
description: Per share decrease in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: PreferredUnitsContributedCapital
description: The amount of capital contributed by the preferred partners.

name: PreproductionCostsRelatedToLongTermSupplyArrangementsCostsCapitalized
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized preproduction costs incurred on long-term supply arrangements, including recoverable costs to design and develop products.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: ProceedsFromRentsReceived
description: Cash received for rents during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfFlightEquipment
description: Cash received from sales of long-lived depreciable flight assets, including owned aircraft or capital improvements.

name: PaymentsToAcquireUSGovernmentSecuritiesPledgedUnderBondIndenture
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInThreeMonthsOrLess
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

name: ProductiveOilWellsNumberOfWellsGross
description: Number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production with working interest ownership.

name: ProjectsThatHaveExploratoryWellCostsThatHaveBeenCapitalizedForPeriodGreaterThanOneYear
description: The number of projects for which exploratory well costs have been capitalized for a period of greater than one year after the completion of drilling.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveNetEnergyPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) of quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: ReimbursementFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment
description: A payment from an investee, in which the investment basis has previously been reduced to zero. This amount reduces net cash used in operating activities.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableGuaranteeBenefits
description: Sum of the amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date for all guaranteed benefit types.

name: RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInThreeMonthsOrLess
description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

name: ResultsOfOperationsSalesRevenueToUnaffiliatedEnterprises
description: Sales revenue to unaffiliated enterprises from oil and gas producing activities.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of fund outstanding loaned in form of security resale agreement for purchase and resale of identical or substantially same security at date certain for specified price, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from security purchased under agreement to resell.

name: SecuritiesReserveDepositRequiredAndMade
description: Securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of fund outstanding borrowed in form of security repurchase agreement for sale and repurchase of identical or substantially same security at date certain for specified price, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from security sold under agreement to repurchase.

name: SecurityOwnedAndSoldNotYetPurchasedFairValueSecuritySoldNotYetPurchased
description: Fair value of financial instruments sold short by a broker-dealer for their own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes determined by management based upon quoted prices of a financial instrument with similar characteristics or on a valuation technique or model.

name: StateInsuranceDepartmentStatutoryToNAICAmountOfReconcilingItem
description: Amount of an item which resulted in a difference from applying state prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices prescribed by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteeMinorityInterestInIncomeOfSubsidiary
description: The dividends from redeemable preferred stock of a subsidiary that are accounted for as a noncontrolling interest in income of a subsidiary in a parent's consolidated financial statements.

name: TheatricalFilmCostsReleased
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the release of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TradingSecuritiesRealizedGain
description: This item represents the gain realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

name: TreasuryStockDeferredEmployeeStockOwnershipPlan
description: The issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares to an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

name: USGovernmentAgenciesSecuritiesAtCarryingValue
description: Debt securities issued by a United States government agency such as Government National Mortgage Association (Ginnie Mae), Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation (Freddie Mac), and Federal National Mortgage Association (Fannie Mae), which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationImputedInterest
description: If disclosed, the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce an unconditional purchase obligation to present value on an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation.

name: AccruedCappingClosurePostClosureAndEnvironmentalCosts
description: The amount of estimated costs accrued as of the balance sheet date to comply with regulatory requirements pertaining to the retirement of a waste management facility (such as a landfill or waste treatment facility). Represents the portion that will be paid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentNotCreditLossNetOfTaxHeldtomaturityDebtSecurities
description: Accumulated other comprehensive loss related to portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized as held-to-maturity that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlansNoncurrentLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: AmortizationOfAdvanceRoyalty
description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of the advance royalties. These royalties are paid in one accounting period, but are deducted from earnings over time through amortization. For example, royalties that are required to be paid in advance of production from a mineral, oil, or gas property and amortized over the period of right to produce these items.

name: AmountOfIneffectivenessOnNetInvestmentHedges
description: Gain (loss) on hedging derivative instrument or the foreign currency transaction gain (loss) on the nonderivative hedging instrument designated as a hedge of a net investment in foreign operations related to hedge ineffectiveness, which is included in earnings in the period.

name: AmountRecognizedInIncomeDueToInflationaryAccounting
description: The amount that will be recognized through the income statement (as well as the impact on the other financial statements) as part of highly inflationary accounting.

name: PercentageOfAmountAmortizedOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearFive
description: #N/A

name: PercentageOfAmountAmortizedOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearFour
description: #N/A

name: PercentageOfAmountAmortizedOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearOne
description: #N/A

name: PercentageOfAmountAmortizedOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearThree
description: #N/A

name: PercentageOfAmountAmortizedOfEndingPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: AssetReportingCurrencyDenominatedValue
description: The reporting currency-denominated asset value.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockCashAndCashEquivalents
description: Cash and highly liquid, safe investments that can be readily converted into cash (cash equivalents) allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockMortgageLoansOnRealEstate
description: Carrying amount of investments in mortgage loans on real estate allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesExpectedCreditLosses
description: Rate at which principal will not be repaid on securitized financial assets regardless of when the transfer occurred.

name: BankAcceptancesExecuted
description: The amount of the financial institution's obligation to pay the holder of the customer's draft which the financial institution has guaranteed (i.e., Banker's Acceptance).

name: BeneficialInterest
description: Obligation reflecting another party's right to economic interests in another entity or trust under a contractual right. For example, an investor may purchase a beneficial interest in a securitization transaction.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseRevenue
description: Total amount of lease revenue realized in the period on leasing arrangements.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTypeLeasesCurrent
description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeases
description: The net investment in sales type leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedImpairment
description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

name: CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExchangeCommissionRegulation
description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesProvisionForLoanLosses1
description: Amount of expense related to loan loss not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ClosedBlockLiabilitiesOtherClosedBlockLiabilities
description: Amount of liabilities allocated to the closed block, classified as other.

name: PerformanceFees
description: #N/A

name: ClosedBlockLiabilitiesPolicyholderDividendObligation
description: The liability as of the balance sheet date for the excess of the cumulative actual closed block earnings over the cumulative expected (actuarially determined) closed block earnings (each) for the period from the actuarial calculation date to the date of measurement. The excess will result in future dividends to closed block policyholders, unless offset by less favorable than expected future performance of the closed block. The policyholder dividend obligation, which may not have a negative balance, recognizes that a portion of earnings in certain cases will not inure to the stockholders of the insurance entity.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsBenefitsAndExpense
description: Amount of benefits, claims and expenses that are related to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block). Includes, but is not limited to, death benefits, matured endowments, participating dividends, general expenses and deferred acquisition costs related to the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsNetResults
description: Amount of net income (loss) from operations of the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsPremiums
description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), revenue for the period from insurance policy premiums; typically included in a table of closed block operations.

name: CollateralSecuritiesRepledgedDeliveredOrUsed
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of securities received as collateral from a counterparty that were re-pledged, sold, delivered or otherwise reused by the entity.

name: ContractReceivableDueFourToFiveYears
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: CustomerDepositsNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of money or property received from customers that is to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPriceDecrease
description: Per share decrease in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPriceIncrease
description: Per share increase in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsEmployeeRelatedCharges
description: Amount of reorganization items related to employee related charges.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsProvisionForExpectedAllowedClaims
description: Amount of expense for claims expected to be incurred by an entity in reorganization.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsGross
description: Amount of issuance costs recognized in a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, before deduction of accumulated amortization or effects of subsequent adjustments.

name: DeferredGasCost
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized gas costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostAmortizationExpenseEffectOfAdjustmentsToEstimatedGrossProfitOrEstimatedGrossMargin
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) of deferred policy acquisition costs from a revision in estimated gross profit or estimated gross margin.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustmentAndOther
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred policy acquisition cost due to the effect of foreign currency translation gain (loss) and increase (decrease) classified as other.

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesGross
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of deferred lease income. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesNetNoncurrent
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of deferred lease income, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

name: DeferredRevenueRefundPayments1
description: Amount of cash outflow to customers for refund payments of revenue that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

name: DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuationAllowanceAllocatedToContributedCapital
description: Amount of valuation allowance for tax benefit to be credited to shareholders' equity if tax benefit subsequently becomes realizable. Includes, but is not limited to, adjustment to opening balance of retained earnings for change in accounting principle or correction of error, gain (loss) in comprehensive income (loss) but excluded from net income (loss), deductible expenditure for income tax purposes reported as reduction of shareholders' equity, and deductible temporary difference existing at date of quasi-reorganization.

name: DepositsRetail
description: The aggregate amount of all retail deposit accounts including demand accounts, savings accounts, and certificates of deposit.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedOffsetAgainstCollateralNetOfNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementPolicyElection
description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed, offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement.

name: DerivativeAverageSwaptionInterestRate
description: Average fixed interest rate that will be received or paid upon exercise of a group of interest rate swaption contracts.

name: DevelopmentWellsDrilledNetProductive
description: Number of development oil and gas wells capable of producing either oil or gas in sufficient quantity to justify completion as oil or gas well.

name: DistributionsOnMandatorilyRedeemableSecurities
description: Amount of distributions during the period on mandatorily redeemable securities.

name: DividendIncomeSecuritiesOperatingTaxExempt
description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

name: DueToEmployeesNoncurrent
description: Amounts due to Employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashContinuingOperations
description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in continuing operations held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseCharitableContributions
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to charitable contributions expense.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStructureDirectLoanEmployerCashPaymentsUsedForDebtService
description: The amount of cash provided by the employer through contributions or dividends that the ESOP used in the period to repay debt and interest on a third-party loan made directly to the ESOP.

name: EnvironmentalCostsRecognizedRecoveryCreditedToExpense
description: Amount of any recovery from third parties that is credited to environmental remediation costs.

name: ExcessOfReportedClosedBlockLiabilitiesOverAssetsDesignatedToClosedBlock
description: The difference between the liabilities of and the assets allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetProductive
description: Number of exploratory oil and gas wells capable of producing either oil or gas in sufficient quantity to justify completion as oil or gas well.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualNoncurrent
description: Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year from the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskDerivativeFinancialInstrumentsAssets
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisDebtInstrumentValuationTechniquesChangeInTechniqueQuantificationOfEffect
description: Represents the quantification of the effect of changes in the valuation technique and related inputs, during the period, used to measure the liability at fair value as of the statement of financial position reporting date.

name: FairValueOptionIneligibleItemsAggregateCarryingAmount
description: Carrying amount of items included in each line item in the statement of financial position that are not eligible for the fair value option.

name: PolicyChargesInsurance
description: #N/A

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesFixedRateUnderOneYear
description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesFloatingRateUnderOneYear
description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsClaimLiabilityWeightedAverageRiskFreeDiscountRate
description: This element represents the weighted average risk free rate used to discount the claim liability related to financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionRedeemableWithinOneYear
description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialServicesLiabilities
description: For entities that provide full or partial financing and servicing for customers supplementary to its major operations (such as a manufacturer or a homebuilder providing and servicing loans to buyers), represents the liabilities associated with such activities, including accounts payable and accrued liabilities.

name: FiniteLivedContractualRightsGross
description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an intangible asset that arises from a contractual arrangement with a third party (not including franchise rights and license agreements).

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseAmortizableIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to amortizable intangible assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent deferred income tax assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseGoodwill
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to goodwill.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseInventories
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to inventories.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinFiveYears
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainLossOnNonRecourseDebt
description: Amount represents the difference between the cash acquisition price of the debt and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its extinguishment (or deconsolidation of in-substance real estate when an entity defaults on its debt obligations).

name: GainLossOnSaleOfInsuranceBlock
description: Excess (deficiency) of net proceeds received over the net carrying value of a certain, bundled grouping of insurance policies.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfProject
description: The gains and losses included in earning resulting from the sale of a project.

name: GasAndOilAreaDevelopedNet
description: Area assigned to productive oil and gas wells representing summation of fractional ownership working interest to whole.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitDiluted1
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding.

name: IncreaseDecreaseDueFromOfficersAndStockholders
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from the reporting entity's executives and owners.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredFuelCosts
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in carrying amount of capitalized fuel costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInEarnestMoneyDepositsOutstanding
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of deposits given by the reporting entity to a seller which shows that the prospective buyer is serious about purchasing a property.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfPriceRiskFairValueHedgingInstruments1
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the fair value of price risk derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFuelInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fuel held in inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyAndCasualtyInsuranceLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in property and casualty insurance liabilities balances during the period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInReserveForCommissionsExpenseAndTaxes
description: The change in the reserve for commissions, expenses and taxes recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCashAndInvestmentsForOperatingActivities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in marketable securities and investments pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSavingsDeposits
