description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all savings account deposits, which may include passbook, statement savings accounts and money-market deposit accounts (MMDAs), classified as cash flows from financing activities.

name: IntercompanyForeignCurrencyBalanceAmount
description: Amount of an intercompany foreign currency transactions that is of a long-term-investment nature, that is, settlement is not planned of anticipated in the foreseeable future.

name: InterestExpenseBeneficialInterestsIssuedByConsolidatedVariableInterestEntities
description: Interest expense on beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities.

name: InterestExpenseLoansFromOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of interest expense on loans received from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

name: InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioIncludingIncentiveFee
description: Percentage, after deduction of fee waiver and incentive fee, of expense to average net assets.

name: InvestmentCompanyNetAssetValuePerSharePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Per share or unit amount of increase (decrease) in net asset value.

name: InvestmentCompanyNetAssetsFromOperationsIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net assets from operations of investment company.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureResidualValueOfLeasedAssets
description: The estimate of the value of the leased asset at the end of the lease term.

name: LiabilitiesOfBusinessTransferredUnderContractualArrangementCurrent
description: The current carrying amount, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of liabilities resulting from the transfer of a business segment under contractual arrangement where the transferor maintains certain risks, obligations or liabilities.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGrossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in asbestos and environmental claims reserve, before estimated recoveries from reinsurers.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodCarryingAmount
description: Fair value amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValue
description: Face value (death benefits) of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method.

name: LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCPreferredUnitAuthorized
description: Maximum number of preferred units of ownership permitted to be issued of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: LoansReceivableBasisSpreadOnVariableRateDuringPeriod
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate or index during the adjustment period to compute the variable [fully indexed] rate on the loans receivable realized during the reporting period. This may be an effective margin for the period depending on the specific terms of the underlying loan agreement (for example, an annual disclosure for a loan with a quarterly adjustment period).

name: LossOnCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The loss recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualUndiscounted
description: Amount of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability) at the end of the accounting period.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePeriodicPaymentTermsBalloonPaymentToBeReceived
description: Amount of payment to be received at final maturity date for mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: MultiemployerPlansPlanContributions1
description: Amount of contributions made to multiemployer plan by all employers who participate in plan.

name: MunicipalDebtSecuritiesAtCarryingValue
description: Bonds or similar securities issued by state, city, or local governments or the agencies operated by state, city, or local governments which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

name: NetIncomeLossFromRealEstateInvestmentPartnership
description: Amount of net income (loss) recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossLimitedPartnershipsNonredeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling partner of a limited partnership.

name: OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToHeldToMaturityAdjustmentFromAociForAmortizationOfGainLossBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: OilAndGasSalesPayableCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to third parties for oil and gas that has been sold but not delivered. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterReclassificationAdjustmentTax
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterTaxAndReclassificationAdjustmentAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to parent.

name: OtherRealEstateImprovements
description: Improvements to other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

name: OtherRecurringIncome
description: Amount of recurring income classified as other.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsReclassificationAdjustmentOfNoncreditPortionIncludedInNetIncomeHeldtomaturitySecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: PaymentsForDepositsAppliedToDebtRetirements
description: Cash outflow during the period as a deposit on account for application (deposits to retire or pay down) against an amount of debt owed by the entity.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromAvailableforsaleSecuritiesShortterm
description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term available-for-sale securities.

name: PaymentsToAcquireRetainedInterestInSecuritizedReceivables
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a retained interest in a receivable securitized via a structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

name: PercentageOfWeightedAverageCostInventory
description: The percentage of weighted average cost inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is valued using different valuation methods.

name: PlanOfReorganizationAmountOfPrepetitionObligationsSettledOrToBeSettledInCashAtEffectiveDate
description: Amount of prepetition liabilities to be settled in cash.

name: PolicyholderDividendsPayable
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for dividends that are payable to the policyholders based upon the terms of the underlying insurance contracts.

name: PostconfirmationNoncurrentOtherObligations
description: Amount of other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of other current liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherPropertyAndEquipment
description: Amount of other property and equipment at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationNoncurrentOtherObligations
description: Amount of other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationOtherAssets
description: Total other assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationPreferredAndCommonStockHeldInTreasury
description: Amount of preferred and common stock held in treasury at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockRedemptionAmountFutureRedeemableSecurities
description: The redemption (or callable) amount of redeemable preferred stock, excluding currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

name: PremiumsEarnedNetLife
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life premiums earned.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfMortgageLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: ProceedsFromLeasePaymentSalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesInvestingActivity
description: Amount of cash inflow from principal payment received from sales-type and direct financing leases classified as investing activity.

name: ProceedsFromSecuritizationsOfLoansHeldForInvestment
description: The cash inflow from the securitization of loans held for investment. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyAccrualPresentValue
description: Present value of the accrual for product liability loss contingencies as of the balance sheet date (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentCommon
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to regulated assets common to business units.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated depreciation on real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceValuationIncrease
description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement for an increase in valuation of real estate owned (REO).

name: RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueFromAffiliatesCurrent
description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due from affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

name: RelatedPartyTaxExpenseEffectOfChangeInAllocationMethodology
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in tax expense resulting from change in methodology used to allocate tax expense to members of a group for which a consolidated tax return is filed.

name: ReorganizationValueNetRealizableValueOfAssetDispositions
description: Amount of reorganization value related to estimated net realizable value of asset dispositions. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

name: ResultsOfOperationsExpenseOther
description: Other costs for oil and gas producing activities.

name: RetailRelatedInventory
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise inventory held by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor for future sale; includes packaging and other supplies used to store, transport, or present merchandise inventory.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security purchased under agreement to resell.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueOtherChangesThatAffectBalanceAmount
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueBalance
description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenue are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsImpactOfChangesInFairValueOfSharesOnAmount
description: Increase (decrease) in settlement amount from change in fair value of issuer's equity shares. For example, but not limited to, issuer obligated to pay an additional Y dollars in cash for each $1 decrease in the fair value of one share.

name: ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesAmount
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loss reserves carried at present value.

name: StockOrUnitsAvailableForDistributions
description: Number of stock or units eligible for distribution to members or limited partners of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

name: TimeSharingTransactionsAllowanceForUncollectibleAccounts
description: Allowance for uncollectible accounts.

name: TradingSecuritiesEquityCost
description: Cost of investments in equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

name: TreasuryStockPreferredValue
description: Amount allocated to previously issued preferred shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

name: UnamortizedDiscountsOnAcceptancesExecuted
description: The amount of the unearned (fee) income on the financial institution's issuance of short-term negotiable time drafts (also known as Banker's Acceptances).

name: UnusualOrInfrequentTaxEffect
description: Amount of tax related to an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseImpairments
description: Amount of operating expense for impairments of regulated operation.

name: AirlineRelatedInventoryValuationReserves
description: The amount of the valuation account as of the balance sheet date which reduces the carrying amount of airline related inventory (including expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers or freight) to net realizable value; takes into consideration such factors as market value, excessive quantities based on expected sales, technological obsolescence, and shrinkage.

name: AmountOfImpairmentToCarryingAmountOfRegulatoryAssets
description: Discloses the amount of any reduction to the carrying amounts of regulated assets that result from impairment (for example, rate actions of a regulator).

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesTransfersToTradingGainsLossesNet
description: This item represents the difference between the gross amount of gains (losses) included in earnings for transfers of securities from the available-for-sale category into the trading category. Such net gain (loss) included in earnings represents the net unrealized gain (loss) which had been included in other comprehensive income and is associated with the securities transferred from the available-for-sale category to the trading category.

name: AverageCollectedCashBalancesWithCommercialBanksFederalHomeLoanBank
description: Average amount of collected cash balances with commercial banks the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) maintain in return for certain services.

name: BasicEarningsPerShareAdjustmentProForma
description: Pro Forma Basic Earnings Per Share Adjustment to reconcile between Net Income and Pro Forma.

name: BillingsInExcessOfCost
description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary difference assumed at the acquisition date that are classified as current.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumSubleaseRentals
description: Minimum payments receivable in the future under noncancelable subleases.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassOtherPropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet
description: Amount after depreciation of leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTypeLeases
description: The lessor's asset under sales type and direct financing leases. The net investment in direct financing and sales-type leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) estimated executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesDeferredIncome
description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a sales-type lease and the cost or carrying amount of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesOfLesseeContingentRentalsBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessee's capital lease.

name: CapitalizedCostsUncompletedWellsEquipmentAndFacilities
description: Capitalized costs of which include those incurred to (1) drill and equip wells that are not yet completed (2) acquire or construct equipment and facilities that are not yet installed.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldDisposalsOfLoans
description: Sale or transfer of a loan during the period resulting in a reduction in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAllowanceForLoanLossesDecreases1
description: Amount of reduction in the reserve for loans impairments as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be significantly higher than previously expected or because actual cash flows are significantly greater than cash flows previously expected for loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: ClosedBlockAssetsAndLiabilitiesMaximumFutureEarningsToBeRecognized
description: The carrying amount of closed block liabilities in excess of the carrying amount of closed block assets at the date of demutualization (adjusted to eliminate the impact of related amounts in accumulated other comprehensive income).

name: ClosedBlockDividendObligationChangeInUnrealizedInvestmentGainsLosses
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the closed block dividend obligation from the unrealized gain (loss) on investments allocated to the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockLiabilitiesPolicyholderDividendsPayable
description: Amount of dividends payable as of the balance sheet date to policyholders of contracts in the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a disposal group, which is allocated to the operations of the closed block.

name: CommonStockIssuedEmployeeTrustDeferred
description: Aggregate value of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesRepurchaseOfSharesBySubsidiary
description: Represents the repurchase of equity (treasury stock) by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent; but not deconsolidation by the parent.

name: CreditDerivativeLiquidationProceedsPercentage
description: Estimated percentage to which the maximum potential amount of future payments under the credit derivative would be covered by the proceeds from liquidation of assets held either as collateral or by third parties.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesRefundPayments1
description: Amount of cash outflow to customers for refund payments.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInterestWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) recognized by reversing interest income.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtPurchasePrice
description: Amount at purchase price of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingFeeOnUnusedBorrowings
description: Percentage of fee on unused borrowings under debtor-in-possession financing arrangement.

name: DeferredFuelCost
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized fuel costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAmortizationExpenseAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense for deferred policy acquisition costs from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: DeferredRevenueAndCredits
description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date representing potential earnings that were not as yet recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP.

name: DeferredRevenueAndCreditsNoncurrent
description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date representing potential earnings that were not as yet recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP, and which are expected to be recognized as such after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesLiquidationPreference
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesNoParValue
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesParOrStatedValuePerShare
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesSharesAuthorized
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesValue
description: #N/A

name: PreferredStockAdditionalSeriesValueOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityIntraEntityTransferAssetOtherThanInventory
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to intra-entity transfer of asset within consolidated group. Excludes intra-entity transfer of inventory.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsExpectedToBeReturnedToEmployerAmount
description: Amount of defined benefit plan asset expected to be returned to employer within one year or operating cycle, if longer, following current fiscal year.

name: PreferredStockCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of derivative asset, security purchased under agreement to resell, and security borrowed, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from derivative asset, security purchased under agreement to resell, and security borrowed.

name: DifferenceBetweenReportedAmountAndReportingCurrencyDenominatedAmountValue
description: The amount of difference between the reported amount and the reporting currency-denominated amount. The default debit balance is based on the reported amount that is greater that the reporting currency-denominated amount.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCostsReleased
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the release of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTaxPerBasicAndDilutedShare
description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations, when the per share amount is the same.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPensionPlanBenefitObligationCurrent
description: Amount classified as defined benefit plan benefit obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DraftsPayable
description: Amount of draft payable by broker-dealer.

name: DueFromEmployeesNoncurrent
description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: PreferredStockDividend
description: #N/A

name: DueFromOfficersOrStockholdersNoncurrent
description: Amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryChemicals
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of solvents or substances produced by or used in a process to change the shape, form or composition of some related matter.

name: PreferredStockDividends
description: #N/A

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasLiquids
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of liquid hydrocarbon components recovered from natural gas.

name: EntityNotSubjectToIncomeTaxesDifferenceInBasesAmount
description: Represents the net difference between the tax bases and the reported amounts of the assets and liabilities of an entity that is not subject to income taxes because its income is taxed directly to its owners.

name: ExplorationCostsCumulative
description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or "G&G" costs. Exploration costs also include costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, the maintenance of land and lease records, dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions, costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells and costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskLoansReceivable
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostReleased
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostProduction
description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in production of film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedPrincipalInvestmentsAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in private equity, mezzanine, venture capital, merchant banking, real estate and special situations investments. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedDerivativesAndOtherContracts
description: Fair value of obligations arising from derivatives and other contracts sold short.

name: FinancingReceivableCoveredBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, before allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

name: FinancingReceivableRevolvingConvertedToTermLoanDuringPeriod
description: Amount of increase in term loan from conversion of revolving financing receivable.

name: ForwardContractIndexedToIssuersEquitySettlementAlternativesSharesAtFairValue
description: Number of shares as a settlement alternative for each freestanding forward contract.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseNoncurrentOtherObligations
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent obligations classified as other.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherAssets
description: Total fresh-start adjustment to other assets.

name: GainLossOnPriceRiskDerivativesNet
description: The aggregate net gain (loss) on price risk derivatives included in earnings in the period.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfCapitalLeasesNet
description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's transactions involving the sale, transfer, or termination of financing agreements classified as capital leases.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfInterestInProjects
description: Gain (loss) included in earnings resulting from the sale of interest in projects.

name: GasAndOilAreaDevelopedGross
description: Area assigned to productive oil and gas wells with working interest ownership.

name: GasAndOilAreaUndevelopedGross
description: Leased area with working interest ownership on which oil and gas wells have not been drilled or completed that would permit production of economic quantities of oil and gas. Excludes area of undrilled acreage held by production under terms of lease.

name: HedgingAssetsNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to hedge price changes in underlying assets, and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipUnitBasic
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquityOther
description: The tax effect of items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to components of shareholders' equity and are not otherwise defined.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCashCollateralForLoanedSecurities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash that is received as security when loaning securities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCollateralHeldUnderSecuritiesLending
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of assets, which may include but are not limited to cash and investments, received as collateral pertaining to securities loaned to a counterparty to the transaction. Includes the change during the period in any unrealized gain or loss on such investments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOutstandingChecksOperatingActivities
description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities. Another element, Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Financing Activities, represents cash flows from outstanding checks classified as financing activities.

name: IncreaseInRestrictedCash
description: Amount of cash outflow associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

name: InsuranceInvestmentIncome
description: Investment income associated with the company's insurance services.

name: InterestAccrualRateAssociatedWithAmortizationMethodOfPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits
description: Rate of interest used in determination of present value of future profits on insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: InterestAndDividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity).

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumerInstallmentCreditCard
description: Interest and fee income from credit card balances due from individuals. Such loans are considered revolving credit arrangements.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesBrokered
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic brokered deposit liabilities.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesTimeDeposit
description: Amount of interest expense on time deposit liabilities.

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributableEarnings
description: Amount of accumulated undistributed tax basis earnings (deficit).

name: InvestmentCompanyNetAssetsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net assets of investment company.

name: PreferredUnitsValue
description: #N/A

name: PreferredUnitsValueNetOfOfferingCosts
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentOwnedForeignCurrencyContractReportingCurrencyAmountCurrentValue
description: Amount the entity is obligated or for which it has the option to buy or sell the foreign currency contract.

name: PremiumIncomeSubjectToParticipationThroughReinsurancePercentage
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedAtFairValue
description: Value of the short position.

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedSaleProceeds
description: The amount of proceeds received resulting from the short sale of a security.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromisePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseProvisionForExpectedAndAllowedClaims
description: The amount of the provision for expected and allowed claims included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForCatastropheClaimsCarryingAmount
description: The amount of estimated liability as of the balance sheet date for the specific conflagration, earthquake, windstorm, explosion, or similar event.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitAfterReinsurance
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of liability for future policy benefit.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsDisabilityAndAccidentBenefits
description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under disability and accident insurance contracts.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsPaymentForBenefits
description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder from benefit payment for expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit.

name: PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce
description: #N/A

name: LiquidationBasisOfAccountingRemeasurementGainLossOnAccruedCostsToDisposeOfAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of estimated accrued costs to dispose of assets or other items expected to be sold in liquidation.

name: LiquidationBasisOfAccountingRemeasurementGainLossOnAsset
description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of an asset to reflect the change in value under liquidation basis.

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsAdditionsForChargesToExpense
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowanceCovered
description: Amount of allowance for loan and lease losses covered by loss sharing agreements.

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsProvisionChargedToExpense
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsProvisionChargedToExpense1
description: #N/A

name: LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInRollingYearFourAndFive
description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fourth and fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValueAdditions
description: Amount of additions to receivables pertaining to a loss contingency.

name: LossOnFairValueHedgeIneffectiveness
description: Amount of recognized loss from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinFourYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumNetCapitalRequiredForEntity1
description: Minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by broker-dealer parent, calculated under Aggregate Indebtedness Standard.

name: MinorityInterestInPreferredUnitHolders
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling preferred unit holders in an entity included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantEmployerContributionUnderCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllParticipatingEmployerContributionsPercentage
description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total contribution from all participating employers in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantEmployeesCoveredByCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllEntitysEmployeesPercentage
description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all entity's employees in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: PremiumsWrittenNetAccidentAndHealth
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsWrittenNetFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsWrittenNetLife
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsWrittenNetOtherInsurance
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsWrittenNetPropertyAndCasualty
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedFourYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

name: PrepaidExpense
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

name: NonconsolidatedLegalEntityFinancialSupportAmount
description: Amount of financial support provided to a nonconsolidated legal entity that is required to comply with or operate in accordance with requirements that are similar to those included in Rule 2a-7 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 for registered money market funds.

name: NumberOfRealEstatePropertiesFeeSimple
description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the statement of financial position to which the entity has fee simple title.

name: OilAndGasReclamationLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of a reclamation liability that is associated with a legal obligation for the closure and reclamation of oil and gas properties.

name: OtherAdjustmentsToIncomeDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of noncash income (expense), classified as other, from discontinued operations.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForInvestmentTransferredFromAvailableForSaleToEquityMethodTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

name: OtherIncreaseDecreaseInEnvironmentalLiabilities
description: Other increase (decrease) not attributable to current expense nor cash payments during an accounting period in estimated obligations recorded for probable future costs attributable to environmental contamination issues.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsUnitsIssued
description: The number of units of other ownership interests issued in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: OtherPartnersCapital
description: Amount of other partners' capital.

name: PrepaidPensionCosts
description: #N/A

name: PaymentForIncentiveFee
description: Amount paid for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

name: PaymentsForMortgageDeposits
description: outflow associated with an amount paid in advance to show an intention to complete a mortgage financing.

name: PaymentsToAcquireManagementContractRights
description: The cash outflow from amounts paid for the rights to manage the property.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedOtherDebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturity
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of other debt securities classified as held to maturity which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PolicyholderDividendsRateOnPolicyEarnings
description: The percentage of earnings allocable to participating policyholders based on earnings of such policies for payment of dividends.

name: PostconfirmationAccruedLiabilities
description: Amount of accrued liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationInventories
description: Amount of inventories at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherAssets
description: Total other assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationGoodwill
description: Amount of goodwill at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PrescriptionDrugBenefitEffectOfSubsidyOnNetPeriodicPostretirementBenefitCost
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: Amount of other current liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PrescriptionDrugBenefitReductionInAccumulatedPostretirementBenefitObligationForSubsidy
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationOtherPropertyAndEquipment
description: Amount of other property and equipment at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsFiveFiscalYearsThereafter
description: #N/A

name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearFive
description: #N/A

name: PrepayableFinancialAssetClosedPortfolioLastOfLayerAmortizedCost
description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearFour
description: #N/A

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnrealizedGainLossOnInvestment
description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearOne
description: #N/A

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearThree
description: #N/A

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeGainOrLossReclassifiedToEarningsNet
description: The amount of net gains or losses on price risk cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income.

name: PrescriptionDrugSubsidyReceiptsYearTwo
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfFinancialServicesObligations
description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing issued by the entity involved in financial services operations.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMandatoryRedeemableCapitalSecurities
description: The cash inflow from issuance of an equity security that embodies an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the security by transferring the assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) that is (or are) initially more than one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date, or upon an event that is certain to occur beyond one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfLongtermInvestments
description: The cash inflow from maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfInsuranceInvestments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of insurance policy investment assets during the period.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: ProgramRightsObligationsNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements that will be paid after one year.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExcludingLessorAssetUnderOperatingLeaseAfterAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedGross
description: Gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.

name: PublicUtilitiesRequestedRateIncreaseDecreaseAmendedPercentage
description: Percentage of public utility's amended requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

name: RealEstatePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) before accumulated depreciation of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

name: ReceivableFromOfficersAndDirectorsForIssuanceOfCapitalStock
description: Amounts receivable from officers and directors resulting from the sale of stock to officers or directors before the cash payment is received.

name: RetailLandSalesReceivablesStatedInterestRate
description: Percentage of stated interest rate for receivables from retail land sales.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivableLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SalesTypeLeaseInitialDirectCostExpenseCommencement
description: Amount of sales-type lease initial direct cost recognized as expense at commencement date.

name: SalesTypeLeaseVariableLeaseIncome
description: Amount of sales-type lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedFairValueOfCollateral
description: Fair value of the securities received as collateral against securities borrowed.

name: SecuritiesSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedCostAmortization
description: Amount of amortization of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInterestAccrued
description: #N/A

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInterestAccrued1
description: #N/A

name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAdditions
description: The value of new servicing liabilities, that are subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through assumptions of servicing obligations and servicing obligations that result from transfers of financial assets.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesInterestAccretion
description: Amount of interest accretion recognized for short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualBestEstimate
description: Best estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for environmental loss contingencies at an individual site.

name: TemporaryEquitySharesSubscribedButUnissuedSubscriptionsReceivable
description: Aggregate monetary value of a new issue of securities which have been allocated to investors to buy. When security is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the security to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

name: TheatricalFilmCostsProduction
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the production of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TimberAndTimberlands
description: Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of forest crops and land devoted primarily to the growth and harvest of forest crops for commercial purposes.

name: TroubledDebtRestructuringDebtorCurrentPeriodGainLossOnRestructuringNetOfTax
description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables, after the impact of income tax expense or benefit, arising from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnrealizedInvestmentGains
description: #N/A

name: TroubledDebtRestructuringDebtorSubsequentPeriodsContingentPaymentsAmount
description: Amount of restructured debt contingently payable based on the occurrence of future events or circumstances.

name: UnamortizedCostsCapitalizedLessRelatedDeferredIncomeTaxesExceedCeilingLimitationExpense
description: The excess of unamortized costs capitalized within a cost center, less related deferred income taxes, over the cost center ceiling limitation, which is charged to expense for oil and gas producing companies that use full cost method of accounting for investments in oil and gas producing properties.

name: UnapprovedChangeOrdersAmount
description: Amount of cost incurred on construction contract for unapproved change order, claim, or similar item subject to uncertainty.

name: UnderlyingDerivativeVolume
description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in volume but not the derivative contract itself.

name: PreviouslyEstimatedDevelopmentCostsIncurredDuringPeriod
description: #N/A

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationMinimumQuantityRequired
description: The minimum number of units that must be purchased, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has not been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToEarningsNet
description: #N/A

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemGainGross
description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseProductsAndServices
description: Amount of operating expense for products and services of regulated operation.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositBrokered
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic brokered deposit liabilities.

name: AcceleratedShareRepurchasesAdjustmentToRecordedAmount
description: The adjustment needed to reconcile previously recorded amounts to the actual aggregate amount paid, whether in cash or other consideration, to acquire all of the shares purchased under an Accelerated Share Repurchase arrangement.

name: AccruedExchangeFeeRebateCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for rebates of an exchange fee some mutual funds impose on shareholders if they exchange (transfer) to another fund within the same fund group.

name: AccruedParticipationLiabilitiesDueInNextOperatingCycle
description: The amount of accrued participation liabilities that it expects to pay during the upcoming operating cycle.

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: AgriculturalRelatedInventoryGrowingCrops
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of agricultural goods that are not yet mature and thus have not yet been harvested.

name: AmortizationExpensePerPhysicalUnitOfProduction
description: Amortization computed on the basis of physical units, with oil and gas converted to a common unit of measure on the basis of their approximate relative energy content.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockAccruedInvestmentIncome
description: Amount of accrued investment income held by the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockInvestments
description: Amount of investments held by the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockOtherClosedBlockAssets1
description: Amount of other assets held by the closed block. Excludes other investments.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesParValuePerShare
description: The par value of the auction market preferred security.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuritiesCurrent
description: Amount of investments in equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as available-for-sale, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: BillingsInExcessOfCostCurrent
description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method that are expected to be realized within one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer, from the reporting date.

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date, classified as noncurrent.

name: BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedTransactionsAdditionalDisclosuresIssuanceCostsNotExpensed
description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of any issuance related costs which have not been expensed.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesAccumulatedAmortization
description: Accumulated amortization of deferred income and initial direct costs pertaining to direct financing leases, which resulted from producing constant periodic rates of return on the net investments in the leases over their respective lease terms.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesUnguaranteedResidualValuesOfLeasedProperty
description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the sales-type lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

name: CarryingCostsPropertyAndExplorationRights
description: The costs incurred to retain exploration and property rights after acquisition but before production has occurred. Costs include legal costs for title defense, ad valorem taxes on nonproducing mineral properties, shut-in royalties, and delay rentals.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldTransfersToLoansHeldForSale
description: Amount of reduction, resulting from a reclassification to held-for-sale, in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: ClosedBlockLiabilitiesOtherPolicyholderFunds
description: Amount of closed block policyholder funds held, which are refundable.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsOtherExpense
description: Amount of expense classified as other allocated to the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsPolicyholderBenefits
description: An expense for the period for estimated policy claims in an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), as typically reported in a table of closed block operations as part of summarized financial data.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsPolicyholderDividends
description: An expense for the period representing distributions paid or accrued for the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), which may be presented in a table of closed block operations as part of summarized financial data.

name: CommissionsAndFloorBrokerageReceivables
description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers from commissions for executing orders on the floor of an exchange.

name: CommodityContractAssetNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from commodity contracts such as futures contracts tied to the movement of a particular commodity, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CommonStockHeldBySubsidiary
description: Value of entity shares held by subsidiary, which are purchased for the purpose of granting the shares to senior employees as part of an employee stock option plan approved by the Entity's Board of Directors. Presented as a reduction of shareholders' equity at their cost to the subsidiary.

name: CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapitalNetOfDiscount
description: Amount after discount on shares of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock held by shareholders. Includes common stock repurchased and held as treasury stock.

name: ConsolidatedOilAndGasProductionCostsPerUnitOfProduction
description: Cost per unit of oil and gas production.

name: ConstructionContractCostProgressPaymentOffset
description: Amount of progress payment netted against construction contract cost.

name: ContractReceivableDueFiveYearsOrMore
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueAfterOneYear
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

name: CustomerRefundLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Noncurrent regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationIncrease
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and beneficial interest, purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityRollingAfterTenYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing after tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedInCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated in current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPurchase
description: Amount of increase from purchase of debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DeferredCostsLeasingNetCurrent
description: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. The costs represented by this element are those costs expected to be recognized in (amortized to) earnings within one year from the date of the statement of financial position or operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAmortizationExpenseExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred policy acquisition costs.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInterestsInFinancialAssetsContinuedToBeHeld
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from interests in financial instruments continued to be held after sale or transfer of related financial instruments.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountOfUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiabilityPolicyholdersSurplus
description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to a policyholders' surplus.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanChangeInFairValueOfPlanAssetsLevel3ReconciliationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount, measured using unobservable inputs, of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan.

name: DepositAssetsPresentValueOfExpectedRecoveries
description: Present value of initial expected recoveries that will be reimbursed under the insurance or reinsurance contracts.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCostsProduction
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the production of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationAccruedIncomeTaxPayableNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as income tax obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPostretirementPlanBenefitObligationNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DividendIncomeSecuritiesOperatingTaxable
description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.

name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashDiscontinuedOperations
description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in discontinued operations held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepatriationForeignEarningsJobsCreationActOf2004
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the temporary incentive for U.S. entities to repatriate accumulated foreign earnings under the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.

name: EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationEstimatedQuantityOfSharesToBeRepurchasedInFollowingPeriod
description: Number of shares to be repurchased in accordance with a policy to use treasury stock to satisfy share-award conversions.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPRepurchaseObligationAmount
description: An entity will typically disclose the amount of any repurchase obligation.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the extended product warranty accrual. Excludes standard product warranties.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualPreexistingIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the extended product warranty accrual from changes in estimates attributable to preexisting product warranties. Excludes standard product warranties.

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetAccretionOfDiscount
description: Increases to the indemnification asset due to accretion of the loan discount relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskCommitments
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesValuationAdjustmentsUnderFairValueOption
description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) from fair value option adjustments.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostProduction
description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in production of film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostDevelopmentAndPreproduction
description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in development and preproduction of film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCompletedAndNotReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationInNextOperatingCycle
description: Amount of amortization for completed and not released film predominantly monetized on its own and expected to be recognized within next operating cycle.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAmountNotEligibleToBeRepledgedByCounterparty
description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions where counterparty does not have the right to re-pledge such.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainLossFromPriceRiskManagementActivity
description: Gain (loss) incurred in risk management activities.

name: GainOnCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The gain recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

name: GainOrLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStockByEquityInvestee
description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

name: GainOrLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStockBySubsidiary
description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

name: GeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseRatio
description: Ratio of non-life general and administrative expenses to non-life net premiums earned.

name: GeneralFairValueHedgeInformationMinimumRSquarePercentage
description: The correlation coefficient between the hypothetical instrument and the hedged item used in determination of the effectiveness of a hedging relationship.

name: GovernmentContractReceivableProgessPaymentsOffset
