description: Amount of progress payment offset against unbilled government contract receivable.

name: GroundLeasesGross
description: Gross long-term land leases capitalized as part of real property.

name: GuaranteedInterestContracts
description: The amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the guarantee given by the insurance entity to contract holders of a specified rate of return (a guaranteed yield) on their investments for a specified period.

name: HealthCareOrganizationAllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPercentageOfAccountsReceivable
description: Ratio of the allowance for doubtful accounts to accounts receivable, expressed as a percentage, for health care organizations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredGasCost
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in carrying amount of capitalized gas costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromOfficersAndStockholdersCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from the reporting entity's executives and owners.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFilmCosts1
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film. Examples include, but are not limited to, costs of story and scenario, compensation, set construction and postproduction costs.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInHealthCareInsuranceLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in health care insurance liability balances during the period.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInventoryForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of inventory pertaining to construction, development, or other contracts or programs that initially were expected to take more than one year or the normal operating cycle to complete.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInterest
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRiskManagementAssetsAndLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value of financial instruments other than those that are purchased and held principally for the purpose of hedging or mitigating market risk, credit risk, legal risk, operational risk and other types of risk.

name: InterestIncomePurchasedReceivables
description: Interest earned from receivables purchased; for instance, receivables purchased through a factoring arrangement.

name: InventoryBuildingsAndImprovements
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of building structures held as inventory including any additions, improvements, or renovations to those structures.

name: InventoryRealEstateMortgageLoansHeldInInventory
description: Represents mortgage loans held in inventory primarily for sale to others (third parties, businesses, legal entities) in the ordinary course of business.

name: InvestmentCompanyFeePaidIndirectly
description: Amount that would have been incurred for brokerage service had service been paid for directly in arm's-length transaction.

name: LessorOperatingLeaseAssumptionsAndJudgmentsValueOfUnderlyingAssetAmount
description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of operating lease term.

name: LeveragedLeasesIncomeStatementNetIncomeFromLeveragedLeases
description: The total recognized during the period for income on leases meeting the criteria for classification as leveraged leases.

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsReinsuranceRecoverable
description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitByProductSegmentInterestRateYearOfIssue
description: The assumed interest rate used to determine present value of future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and unpaid claim costs relating to insurance contracts including estimates of costs relating to incurred but not reported claims based on the estimated ultimate cost of settling the claims (including effects of inflation and other societal and economic factors), using past experience adjusted for current trends and any other factors that would modify past experience in the year the policy went into force.

name: LiabilityReportingCurrencyDenominatedValue
description: The reporting currency-denominated liability value.

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowAdditionsToHeldForSale
description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of additions to loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

name: LongTermConstructionLoanCurrent
description: This element represents the current portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

name: LongTermContractForPurchaseOfElectricPowerShareOfPlantOutputBeingPurchased
description: Share of plant output being purchased under a long-term contract to purchase electricity from a production plant constructed and financed by a public utility district, cooperative, or other organization.

name: LossFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfCashFlowHedgeEffectiveness
description: The loss relating to components of the gain (loss) on the cash flow hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of cash flow hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: LossOnContractTerminationForDefault
description: The amount of the loss on termination of a contract for default.

name: MalpracticeInsuranceDeductible1
description: Amount of risk retained by the entity before the insurance arrangement begins to provide coverage.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsThereafter
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsWithinFiveYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateDelinquentPrincipalOrInterestAcquiredFromAffiliates
description: Amount of principal due on delinquent mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, acquired from controlled and other affiliates.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantEmployerContributionUnderCollectiveBargainingArrangementToTotalEmployerContributionPercentage
description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total employer contribution for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantPlanAsset
description: Amount of asset available for benefits to participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: MultiemployerPlansCollectiveBargainingArrangementPercentageOfParticipants
description: Percentage of employee participants subject to a collective bargaining arrangement to all participants in a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: NetCreditLossOnLoansManagedOrSecuritizedOrAssetbackedFinancingArrangement
description: Amount of credit loss after recoveries for transferred financial assets that continue to be recognized in the statement of financial position.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedFiveOrMoreYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedInCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in current fiscal year.

name: NoninterestbearingDomesticDepositOther
description: Amount of other noninterest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities.

name: OriginationOfLoanToPurchaseCommonStock
description: Cash outflow for origination of loan for purchasing common stock.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityAdjustmentFromAociForAccretionOfNoncreditPortionOfOttiAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToParentHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementSharesOutstanding
description: The number of shares outstanding as of the date of the statement of financial position in connection with an own-share lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

name: ParticipatingPolicyPercentageOfPremiumIncome
description: Percentage of participating insurance to premium income.

name: PaymentsForNuclearFuel
description: Cash outflow associated with the purchase of any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.

name: PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

name: PaymentsToAcquireTimberlands
description: The cash outflow for acquisition of timber and timberlands during the period.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedMortgageRelatedSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOrHeldForInvestment
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of mortgage-related securities, classified as available for sale or held for investment, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedLoansReceivablePledgedForOtherArrangements
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesForOtherDebtFacilities
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for debt facilities other than FHLB loans, repurchase agreements and letter of credit arrangements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredLifeAndAnnuity
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for life and annuity insurance contracts.

name: PostconfirmationGoodwill
description: Amount of goodwill at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredStockSharesSubscribedButUnissuedSubscriptionsReceivable
description: Amount of subscription receivable from investors who have been allocated nonredeemable preferred stock or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndPrincipalCollections
description: #N/A

name: PriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAssetAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative assets not designated as hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromLoanOriginations
description: #N/A

name: PriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfOtherReceivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale and collection of receivables classified as other.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherReceivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of receivables classified as other.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualBestEstimate
description: Best estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for damages pertaining to a specified product.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedBestEstimate
description: Best estimate of the loss exposure for a reasonably possible liability for product liability damages for which no accrual has been recorded.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExcludingLessorAssetUnderOperatingLeaseBeforeAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentEquipment
description: Period end book value of equipment owned (but not classified elsewhere) by the public utility.

name: QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyChargesAndCreditsAmountAffectingComparability
description: Amount of the item included in the interim period that affected period-to-period comparability (excluding restatement adjustments).

name: RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleNet
description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale, net of associated liabilities.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceComponent
description: The valuation allowance loss on real estate owned or any impairment losses taken against real estate investments held for use or resale.

name: RecordedThirdPartyEnvironmentalRecoveriesAmount
description: Recorded amount of the individual components comprising the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOtherRedemptionValue
description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for other shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

name: RepaymentsOfPollutionControlBond
description: The cash outflow from settlement of a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: ReportingUnitZeroOrNegativeCarryingAmountNumber
description: Number of reporting units with zero or negative amount of net assets.

name: RetailRelatedInventoryPackagingAndOtherSupplies
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items used in storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods that are targeted for sale to end users.

name: RetentionPayable
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionOtherPaymentsRequired
description: Other amounts the seller-lessee is required to pay under the terms of the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and lease of the property back to the seller, including reimbursements for such items, as utilities, taxes, insurance and common area maintenance.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionTransactionCostsInvestingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivableLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearFive
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivableLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearThree
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivableLeasePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivablePaymentsToBeReceivedRollingYearFour
description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: SecSchedule1218SupplementalInformationPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersCurrentYearClaimAndClaimAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of expense for claim incurred in current reporting period and related claim settlement cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: SecSchedule1218SupplementalInformationPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersPriorYearClaimAndClaimAdjustmentExpense
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claim incurred in prior reporting period and related claim settlement cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: SecuritiesLoanedGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: SecuritiesLoanedNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of security loaned to entity in exchange for collateral, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from security loaned.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAssociatedLiabilitiesFairValue
description: Fair value of liabilities arising from or related to a financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) which has been pledged to counterparties.

name: SecurityOwnedAndSoldNotYetPurchasedFairValueSecurityOwned
description: Fair value of financial instruments held by a broker-dealer for their own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes determined by management based upon quoted prices of a financial instrument with similar characteristics or on a valuation technique or model.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOf20PercentAdverseChangeInExpectedCreditLosses
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the expected credit, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsMaximumAmount
description: The maximum amount that the issuer could be required to pay to redeem the instrument by physical settlement, if applicable.

name: SignificantChangesFranchisesPurchasedDuringPeriod
description: The number of franchises purchased during the period when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

name: SignificantChangesFranchisesSold
description: The number of franchises sold during the period when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

name: StormDamageProvision
description: A noncash adjustment to the provision established for storm damage by an oil, gas, or utility company.

name: TaxBasisOfInvestmentsGrossUnrealizedDepreciation
description: The aggregate gross unrealized depreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of tax cost over value.

name: TheatricalFilmCostsCompletedAndNotReleased
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest related to the completion of a theatrical film not yet released. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TransfersOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsSaleInitialFairValueOfLiabilitiesIncurred
description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for liabilities incurred on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

name: ProceedsFromRecoveriesOfLoansPreviouslyChargedOff
description: #N/A

name: UnamortizedLossReacquiredDebtNoncurrent
description: Unamortized Loss on Reacquired Debt is the loss incurred upon reacquisition or refinancing of debt, is treated as a deferred charge and amortized over the life of the new debt issued.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnEnergyContracts
description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell energy at some future point, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: UnrealizedGainOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount of unrealized gain related to the increase in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: AccountsPayableInterestBearingNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate.

name: AdjustmentForLongTermIntercompanyTransactionsTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature or settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future.

name: AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConvertibleDebtInstrumentIssuedAtSubstantialPremium
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid-in capital (APIC) from recognition of substantial premium at which convertible debt instrument is issued.

name: AirlineCapacityPurchaseArrangements
description: Costs incurred related to air services provided by third-party transportation companies, including regional affiliates.

name: AmortizationAndDepreciationOfDecontaminatingAndDecommissioningAssets
description: The current period expense charged against earnings on decontaminating and decommissioning of facilities used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale to allocate or recognize the cost of the assets over their useful lives.

name: AmountOfRegulatoryAssistanceReceived1
description: Amount of regulatory assistance received from a federal regulatory agency in conjunction with either an acquisition of a troubled financial institution, transfer of nonperforming assets to a newly-formed entity, or other reorganization.

name: AmountOfRegulatoryCostsNotYetApproved
description: Amount of regulatory costs not yet approved by the regulatory authority.

name: AssetAcquisitionContingentConsiderationLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of liability recognized from contingent consideration in asset acquisition, classified as current.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockDeferredTaxAssetNet
description: Amount, after valuation allowance and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset pertaining to the closed block.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRollingYearThree
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BusinessCombinationAcquiredDirectFinancingLeaseReceivable
description: Amount of acquired direct financing lease receivable from business combination.

name: BusinessCombinationAssetsAndLiabilitiesArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognizedOtherThanAtFairValue
description: The net amount, measured at other than acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired and liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity, if the acquisition-date fair value cannot be determined and other criteria (as defined) related to the contingencies have been met.

name: BusinessCombinationAssetsArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognized
description: The amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesNoncurrent
description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesNoncurrent
description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases, and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesAllowanceForUncollectibleMinimumLeasePayments
description: The estimate of contractual payments on direct financing leases that are probable of not being collected as of the balance sheet date.

name: CarryingValueOfFederalFundsPurchasedSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseAndDepositsReceivedForSecuritiesLoaned
description: Carrying value of federal funds purchased and securities sold under repurchase agreements and deposits received for securities loaned.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesCarryingAmountNet
description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and other-than-temporary impairments), for certain contractual rights to receive money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsToNonaccretableDifference
description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, after acquisition of a loan, which results in a decrease in accretable yield (for example, as a result of an other-than-temporary impairment). This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: ClosedBlockInvestmentsAvailableForSaleChangeInUnrealizedAppreciation
description: The net increase or decrease in the period in the fair value of the fixed maturity and equity investments designated as available for sale as of the balance sheet date that were allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as a closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

name: ConcentrationRiskNetAssetsAmountGeographicArea
description: Carrying amount of total assets less total liabilities of a designated geographic area if disclosed as a concentration risk.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetNotPastDue
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, not past due.

name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsRealizedLosses
description: For investments in debt and equity securities accounted for at cost, the excess of the carrying amount over net sale proceeds of investments disposed of during the period and any losses recognized thereon for impairments of other than a temporary nature.

name: CostOfPurchasedWater
description: Cost of water purchased, may include any water related assessment. If water is bought on a unit volume basis, would also be considered as commodity costs.

name: CostsOfFranchisedOutlets
description: Costs incurred that are directly related to generating franchise revenues from franchised outlets.

name: CreditDerivativePurchasedCreditProtection
description: Amount of purchased credit protection expected to cover future payments under the credit risk derivative.

name: CustomerAdvancesNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future.

name: CustomerAdvancesOrDepositsNoncurrent
description: Aggregate noncurrent portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future, as well as the current portion of money or property received from customers that is to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleExcludingAccruedInterestCurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedFiveOrMoreYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedFourYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedInFiscalYearBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DeferredSalesInducementCostAmortizationExpenseAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense for deferred sales inducement cost from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: DeferredSalesInducementCostAmortizationExpenseAssumptionChange
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred sales inducement cost from assumption change.

name: DeferredStormAndPropertyReserveDeficiencyNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized storm costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredTaxAssetsFrequentFlierLiability
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from frequent flier obligations.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanPrescriptionDrugBenefitAccumulatedPostretirementBenefitObligationDecreaseForSubsidy
description: Amount of decrease in accumulated postretirement benefit obligation for government subsidy related to prescription drug benefits attributed to past service.

name: DemutualizationByInsuranceEntitySecuritiesIssuedGrossCashProceeds
description: The price per share or unit times the number of shares or units issued in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity. Amount is gross, before offering costs.

name: DerecognizedAssetsSecuritizedOrAssetbackedFinancingArrangementAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherNetCreditLossesDuringPeriod
description: Net credit losses are charge-offs and are based on total loans outstanding during the period.

name: DerivativeExchangeRateFloor1
description: Floor rate on a foreign currency derivative for example, but not limited to, a floor or a collar.

name: DerivativeInstrumentsLossRecognizedInIncomeIneffectivePortionAndAmountExcludedFromEffectivenessTesting
description: The portion of losses on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments representing (a) the amount of the hedge ineffectiveness and (b) the amount, if any, excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectOperatingCommunicationsCosts
description: Communications costs incurred and are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCosts
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCostsCompletedAndNotReleased
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest related to the completion of a direct-to-television film not yet released. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DividendsSharebasedCompensationPaidInKind
description: Amount of paid and unpaid paid-in-kind dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNondeductibleExpenseLeases
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to lease expense.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStructureIndirectLoanAmount
description: The amount reported as a liability as of the balance sheet date by the entity (the employer) of the loan made by a third-party lender to the employer relating to loans made by the employer to the ESOP.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPGainLossOnTransactionsInDeferredShares
description: The difference between cost and fair value added or subtracted from paid-in capital, arising from contribution of shares to an ESOP or commitments-to-release ESOP shares.

name: EnvironmentalCostsRecognizedCapitalized
description: Amount of costs recognized in the balance sheet for known or estimated future costs arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the extended product warranty liability. Excludes standard product warranties.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfLand
description: #N/A

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetCashPaymentsReceived
description: Amount of decreases to the indemnification asset due to cash payments received relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

name: FacilityCosts
description: Facility expenses incurred related to gas and oil produced and sold during the reporting period.

name: FairValueRecurringBasisUnobservableInputReconciliationAssetLiabilityGainLossOci
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFloatingRateUnderOneYear
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesPremium
description: Amount of unearned premiums on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCost
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostDevelopmentAndPreproduction
description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in development and preproduction of film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCost
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearOne
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized on its own and expected to be recognized within first operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThanOneAndWithinTwoYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivablePremiumExpectedToBeCollected
description: Amount of premium receivables under financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancingReceivableCoveredAndNotCoveredAfterAllowanceForCreditLossFeePremiumAndDiscount
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss and unamortized deferred fee, premium, and discount, of financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and financing receivable not covered under loss sharing agreement.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FlightEquipmentAccumulatedDepreciation
description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements) that has been recognized in the income statement.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseEquipment
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to equipment.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseLand
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to land.

name: GainLossFromHedgedFirmCommitmentNotQualifyingAsFairValueHedgeNet
description: Amount of net gain (loss) recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossOnInterestRateFairValueHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the period due to the ineffectiveness on interest rate fair value hedges.

name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfCreditCardPortfolio
description: The gain (loss) resulting from the sale of credit card receivables (portfolios).

name: GeneralAndAdministrativeCostsInInventoryAmountIncurred
description: Aggregate amount of general and administrative costs incurred in each period and charged to inventory.

name: GeneralPartnersCumulativeCashDistributions
description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the general partner.

name: GrantsReceivableNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.

name: HealthCareOrganizationExpensesNet
description: Total costs of health care costs, net of recoveries of stop-loss insurance. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).

name: HybridInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of hybrid instruments.

name: ImpactOfRestatementOnOpeningRetainedEarningsNetOfTax
description: Amount after tax of cumulative effect of restatement on the opening retained earnings of the earliest year presented.

name: IncomeLossBeforeGainOrLossOnSaleOfPropertiesExtraordinaryItemsAndCumulativeEffectsOfAccountingChanges
description: Amount of income (loss) before gain (loss) on sale of properties of Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT).

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
description: The amount of income (loss) derived from discontinued operations during the period, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

name: IncomeLossOfDiscontinuedOperationEquityMethodInvestmentRetainedAfterDisposalBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of the investee in which an equity method investment is retained after disposal of discontinued operation.

name: IncomeTaxRefundsDiscontinuedOperations
description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes from discontinued operations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCostInExcessOfBillingOnUncompletedContract
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromEmployeeCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from employees for floats, allowances and loans (generally evidenced by promissory notes).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToEmployeesCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in obligations due within one year (or one business cycle) to employees other than officers.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period in insurance industry assets which are classified as cash flows from operating activities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherInsuranceLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in insurance liabilities classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of the liability pertaining to obligations to return collateral that the entity received when it loaned securities to the counterparty to the transaction.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInUndisbursedLoanFunds
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in undistributed cash for loans that have been granted but not entirely funded.

name: InsuranceReceivableForMalpracticeCurrent
description: The current portion of the amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumerInstallmentAutomobilesMarineAndOtherVehicles
description: Interest and fee income generated by automobile, marine, and other vehicle loans made to individuals.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansOtherConsumer
description: Interest and fee income from other loans extended to individual consumers.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeNonmortgageLoansAndLeasesHeldForSale
description: Amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale, but excluding mortgage loans held-for sale.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositMoneyMarket
description: Amount of interest-bearing money market demand account deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesDemand
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic demand deposit liabilities.

name: InterestExpenseOnPrepetitionLiabilitiesRecognizedInStatementOfOperations
description: The amount of interest expense on prepetition obligations included in the statement of operations.

name: InterestIncomeLoansToOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of interest income from loans to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: InventoryOreStockpilesOnLeachPads
description: Amount before last-in first-out (LIFO) and valuation reserves of ore stockpile material contained on a leach pad, for example, but not limited to, copper or gold ore.

name: InventoryRealEstateOther
description: Amount of investment in certain other real estate investments not specifically identified elsewhere in the existing taxonomy.

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalancePrincipalAmount
description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

name: LeveragedLeasesBalanceSheetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesNet
description: The net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria to be classified as leveraged.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureDeferredTaxesArisingFromLeveragedLeases
description: Taxes arising from arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as leveraged leases due to timing differences between accounting and tax income recognition.

name: LiabilitiesOfBusinessTransferredUnderContractualArrangementNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion, due in greater than one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of liabilities resulting from the transfer of a business segment under contractual arrangement where the transferor maintains certain risks, obligations, or liabilities.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEnvironmentalContingencies
description: The amount of environmental remediation liabilities included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsNetPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in asbestos and environmental claims reserve, net of reinsurance recoveries.

name: LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseDisabilityAccidentAndHealth
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to disability, accident and health insurance insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date) and the amount needed to provide for the estimated ultimate cost required to investigate and settle claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date), whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodGainLoss
description: This item represents the gains or losses recognized and realized during the period on investments in life settlement contracts sold during the period.

name: LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts
description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the limited partners.

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountCovered
description: Net carrying amount of loans and leases receivable covered by loss sharing agreements.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeVolatilityRate
description: Percentage rate that is indicative of an expected degree of movement against a base line index, and which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

name: LongTermCommercialPaperCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

name: LongTermContractForPurchaseOfElectricPowerAmountOfLongTermDebtOrLeaseObligationOutstanding
description: Under long-term contracts with public utility districts, cooperatives or other organizations, a utility company receives a portion of the output of a production plant constructed and financed by the district or cooperative. The utility has only a nominal or no investment at all in the plant but pays a proportionate part of the plant's costs, including debt service.

name: LongTermPurchaseCommitmentMinimumEnergyVolumeRequired
description: Energy volume that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

name: LossContingencyPatentsFoundInfringedNumber
description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity was found to have infringed.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyDiscountRate
description: The interest rate used to discount the estimated cash flows associated with the payment of malpractice claims.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualHighEstimate
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualLowEstimate
description: #N/A

name: MarketDataRevenue
description: Amount of revenue from market data services, including, but not limited to, information about current quotes and most recent prices for a specific security.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedHighEstimate
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedLowEstimate
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyRecoveryFromThirdPartyOfEnvironmentalRemediationCost
description: #N/A

name: MarketRiskBenefitChangeInFairValueGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in fair value of contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk. Excludes change attributable to instrument-specific credit risk.

name: MultiemployerPlanContributionRateIncreaseDecrease
description: Increase (decrease) in employer's contractual contribution rate to multiemployer plan.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionSignificantAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

name: MultiemployerPlansMinimumContribution
description: Amount of minimum contribution(s) required for future periods to a multiemployer plan by collective bargaining arrangements, statutory obligations, or other contractual obligations. A multiemployer plan is a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: NetChangeInterestAndNoninterestBearingDepositsDomestic
description: The increase (decrease) in domestic interest and noninterest bearing deposits.

name: ProductWarrantyAccrualCurrencyTranslationIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedInFiscalYearBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionEmployeeBenefitLiabilitiesAssumed1
description: The amount of employee benefit liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: NumberOfPriceRiskDerivativesHeld
description: Number of price risk derivative instruments held by the entity at the reporting date.

name: OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToHeldToMaturityAdjustmentFromAociForAmortizationOfGainLossTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquityRedeemableStockRedemptionRequirementsAmount1
description: Amount of redeemable stock for issue of capital stock that are redeemable at fixed or determinable prices on fixed or determinable dates in each of the five years following the date of the latest statement of financial position presented.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiAfterTaxAndAdjustments
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: ProductionBarrelsOfOilEquivalents
description: #N/A

name: OtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments not designated as a hedging instrument.

name: OtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsLiabilitiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of all derivative liabilities not designated as a hedging instrument.

name: OtherInventoryDemo
description: Gross amount of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to which the entity holds the title and uses for the specific purpose of showing the benefits and features of the entity's products to existing or potential customers.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsCapitalAccount
description: Capital account balance of the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: OtherRealEstateCovered
description: Carrying amount of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToParentAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to the parent entity.

name: ParticipatingMortgageLoansUnamortizedDebtDiscountAmount
description: The amount of the related debt discount at the end of the accounting period.

name: ParticipatingPoliciesAmountInForce
description: Amount of participating insurance in force.

name: PaymentsForFilmCosts
description: Cash payments related to direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: PaymentsForParticipationLiabilities
description: Cash payments related to participation costs.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInterestEarningAssets
description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in other interest earning assets not separately disclosed.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstateHeldforinvestment
description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with the purchase (sale) of real estate held for investment, as opposed to operating, purposes.

name: PaymentsToAcquireWaterAndWasteWaterSystems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities; and waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsDemand
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedLoansPledgedForRepurchaseAgreementsAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans that are restricted as collateral for the payment of repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedOtherDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOrHeldForInvestment
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of other securities, classified as available for sale or held for investment, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritiesPledgedForOtherDebtObligationsAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredOther
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for benefits and costs incurred for other insurance contracts.

name: PostconfirmationAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
description: Amount of accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PromotionalAllowances
description: #N/A

name: PropaneCosts
description: #N/A

name: PropaneRevenue
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationEquipment
description: Amount of equipment at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseAssumptionChange
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from assumption change.

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromFinancingRevenueReceivedUnderLeases
description: Financing revenue received under leases during the current period by an entity that provides financial services.

name: ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfTrustPreferredSecurities
description: The cash inflow from issuance of trust preferred securities, net of the cash outflow for repurchasing trust preferred securities, by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfFurnitureAndFixtures
description: The cash inflow from sale of furniture and fixtures.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstateHeldforinvestment
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate held for investment not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

name: ProceedsFromSecuritizationsOfConsumerLoans
description: The cash inflow from the securitization of receivables for loans to consumers. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

name: ProceedsFromSecuritizationsOfLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from securitizing loans held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExcludingLessorAssetUnderOperatingLeaseAccumulatedDepreciation
description: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of accumulated amortization, depreciation, depletion for physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNumberOfAircraftSold
description: The number of aircraft sold by the entity during the period.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesImprovedRecovery
description: Changes in proved reserve estimates resulting from application of improved recovery techniques.

name: PublicUtilitiesAmountOfAllowanceForEarningsOnEquityCapitalizedForRateMakingPurposes
description: Discloses the amount of any allowance for earnings on shareholders' investment capitalized for rate making purposes but not for the financial statements.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfConstructionWorkInProcessIncludedInRateBase
description: Discloses the amount of construction work in process that is included in the rate making process at period end.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentFuel
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to fuels owned by the public utility.

name: RealEstateAssetsHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
description: For banks, the total amount of real estate assets held for development and sale.

name: ReclamationAndMineShutdownProvision
description: Adjustment of the mine reclamation or mine shutdown liability account that is made when estimates of future costs are changed.

name: RefundableGasCosts
description: Gas costs of a regulated entity that are refundable through future rate adjustments. Such costs are a form of a regulatory liabilities and are expected to be refunded in less than one year through rate adjustments.

name: RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesDeferred
description: The amount of any deferred tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

name: RequiredNetCapitalUnderCommodityExchangeAct1
description: Amount of net capital required to be maintained by futures commission merchant (FCM) per Commodity Futures Trading Commission's (CFTC) requirement.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentAssetAcquiredOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationFairValueAcquired
description: The fair value of capitalized costs of a research and development nature that were acquired during the period in a transaction other than a business combination.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionQuarterlyRentalPayments
description: The amount of the quarterly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

name: SalesTypeLeaseResidualValueOfLeasedAsset
description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee under sales-type lease. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedNotOffsetPolicyElectionDeduction
description: Amount of security borrowed from entity in exchange for collateral, subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement and not elected or qualified to offset, deducted from security borrowed.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeAverage
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMaximum
description: #N/A

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMinimum
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionCapitalizedCost
description: The amount by which an asset or assets increased resulting from the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

name: SiteContingencyRecoveryFromThirdPartyOfEnvironmentalRemediationCost
description: Amount of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period for an individual site that reduces environmental remediation expense.

name: StatutoryCapitalAndSurplusApplyingNationalAssociationOfInsuranceCommissionersNAICPractices
description: Amount of statutory capital and surplus computed using statutory accounting practices prescribed by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

name: TaxBasisOfInvestmentsGrossUnrealizedAppreciation
description: Aggregate gross unrealized appreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of value over tax cost.

name: TheatricalFilmCosts
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearOne
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearTwo
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TimesharingTransactionsStatedInterestRateForNotesReceivable
description: Stated interest rate of notes receivable from time-sharing transactions.

name: TradingSecuritiesRealizedLoss
description: This item represents the loss realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAtBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of unbilled receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: VariableInterestEntityNumberOfEntitiesWithUnavailabilityOfInformation
description: Number of Variable Interest Entities (VIE) or potential VIEs for which the necessary information is unable to be obtained to: (1) determine whether the legal entity is a VIE, (2) determine whether it (the reporting entity) is the VIE's primary beneficiary, or (3) perform the accounting required to consolidate the VIE for which it is determined that it (the reporting entity) is the primary beneficiary.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: VentureCapitalGainsLossesNet
description: Amount of gain (loss) on venture capital activities. Includes venture capital revenue, fair value adjustments, interest and dividends, investment gain (loss) and fee or other income from venture capital activities.

name: AccountsPayableInterestBearingCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate.
