name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentNonaccrual
description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentNotCreditLossNetOfTaxDebtSecurities
description: Total of accumulated other comprehensive loss related to that portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized either as available-for-sale or held-to-maturity that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

name: ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE
description: #N/A

name: AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesESOPConvertiblePreferredStock
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

name: AociDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleWithoutAllowanceForCreditLossCumulativeGainLossAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) without allowance for credit loss.

name: AssetAcquisitionConsiderationTransferredOtherAssets
description: Amount of tangible and intangible assets included as part of consideration transferred in asset acquisition, classified as other. Excludes cash.

name: ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE
description: #N/A

name: AssetAcquisitionContingentConsiderationLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of liability recognized from contingent consideration in asset acquisition, classified as noncurrent.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockOtherInvestments
description: Amount of other investments held by the closed block.

name: ProvedUndevelopedReservesBOE
description: #N/A

name: ProvedUndevelopedReservesVolume
description: #N/A

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockPremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet
description: Amount, after the allowance for doubtful accounts, of premium and other receivables held by the closed block.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesSharesIssued
description: Number of auction market preferred securities shares issued.

name: AuctionRateSecuritiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of securities that are debt instruments (corporate or municipal bonds) that typically have long-term nominal maturities for which the interest rate is reset through an auction process.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherFairValueVolatilityRate
description: This item represents the volatility of the security's fair value, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRatioCapitalAdequacyMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRollingYearFour
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BelowMarketLeasePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in acquired leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementSalesTypeLeaseRevenue
description: Revenue realized in the period on sales type leases.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesCurrent
description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesMinimumPaymentsToBeReceived
description: Amount of remaining payments as of the balance sheet date that lessees are obligated to make or can be required to make under sales-type leases, including any guarantee of residual value and executory costs. The amount also includes any guaranteed rental payments by an unrelated third-party provided that are financially capable of making such payments.

name: CapitalRequirementOfConsolidatedBrokerDealerSubsidiaryElectingAlternativeMethod
description: Minimum amount of net capital of broker-dealer subsidiary, calculated under Alternative Standard.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorServicingFeeAdvances
description: Cash flows between transferor and transferee in payment of service fees in advance, prior to or in contemplation of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor will have continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAccretableYieldReclassificationsToNonaccretableDifference
description: Amount of decrease from reclassification to nonaccretable difference of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAndDebtSecuritiesAcquiredInTransferNoAllowanceRecordedAndNoSubsequentImpairment
description: The recorded amount of loans and debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it was probable, at acquisition, that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable, but which are not deemed to be impaired since the acquisition by transfer. Therefore, no allowance for credit losses is recorded.

name: CertainLoansAndDebtSecuritiesAcquiredInTransferWithRelatedAllowanceForCreditLossesDueToSubsequentImpairment
description: The recorded amount of loans and debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it was probable, at acquisition, that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable. They are deemed to be impaired since the acquisition and an allowance for credit losses has been recorded. Disclosure is gross of the allowance.

name: ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemInForeignCurrencyFairValueHedge1
description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a foreign currency fair value hedge which was recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

name: CharityCareDirectAndIndirectCostBasisAmount
description: The amount of charity care provided during the period based on the provider's direct and indirect costs of providing charity care services.

name: ClosedBlockAssetsAndLiabilitiesChangeInPolicyholderDividendObligation
description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block, the change in the period in the obligation representing amounts to be distributed to policyholders owning contracts in the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

name: ClosedBlockAssetsAndLiabilitiesEffectOnOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The increase or decrease in the period in other comprehensive income within the closed block comprised of the change in (a) dividend obligation to policyholders of the closed block, and (b) unrealized gain (loss) on available for sale securities allocated to the closed block.

name: ContractReceivableDueAfterOneYear
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfAcquisitionAdjustments
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetAllowanceForCreditLossRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from recovery.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

name: CostOfServicesCatering
description: Cost of food and beverage catering for passengers.

name: CustomersLiabilityForAcceptancesNet
description: The aggregate of all customer's outstanding debt to the institution that resulted from short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions), net of allowance for uncollectible customer's liability for acceptances.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleLiquidationPreferencePerShare
description: Per share excess of preference in liquidation over convertible debt instrument's if-converted par or stated value of share.

name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleLiquidationPreferenceValue
description: Amount of excess of preference in liquidation over convertible debt instrument's if-converted par or stated value of share.

name: DebtInstrumentCumulativeSinkingFundPayments
description: Cumulative amount paid into a fund, which is used to retire the debt instrument.

name: DebtOfSubsidiaryNotAssumed
description: Debt of a subsidiary that has not been assumed or guaranteed by the entity and any liens on premises of a subsidiary, or its consolidated subsidiaries, which have not been assumed by the entity, or its consolidated subsidiaries.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityAmortizedCostBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossExpense
description: Amount of credit loss expense on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) transferred into held-to-maturity out of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesGainLossExcludingOtti
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturity90DaysOrMorePastDueStillAccruing
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentNuclearFuelUnderCapitalLease
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityRollingAfterFiveThroughTenYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityRollingAfterOneThroughFiveYearsWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityRollingWithinOneYearWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsInterestIncomeOnAccumulatedCash1
description: Amount of interest income on accumulated cash, reported as a reorganization item.

name: DeferredAdvertisingCosts
description: The costs of direct-response advertising whose primary purpose is to elicit sales to customers who could be shown to have responded specifically to the advertising and that results in probable future benefits and are reported as assets net of accumulated amortization.

name: DeferredCostsCreditCardOriginationCostsAmount
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and related credit card fees, of credit card origination costs not related to private label credit cards.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) deferred policy acquisition costs.

name: DeferredSalesInducementCostImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred sales inducement cost.

name: DeferredSetUpCostsNoncurrent
description: Deferred incremental direct costs incurred typically at a contract's inception so that the company may be in a position to fulfill all contractual obligations of an arrangement. The costs are directly related to specified activities under the arrangement and are deferred in order to match revenue that will be recognized after one year from the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle if longer). Excludes start-up costs (such as one-time activities related to opening a new facility, introducing a new product or service, establishing business with a new class of customers, preopening costs, and organization costs), which are expensed as incurred.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGrossCurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as current.

name: DefinedBenefitPlanEstimatedAmountOfPlanParticipantsFutureBenefitsCoveredByInsuranceContractsIssuedByEmployerOrRelatedParties
description: Amount of future annual benefit for defined benefit plan participant covered by insurance contract. Includes, but is not limited to, contract issued by employer or its related party.

name: DerecognizedAssetsSecuritizedOrAssetbackedFinancingArrangementAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherDelinquentAmountAtEndOfPeriod
description: This is the amount of the financial instruments that are considered delinquent (past due) at the end of the period.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: DerivativeAverageBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The average percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the group of interest rate derivatives.

name: DerivativeAverageFloorInterestRate
description: Average floor rate on a group of interest rate derivatives, such as interest rate floor or collars. If market rates fall below the floor rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

name: DerivativeExchangeRateCap1
description: Cap rate on a foreign currency derivative for example, but not limited to, a cap or a collar.

name: DerivativeExcludedComponentLossRecognizedInEarnings
description: Amount of loss from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

name: DerivativeForeignCurrencyOptionStrikePrice
description: The strike price on the foreign currency option contract such as a put option or a call option.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseVariableLeaseIncome
description: Amount of direct financing lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIntraEntityAmountsDiscontinuedOperationAfterDisposalExpense
description: Amount of expense in continuing operations related to continuing involvement in a discontinued operation after the disposal that before the disposal was eliminated as intra-entity transactions.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCapitalLeasedAssets
description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as deferred tax assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPostretirementPlanBenefitObligation
description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

name: DistributionsPerGeneralPartnershipUnitOutstanding
description: Cash dividends declared or paid to each outstanding general partnership unit during the reporting period.

name: DistributionsPerLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitOutstandingBasic
description: Cash dividends declared or paid to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit during the reporting period.

name: QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAssetOrLiabilityTransferorsContinuingInvolvementSecuritizationOrAssetbackedFinancingPrincipalAmountOutstandingContinuedRecognitionAmount
description: #N/A

name: QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAssetOrLiabilityTransferorsContinuingInvolvementSecuritizationOrAssetbackedFinancingPrincipalAmountOutstandingDerecognizedAmount
description: #N/A

name: QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAssetsOrLiabilitiesForTransferorsContinuingInvolvementInSecuritizationOrAssetbackedFinancingArrangementPrincipalAmountsOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsMedicarePrescriptionDrugBenefit
description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPInterestPaymentsFromESOP
description: An entity often discloses the amount of interest paid by the ESOP to a lender.

name: EnergyRelatedInventoryPropaneGas
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of product derived from petroleum during the processing of oil or natural gas which is then used as a heat source or fuel.

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialCapitalizedCost
description: Amount of capitalized cost for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material.

name: RatioOfIndebtednessToNetCapital
description: #N/A

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialExpectedAmortizationYearOne
description: Amount of amortization for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material expected to be recognized within first operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialExpectedAmortizationYearThree
description: Amount of amortization for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material expected to be recognized within third operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreciationExpense
description: #N/A

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialExpectedAmortizationYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material expected to be recognized within second operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentDeferredGainOnSale
description: This element represents disclosure of the amount of gain which has been deferred as the result of the sale of a business or operating assets to a highly leveraged entity which deferred gain has been reflected in the accompanying statement of financial position as reduction from the related asset.

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Change in carrying amount of the indemnification asset relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). The change includes for example, but is not limited to, acquisitions, additional estimated losses, disposals, cash payments, accretion of discount and write-offs, net of recoveries.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesAffordableHousingProgramPrincipalOutstanding
description: Principal amount outstanding of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) relating to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

name: FilmCostsAmortizedInNextOperatingCycle
description: The amount of film costs related to completed films that are expected to be amortized during the upcoming operating cycle.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostCompletedAndNotReleased
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for completed and not released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAccumulatedDepreciation
description: #N/A

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearOne
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements and expected to be recognized within first operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearThree
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements and expected to be recognized within third operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements and expected to be recognized within second operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarryingAmountOfLandAndBuildingsAndImprovements
description: #N/A

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostCompletedAndNotReleased
description: Amount of capitalized film cost for completed and not released film predominantly monetized on its own.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearThree
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized on its own and expected to be recognized within third operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationYearTwo
description: Amount of amortization for released film predominantly monetized on its own and expected to be recognized within second operating cycle following most recent annual statement of financial position.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognized
description: Amount of unearned premium revenue under contracts issued by an insurance entity that provide protection to the holder of a financial obligation from a financial loss in the event of a default.

name: RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationLifeUsedForDepreciation
description: #N/A

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedDuringFirstQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in next fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedDuringFourthQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in fourth fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedDuringSecondQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in second fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedDuringThirdQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in third fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThanFourAndWithinFiveYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThanThreeAndWithinFourYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThanTwoAndWithinThreeYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableAccretionOfDiscountOnPremiumReceivable
description: Amount of accretion of the discount for premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedPhysicalCommoditiesAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in physical commodity contracts (for example, agricultural products, metals and energy). Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedStateAndMunicipalGovernmentObligationsAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in fixed income obligations issued by state and local governments and authorities. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancingReceivableCoveredAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCostsCostOfSales
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePreferredAndCommonStockHeldInTreasury
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to preferred and common stock held in treasury.

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCostsInAcquiredInventory
description: #N/A

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainContingencyPatentsFoundNotInfringedUponNumber
description: Number of entity's patents that another entity was found not to have infringed.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfInterestRateFairValueHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) included in earnings for the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on interest rate fair value hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfProvedProperty
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property with proven oil and gas reserves.

name: GeneralAndAdministrativeCostsInInventoryAmountRemaining
description: Actual or estimated amount of general and administrative costs remaining in inventory.

name: GoodwillNotAllocatedAmount
description: Portion of goodwill not yet allocated to reportable segments.

name: GuaranteedBenefitLiabilityNet
description: Sum of the amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date, net of reinsurance recoverables, for all guaranteed benefit types.

name: HealthCareOrganizationRevenueNetOfPatientServiceRevenueProvisions
description: Amount of patient service revenue recognized, net of contractual allowances and discounts, less the provision for bad debts related to patient service revenue plus all other revenue.

name: HostingArrangementServiceContractImplementationCostImpairment
description: Amount of impairment loss on capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestBeforeIncomeTax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInBalancingAccountUtility
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the asset created by the regulatory convention in which costs and revenues associated with certain utility expenses (such as fuel) are accumulated but on which no return is earned.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInContractReceivablesNet
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables arising from the contracting of goods and services, net for uncollectible accounts.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDepositsWithOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFuturePolicyBenefitReservesAndOtherInsuranceLiabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in estimated future policy benefit obligations under insurance contracts, and obligations under insurance contracts classified as other.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidAdvertising
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits in future periods.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRegulatoryClauseRevenue
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in unrecovered fuel costs for a regulated utility company.

name: InitialFranchiseFees
description: The amount of initial franchise fees.

name: RealEstateOwnedAmountOfLossAtAcquisition
description: #N/A

name: InsuranceTax
description: Represents total insurance tax expense reflected in the income statement for each period presented.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialIndustrialAndAgriculturalLoans
description: Interest and fee income generated from all commercial, industrial, and agricultural loans.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansRealEstateConstruction
description: Interest and fee income from loans used for real estate development and construction costs. Such loans are referred to as "Construction" loans or mortgages.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesNoticeOfWithdrawal
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesWithdrawalPenalties
description: Early withdrawal penalties on domestic deposits which discourage customer withdrawal prior to maturity.

name: RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowanceProvision
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
description: Total interest expense on long-term debt and capital securities.

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesCorporateDebtOperating
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on corporate debt securities.

name: InventoryForLongTermContractsOrProgramsGeneralAndAdministrativeCostsIncludedInInventory
description: The actual or estimated amount of general and administrative expense remaining in inventory as of the balance sheet date.

name: InventoryGasInStorageUndergroundNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet future seasonal and peak load demands and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a noncurrent asset because it is not expected to be used within 12 months or in the normal operating cycle.

name: RealEstateRevenueNet
description: #N/A

name: InventoryRealEstateImprovements
description: Represents improvements to real estate during development for ultimate sale to third parties. Improvements may consist of project infrastructure and other expenditures necessary to completion of the development project which is generally of a long-term nature.

name: InventoryRealEstateTimeshareAvailableForSale
description: Amount of real estate which is available for sale in the form of shared property ownership in which rights vest in several owners (buyers, timeshare holders) to use the property for a specified period each year (timeshare). Included in this item would be real estate assets in which timeshares are for sale, such as in condominiums at timeshare resorts. Excluded from this item would be assets, other than real estate, in which the Entity has sold or intends to sell timeshares, such as for cruises, recreational vehicles, campgrounds, aircraft (fractional ownership) and other types of rights.

name: RealEstateWriteDownOrReserveAmount
description: #N/A

name: RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesAndCostMethodInvestmentsExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairmentsAndOtherInvestments
description: #N/A

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributableEarningsLossAccumulatedLongTermCapitalGainLoss
description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from long-term capital gain (loss) of investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyFinancialSupportToInvesteeContractuallyRequiredAmount
description: Amount of financial support committed by investment company to investee that is contractually required.

name: LeveragedLeasesIncomeStatementIncomeFromLeveragedLeases
description: Pretax lease income allocated in proportionate amounts from unearned income.

name: LeveragedLeasesIncomeStatementIncomeTaxExpenseOnLeveragedLeases
description: The tax effect from the current year income from arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as a leveraged lease.

name: ReceivableForRecoveryOfImportDutiesNetCurrent
description: #N/A

name: ReceivableForRecoveryOfImportDutiesNetNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationContractsOtherLiabilityAdjustments
description: Net amount of other increases or decreases to the liability for guaranteed minimum benefits on long-duration contracts occurring during the period.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseCapitalLeaseObligationsAndAccruedInterest
description: The amount of capital lease obligations and related accrued interest included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued obligations to policy and contract holders for long-duration insurance contracts.

name: LiabilityForTitleClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpense
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling asserted and unasserted claims estimated to have been incurred by the insureds on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to the existence of a lien, encumbrance, defect or other matter purportedly affecting the title to the interest as insured.

name: LiabilityPremiumDeficiencyTestingOnLongDurationContractAmount
description: Amount of liability from premium deficiency and loss recognition testing on long-duration contract issued by insurance entity. Excludes closed block.

name: LongTermDebtAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of long-term debt.

name: LongTermTransitionBond
description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the noncurrent portion.

name: ReceivablesChangeInMethodOfCalculatingImpairmentRecordedInvestment
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyAccrualInsuranceRelatedAssessmentDiscountRate
description: The rate applied as of the balance sheet date to reduce the undiscounted amount of a guarantee fund and other insurance-related assessments to present value.

name: LossContingencyRelatedReceivableCarryingValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of receivables pertaining to a loss contingency.

name: MembershipsInExchangesOwned
description: Amount of capitalized cost for obtaining membership with right to do business on trading exchange.

name: MineralPropertiesAccumulatedImpairment
description: The accumulated decrease in the carrying value of the mineral properties as a result of adjustments in estimates of future income generating potential of the mineral property.

name: MultipleEmployerPlanAccountedForAsMultiemployerPlanContributionByParticipatingEntity
description: Amount of contributions made by entity participating in defined benefit plan, defined as multiple-employer plan but accounted for as multiemployer plan.

name: ReceivablesHeldForSaleNetAmount
description: #N/A

name: NetCapitalUnderCommodityExchangeActComputation
description: Amount of adjusted net capital of futures commission merchant (FCM) per Commodity Futures Trading Commission's (CFTC) requirement.

name: NetChangeAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertificates
description: The cash inflow or outflow for an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

name: NetInvestmentHedgeDerivativesAtFairValueNet
description: Net fair value of all derivatives designated as hedges of net investment in foreign operations.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnBasicEarningsPerShare
description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on basic earnings per share.

name: NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAccountingPrincipleEffectOfChangeOnDilutedEarningsPerShare
description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on diluted earnings per share.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFinancialOrEquityInstrumentConsiderationOptionsIssued1
description: The number of options issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossLimitedPartnershipsRedeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling partner of a limited partnership.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossPreferredUnitHoldersNonredeemable
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling preferred unit holders.

name: NotesReceivableByOwnerToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLC
description: Amount of an agreement for an unconditional promise by an owner to pay limited liability company (LLC) a definite sum of money at a future date.

name: ReclassificationToUnappropriatedRetainedEarnings
description: #N/A

name: ObligationWithJointAndSeveralLiabilityArrangementAmountRecognized
description: Amount of joint and several liability recognized in the balance sheet.

name: OciEquityMethodInvestmentBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionBeforeTaxAfterReclassificationAdjustment
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForDerecognitionTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

name: OtherInventoryNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of inventories not expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle (such as inventory related to long-term contracts or program rights).

name: OtherInvestmentNotReadilyMarketableQuotedValue
description: Value of the other investments measured by quoted price.

name: OtherRealEstateCoveredValuationAdjustments
description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherRealEstateNonCovered
description: Carrying amount of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToParent
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

name: PaymentToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicyOperatingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

name: PaymentsForDepositsWithOtherInstitutions
description: Cash paid to make deposits at other institutions during the period.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromMortgageDeposits
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the mortgage.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing leases held for investment purposes during an accounting period.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: Amount of cash outflow from purchases of loans and leases held-for-investment classified as other.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsBrokered
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic brokered deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedMortgageRelatedSecuritiesHeldToMaturity
description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of mortgage-related securities classified as held to maturity which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PolicyholdersSurplus
description: Amount of policyholders' surplus excluded from calculating deferred taxes.

name: PostconfirmationLand
description: Amount of land at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPostconfirmationCreditFacility
description: Amount of long-term postconfirmation date credit facility at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPreferredStock
description: Amount of preferred stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationAmortizableIntangibleAssetsNet
description: Amount of intangible assets subject to amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDebtorInPossessionFinancing
description: Amount of long-term debt related to debtor-in-possession financing at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of current deferred income tax liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationEquipment
description: Amount of equipment at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: RecyclingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockSharesAuthorized
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: RedeemableConvertiblePreferredStockValueExcludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationLand
description: Amount of land at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationPensionObligations
description: Amount of noncurrent pension obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreferredUnitsCumulativeCashDistributions
description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the preferred partners.

name: PreferredUnitsCumulativeNetIncome
description: The amount of aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to preferred partners.

name: PrepaidMineralRoyaltiesNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized amounts paid for mineral royalties which will be charged against earnings after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: PreproductionCostsRelatedToLongTermSupplyArrangementsAssetForMoldsDiesAndToolsOwned
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of molds, dies, and other tools that will be used in producing products under a long-term supply arrangement.

name: PrescriptionDrugBenefitEffectOfSubsidyOnNetPeriodicPostretirementBenefitCost1
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in net periodic benefit cost from government subsidy for prescription drug benefits.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseRealizedGainLoss
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from realized investment gain (loss).

name: PriceRiskDerivativesAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative assets, net of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.

name: ProceedsFromDepositsWithOtherInstitutions
description: Cash received from refund of deposits with other institutions during the period.

name: ProceedsFromLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: The cash inflow from the sale of a lease held for investment, which may be a lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityRangeOfEstimatedFairValueHigh
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromRefundsFromSuppliersOfMaterial
description: Cash received for refunds from suppliers during the current period. This element includes refunds from suppliers of materials; it excludes refunds from providers of fixed assets.

name: RedeemablePreferredStock
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyAccrualDiscountRate
description: Rate applied to the undiscounted amount of estimated damages for product liability to arrive at the present value recorded as of the balance sheet date.

name: RedeemablePreferredStockIncreaseDecreaseInCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockIssueIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockSharesAuthorized
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockSharesIssued
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockSharesOutstanding
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockSubscriptionsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: RedeemablePreferredStockValueExcludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
description: #N/A

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyThirdPartyRecovery
description: Amount of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

name: ProductionCostsCumulative
description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to operate and maintain wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities. They become part of the cost of oil and gas produced. Examples of production costs (sometimes called lifting costs) are: costs of labor to operate the wells and related equipment and facilities; repairs and maintenance; materials, supplies, and fuel consumed and supplies utilized in operating the wells and related equipment and facilities; property taxes and insurance applicable to proved properties and wells and related equipment and facilities; severance taxes; some support equipment or facilities may serve two or more oil and gas producing activities and may also serve transportation, refining, and marketing activities. To the extent that the support equipment and facilities are used in oil and gas producing activities, their depreciation and applicable operating costs become exploration, development or production costs, as appropriate. Depreciation, depletion, and amortization of capitalized acquisition, exploration, and development costs are not production costs but also become part of the cost of oil and gas produced along with production (lifting) costs identified above.

name: ProductiveGasWellsNumberOfWellsGross
description: Number of producing gas wells and gas wells capable of production with working interest ownership.

name: RefiningAndMarketingCosts
description: #N/A

name: RefiningAndMarketingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ProgramRightsObligations
description: Total amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements.

name: ProgressPaymentsNettedAgainstInventoryForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount of advances received from customers under long-term contracts which have been offset against inventories accounts at the balance sheet date.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfLossRecoveryOnPlantAbandonment
description: Amount of loss (recovery of loss) related to a plant abandonment.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentLand
description: Period end book value of land owned by the public utility.

name: QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationTransferorsContinuingInvolvementArrangementsOfFinancialSupportAmount
description: The transferor's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its continuing involvement in transferred financial assets.

name: RealEstateInsurance
description: A contract to provide coverage or protection in exchange for a payment or "premium". Examples of insurance protection include liability and property insurance. The entity paying the premiums for the protection will have insurance expense and possibly an asset, Prepaid Insurance (if the premiums are paid in advance).

name: RealEstateInventoryConstructionMaterials
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unprocessed goods that will be used in the course of a construction project which will become a part of the finished inventory.

name: RealEstateInvestmentPartnershipRevenue
description: Amount of revenue recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

name: RealEstateOwnedAmountOfLossAtAcquisition1
description: Amount of reduction to fair value of loan related to real estate owned (REO) at time of acquisition.

name: ReceivableForRecoveryOfImportDutiesNet
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of tariffs due either from customers or suppliers arising from sales or purchases, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities or vendors.

name: ReceivablesWithImputedInterestAmortizationAmount
description: The amount of amortization of the discount or premium on the note or receivable which was the result of the determination of present value in cash or noncash transactions, recognized in the statement of operations for the period.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenuePipelines
description: The amount of regulated pipeline operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RegulatoryAssetsNoncurrentFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are not expected to be recovered through revenue sources.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablePastDue
description: Amount of reinsurance recoverable past due.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesAllowance
description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.

name: ResultsOfOperationsGeneralAndAdministrativeRelatedToOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: General and administrative costs from oil & gas producing activities.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionTransactionCostsFinancingActivities
description: Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.

name: SalesTypeLeaseImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedFiveOrMoreYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedFourYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedInCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in current fiscal year.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedInFiscalYearBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

name: SecuredDemandNotes
description: Represents the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans made to broker-dealers which are generally secured by marketable securities owned by the borrower broker-dealer but held by the lender, are interest-bearing, and payable upon demand. The right to demand payment may be conditioned upon the occurrence of certain events.

name: ReimbursementRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesBorrowedGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountRepledgedAndSold
description: The fair value of collateral received that has been sold or re-pledged and is owed to the debtor (transferor) upon settlement of the related contractual obligation under which it was received.

name: ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncurredNetAmount
description: #N/A

name: ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncurredPoliciesAcquiredInPeriod
description: #N/A

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOfOtherThan10Or20PercentAdverseChangeInPrepaymentSpeedPercent
description: A specified percentage variance in the prepayment speed assumption in the determination of fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities).

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

name: ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompaniesByProductSegmentAmountAssumedFromOtherCompanies
description: #N/A

name: ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompaniesByProductSegmentAmountCededToOtherCompanies
description: #N/A

name: ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompaniesByProductSegmentGrossAmount
description: #N/A

name: ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompaniesByProductSegmentNetAmount
description: #N/A

name: ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompaniesByProductSegmentPercentageOfAmountAssumedToNet
description: #N/A

name: SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanSuspenseShares
description: Number of suspense shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Suspense shares are shares that have not been released, committed to be released or allocated to individual participant accounts.

name: SubadvisoryFeesForMutualFunds
description: Subadvisory fees that the funds adviser pays for out of the management fee, which it receives from the fund.

name: ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecoverable
description: #N/A

name: SubsequentEventEffectOfChangeInTaxStatus
description: Monetary effect of a change in the tax status effective after year-end but before the financial statements for the reporting period are issued or available to be issue by the entity.

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteeDeferredIncomeTaxProvisionOnCumulativeGainLossRecognizedAmount
description: The amount provided for deferred income taxes in relation to any gain (loss) recognized in income of the entity resulting from the issuance of shares by a subsidiary or equity method investee.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingTransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsProvisionalLiability
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: ThresholdPercentageOfValueDeclineInEquitySecuritiesToBeConsideredOtherThanTemporaryImpairment
description: Threshold percentage by which investments in equity securities have declined in value to be considered other than temporary impairment (OTTI).

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearThree
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TradingSecuritiesRestricted
description: Total of all securities that are purchased with the intent to be sold in the short-term and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

name: UnderlyingDerivativeEnergyMeasure
description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in energy volume but not the derivative contract itself.

name: UnderlyingDerivativeMass
description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in mass but not the derivative contract itself.

name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnHybridInstrumentNet
description: Amount of the unrealized gain (loss) in earnings for the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value on hybrid instruments measured at fair value.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) arising from the change in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemEarningsPerShareImpactNet
description: Per share amount of earnings, after tax, of an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenance
description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance and repairs of regulated operation.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLosses
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityOtherMeasureOfActivityAmount
description: The amount of activity, consisting of a transaction or a measure not described elsewhere in the taxonomy, occurring during the period between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE) or potential VIE.

name: WaterProductionCosts
description: Cost incurred related to water production and may include cost of treatment plants, pumps, pipes and reservoir, purchased water, power and pump taxes as well as the cost of reducing water leakage.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesPercentageOfTotal
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageRateInterestBearingDomesticDepositsOverTime
description: Weighted average interest rate calculated over time for domestic deposit liability.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrent90DaysOrMorePastDueStillAccruing
description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentAccruedInterestWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent recognized by reversing interest income.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentNotPastDue
description: Amount of accounts receivable not past due, classified as noncurrent.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedFourYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedInCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated in current fiscal year.

name: RelatedPartyDebtNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedInFiscalYearBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

name: AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsuranceCurrentWeightedAverageDiscountRate
description: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

name: AdvancesReceivedOnGovernmentContractsNotNettedAgainstAccountsReceivable
description: Advances received on government contracts that are not offset against receivables because they cannot be definitely regarded as payments on account for contract work in progress.

name: AdvertisingBarterTransactionsAdvertisingBarterRevenue
description: Total revenue recognized from advertising barter transactions for each income statement presented.

name: AgriculturalRelatedInventory
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or supplies held which are related to plants and animals.

name: AgriculturalRelatedInventoryPlantMaterial
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of products that are used in the growth of plant goods (examples would include seeds, soil, fertilizers and other products).

name: AllCertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesNotAccountedForUsingIncomeRecognitionModel
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer, for which it was deemed probable at acquisition that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments, and to which the income recognition total model was not applied.

name: AmortizationOfDeferredPropertyTaxes
description: The amount of amortization charged against earnings during the period for deferred property taxes.

name: AmortizationOfNuclearFuelLease
description: Amount of amortization of nuclear fuel.

name: AmortizationOfPowerContractsEmissionCredits
description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized costs related to purchasing power, fuel, or emission credits. These items may be purchased in one accounting period but are deducted from earnings over time through amortization.

name: AmortizationOfRateDeferral
description: The periodic expense to reduce the value of the rate deferral asset that is created when utilities under bill customers during periods of rate increases by deferring rate increases. These customers eventually pay higher rates to repay the utility for the rate deferral.

name: RelatedPartyTransactionRevenuesFromTransactionsWithRelatedParty
description: #N/A

name: AssetRecoveryDamagedPropertyCostsNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the reserved funds established by a utility from customer payments to cover the repair costs of damages from major storms, which repairs are expected to be incurred beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockEquitySecuritiesAtFairValue
description: Fair value of equity securities allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockEquitySecuritiesAvailableForSaleAtFairValue
description: Fair value of equity securities designated as available for sale, which are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockTradingSecuritiesDebt
description: Amount of investments in debt securities classified as trading that are held by the closed block.

name: AssetsThatContinueToBeRecognizedSecuritizedOrAssetBackedFinancingArrangementAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherNetCreditLossesDuringPeriod
description: Amount of net credit losses charged off.

name: AssumptionForFairValueOnSecuritizationDateOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesExpectedCreditLosses
description: Rate at which principal will not be repaid on securitized financial assets, including for example, but not limited to, expected static pool losses for initial fair value measurement.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesLiquidationValue
description: The amount of the liquidation value for auction market preferred securities.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherDefaultRate
description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: BankingRegulationCountercyclicalCapitalBuffer
description: Countercyclical capital buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationGlobalSystemicallyImportantBankGsibSurcharge
description: Global systemically important bank (GSIB) surcharge percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRatioWellCapitalizedMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: BankruptcyClaimsNumberOfClaimsSettled
description: The aggregate number of claims settled.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRollingYearFive
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BusinessCombinationLiabilitiesArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognizedOtherThanAtFairValue
description: The amount, measured at other than acquisition-date fair value, of all the liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity, if the acquisition-date fair value cannot be determined and other criteria (as defined) related to the contingencies have been met.
