name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesIndemnificationAgreementsPayments
description: Amount of payments made under the terms of an indemnification agreement contained in a lease.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassOtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: Amount before depreciation of leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesExecutoryCosts
description: Estimated remaining costs to be incurred to service the direct financing lease, such as taxes, maintenance and insurance and the profit thereon, that are included in the minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInSalesTypeLeasesExecutoryCosts
description: Estimated remaining costs to be incurred to service the sales-type lease, such as taxes, maintenance and insurance and the profit thereon, that are included in the minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalUnitsTotalCostToInvestors
description: Cost to investors of each class of capital shares or other capital units.

name: CarryingValueOfSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellAndDepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowed
description: Carrying value of securities purchased under agreements to resell and deposits paid for securities borrowed.

name: CashDividendsPaidToParentCompanyBy50PercentOrLessOwnedPersons
description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by 50 percent or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

name: RepaymentsOfFinancialServicesObligations
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodConsumerContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CharityCareReimbursementsReceived
description: The amount of subsidies received by the entity for providing charity care, for example, from an uncompensated care fund.

name: ClosedBlockDividendObligationIncreaseDecreaseForEffectOfOperatingResults
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the closed block dividend obligation from the effect on dividends to policyholders on the net results of operations for the period of the closed block.

name: ClosedBlockInvestmentsFixedMaturityAvailableForSaleAmortizedCost
description: The amortized cost as of the balance sheet date of those fixed maturity investments designated as available for sale and reported at fair value which are allocated to the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableIncludingContractRetainage
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract.

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableRetainageYearOne
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetPastDue
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, past due.

name: CostOfTrustAssetsSoldToPayExpenses
description: Cost of trust assets sold to pay trust expenses (includes commodities, but is not limited to, gold and silver).

name: CostmethodInvestmentsRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: This item represents the gain (loss) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

name: CustomerRefundableFees
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of proceeds that had been received in revenue related transactions that are refundable to the customers and do not meet the criteria for revenue recognition (for example, refundable membership fees).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPresentValueInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToTradingGainLoss
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToTradingLoss
description: Amount of unrealized loss recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in methodology.

name: RepaymentsOfSecuredTaxExemptDebt
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityChangeInPresentValueInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestYearFiveOriginatedFourYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestYearFourOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestYearOneOriginatedCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated in current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestYearThreeOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestYearTwoOriginatedFiscalYearBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityFairValueCurrent
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityFairValueNoncurrent
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtorInPossessionFinancingAmendmentsToArrangementIncreaseDecreaseInAmountArranged
description: Increase or Decrease over the original amount of debtor-in-possession financing made available, via amendment of the original agreement (but not necessarily all borrowed).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of reorganization items related to impairment loss.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination, from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: DeferredSalesInducementsAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred sales inducement cost, classified as other.

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesZeroCouponNotes
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments in zero coupon (no stated interest) debt securities.

name: DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuationAllowanceAvailableToReduceGoodwillAndIntangibleAssets
description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's goodwill and other noncurrent intangible assets.

name: RepurchaseAgreementCounterpartyWeightedAverageMaturityOfAgreements
description: #N/A

name: DepositLiabilitiesWithAbnormalTerms
description: Amount of deposits held by the entity on terms other than those available in the normal course of business.

name: RequiredNetCapitalUnderCommodityExchangeAct
description: #N/A

name: DeterioratedLoansTransferredInDebtSecuritiesAccreditableYieldPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) in accreditable yield (the excess of the loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan) for the period.

name: ResaleAgreementCounterpartyWeightedAverageMaturityOfAgreements
description: #N/A

name: ResaleAgreementsInterestIncomeAmount
description: #N/A

name: DevelopmentWellsDrilledNetNonproductive
description: Number of development oil and gas wells incapable of producing either oil or gas in sufficient quantity to justify completion as oil or gas well.

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCMemberUnitDistribution
description: Number of units distributed for payment of a unit distribution to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

name: DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerUnitDistributionDilutionPerUnit
description: Per unit of ownership amount of dilution resulting from the issuance of additional unit for payment of unit distribution to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStructureEmployerLoanGuarantee
description: Reflects the amount as of the balance sheet date of the employer's guarantee of debt repayment by the ESOP.

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized cost for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentUnrealizedIntercompanyProfitLossNotEliminatedAmount
description: This item represents the amount of unrealized intercompany profits and losses on transactions between the Entity and unconsolidated subsidiaries (including certain corporate joint ventures, and noncontrolled corporations), accounted for under the equity method of accounting, which have not been eliminated in preparing the Entity's financial statements.

name: ExcessTangibleCapital
description: Amount of tangible capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ExcessTangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToTangibleAssets
description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

name: ExploratoryWellsDrilledNetNonproductive
description: Number of exploratory oil and gas wells incapable of producing either oil or gas in sufficient quantity to justify completion as oil or gas well.

name: ExtendedProductWarrantyAccrualAdditionsFromBusinessAcquisition
description: Liability for an extended product warranty acquired in a business acquisition. Does not include any liability for a standard warranty acquired in a business acquisition.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskDerivativeFinancialInstrumentsLiabilities
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: ReserveForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpenses
description: #N/A

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskFederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesBorrowedOrPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskForeignCurrencyContracts
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentDebtSecurities
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are debt securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentEquitySecurities
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePlannedSaleInvestmentsNotIdentifiedPercentage
description: The total percentage of all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell 20 percent of its investments in private equity funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePlannedSaleInvestmentsNotIdentifiedValue
description: The total fair value for all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell $10,000,000 of its investments in private equity funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesCommitmentFees
description: Amount of unearned commitment fees on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnAndFilmGroupImpairment
description: Amount of impairment loss on capitalized cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and film group.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsAcceleratedPremiumRevenueAmount
description: This element represents the amount of premium revenue on financial guarantee insurance contracts recognized during the period that was accelerated for revenue recognition purposes.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThanFiveAndWithin10YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedOneYearFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedDuringFirstQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in next fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedDuringFourthQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in fourth fiscal quarter following current year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedDuringSecondQuarterFollowingTheBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in second fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedDuringThirdQuarterFollowingBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in third fiscal quarter following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan10AndWithin15YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in eleventh through fifteenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThanFiveAndWithin10YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThanFourAndWithinFiveYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThanOneAndWithinTwoYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThanThreeAndWithinFourYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThanTwoAndWithinThreeYearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivable
description: Amount of the premium receivable for financial guarantee insurance contracts reported in the statement of financial position. This element primarily would consist of those financial guarantee insurance contracts which premiums are to be collected over the contract period, but may, on occasion, include premiums which are to be collected in full at inception, but which straddle a financial reporting period.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivableProceedsFromPremiumsReceived
description: Amount of cash inflow from premiums received for premium receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableAdjustmentChangeInPeriodOfContract
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premium receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts from changes in the period of the contract.

name: FinancialInstrumentsOwnedOtherSovereignGovernmentObligationsAtFairValue
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in fixed income obligations issued by foreign governments. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedCorporateDebt
description: Fair value of obligations arising from corporate debt obligations sold short.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedUSGovernmentAndAgencyObligations
description: Fair value of obligations arising from US treasury and other US government and agency debt obligations sold short.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsImpactOfChangesInFairValueOfSharesOnNumberOfShares
description: Increase (decrease) in number of shares from change in fair value of issuer's equity shares affect on settlement amount. For example, but not limited to, additional shares for each $1 decrease in the fair value of one share.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostCostIncurredToDate
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterestCurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableChangeInPresentValueInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable from change in present value of expected cash flows attributable to passage of time. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCostRemaining
description: #N/A

name: FinancingReceivableCoveredAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FlightEquipmentNet
description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePensionObligations
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to pension obligations.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePreferredStock
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to preferred stock.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseShortTermBorrowings
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to short-term borrowings.

name: GainLossOnDiscontinuationOfForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurringNet
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when foreign currency cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostReportableSegmentCostIncurredToDate
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostReportableSegmentExpectedCost
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringAndRelatedCostReportableSegmentIncurredCost
description: #N/A

name: GainOnFairValueHedgeIneffectiveness
description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

name: GovernmentContractReceivableUnbilledAmounts
description: Unbilled amounts (net of unliquidated progress payments) of government contract receivables.

name: GrossTransactionVolume
description: Amount of consideration expected to be received as agent for product and service transferred to customer by another party, before deduction of payment for product and service provided by that party.

name: ImpairmentLessorAssetUnderOperatingLease
description: Amount of impairment for lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.

name: ImpairmentOfRetainedInterest
description: The charge against earnings to reduce the carrying value of an interest continued to be held by the transferor in a securitized financial instrument.

name: RestructuringReserveAccrualAdjustment
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasic
description: Per unit ownership amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, after tax, available to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit.

name: IncomeLossFromOngoingEquityMethodInvestmentInDiscontinuedOperationAfterDisposal
description: Amount of share in income (loss) of the equity method investee after the disposal of the discontinued operation.

name: IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquityPriorPeriodAdjustment
description: The tax effect of correction of an error charged or credited directly to the opening balance of retained earnings.

name: RestructuringReservePeriodExpense
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedCostOfOilAndGasReclamation
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in accrued costs that represent future cash outlays for restoration and reclamation of oil and gas producing properties.

name: RestructuringReserveSettledWithCash
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringReserveSettledWithoutCash
description: #N/A

name: RestructuringReserveSettledWithoutCash1
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInGasImbalanceReceivable
description: Change in the balance of the gas balancing receivable account. Gas imbalances occur when the entity sells more or less than its entitled ownership percentage of total gas production. If the entity receives less than it is entitled, the underproduction is recorded as a receivable.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInParticipationLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of participation liabilities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRecoverablePropertyDamageCosts
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the public utility damage costs that will be permitted by regulatory agencies to be recovered from rate payers.

name: InsuranceReceivableForMalpracticeNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of the receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeOtherLoansHeldForSale
description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans held-for-sale and classified as other.

name: InterestBearingDomesticDepositRetail
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic retail deposit liabilities.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositTimeDeposits
description: Amount of interest-bearing time deposits in foreign banking offices. Time deposits bear interest for a fixed, stated period of time and include certificate of deposits and individual retirement accounts.

name: InterestExpenseCommercialPaper
description: Amount of interest expense on commercial paper.

name: ResultsOfOperationsEntitysShareOfEquityMethodInvesteesResultsOfOperationsForOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeForeignDeposits
description: Interest income generated from amounts on deposit with foreign entities located outside the United States of America.

name: InventoryDrillingNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of inventories of minerals, materials and supplies related to long-term drilling operations.

name: InventoryFinishedHomes
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of homes that have been finished and are ready for sale, net of valuation allowance and impairment loss.

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributableEarningsLossAccumulatedAppreciationDepreciation
description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from unrealized appreciation (depreciation) of investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributableEarningsLossAccumulatedCapitalLossCarryforward
description: Amount of accumulated undistributed deficit from capital loss carryforward of investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyDistributableEarningsLossAccumulatedOrdinaryIncomeLoss
description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from ordinary income (loss) of investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioExcludingIncentiveFee
description: Percentage, after deduction of fee waiver and before deduction of incentive fee, of expense to average net assets.

name: InvestmentCompanyPaymentByAffiliatePerShare
description: Per share or unit amount of payment by affiliate of fund to offset fund loss.

name: InvestmentCompanyRegistrationExpense
description: Amount of registration fee expense for issuance of shares or units.

name: InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistribution
description: Amount of distribution in excess of tax-basis earnings and profit of investment company.

name: InvestmentCompanyVoluntaryFeeWaived
description: Amount of fee voluntarily waived by investment company.

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalanceShares
description: Number of securities sold short (the short position) as of the end of the period.

name: JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrustNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: LeveragedLeaseInvestment
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of leveraged lease investments which represent the aggregate amount of the estimated residual value of the lease assets and lease payments receivables, net of unearned and deferred income to be allocated over the lease term and non-recourse debt.

name: RetailExpenses
description: #N/A

name: RetailLandSaleReceivablesWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: #N/A

name: RetailLandSalesDepositMethodDebtAssumedByBuyer
description: #N/A

name: LeveragedLeasesBalanceSheetInvestmentInLeveragedLeases
description: The net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria to be classified as leveraged excluding deferred taxes.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureRentalReceivablesGross
description: The gross rentals receivable equal to the future cash flows from the lessee.

name: RetailLandSalesDepositMethodSalesValue
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEmployeeAndDeemedClaims
description: The amount of employee and related claims included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: RetailLandSalesImprovementRevenuePriorSales
description: #N/A

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncomeTaxContingencies
description: The amount of income taxes included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClaimsGrossIncurredLoss1
description: Amount, before effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

name: LifeInsuranceAssumedRatio
description: Ratio of life insurance assumed from another insurer to gross life insurance in force.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingAfterYearFive
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RetailLandSalesReceivablesHighEndOfRangeOfStatedInterestRates
description: #N/A

name: RetailLandSalesReceivablesLowEndOfRangeOfStatedInterestRates
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInYearFive
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInYearFour
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInYearThree
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInYearTwo
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: RetailRevenue
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingAfterYearFive

Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearThree
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearTwo
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingAfterYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearFour
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearThree
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearTwo
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFiveYearDisclosurePremiumsToBePaid
description: Amount of life insurance premiums anticipated to be paid to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContracts
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method.

description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the limited partners.

description: Anticipated rate of future terminations of contracts in force as of the balance sheet date, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeMortalityRate
description: Actuarially determined death rate of policyholders, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

name: LongTermContractForPurchaseOfElectricPowerEstimatedAnnualCost
description: Estimated annual cost to purchase electricity under a long-term contract from a production plant constructed and financed by a public utility district, cooperative, or other organization.

name: LongTermPollutionControlBond
description: Noncurrent portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: RevenueMineralSales
description: #N/A

name: LongTermPurchaseCommitmentMinimumMassRequired
description: Mass of goods that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

name: LongtermTransitionBondCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current and noncurrent portions. The initial maturity is beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: LossRecognizedOnAssetsTransferredToSeparateAccountGross
description: Amount of loss recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

name: RevenueOilAndGasServices
description: #N/A

name: RevenueOtherFinancialServices
description: #N/A

name: RevenueOtherManufacturedProducts
description: #N/A

name: RevenueRecognitionGiftCardsBreakage
description: #N/A

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualDiscountedCurrent
description: Amount of the current portion of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualUndiscountedCurrent
description: Amount of the current portion of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

name: RevenueRecognitionNewAccountingPronouncementMaterialEffectRevenueDeferredUnderAmendedGuidance
description: #N/A

name: RevenueRecognitionNewAccountingPronouncementMaterialEffectRevenueRecognizedUnderAmendedGuidance
description: #N/A

name: RevenueRecognitionNewAccountingPronouncementRevenueRecognizedUnderPriorGuidance
description: #N/A

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualUndiscountedNoncurrent
description: Amount of the noncurrent portion of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyLettersOfCreditAndSuretyBonds
description: Amount of letters of credit and other surety bonds that are available for the future payment of malpractice claims.

name: ManagingMemberOrGeneralPartnerSubsequentDistributionAmount
description: Amount of cash or stock or unit payment to a limited liability corporation managing member or limited partnership general partner after the end of the accounting period.

name: RevenueSteamProductsAndServices
description: #N/A

name: MaturitiesOfSubordinatedDebt
description: The cash outflow for a long-term borrowing where lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets as it matures.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateRenewedAndExtendedAmount1
description: Amount of mortgage loan in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, renewed or extended.

name: MultiemployerPlanCollectiveBargainingArrangementPercentageOfContributionsRequiredForMultipleCollectiveBargainingArrangements
description: Percentage of contributions required of employer under collective bargaining arrangement to total contributions required under all collective bargaining arrangements for pension and other postretirement plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: RevenuesFromExternalCustomers
description: #N/A

name: RevenuesFromTransactionsWithOtherOperatingSegmentsOfSameEntity
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: ReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
description: #N/A

name: ReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExchangeCommissionRegulation
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantEmployeesCoveredByCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllEntitysEmployeesPercentage
description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all entity's employees in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: RevolvingLoanFacilityToFinanceLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantEmployeesCoveredByCollectiveBargainingArrangementToAllParticipantsPercentage
description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: NetIncomeLossFromRealEstateInvestmentPartnershipAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of income (loss) from consolidated real estate investments attributed to noncontrolling interest.

name: NetIncomeLossFromRealEstateInvestmentPartnershipAttributableToParent
description: Amount of income (loss) from consolidated real estate investments attributed to parent.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NondebtorReorganizationItemsLegalAndAdvisoryProfessionalFees
description: Amount of reorganization items related to legal and advisory professional fees related to entities not in bankruptcy.

name: RoyaltyRevenue
description: #N/A

name: RoyaltyRevenueFromCoal
description: #N/A

name: NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered
description: Amount of noninterest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

name: OciEquityMethodInvestmentTax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

name: OilAndGasDeliveryCommitmentsAndContractsFixedPrice
description: The delivery price committed to in the contract.

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquitySettlementAlternativesCashAtFairValue
description: Amount that would be paid upon settlement of option contract indexed to equity.

name: OptionIndexedToIssuersEquitySettlementAlternativesSharesAtFairValue
description: Number of shares as a settlement alternative for each freestanding option contract.

name: OrderFlowFees
description: The amount of expense in the period for the cost of other broker-dealers' executions of orders.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationBeforeTaxNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiAfterAdjustmentsTax
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForNoncreditPortionOfOttiSaleAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized upon sale of investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForNoncreditPortionOfOttiTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherDeferredCreditsCurrent
description: Amount of unearned revenue or income classified as other, expected to be taken into income within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionCumulativeGainRecognized
description: #N/A

name: OtherInventoryScrap
description: Gross amount of residue from manufacturing or production process that has recovery value.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementSharesOutstandingValue
description: The fair value as of the date of the statement of financial position of shares outstanding in connection with an own-share lending arrangement, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsReissued
description: Value of units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the monetary value of these units which were reissued during the period.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherRealEstatePartnerships
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from other real estate partnerships not otherwise defined in the taxonomy (buyouts, other agreements).

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceeds
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsToAcquireWasteWaterSystems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

name: PaymentsToAcquireWaterSystems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsNoticeOfWithdrawal
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PercentageOfUnamortizedFilmCosts
description: The percentage of unamortized film costs for released films, excluding acquired film libraries, that it expects to amortize within three years from the date of the balance sheet.

name: PlantHeldForFutureUseAmount
description: Discloses the period end amount of plants held for future use and whether such amount is included in the utility's rate base.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedOnStatementOfFinancialPositionAtFairValue
description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings, repurchase agreements or other current or potential obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceeds
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationBuildingsAndImprovements
description: Amount of buildings and improvements at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of current deferred income tax liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherPostretirementObligations
description: Amount of noncurrent other postretirement obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPensionObligations
description: Amount of noncurrent pension obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationBuildingsAndImprovements
description: Amount of buildings and improvements at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationInvestments
description: Amount of investments at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationPreferredStock
description: Amount of preferred stock at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumDeficiencyTestingExpenseLongDurationContractAmount
description: Amount of expense for premium deficiency and loss recognition testing on long-duration contract issued by insurance entity. Excludes closed block.

name: PremiumsEarnedNetOtherInsurance
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of other types of premiums earned.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPercentageOfAmortizationExpenseYearFive
description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPercentageOfAmortizationExpenseYearFour
description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPercentageOfAmortizationExpenseYearOne
description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPercentageOfAmortizationExpenseYearThree
description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPercentageOfAmortizationExpenseYearTwo
description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: SalesAllowancesGoods
description: #N/A

name: SalesAllowancesPriceProtection
description: #N/A

name: SalesAllowancesServices
description: #N/A

name: SalesAndExciseTaxPayable
description: #N/A

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset representing the present value of future profits.

name: PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSalePreviouslyWrittenOffRecovery
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), previously written off.

name: ProceedsFromCustomersForProgressPayments
description: Cash received from customers as progress payments on projects that have been partially completed.

name: SalesDiscountsReturnsAndAllowancesGoods

name: SalesOfRealEstate
