name: SalesReturnsAndAllowancesGoods
description: #N/A

name: SalesReturnsGoods
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueEnergyServices
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueFromEnergyCommoditiesAndServices
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueGoodsGross
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueGoodsNet
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueGoodsNetPercentage
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueNet
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueServicesGross
description: #N/A

name: SalesRevenueServicesNet
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromOperatingActivities
description: Total amount of cash received from operating activities during the current period.

name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForDepositsAppliedToDebtRetirements
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from payments to deposit account and application of deposits to retire or pay down debt during the period.

name: ProceedsFromPollutionControlBond
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebtMaturingInMoreThanThreeMonths
description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes long-term debt and short-term debt.

name: ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLeaseReceivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale or collection of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

name: ProceedsFromShortTermCapitalLeaseObligations
description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to capital lease obligation.

name: ProductLiabilityContingencyThirdPartyRecoveryPercentage
description: Percentage of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

name: ProductiveGasWellsNumberOfWellsNet
description: Number of producing gas wells and gas wells capable of production representing summation of fractional ownership working interest to whole.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCollectionsNotCapitalized
description: Amount not capitalized of work of art, historical treasure, and similar asset classified as collections.

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveImprovedRecoveryEnergy
description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from application of improved recovery techniques, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesNetPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Volume increase (decrease) of proved reserves of oil and gas.

name: RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCostsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized interest costs in real estate inventory.

name: RealEstatePartnershipInvestmentSubsidiariesNetIncomeLossBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of net income (loss) derived from real estate held for development and sale, and related investments.

name: RecordedThirdPartyEnvironmentalRecoveriesNet
description: Present value of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations as of the balance sheet date (if the receivable is discounted).

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ReductionsInOtherAssetsAmount
description: Amount of significant reductions in the period of other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueWater
description: The amount of regulated water operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: ReinsuranceRecoverableChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from change in methodology.

name: ReorganizationValueCashInExcessOfNormalOperatingNeeds
description: Amount of reorganization value related to cash in excess of normal operating requirements generated by operations. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentArrangementWithFederalGovernmentCostsIncurredNet
description: The net amount of research and development costs incurred for a fixed-price, best-efforts research and development cost-sharing arrangement with the Federal Government.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseSale
description: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type lease.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationGrossClaimLiability
description: This element represents the gross claim liability for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationInsuredContractualPaymentsOutstanding
description: This element represents the amount of insured contractual payments outstanding on the underlying insured obligations for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationInsuredContractualPaymentsOutstandingInterest
description: This element represents the amount of insured contractual payments outstanding attributable to interest accrued on the underlying insured obligations for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationInsuredContractualPaymentsOutstandingPrincipal
description: This element represents the amount of insured contractual payments outstanding attributable to the principal of the underlying insured obligations for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationNetClaimLiability
description: This element represents the net claim liability related to financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationNumberOfContractsIssuedAndOutstanding
description: This element represents the number of issued and outstanding contracts for each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationStatementOfFinancialPositionClaimLiability
description: This element represents the claim liability, reported on or included in the statement of financial position, related to financial guarantee insurance contracts and presented in the schedule of insured financial obligations with credit deterioration in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationStatementOfFinancialPositionUnearnedPremiumRevenue
description: This element represents the amount of unearned premium revenue, reported on or included in the statement of financial position, related to financial guarantee insurance contracts and presented in the schedule of insured financial obligations with credit deterioration in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountForeclosed
description: The fair value of collateral received that was taken through foreclosure due to default by the original transferor in lieu of collection of the secured receivable.

name: SecuritiesSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExchangeCommissionRegulation
description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.

name: SecuritizedAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherDelinquentAmountAtEndOfPeriod
description: This is the amount of the financial instruments that are considered delinquent (past due) at the end of the period.

name: SecuritizedRegulatoryTransitionAssetsNoncurrent
description: Carrying value of the regulatory asset that represents capitalized stranded costs that have been securitized (financed with debt) and are expected to be recoverable through a transition charge after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer). A transition charge is a charge approved by a regulator that allows deregulated utilities to recover investments in certain assets, such as power plants, over a transition period leading into a deregulated market.

name: SecurityOwnedNotReadilyMarketableQuotedValue
description: Amount of not readily marketable security or investment measured by quoted price.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOfOtherThan10Or20PercentAdverseChangeInDiscountRate
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a specified adverse percentage change in discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOfOtherThan10Or20PercentAdverseChangeInDiscountRatePercent
description: A specified percentage variance in the discount rate assumption in the determination of fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The net increase (decrease) in the fair value of servicing liabilities subsequently measured at fair value.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardSharesToBeRepurchasedNextYear
description: An entity expecting to repurchase shares in the following period, generally discloses an estimate of the amount or range of shares to be repurchased.

name: SignificantCostsIncurredToAcquireMineralInterestOfProvedReserves
description: Significant costs that have been incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, to acquire mineral interests that have proved reserves.

name: SpecialAssessmentBondNoncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesPortionOfExcessRetainedEarningsNotTaxed
description: The amount of retained earnings as of the balance sheet date in excess of statutory unassigned surplus on which no income tax provisions have been made.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersInterestRateAtWhichDiscountComputed
description: Rate at which discount was computed for deduction from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsOtherPostemployment
description: Amount of postemployment benefit liabilities classified as other.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingTransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsProvisionalLiabilityCurrent
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingTransitionTaxForAccumulatedForeignEarningsProvisionalLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

name: TheatricalFilmCostsDevelopment
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in development of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsAggregateMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableGross
description: Amount of notes receivable related to time share sales, before allowance for uncollectible accounts and deferred profit.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsEstimatedCostToCompleteImprovementsAndPromisedAmenities
description: Estimated cost to complete improvements and promised amenities.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableFutureYears
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearFive
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearFour
description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDisposalGroup
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of accounts receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group.

name: TwoPercentOfDebitItems
description: Minimum amount of net capital of broker-dealer parent, calculated under Alternative Standard.

name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnrecoveredCostsForPurchasedGasAmount
description: Discloses the amount of unrecovered costs for purchased gas.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationRemainingWeightedAverageContractPeriod
description: #N/A

name: UtilitiesOperatingExpenseOperations
description: Amount of operating expense for routine operations of regulated operation.

name: VariableInterestEntityActivityBetweenVIEAndEntityPurchases
description: The amount of purchases between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesCurrentNoRecourse
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that do not have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary, classified as current.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesRecourse
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary.

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOfTimeDeposits100000OrMore
description: Weighted average interest rate of time deposits, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

name: SecondaryProcessingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageRateForeignDeposit
description: Weighted average interest rate calculated at point in time for foreign deposit liability.

name: AccountsReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentNonaccrualInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentNonaccrualNoAllowance
description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

name: AccountsReceivableNoncurrentOriginatedFiveOrMoreYearsBeforeLatestFiscalYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

name: AccountsReceivableUnapprovedContractClaims
description: The total amount of accounts receivable from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unapproved change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization.

name: AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsuranceInterestIncomeExpense
description: Amount of interest income (expense) for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

name: SecuredDemandNoteDeficiency
description: #N/A

name: AdvancePaymentsNettedAgainstClaimReceivable
description: Amount of advance payments received on the contract before its termination shown as a deduction from the claim receivable related to a termination of a contract.

name: AffordableHousingProgramObligationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of obligation related to Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

name: AgriculturalRelatedInventoryFeedAndSupplies
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of materials capitalized as inventory because of their use in the growth and maintenance of animals and crops.

name: AircraftRentalAndLandingFees
description: Expenses incurred related to the lease of aircraft from outside third parties that are used in the entity's business operations and direct costs incurred at airports primarily consisting of fees paid to the airport authority for takeoff and landing, gate and facility fees, and other related fees.

name: AirlineRelatedInventory
description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used in air transport of passengers and freight.

name: AirlineRelatedInventoryAircraftParts
description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of plant or equipment components to be used for the primary purpose of air transportation.

name: AllowanceForUncollectibleCustomersLiabilityForAcceptances
description: Represents the reserve against amounts due from customers which are uncollectible or questionable as to collection and which specifically relate to short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known banker's acceptances).

name: AmortizationExpensePerDollarOfGrossRevenue
description: Amortization computed on the basis of current gross revenues (excluding royalty payments and net profits disbursements) from production in relation to future gross revenues, based on current prices (including consideration of changes in existing prices provided only by contractual arrangements), from estimated production of proved oil and gas reserves.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockFixedMaturitiesHeldToMaturityAtAmortizedCost
description: Carrying amount of investments in debt securities that are deemed to be held to maturity that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockIncomeTaxReceivable
description: Amount of tax refunds receivable held by the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockRealEstate
description: Real estate investments allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateInvestmentSubsidiaries
description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held by entities that are wholly-owned.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesSharesRedeemed
description: These are the number of AMPS shares redeemed during the period.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesTransfersToTradingGrossGains
description: Amount of gain included in earnings for reclassification of securities from available-for-sale into trading.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherPercentageOfNonperformingAssets
description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesTransfersToTradingGainsLossesExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: BankingRegulationLeverageBufferActual
description: Leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationLeverageBufferMinimum
description: Minimum leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationMaximumLeveragePayoutRatio
description: Maximum percentage of eligible retained income that can be paid out in distribution and discretionary bonus payment by global systemically important bank (GSIB) as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationMaximumPayoutAmount
description: Amount of eligible retained income multiplied by applicable maximum payout ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationTierOneLeverageCapitalRatioUndercapitalizedMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfFiledClaimsLikelyToBeDenied
description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed with bankruptcy court that are likely to be denied.

name: BelowMarketLeaseAmortizationIncomeRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: BusinessCombinationAcquiredSalesTypeLeaseReceivable
description: Amount of acquired sales-type lease receivable from business combination.

name: BusinessCombinationIndemnificationAssetsRangeOfOutcomesValueLow
description: For indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the low-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the indemnification benefit which may be realized.

name: CapitalLeasedAssetsNoncurrentFairValueDisclosure
description: Fair value portion of the lessor's net investment in nonoperating or leveraged leases expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInFourAndFiveYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth and fifth fiscal years following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvestmentInDirectFinancingLeasesCurrent
description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs, less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

name: CapitalUnitsDeductionsFromTotalCostToInvestors
description: Amount of deductions from cost to investors of capital shares or other capital units for fees, loads and other charges.

name: CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized exploratory well costs.

name: CarryingValueOfFederalFundsSoldSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellAndDepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowed
description: Carrying value of federal funds sold, securities purchased under agreements to resell, and deposits paid for securities borrowed.

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorReceiptsOnInterestsThatContinueToBeHeldOther
description: Cash flows between transferor and a transferee attributable to the transferor's interests related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor will have continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorRepaymentsOfServicingFeeAdvances
description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in repayment of service fee advances, in advance of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCashFlowsExpectedToBeCollectedAtAcquisition
description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldToMaturityDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldToMaturityDebtSecuritiesOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounted deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date. This relates to loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCommercialAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired commercial loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: SecuritiesOwnedNotReadilyMarketable
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCommercialCashFlowsExpectedToBeCollectedAtAcquisition
description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired commercial loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodCommercialContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired commercial loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesCommercialOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to commercial loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesConsumerOutstandingBalance
description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsChangeInPolicyholderBenefitsAndInterestCreditedToPolicyholderAccountBalances
description: Difference between prior period and current period estimated policy claims and interest due to and designated to policies in an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block).

name: CommercialPaperAverageOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of commercial paper.

name: CompensatedAbsencesLiabilitySabbaticalLeave
description: Amount of liability accrued for the employer's obligation related to an employee's right to receive compensation during a future sabbatical leave. This amount does not include amounts accrued for the employee's future vacation and holidays.

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableRetainageAfterYearOne
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableToBeCollectedAfterYearOneInterestRate
description: Rate of interest on amount billed to customer under long-term contract or program to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

name: ContractWithCustomerAssetChangeInMethodCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from change in methodology.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected after the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CostDepletion
description: Cost of reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly related to good produced and service rendered.

name: CostOfGoodsSoldDirectFinancingLease
description: Cost of goods sold for direct financing lease.

name: CustomerAdvancesForConstruction
description: For utilities only, represents the carrying amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date for payments received by a utility from its customers in advance of performing its obligations under terms of its construction agreements.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityCumulativeUnrecognizedGain
description: Amount of cumulative unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAndHeldToMaturityCumulativeUnrecognizedLoss
description: Amount of cumulative unrecognized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: SecuritiesSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActRegulation
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleExcludingAccruedInterestNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

name: SecuritiesSoldNotYetPurchasedFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityChangeInPresentValueExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in present value of expected cash flows.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityDerivativeCumulativeGain
description: Amount of gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityDerivativeCumulativeGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestOriginatedMoreThanFiveYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear
description: Amount excluding accrued interest of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityNonaccrualInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), on nonaccrual status.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAllowanceForCreditLossAtAcquisitionDate
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationAmountAtParValue
description: Amount at par value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturitySale
description: Amount of decrease from sale of debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityTransferToAvailableForSaleAllowanceForCreditLossExpense
description: Amount of credit loss expense on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) transferred into available-for-sale out of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DeferredCostsCreditCardOriginationCostsAmortization
description: Amount of amortization of capitalized credit card origination costs not related to private label credit cards.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsAccumulatedAmortization
description: The cumulative amount of amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement which has been periodically charged to earnings, generally as a component of interest expense, during the term of the arrangement.

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsAccumulatedAmortizationAdjustment
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with a share-lending arrangement.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseAssumptionChange
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) of deferred policy acquisition costs and future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination, from assumption change.

name: SecuritizedAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherAverageBalanceDuringPeriod
description: #N/A

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: SecuritizedAssetsAndAnyOtherFinancialAssetsManagedTogetherNetCreditLossesDuringPeriod
description: #N/A

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnrealizedGainLossOnInvestment
description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of deferred lease income.

name: DeferredSalesInducementCostAmortizationExpenseExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred sales inducement cost, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: DeferredSalesInducementsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unamortized deferred sales inducement costs.

name: DeferredSubscriberAcquisitionCostsNoncurrent
description: Costs deferred when a service provider gives incentives to third-party manufacturers or resellers to reduce the selling prices of specialized equipment in order to stimulate end-customer demand for the service provider's offerings.

name: DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuationAllowanceAvailableToReduceGoodwill
description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's goodwill if those tax benefits become realizable.

name: DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuationAllowanceAvailableToReduceIntangibleAssets
description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's other noncurrent intangible assets if those tax benefits subsequently become realizable.

name: DemutualizationByInsuranceEntitySecuritiesIssuedOfferingCosts
description: Cost of offering shares or units in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: DerivativeAverageForwardInterestRate
description: Average stated rate on a group of interest rate forward or futures contracts.

name: SegmentReportingAssetReconcilingItemAmount
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingEntityConsolidatedAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingEntityConsolidatedRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingIncomeBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsDiscontinuedOperationsAndCumulativeEffect
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationAccountsReceivableNet
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationAverageAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationExpense
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationDepreciationExpense
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationEquityInNetIncomeOfEquityMethodInvesteesOfSegment
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationExpendituresForAdditionsToLongLivedAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationExtraordinaryItems
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationGoodwill
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationIncomeLossBeforeIncomeTaxes
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInterestExpense
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInterestIncome
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInterestIncomeExpenseNet
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationIntersegmentRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInventoryNet
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInvestmentInEquityMethodInvestees
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationInvestments
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationNetAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationNoninterestExpense
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingInformationNoninterestIncome
description: #N/A

description: #N/A

description: #N/A
