description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingOtherSignificantReconcilingItemSegment
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingReconcilingItemForOperatingProfitLossFromSegmentToConsolidatedAmount
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingReconcilingItemsAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingReconcilingItemsForOperatingProfitLoss
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingReconcilingItemsRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingRevenueReconcilingItemAmount
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingSegmentAssets
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingSegmentOperatingProfitLoss
description: #N/A

name: SegmentReportingSegmentRevenue
description: #N/A

name: DerivativeInstrumentsGainRecognizedInIncomeIneffectivePortionAndAmountExcludedFromEffectivenessTesting
description: The portion of gains on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments representing (a) the amount of the hedge ineffectiveness and (b) the amount, if any, excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
description: Amount of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

name: DevelopmentProfitsNonoperating
description: Income recognized during the period from participation in unconsolidated joint ventures engaged in real estate development (such as the building upon or otherwise improving property).

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCostsDevelopment
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in development of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCapitalLeasedAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as deferred tax liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationInventoryNoncurrent
description: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPTaxBenefitOfDividendsPaidToPlan
description: The tax benefit resulting from dividends paid on preferred stock held by an employee stock option plan, when that stock is not a common stock equivalent.

name: EnergyMarketingAccountsPayable
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for energy purchases, typically by a utility or an entity engaged in selling energy contracts.

name: EnergyMarketingContractLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Fair value of liability arising from energy marketing activities (trading activities), expected to be settled after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Examples of energy marketing activities include, but are not limited to, trading of electricity, coal, natural gas and oil using financial instruments, including, but not limited to, forward contracts, options and swaps.

name: EnergyMarketingContractsAssetsNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from energy trading activities that involves the purchase and sale of energy under forward contracts at fixed and variable prices and the buying and selling of financial energy contracts that include exchange futures and options and over the counter options and swaps, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EnvironmentalExitCostsReasonablyPossibleAdditionalLossesBestEstimate
description: Best estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

name: EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancialInformationRedeemablePreferredStock
description: The amount of redeemable preferred stock reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

name: ExpensesAndLossesReportingCurrencyDenominatedValue
description: The reporting currency-denominated expense (including losses) amount.

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetAcquisitions
description: Amount of increases to the indemnification asset due to acquisitions of assets relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetAdditionalEstimatedLosses
description: Amount of increases to the indemnification asset due to additional estimated losses assumed by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), relating to loss sharing agreements with the FDIC.

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetNetWriteOffs
description: Amount of decreases to the indemnification asset due to write offs of loans, net of recoveries, relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskCashSurrenderValue
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskNotesReceivable
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellPledgedAsCollateral
description: The fair value of federal funds sold and securities purchased under agreements to resell that serve as collateral for borrowings.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFixedRateAfterFiveYears
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFixedRateOneToFiveYears
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeOneToFiveYears
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAssessments
description: Amount of Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments and Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments.

name: FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCompletedAndNotReleasedFilmExpectedAmortizationInNextOperatingCycle
description: Amount of amortization for completed and not released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements and expected to be recognized within next operating cycle.

name: SeparateAccountsAsset
description: #N/A

name: FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnAndFilmMonetizedInFilmGroupAmortizationExpense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

name: ServiceManagementCosts
description: #N/A

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan10AndWithin15YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in eleventh through fifteenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan15AndWithin20YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in sixteenth through twentieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan15AndWithin20YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in sixteenth through twentieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivableNewBusinessWritten
description: Amount of new business written on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAmortization
description: #N/A

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivedOverContractPeriodPremiumReceivableWeightedAverageRiskFreeDiscountRate
description: This element represents the weighted average risk free rate used to discount the premiums expected to be collected for financial guarantee insurance contracts where the premium is to be received over the contract period.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableAdjustmentOtherAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts from adjustments classified as other.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedPhysicalCommoditiesSold
description: Fair value of obligations arising from physical commodities sold short.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDebtorInPossessionFinancing
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to debtor-in-possession financing.

name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to deferred income tax liabilities.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseInvestments
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to investments.

name: FuelCostsGrossOfHedging
description: The cost for fuel, incurred during the period, before considering the impacts of any related hedging activities.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfFairValueHedgeEffectiveness
description: Gain relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossFromHedgedFirmCommitmentNotQualifyingAsInterestRateFairValueHedgeNet
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as an interest rate fair value hedge.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfPriceRiskCashFlowHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertiesApplicableIncomeTaxes
description: This element represents the applicable amount of income taxes or benefit realized on the gain (loss) on sale of properties during the reporting period.

name: GainOnDiscontinuationOfCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurring
description: The amount of gain reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: GainRecognizedOnAssetsTransferredToSeparateAccountGross
description: Amount of gain recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

name: HealthCareOrganizationHealthCareCostsGross
description: Total expenses of a HCO before stop-loss insurance recoveries. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).

name: ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAtFairValueAssumptionsUsedToEstimateFairValueWeightedAverageLife
description: #N/A

name: ServicingFees
description: #N/A

name: ServicingFeesNet
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationStopLossInsurancePremiumExpense
description: Stop-loss insurance premiums recognized as expense. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherLoanToCollateralValueRatio
description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: ImpactOfRestatementOnOpeningRetainedEarningsBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of cumulative effect of restatement on the opening retained earnings of the earliest year presented.

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasic
description: The amount of income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations available to each limited partnership and general partnership unit during the reporting period, net of tax.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueAmortization
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCoalInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of coal held in inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerLoyaltyProgramLiability
description: Increase (decrease) in the liability arising from revenue deferred or cost to provide future products or services resulting from customer loyalty program. Excludes liability associated with frequent flier programs. Includes liability associated with customer loyalty programs for other businesses, for example, but not limited to, hotels, supermarkets, credit card companies, automobile rental companies, and book sellers.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredChargesInvesting
description: The increase (decrease) in noncurrent deferred charges, classified as investing activities.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInGiftCardLiability
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation for outstanding gift cards. Retail customers purchase gift cards or gift certificates that can be redeemed at a later date for merchandise or services; those unredeemed represent a liability of the entity because the revenue is being deferred.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorCurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of the assets created and retained during the securitization of trade receivables, which are not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOptionPremiumContractsPayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of option premium contracts for energy-related commodities.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOverEnergyRecovery
description: The change during the reporting period in the value of the asset created by an over recovery. An over recovery means that the basic energy product price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is less than the basic fuel price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOverUnderEnergyRecovery
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of the asset or liability created by an over or under recovery. An over under-recovery means that the basic energy price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is less (over) or more (under) than the basic energy price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRetainagePayable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in retainage obligations due by the reporting entity that are payable within one year (or one business cycle).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInUnprovedOilAndGasProperty
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of property designated for oil and gas production that has not been found (through exploratory drilling) to have extractible reserves of oil and gas.

name: IncurredClaimsFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: Amount, after policies assumed or ceded, of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: InsuranceReceivableForMalpractice
description: The amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

name: SeveranceCosts
description: #N/A

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansLeaseFinancing
description: Interest and fee income generated by direct lease financing which consists of an institution owning and leasing personal property for the use of its customers at the customers' specific request.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansTradeFinancing
description: Interest and fee income generated by trade financing. Trade financing is a specialized area of commercial lending frequently used by businesses that engage in international activities. Such financing includes open account financing, sales on consignment, documentary collections, advances against collections, letters of credit, bankers' acceptances, factoring, and forfeiting.

name: InterestExpenseForeignDeposits
description: Interest expense on all foreign deposits.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardCompensationCost
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardDiscountFromMarketPrice
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseShortTermDebtOtherIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest expense on short-term debt classified as other.

name: InterestIncomeDepositWithFinancialInstitutionIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest income on deposit with financial institution.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityConvertedInPeriod
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeDepositsWithOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of interest income from interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsForfeitedInPeriodIntrinsicValue
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsForfeitedInPeriodWeightedAverageGrantDateFairValue
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeFinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of interest income from financing receivable before allowance for credit loss.

name: InterestIncomeInterestEarningAsset
description: Amount of interest income from interest-earning asset.

name: InventoryOperativeBuildersOther
description: Amount of inventory used in the development of real estate classified as other.

name: InvestmentCompanyGainLossOnInKindRedemption
description: Amount of gain (loss) on redemption of investment company shares or units by payment in portfolio securities.

name: InvestmentsInPowerAndDistributionProjects
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in power and distribution projects that are expected to be realized after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

name: LessorSalesTypeLeaseAssumptionsAndJudgmentsValueOfUnderlyingAssetAmount
description: Amount that lessor expects to derive from underlying asset following end of sales-type lease term.

name: LeveragedLeasesBalanceSheetDeferredTaxesArisingFromLeveragedLeases
description: The liability for taxes payable in the future as a result of temporary differences in treatment of certain items in the current year arising from the net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as a leveraged lease.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsOtherIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in accrued obligations to policyholders pertaining to insured events for the period.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsOutstandingWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseIntrinsicValue
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsTotalShareBasedLiabilitiesPaid
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodUnrealizedGainLoss
description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of investments in life settlement contracts held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmount
description: Carrying amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsWeightedAverageGrantDateFairValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInYearFive
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInYearFour
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInYearThree
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInYearTwo
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsExpectedTerm
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsExpectedTermMaximum
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsExpectedTermMinimum
description: #N/A

name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableFeesEarnedButExcludedFromYield
description: Reflects the amount of fees recognized as income related to loan originations, commitments or servicing which are not included in interest income and that exceed 1 percent of the aggregate of total interest income and other income.

name: LongDurationContractsAssumptionsByProductAndGuaranteeOtherRate
description: Anticipated rate, classified as other, for assumptions included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation.

name: LongTermContractForPurchaseOfElectricPowerAnnualMinimumDebtServicePaymentRequired
description: Under long-term contracts with public utility districts, cooperatives or other organizations, a utility company receives a portion of the output of a production plant constructed and financed by the district or cooperative. The utility has only a nominal or no investment at all in the plant but pays a proportionate part of the plant's costs, including debt service. If the utility is obligated to pay certain minimum amounts which cover debt service requirements whether or not the plant is operating, the amount can be disclosed here.

name: LongtermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearsFourAndFive
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fourth and fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LongtermPollutionControlBondCurrent
description: Current portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: LossContingencyAccrualInsuranceRelatedAssessmentPolicySurchargeAsset
description: The amount of insurance-related assessment liability that is expected to be recovered through policy surcharges applied to in-force policies.

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityDiscount
description: The amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the estimated aggregate undiscounted amount of the accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product(s) or process(es) to the present value recognized on the balance sheet (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

name: LossFromHedgedFirmCommitmentNotQualifyingAsFairValueHedge
description: Amount of loss recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyClaimsIncurredInPeriod
description: Amount of loss recognized for asserted and unasserted malpractice claims.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyClaimsIncurredNet
description: Amount of costs associated with malpractice claims and insurance premiums incurred during an accounting period, less insurance recoveries and returns of previously paid premiums.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyInsuranceRecoveries
description: Amount of insurance recoveries recognized from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims recognized during an accounting period.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyPremiumCosts
description: Amount of costs incurred that are associated with obtaining malpractice insurance and other risk transferring arrangements during an accounting period.

name: MultiemployerPlanPensionInsignificantPlanAsset
description: Amount of asset available for benefits to participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

name: MunicipalInvestmentAgreements
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations arising from contracts specifying rights and responsibilities of a host municipality in the structure or operation of an investment project. For example, proceeds from a revenue bond may be invested temporarily in contracts until disbursements are required for construction of a major project. There is little or no insurance risk for the entity.

name: NetAssetsAdjustedBalance
description: Amount of assets after deduction of liabilities and cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

name: NetCapitalInExcessOfFivePercentOfDebitItems
description: Amount of net capital calculated under Alternative Standard in excess of 5 percent of debit items.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseNonaccrualNoAllowance
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseSale
description: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NonmonetaryTransactionAmountOfBarterTransaction
description: The amount of revenue and expenses for the services received and provided in a nonmonetary arrangement.

name: OilAndGasProducingPropertiesOfRateRegulatedCompaniesUnamortizedCost
description: The amount of unamortized cost related to properties subject to cost-of-service ratemaking.

name: OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodAccumulatedImpairment
description: Accumulated impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisableIntrinsicValue
description: #N/A

name: OpenOptionContractsWrittenExercisePrice
description: The exercise price of the open option contracts written on the investment.

name: OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementCarryingAmountAtLeaseInceptionExceedsFairValue
description: This element represents the loss resulting from the amount by which the cost or carrying amount, if different, of an asset subject to an agreement classified as an operating lease, at the inception of a lease involving real estate, exceeds the fair value of the leased property.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisableWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisesInPeriod
description: #N/A

name: OperatingSupportFromAdviserAmount
description: The amount of the support provided by the Adviser to help the REIT achieve a certain return for the period.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExercisesInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiBeforeTaxAfterAdjustments
description: Amount, before tax, after adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsExpirationsInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForNoncreditPortionOfOttiAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherExpenseFromRealEstatePartnershipOperations
description: Amount of selling, general, and administrative expenses, and other expenses, related to investments in real estate partnerships.

name: OtherInventoryWarehouse
description: Gross amount of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held by the entity in a building or part of a building for future sale.

name: OtherRealEstateNonCoveredDisposals
description: Disposals of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsForfeituresInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: OtherRealEstateNonCoveredValuationAdjustments
description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriodForfeited
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAvailableforsaleSecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresPercentageOfNonperformingAssets
description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets underlying the security which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and the amount of such impairment determined to be related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: ParticipatingMortgageLoansExtinguishmentGainLoss
description: States the amount of gain (loss) resulting from a participating loan extinguished before its due date.

name: ParticipatingPoliciesAdditionalIncomeAllocated
description: Amount of additional income allocated to policy holders whose contracts entitle them to a portion of the entity's earnings or surplus, paid through dividends.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOtherShareIncreaseDecreaseInPeriodWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: PartnersCapitalAccountDeferredCompensation
description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to deferred compensation. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Total net change in the units of each class of partners' capital accounts during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasuryUnitsReissued
description: Units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the number of these units which were reissued during the period.

name: PartnersCapitalAdjustedBalance1
description: Amount of partners' capital after the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDelayedTaxExemptExchange
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from a property which is traded for the promise to provide a replacement like-kind property in the near future also known as tax deferred exempt exchange.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOutstandingWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForProceedsFromNuclearFuel
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsOtherTimeDeposit
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic time deposit liabilities other than certificates of deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PhaseInPlanAmountOfCostsDeferredForRateMakingPurposes
description: The total amount of allowable costs capitalized during the period by the entity pertaining to Phase-In plans which were deferred on the expectation of future recovery.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedAndExpectedToVestExercisableWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedLoansPledgedForOtherDebtObligationsAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

name: PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedNonsecuritizedInvestmentsPledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of investments which are not evidenced by ownership of securities, such as interests in partnerships or other forms of unincorporated entities, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that is reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge such ownership interests.

name: PostconfirmationAmortizableIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of amortizable intangible assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedAndExpectedToVestOutstandingWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsVestedInPeriodFairValue
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationDebtorInPossessionFinancing
description: Amount of long-term debt related to debtor-in-possession financing at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationDeferredFinancingCosts
description: Amount of debt issuance costs after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsCurrent
description: Amount of current deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationNonamortizableIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of nonamortizable intangible assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPreferredAndCommonStockHeldInTreasury
description: Amount of preferred and common stock held in treasury at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsCurrent
description: Amount of current deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationNonamortizableIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of intangible assets not subject to amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardWeightedAveragePricePaidForSharesPurchased
description: #N/A

name: PreconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationShortTermInvestments
description: Amount of short-term investments at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsEarnedNetFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of financial guarantee premiums earned.

name: PreproductionCostsRelatedToLongTermSupplyArrangementsAssetForMoldsDiesAndToolsNotOwned
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of molds, dies, and other tools that the entity does not own which are or will be used in producing goods under a long-term supply arrangement, and for which there is a noncancelable right of use during such arrangement.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmortizationExpenseExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

name: ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeExercisableOptionsWeightedAverageExercisePrice
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeExercisableOptionsWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsContractWithCustomerAssetPreviouslyWrittenOffRecovery
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, previously written off.

name: ProceedsFromDelayedTaxExemptExchange
description: Cash inflow related to a property which is traded for the promise to provide a replacement like-kind property in the near future also known as a tax deferred exempt exchange.

name: ProceedsFromDivestitureOfRealEstatePartnership
description: The cash inflow from the sale of interest in partnership during the period.

name: ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeOutstandingOptionsWeightedAverageExercisePriceBeginningBalance
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeOutstandingOptionsWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCallsOfSecuritiesOperatingActivities
description: Cash received from maturities, prepayments and calls of trading securities and other securities, classified as operating.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfFirstMortgageBond
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionCashFlowEffects
description: #N/A

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionExpense
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromSecuritizationsOfCreditCards
description: The cash inflow from the securitization of credit card receivables. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionModificationOfTermsNumberOfVendorsAffected
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromTimeDepositsAccepted
description: Cash received from customers who deposit money in checking and similar accounts at a financial institution.

name: ProceedsOfOtherLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
description: Amount of cash inflow from loans and leases held-for-investment, classified as other.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfAcquisitionAdjustmentsRelatedAccumulatedDepreciation1
description: Amount of increase (decrease) for acquisition adjustments on accumulated depreciation included in long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale for utilities.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfDisallowedCostsForRecentlyCompletedPlant
description: Amount of disallowed costs for rate making purposes for recently completed plants in regulated industries.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmountOfIndirectDisallowanceOfCostsOfRecentlyCompletedPlants
description: The amount of indirect disallowance of costs of a recently completed plant. When it becomes probable that part of the cost of a recently completed plant will be disallowed for rate-making purposes and a reasonable estimate of the amount of the disallowance can be made, the estimated amount of the probable disallowance is deducted from the reported cost of the plant and recognized as a loss. If part of the cost is explicitly, but indirectly, disallowed (for example, by an explicit disallowance of return on investment on a portion of the plant), an equivalent amount of cost is deducted from the reported cost of the plant and recognized as a loss.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionValuationMethodExpectedTerm
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentPresentValueOfRegulatedAssetForPlantAbandonment
description: The present value amount of future cost recoveries that are probable and estimable related to plant abandonment's for regulated industries.

name: RealEstateInvestmentPartnershipCostOfSales
description: Amount of cost of sales related to investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

name: ShareOfEquityMethodInvesteesPropertyAcquisitionExplorationAndDevelopmentCostsIncurredInOilAndGasProducingActivities
description: #N/A

name: RecordedThirdPartyEnvironmentalRecoveriesCurrent
description: Cumulative amount of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations that is recoverable within one year of the balance sheet date.

name: RecordedThirdPartyEnvironmentalRecoveriesNoncurrent
description: Cumulative amount of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations that is recoverable after one year from the balance sheet date.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationMinimumQuantityRequired
description: The minimum number of units that must be purchased, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationNonfinancialAssetsPledgedAsSecurityValue
description: The value of assets other than financial instruments pledged to provide security to a suppler under a recorded unconditional purchase obligation arrangement.

name: RecoveryStrandedCosts
description: Revenue from billings to utility customers to recover what are also referred to as stranded assets or stranded investments. These are assets that formerly regulated utilities with monopolies on local service are allowed to recover during their transition to deregulated suppliers in competitive markets. Essentially, these investments are sunk costs, made by utilities under the old regulated system, which might not be recovered in a truly competitive marketplace. However, since they were valid investments at the time, the utilities are allowed to recover these costs from customers (for example, an investment in electrical generation assets that may not be recouped if customers are now allowed to purchase electricity from another utility).

name: ReductionOfShortTermCapitalLeaseObligations
description: The cash outflow for a borrowing recorded for a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization (with maturities within one year or the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer).

name: ReservesShareOfEquityMethodInvesteesNetProvedOilAndGasReserves
description: The proportional interest of net proved oil reserve quantities of equity investees.

name: RetailLandSalesDepositMethodDepositReceived
description: This element represents the amount of deposit received in a retail land sale transaction accounted for under the deposit method.

name: RetainedPatronageAllocations
description: Amount of patronage earnings retained within the agricultural cooperative.

name: RisksInherentInServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesFairValueOfInstrumentsUsedToManageRisks
description: The price received to sell a servicing asset or price paid to transfer a servicing liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date.

name: SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardOptionsOutstandingWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm1
description: #N/A

name: SalesTypeLeaseInterestIncomeUnguaranteedResidualAsset
description: Amount of interest income from unguaranteed residual asset of sales-type lease.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeasePurchase
description: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type lease.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationReductionsOfGrossClaimLiabilityGrossPotentialRecoveries
description: This element represents the gross potential recoveries against the gross claim liability for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationReductionsOfGrossClaimLiabilityNetDiscount
description: This element represents the net discount consisting of the difference between the discount related to the claim liability for and potential recoveries thereof related to financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security borrowed.

name: SharebasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeExercisableOptionsWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm1
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesBorrowedAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of security borrowed, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: SharebasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUnderStockOptionPlansExercisePriceRangeOutstandingOptionsWeightedAverageRemainingContractualTerm1
description: #N/A

name: ShareholderLoansToFinanceLeveragedBuyout
description: #N/A

name: ShareholdersEquityFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellIncrease
description: Amount of increase from purchase of security purchased under agreement to resell.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of securities sold under agreements to repurchase.

name: SeparateAccountLiabilityDeposit
description: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability for cash received for deposit.

name: ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseAccumulatedForeignExchange
description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) to the liability for unpaid claims and claim adjustment expenses used for claim development from a foreign exchange rate (gain) loss.

name: SignificantChangesFrachisedOutletsInOperation
description: The number of franchised outlets in operation at the balance sheet date when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

name: SpentNuclearFuelObligationNoncurrent
description: Provision for the disposal costs of spent nuclear fuel from generating stations.

name: SubordinatedLiabilitiesAdditions
description: New liabilities assumed during the reporting period that are subordinated to claims of general creditors.

name: SubordinatedLiabilitiesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in subordinated debt.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefits
description: Liability for benefits due terminated employees.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsContinuationOfLifeInsurance
description: Liability for extension of life insurance coverage in instances where coverage under the plan would otherwise end.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsDisabilityRelatedBenefits
description: Liability for amount due a former employee for benefits as a result of them becoming physically or mentally impaired.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017DecreaseInDeferredTaxLiabilityDueToTransitionTax
description: Amount of decrease in deferred tax liability previously recognized attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary and other recognized entity now subject to transition tax.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxLiabilityExistingIncomeTaxBenefit
description: Amount of income tax benefit for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsForwardPriceOrOptionStrikePrice
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingUndistributedAccumulatedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiaryExistingUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiability
description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized on undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of time deposits maturing after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableNet
description: Amount of notes receivable related to time share sales, net of allowance for uncollectible accounts and deferred profit.

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowDeductionsFromHeldForSale
description: Amount of deductions to trade receivables held-for-sale, after allowance for bad debt, that are not part of a disposal group.

name: TradingActivityLoss
description: The loss on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

name: SharesUsedInComputationOfBasicEarningsLossPerShare
description: #N/A

name: SharesUsedInComputationOfDilutedEarningsLossPerShare
description: #N/A

name: ShippingAndHandlingRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ShippingHandlingAndTransportationCosts
description: #N/A

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAtBalanceSheetDateAmountExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected after the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

name: ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesDiscountRateHighEndOfRange
description: #N/A

name: ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilitiesDiscountRateLowEndOfRange
description: #N/A

name: ShortTermAndLongTermDebtDefaultedAmount
description: #N/A

name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationMaximumQuantity
description: Maximum number of units that may be acquired, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has not been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

name: ShortTermDebtAmount
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsDisposals
description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on disposal of the related asset.

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsSalesAndDisposals
description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on sales and disposals.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsNoncurrent
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets classified as noncurrent.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsNoncurrentPledged
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of VIE, classified as noncurrent.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities classified as current.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities, classified as noncurrent.

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOfTimeDeposits100000OrMoreThreeMonthsOrLess
description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of three months or less.

name: WellsInProcessOfDrilling
description: Number of oil and gas wells in process of being drilled.

name: AccountsPayableUnderwritersPromotersAndEmployeesOtherThanSalariesAndWagesCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligation to underwriters, promoters, and employees excluding salaries, wages and amount to related party.

name: AccountsReceivableUnapprovedContractClaimsAmountExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
description: The amount of unbilled receivables, which are expected to be collected within one year, from customers under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable at the date of the statement of financial position.

name: AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsuranceAfterReinsurance
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

name: AdvancesForGasExplorationDevelopmentAndProductionAmount
description: Discloses the period end balance sheet amount of advances for gas exploration, development and production.

name: AirTrafficLiabilityCurrent
description: The value of air transportation services sold but as yet unused by the passenger, including sales for air transportation to be provided by the reporting air carrier and air transportation to be provided by another air carrier for whom sales were made. Used to reflect the current portion of the liability (within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: AirlineRelatedInventoryAircraftFuel
description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of fuel used in air transportation.

name: AmountOfEmbeddedRegulatoryAsset
description: Discloses amount of embedded regulatory assets within the plant accounts. This may result when the regulatory depreciable life is longer than the depreciable life generally used for nonregulatory accounting.

name: AmountOfEmbeddedRegulatoryLiability
description: Discloses amount of embedded regulatory liabilities within the plant accounts. This may result when the regulatory depreciable life is shorter than the depreciable life generally used for nonregulatory accounting.

name: AssetAcquisitionIndemnificationAssetAmount
description: Amount of indemnification asset recognized at acquisition date in asset acquisition.

name: AssetsAverageOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of interest-earning and noninterest-earning assets.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockOtherLongTermInvestments
description: Amount of other long-term investments held by the closed block.

name: AssetsDesignatedToClosedBlockShortTermInvestments
description: Short-term investments allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

name: AssetsUnderManagementAverageBalance
description: The average carrying amount of assets managed during the period by the investment advisor on behalf of investors.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesFailedAuctionValue
description: The value of securities held, for which the interest rate resets through an auction process, that are categorized neither as trading nor held-to-maturity, that failed to be liquidated through auction.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherLevelOfSubordination
description: This item represents the current level of subordination of the entity's receipt of consideration should the assets underlying the security be liquidated when the level of subordination was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherLoanToCollateralValue
description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: AvailableforsaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherThirdPartyGuaranteesAmount
description: Amount of third party guarantees against loss of value in the underlying assets related to available-for-sale security in an unrealized loss position and for which other-than-temporary impairments (OTTI) have not been recognized.

name: BankingRegulationMaximumPayoutRatio
description: Maximum percentage of eligible retained income that can be paid out in distribution and discretionary bonus payment as defined by regulatory framework.

name: BankingRegulationTierOneLeverageCapitalRatioSignificantlyUndercapitalizedMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: BankingRegulationTotalRiskBasedCapitalRatioUndercapitalizedMinimum
description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfClaimsExpungedByBankruptcyCourt
description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed that bankruptcy court has expunged.

name: BankruptcyClaimsAmountOfClaimsUnderReviewByManagement
description: Amount of bankruptcy claim under review by management.

name: BankruptcyClaimsNumberOfClaimsExpungedByBankruptcyCourt
description: The aggregate number of claims filed that the bankruptcy court has expunged.

name: BillingsInExcessOfCostNoncurrent
description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method that are expected to be realized more than one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer, from the reporting date.

name: BusinessCombinationAssetsArisingFromContingenciesAmountRecognizedOtherThanAtFairValue
description: The amount, measured at other than acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity, if the acquisition-date fair value cannot be determined and other criteria (as defined) related to the contingencies have been met.

name: CapitalAccumulationPlans
description: Value of stock in an investment or savings plan established by the entity for the benefit of its employees that permits the employees to make investment decisions.

name: CapitalLeasesContingentRentalPaymentsReceived
description: For sales-type and direct financing leases, total contingent rentals received during the period.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInTwoAndThreeYears
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second and third fiscal years following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceivableDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: SignageRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsAcquisitionCostsOrSaleProceeds
description: #N/A

name: SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsGainLossOnSaleOrDisposalNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsGainLossOnSaleOrDisposalPretax
description: #N/A

name: SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsRestrictionOnAmountOfProceedsFromDonatedPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: #N/A

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassFlightEquipmentAccumulatedDepreciation

description: The estimate of minimum payments on sales-type leases that are probable of not being collected as of the balance sheet date.

name: CapitalLeasesOfLessorContingentRentalsBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessor's capital lease (sales-type and direct financing leases).

name: CapitalUnitsAdjustmentForMarketChanges
description: The adjustment for market appreciation or depreciation of capital units or shares.

name: CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActRegulation
description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

name: SignificantCommitmentRemainingMinimumAmountCommitted
description: #N/A

name: CashSurrenderValueDuePolicyholdersAmount
description: Amount of cash to be paid to policyholder upon termination and surrender of long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

name: SignificantPurchaseCommitmentRemainingMinimumAmountCommitted
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodNotAccountedForUsingIncomeRecognitionModelAtAcquisitionAtCarryingValue
description: The recorded value, at the acquisition date, of loans for which the income recognition model was not applied. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities acquired during the period, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: SingleEmployerPlansAccountedForAsMultiemployerPlanContributions
description: #N/A

name: SiteContingencyAccrualDiscountRate
description: #N/A

name: SiteContingencyAccrualPresentValue
description: #N/A

name: SiteContingencyAccrualUndiscountedAmount
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsAvailableforsaleDebtSecuritiesOtherthanTemporaryImpairmentChargesCreditLoss
description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities.

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualHighEstimate
description: #N/A

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureInExcessOfAccrualLowEstimate
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesOtherthanTemporaryImpairmentChargesCreditLoss
description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as debt securities.

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedHighEstimate
description: #N/A

name: SiteContingencyLossExposureNotAccruedLowEstimate
description: #N/A

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldToMaturityDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodContractuallyRequiredPaymentsReceivableAtAcquisition
description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodConsumerAtAcquisitionAtFairValue
description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodConsumerCashFlowsExpectedToBeCollectedAtAcquisition
description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

name: CharityCareOtherMeasurementBasisAmount
description: The amount of charity care provided during the period on a basis other than the provider's direct and indirect costs of providing charity care services.

name: ClosedBlockAssetsAndLiabilitiesMaximumFutureEarningsToBeRecognizedOtherAdjustments
description: Amount of increase (decrease) for other adjustments to closed block's maximum future earnings.

name: ClosedBlockAssetsAndLiabilitiesMaximumFutureEarningsToBeRecognizedPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) of closed block liabilities in excess of closed block assets at the date of demutualization.

name: SquareFootageOfRealEstateProperty
description: #N/A

name: ClosedBlockDividendObligationPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the policyholder dividend obligation attributable to closed block liabilities.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsAfterTaxResultsFromContinuingOperations
description: Amount after tax of closed block income from continuing operations.

name: ClosedBlockOperationsOtherRevenue
description: Amount of revenue classified as other allocated to the closed block.

name: StandardProductWarrantyAccrualCurrencyTranslationIncreaseDecrease
description: #N/A

name: ConstructionContractorReceivableIncludingContractRetainageYearOne
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: ContinuingCareRetirementCommunitiesAdvanceFeesObligationForFutureServicesAmount
description: Amount of refund obligation under existing contract for continuing care retirement community.

name: ContractReceivableDueAfterOneYearWeightedAverageInterestRate
description: The weighted average interest rate charged on contract receivables maturing after one year.

name: ContractReceivableDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractTerminationClaimsUSFederalGovernment
description: Amount included in accounts receivable for long-term contracts and programs associated with governmental contracts at the balance sheet date representing amounts deemed to be reimbursable items under a terminated United States government contract or subcontract and included in a claim with the United States government, including those associated with terminated war and defense contracts.

name: ContractWithCustomerReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedInRemainderOfFiscalYear
