description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CostMethodInvestmentsAggregateCarryingAmountNotEvaluatedForImpairment
description: This element represents the aggregate carrying amount of all cost-method investments held by the Entity which was not evaluated for impairment. Because the fair value of cost-method investments is not readily determinable, the evaluation of whether an investment is impaired generally consists of whether an event or change in circumstances has occurred during the reporting period that may have a significant adverse effect on the fair value of the investment (an "impairment indicator"). Impairment indicators include, but are not limited to: (1) significant deterioration in the earnings performance, credit rating, asset quality, or business prospects of the investee; (2) significant adverse change in the regulatory, economic, or technological environment of the investee; (3) significant adverse change in the general market condition of either the geographic area or the industry in which the investee operates; (4) a bona fide offer to purchase (whether solicited or unsolicited), an offer by the investee to sell, or a completed auction process for the same or similar security for an amount less than the cost of the investment; or (5) factors that raise significant concerns about the investee's ability to continue as a going concern, such as negative cash flows from operations, working capital deficiencies, or noncompliance with statutory capital requirements or debt covenants.

name: CustomerAdvancesAndProgressPaymentsForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: The amount of the offset related to government or other customer advances received on a contract when the expected advances will be applied in payment to those particular charges of the receivable.

name: StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNetCashFlowRelatingToProvedOilAndGasReserves
description: #N/A

name: CustomerLoyaltyProgramLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Value of deferred revenue or cost to provide products or services, which is expected to be recognized in income or incurred after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, resulting from customer loyalty program. Excludes liability associated with frequent flier programs. Includes liability associated with customer loyalty programs for other businesses, for example, but is not limited to, hotels, supermarkets, credit card companies, automobile rental companies, and book sellers.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in customer refundable fees.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferToTradingGain
description: Amount of unrealized gain recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPurchasedWithCreditDeteriorationDiscountPremium
description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityTransferDerivativeHedgeGainLoss
description: Amount of gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) of derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), transferred to investment in debt security measured at fair value with changes in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsGainLossOnAssetSalesNet1
description: Amount of gain (loss) on asset sales, reported as a reorganization item.

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsPensionAndOtherPostretirementRelatedCharges
description: Amount of reorganization items related to pension and other postretirement related charges.

name: DeferredAirTrafficRevenue
description: Value of revenue deferred or cost to provide future services associated with points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs and the value of transportation services sold but as yet used by the passenger. Used to reflect the current portion of the liability (within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: DeferredFinanceCostsOwnshareLendingArrangementIssuanceCostsAmortizationExpensePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the accumulated amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement.

name: DeferredGasPurchasesCurrent
description: Current liabilities arising from deferral of gas to be purchased.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsImpairmentLoss
description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredPurchasedPowerCosts
description: Costs of power used for operations in prior periods that were expected to be recovered from customers in future periods.

name: DeferredSetUpCostsCurrent
description: Deferred incremental direct costs incurred typically at a contract's inception so that the company may be in a position to fulfill all contractual obligations of an arrangement. The costs are directly related to specified activities under the arrangement and are deferred in order to match revenue that will be recognized within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle if longer).

name: DeferredStormAndPropertyReserveDeficiencyCurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized storm costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DeferredSubscriberAcquisitionCostsCurrent
description: Costs deferred when a service provider provides incentives to third-party manufacturers or resellers to reduce the selling prices of specialized equipment in order to stimulate end-customer demand for the service provider's offerings.

name: DemandSideManagementProgramCostsNoncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of a regulated entity, consisting of the planning, implementing, and monitoring activities which are designed to encourage consumers to modify their level and pattern of energy usage, which are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: StockConvertedFromOneClassToAnotherClassShares
description: #N/A

name: StockConvertedFromOneClassToAnotherClassValue
description: #N/A

name: DemutualizationByInsuranceEntitySecuritiesIssuedAmountOfNetProceeds
description: The proceeds received by an insurance entity after deducting offering and other costs of securities issued and after policy credits, in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

name: StockGrantedDuringPeriodSharesSharebasedCompensation
description: #N/A

name: DemutualizationByInsuranceEntitySecuritiesIssuedPricePerShareOrUnit
description: The share or unit price of securities issued in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

name: DemutualizationCostAndExpense
description: The costs and expenses incurred pertaining to the reorganization process to convert a mutual entity to a stock company.

name: DepositAssetsAmortizatonExpenseFromExpirations
description: Amount of amortization expense from expiration of contracts underlying deposit assets.

name: StockIssued
description: #N/A

name: DepositAssetsEffectOfIncreaseDecreaseInInterestAccrualAssumptionOnExpectedRecoveryAmounts
description: Amount of (increase) decrease in expense due to change in the interest accrual assumption on deposit assets.

name: DepositLiabilitiesEffectOfIncreaseDecreaseInInterestAccrualAssumptionOnExpectedRecoveryAmounts
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in expense due to change in the interest accrual assumption on expected recoveries.

name: DepositLiabilityUninsured
description: Amount of uninsured deposit liability.

name: DepreciationExcludingLessorAssetUnderOperatingLease
description: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of depreciation expense.

name: DerivativeExcludedComponentGainRecognizedInEarnings
description: Amount of gain from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

name: DerivativeSwapTypeVariablePrice
description: Variable price rate related to the price risk swap derivative.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease, classified as current.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForCash
description: #N/A

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForNoncashConsideration
description: #N/A

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterestNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseChangeInPresentValueExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: DirectToTelevisionFilmCostsPreproduction
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the preproduction of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCapitalLeasedAssetsCurrent
description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationPostretirementPlanBenefitObligationCurrent
description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: EarningsPerShareDilutedProFormaAdjustment
description: Pro forma diluted earnings per share adjustment to reconcile between net income and pro forma amounts.

name: EffectsOfCashFlowHedgesNotConsideredInCalculatingCeilingLimitationAmount
description: Amount that would have been charged to income had the effects of the cash flow hedges not been considered in calculating the ceiling limitation at an oil and gas producing company subject to the full cost rules.

name: EntertainmentLicenseAgreementForProgramMaterialLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Amount of obligation incurred for right acquired by broadcaster under license agreement for program material, classified as noncurrent.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockDividend
description: #N/A

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskForeignCurrencyContractAsset
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskInvestmentInFederalHomeLoanBankStock
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskRetainedInterest
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskTradingAccountAssets
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentArbitrageInvestments
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are arbitrage investments for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesOutstandingGreaterThanOneBillionDollarsPerBorrowerPercent
description: Percentage of advances outstanding made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) that are in excess of one billion U.S. dollars per borrower to the total advances outstanding.

name: FeeIncomeOnAcceptancesExecuted
description: Amount of amortization to income from discounts on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsClaimLiabilitySignificantComponentsOfChangeTiming
description: This element represents the amount of the change in the claim liability related to financial guarantee insurance contracts arising from a change in the timing of the claim liability.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan20AndWithin25YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in twenty-first through twenty-fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan25AndWithin30YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in twenty-sixth through thirtieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan30AndWithin35YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in thirty-first through thirty-fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForCash
description: #N/A

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForNoncashConsiderations
description: #N/A

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan20AndWithin25YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in twenty-first through twenty-fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan25AndWithin30YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in twenty-sixth through thirtieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan30AndWithin35YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in thirty-first through thirty-fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYearFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivedOverContractPeriodUnearnedPremiumRevenue
description: Amount of unearned premium revenue in the statement of financial position for financial guarantee insurance contracts where the premium is received over the contract period.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivableAdjustment
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts. Includes, but is not limited to, adjustments due to changes in the period of the contract, accretion of the discount on the premiums receivable, and adjustments classified as other. Excludes new business written and proceeds from premiums.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsRiskManagementActivitiesMitigatingClaimLiabilitiesAccruedLiabilities
description: The amount of expense accrued as of the reporting date related to risk management activities (not including reinsurance) for the mitigating of claim liabilities related to financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedCorporateEquities
description: Fair value of obligations arising from corporate equity sold short.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedMortgagesMortgageBackedAndAssetBackedSecurities
description: Fair value of obligations arising from mortgages, mortgage-backed securities and asset-backed securities sold short.

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedOtherSovereignGovernmentDebt
description: Fair value of obligations arising from foreign government debt obligations short.

name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueSharesHeldInTrustOfEmployeeStockOwnershipPlan
description: #N/A

name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedStateAndMunicipalGovernmentObligations
description: Fair value of obligations arising from state and municipal debt obligations sold short.

name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossMaturityYearOne
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.

name: FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForInvestmentAllowanceForCreditLossExpense
description: Amount of expense for allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-investment classification.

name: FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForInvestmentValuationAllowanceExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense reversal of valuation allowance on financing receivable transferred to held-for-investment classification.

name: ForeignFinancialInstitutionsActualReserveAmount
description: The amount of reserves held by branches of foreign institutions.

name: ForeignFinancialInstitutionsMandatedDeposits
description: The amount of mandated deposits required of branches of foreign institutions.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCurrentMaturitiesOfCapitalLeaseObligations
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current capital lease obligations.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDeferredFinancingCosts
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in debt issuance costs from fresh-start adjustment.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsCurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current deferred income tax assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseFurnitureAndFixtures
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to furniture and fixtures.

name: StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseNonamortizableIntangibleAssets
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to nonamortizable intangible assets.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherPostretirementObligations
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other postretirement obligations.

name: StockRepurchaseProgramPeriodInForce
description: #N/A

name: StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorizedRepurchaseAmount
description: #N/A

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreasePostconfirmationCreditFacility
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to postconfirmation credit facility.

name: FutureMinimumSubleaseRentalsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: GainFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfCashFlowHedgeEffectiveness
description: The gain relating to components of the gain (loss) on the cash flow hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of cash flow hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: GainLossFromHedgedFirmCommitmentNotQualifyingAsForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeNet
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings for the period when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as an foreign currency fair value hedge.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfCreditRiskHedgeEffectiveness
description: Amount of gain (loss) excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness for credit risk hedging instruments.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency fair value hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfPriceRiskFairValueHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on price risk fair value hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: StockholdersEquityAttributableToParentNotAllowableForNetCapital
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnForeignCurrencyFairValueHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the period due to the ineffectiveness on foreign currency fair value hedges.

name: GainLossOnPriceRiskCashFlowHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the period due to ineffectiveness in price risk cash flow hedges.

name: GainLossOnPriceRiskHedgeIneffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the reporting period due to the ineffectiveness on price risk cash flow and fair value hedges.

name: GainLossOnSaleOfTimberProperty
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property used for growing and harvesting trees.

name: StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAdjustedBalance
description: #N/A

name: GainLossOnSaleOfUnprovedProperty
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property without proven oil and gas reserves.

name: StockholdersEquityNotAllowableForNetCapital
description: #N/A

name: GasImbalancePayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage.

name: GasImbalanceVolumeAmount
description: The amount of the gas imbalance in terms of units of measure (Mcf) as of the end of the period.

name: StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversionRatio
description: #N/A

name: GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthorized
description: The number of general partner units authorized to be issued.

name: GeneralPartnersCumulativeNetIncome
description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the general partner based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or any special earnings allocations.

name: HealthCareOrganizationAccountsPayableToThirdPartyPayor
description: Amount payable to third-party payor by health care organization for contractual adjustment and final settlement.

name: HealthCareOrganizationPatientServiceRevenueLessProvisionForBadDebts
description: Amount of patient service revenue, net of contractual allowances and discounts, less the related provision for bad debts.

name: HealthCareOrganizationPatientServiceRevenueProvisionforBadDebts
description: Amount of the provision for bad debts related to patient service revenue.

name: StockholdersEquityQualifiedForNetCapital
description: #N/A

name: HealthCareOrganizationStopLossInsuranceRecoveries
description: Amount of stop-loss insurance recoveries. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYearFairValue
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherFairValueVolatilityRate
description: This item represents the volatility rate related to the fair value of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: StructuredSettlementAnnuitiesInterestRateHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: StructuredSettlementAnnuitiesInterestRateLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherPercentageOfNonperformingAssets
description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareBasic
description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on basic earnings per share.

name: ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareDiluted
description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on diluted earnings per share.

name: SubordinatedBorrowingsAllowableInComputationOfNetCapital
description: #N/A

name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingGeneralPartnershipUnitNetOfTax
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingGeneralPartnershipUnit1
description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

name: IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductionsMedicarePrescriptionDrugBenefitSubsidy
description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfHedgedItemInPriceRiskFairValueHedge1
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings related to the fair value of the hedged item in a price risk fair value hedge, offset by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFossilFuelInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fossil fuel held in inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInRecoverableRefundableGasCosts
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the asset or liability created by a public utility's ability to recover gas costs that are higher or lower than the basic cost included in rate payer calculations.

name: SubscriptionRevenue
description: #N/A

name: SubsequentEventAmount
description: #N/A

name: SubsequentEventAmountHigherRange
description: #N/A

name: SubsequentEventAmountLowerRange
description: #N/A

name: IndefiniteLivedDomesticSlotsAndRoutes
description: Carrying amount, (original cost adjusted for any previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date, of domestic slots, route authorities, airport operating and gate lease rights and related intangibles.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansForeign
description: Interest and fee income generated by commercial and consumer loans, made by foreign branches of the reporting entity, which may include loans to foreign governments, foreign banks and other financial institutions, commercial and industrial entities, and citizens of not domiciled in the same country as the reporting entity.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositDemand
description: Amount of money in interest-bearing foreign accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits. Checking and negotiable order withdrawals (NOW) are the most common forms of demand deposits.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOW
description: Amount of interest-bearing negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: InterestExpenseDepositsFromOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of interest expense on interest-bearing deposits from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesOtherTimeDeposit
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic time deposit liabilities other than certificates of liabilities.

name: InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitiesRetail
description: Amount of interest expense on domestic retail deposit liabilities.

name: SubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvesteePricePerShare
description: #N/A

name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxAdvantaged
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to tax benefits. Excludes operating interest income on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

name: InterestIncomeShortTermInvestmentIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest income on short-term investment.

name: InterestIncomeShortTermInvestmentOther
description: Amount of interest income from short-term investment classified as other.

name: InventoryAmountUnpricedChangeOrdersForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
description: Amount of unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization included in inventory as of the balance sheet date.

name: InventoryForLongTermContractsOrProgramsGeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseIncurred
description: Amount of general and administrative costs charged to inventory.

name: InvestmentCompanyExpenseOffsetArrangement
description: Amount of expense reduction under arrangement in which third party explicitly reduces its fee by specified amount for service provided in exchange for use of investment company's assets.

name: InvestmentOwnedRestrictedCarryingValuePerUnitAtDateOfBalanceSheet
description: The carrying value per unit of investment at date of related balance sheet.

name: InvestmentOwnedSubjectToOptionPrice
description: The option price of the investment that is subject to option.

name: JuniorSubordinatedNotesCurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term debt due within one year or the operating cycle if longer identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

name: LandUnderPurchaseOptionsNotRecorded
description: Discloses the total purchase price of land option agreements that were not recorded.

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersMaximumInterestRateInRange
description: #N/A

name: SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasualtyInsuranceUnderwritersMinimumInterestRateInRange
description: #N/A

name: LessorDirectFinancingLeaseAssumptionsAndJudgmentsValueOfUnderlyingAssetAmount
description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of direct financing lease term.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureInvestmentTaxCreditReceivable
description: This element represents the receivable for the amount of the investment tax credit to be realized on the leveraged lease transaction.

name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureNonrecourseDebtService
description: The portion of rentals receivable applicable to principal and interest on the nonrecourse debt.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseAsbestosObligations
description: The amount of asbestos related liabilities included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseExpenseReversalOfExpenseForLiabilities
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) related to liabilities subject to compromise since the bankruptcy filing date.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseIncreaseDecreaseUnderBankruptcyCourtOrderReclassifications
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to the bankruptcy court orders from reclassifications of liabilities.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromisePaymentsUnderBankruptcyCourtOrderForOtherLiabilities
description: Amount of cash outflow to creditors related to liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to bankruptcy court orders for liabilities classified as other.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitAdverseDevelopmentExpense
description: Amount of expense for adverse development on liability of future policy benefit from net premium exceeding gross premium.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitCurrentWeightedAverageDiscountRate
description: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure liability for future policy benefit.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitExpectedNetPremiumCumulativeIncreaseDecreaseOfActualVarianceFromExpectedExperience
description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in expected net premium component for liability of future policy benefit from effect of variance from cash flow assumption change for actual experience.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitExpectedNetPremiumPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in expected net premium component for liability for future policy benefit.

name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsContractTerminations1
description: Amount of expense reversal for policy expiration or cancellation of long-duration insurance contracts.

name: LiabilityNetForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseFinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContracts
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to financial default insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date) and the amount needed to provide for the estimated ultimate cost required to investigate and settle claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date), whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidAfterYearFive
description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LimitedPartnersCumulativeNetIncome
description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the limited partners based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or special earnings allocations.

name: LiquidationBasisOfAccountingRemeasurementGainLossOnItemsPreviouslyNotRecognized
description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of items not previously recognized expected to be sold in liquidation.

name: LiquidationBasisofAccountingItemsPreviouslyNotRecognized
description: Amount of items not previously recognized that are expected to be sold in liquidation.

name: LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrincipalInYearsTwoAndThree
description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the second and third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LossFromComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfFairValueHedgeEffectiveness
description: Loss relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyAccrualDiscounted
description: Amount of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyClaimsIncurredInPriorPeriods
description: Amount of increase in asserted and unasserted malpractice claims that were originally recognized in a prior period.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyPeriodCost
description: Amount of costs associated with malpractice claims, including costs associated with litigating and settling claims, incurred during an accounting period.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyReturnOfPremiums
description: Amount received during the period representing a return of premiums previously paid, generally under a retrospectively rated policy.

name: MarketRiskBenefitBenefitPayment
description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder from benefit payment for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

name: MarketRiskBenefitIncreaseDecreaseFromEquityMarketChange
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk from change in equity market assumption.

name: MultiemployerPlanCollectiveBargainingArrangementRequiredPercentageOfContributions
description: Percentage of contributions required by collective bargaining arrangement to all contributions required of employer for pension and other postretirement plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: MultiemployerPlanDecreaseInEmployerContributionDivestiturePercentage
description: Percentage decrease in employer contribution to multiemployer plan from divestiture.

name: MultiemployerPlanIncreaseInEmployerContributionBusinessCombinationPercentage
description: Percentage increase in employer contribution to multiemployer plan from business combination.

name: SurveyChargesAmount
description: #N/A

name: MultiemployerPlansAccumulatedBenefitObligation
description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation attributable to the pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: MultiemployerPlansEmployeesIncreaseDecreasePercentage
description: Percentage of increase (decrease) in entity's employees covered by multiemployer plan.

name: NetChangeContractHoldersFunds
description: The cash inflow or outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

name: NetChangeInterestBearingDepositsForeign
description: The increase (decrease) in interest bearing deposits foreign.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseChangeInPresentValueExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

name: TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised
description: #N/A

name: TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: TaxCreditCarryforwardDeferredTaxAsset
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseNonaccrualInterestIncome
description: Amount of interest income on nonaccrual net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFinancialOrEquityInstrumentConsiderationRate
description: Dividend or interest rate associated with the financial or equity instrument issued as noncash or part noncash consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash are transactions that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments. Part noncash refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments.

name: NonconsolidatedLegalEntityFinancialSupportCumulativeAmount
description: Amount of cumulative financial support provided to a nonconsolidated legal entity that is required to comply with or operate in accordance with requirements that are similar to those included in Rule 2a-7 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 for registered money market funds.

name: OciMarketRiskBenefitInstrumentSpecificCreditRiskAdjustmentFromAociForDerecognitionAfterTax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for gain (loss) (AOCI) from (increase) decrease in instrument-specific credit risk on contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk, not recognized in income and used in calculating liability for future policy benefit for payout annuity.

name: OilAndGasJointInterestBillingReceivablesNoncurrent
description: Noncurrent portion of accounts receivable attributable to joint interest partners in oil and gas properties. These are billings to the non-operators associated with the operation of wells and are based on those owners' working interests in the wells.

name: OpenOptionContractsWrittenNumberOfShares
description: The number of shares for the open option contracts written on the investment.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearTwoAndThree
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second and third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OperatingLeasesOfLessorContingentRentalsBasisSpreadOnVariableRate
description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessor's operating lease.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsaleSecuritiesTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQualifyingAsHedgesTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsBeforeTaxNoncontrollingInterest1
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassification for sale and settlement, and amount recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsTaxNoncontrollingInterest1
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassification for sale and settlement, and amount recognized under systematic and rational method.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterReclassificationAdjustmentTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionBeforeTaxAfterReclassificationAdjustmentAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionBeforeTaxAfterReclassificationAdjustmentAttributableToParent
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForInvestmentTransferredFromAvailableForSaleToEquityMethodBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityAdjustmentFromAociForAccretionOfNoncreditPortionOfOttiTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiAfterAdjustmentsTaxAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiAfterTaxAndAdjustmentsAttributableToParent
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityReclassificationAdjustmentFromAociForNoncreditPortionOfOttiSaleTax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized upon sale of investment in held-to-maturity security.

name: OtherNonoperatingAssetRelatedIncome
description: Amount of income related to nonoperating assets, classified as other.

name: OtherRealEstateCoveredDisposals
description: Disposals of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherRealEstateCoveredPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Change in carrying amount of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed. The change includes for example, but is not limited to, additions, improvements, disposals and valuation adjustments.

name: OtherRealEstateNonCoveredAdditions
description: Additions of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherRealEstateNonCoveredPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Change in carrying amount of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed. The change includes for example, but is not limited to, additions, improvements, disposals and valuation adjustments.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAccretionOfNoncreditPortionHeldtomaturitySecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount, before tax, of accretion of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive income loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: TaxEffectOfExtraordinaryItem
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParentHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount after tax of amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToParentHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to the parent entity.

name: TaxesOtherThanIncomeExciseProductionAndPropertyTaxes
description: #N/A

name: TaxesPayable
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsReclassificationAdjustmentOfNoncreditPortionFromHeldtomaturityToAvailableforsaleSecuritiesBeforeTax
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss transferred from held-to-maturity to available-for-sale securities.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementCounterpartyDefaultPeriodOfDefaultExpense
description: The amount of default related expense recognized in earnings in the period in which the entity concludes it is probable that the counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement will default.

name: TechnologyServicesCosts
description: #N/A

name: TechnologyServicesRevenue
description: #N/A

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementDividendsNotReimbursed
description: The amount of dividends paid to holders of record of shares of the entity's stock associated with an own-share lending arrangement in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, which will not be reimbursed by the counterparty (share borrower) to the arrangement.

name: PartnersCapitalAllocatedForIncomeTaxAndOtherWithdrawals
description: Amount of partnership capital allocated for income tax and other withdrawals.

name: PatronageRefunds
description: Amount of earnings distributed to patrons of the agricultural cooperative.

name: PatronageSourceEarnings
description: Amount of revenue in excess of cost resulting from transactions for or with patrons.

name: PaymentsForDelayedTaxExemptExchange
description: Cash outflow related to a property which is traded for the promise to provide a replacement like-kind property in the near future also known as a tax deferred exempt exchange.

name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsForInvestmentInRestrictedCashFromPollutionControlBond
description: The cash outflow for investments in restricted cash from pollution control bond, which is a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: PaymentsForTimeDeposits
description: Cash paid to customers who withdraw money in checking and similar accounts at a financial institution.

name: PaymentsToPurchaseOtherLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans (other than mortgage loans) that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

name: PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepositsToDepositsRetail
description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic retail deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

name: PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedNonsecuritizedInvestments
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of investments which are not evidenced by ownership of securities, such as interests in partnerships or other forms of unincorporated entities, but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparatelyReportedLoansReceivablePledgedForRepurchaseAgreements
description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of repurchase obligations, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

name: PortionOfFutureOilAndGasProductionBeingHedged
description: The quantity of future oil and gas production being hedged.

name: PostconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfCapitalLeaseObligations
description: Amount of current maturities of capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationFurnitureAndFixtures
description: Amount of furniture and fixtures at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationInvestments
description: Amount of investments at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationLeaseholdImprovements
description: Amount of leasehold improvements at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of other long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationReorganizationValueInExcessOfAmountsAllocableToIdentifiableAssets
description: Amount of reorganization value in excess of amounts allocable to identifiable assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: TemporaryEquityRedemptionValue
description: #N/A

name: PostconfirmationShortTermBorrowings
description: Amount of short-term borrowings at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationShortTermInvestments
description: Amount of short-term investments at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationDeferredFinancingCosts
description: Amount of debt issuance costs before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationFurnitureAndFixtures
description: Amount of furniture and fixtures at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationLeaseholdImprovements
description: Amount of leasehold improvements at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationOtherPostretirementObligations
description: Amount of noncurrent other postretirement obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationShortTermBorrowings
description: Amount of short-term borrowings at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsEarnedNetAccidentAndHealth
description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of accident and health premiums earned.

name: PremiumsReceivableProceedsFromSaleOfReceivables
description: The amount of proceeds from the transfer of premium receivables reported as sales by an insurance entity.

name: TenantReimbursements
description: #N/A

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitExperienceAdjustment
description: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized present value of future profit of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAccumulatedAmortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLoss
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsImpairmentWritedown1
description: Amount of impairment loss for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PriceRiskFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities designated as fair value hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsDebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityPreviouslyWrittenOffRecovery
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), previously written off.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterestInSecuritizedReceivablesCategorizedAsAvailableForSale
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of loan receivable measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

name: ProceedsFromDistributionOfRestrictedCashFromPollutionControlBond
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from distributions of restricted cash from pollution control bond, which is a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredTaxExemptDebt
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term tax exempt debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral.

name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredTaxExemptDebt
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.

name: ProceedsFromNuclearFuel
description: Cash inflow resulting from the sale of any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.

name: ProceedsFromRemovalCosts
description: Cash inflow resulting from recoveries, by any means, against the cost of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

name: ProceedsNetInvestmentInLeasePreviouslyWrittenOffRecovery
description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, previously written off.

name: PublicUtilitiesAmountOfAllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionEquityCostsCapitalizedOnlyForRateMakingPurposes
description: Amount of costs of debt and equity financing capitalized for setting rates but not capitalized for financial statement purposes.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentPlantAcquisitionAdjustmentsForIntangibleUtilityPlants
description: Any changes made to the acquisition costs of intangible utility plants.

name: PumpTaxes
description: Pump tax, commonly known as a Replenishment assessment. A charge on each acre-foot of groundwater extracted from the basin. Income from the pump taxes finances the replenishment of the basin and projects for water recycling and water quality improvements.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationAmountOfMaturitiesAndSinkingFundRequirements
description: States the combined aggregate amount of maturities and sinking fund requirements for a long-term unconditional purchase obligation that has been recognized on the balance sheet.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RegistrationPaymentArrangementAccrualCarryingValue
description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability representing the obligation under the registration payment arrangement.

name: RegistrationPaymentArrangementGainsAndLosses
description: The decrease (gain) or increase (loss) in the carrying amount of the registration payment obligation that was recognized in earnings during the period.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueExplorationAndProduction
description: The amount of regulated exploration and production operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: TimberOperatingCosts
description: #N/A

name: TimberRevenue
description: #N/A

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueFieldServices
description: The amount of regulated field services operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RepaymentsOfUnsecuredTaxExemptDebt
description: The cash outflow to repay long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.

name: ResellAgreementsPeriodEndAmountsExcludingEffectsOfAgreementsReportedNetByCounterparty
description: This is the total amount of resale agreements as of the reporting date. This is a gross amount (does not net agreement amounts by counterparty).

name: RestatementOfPriorYearIncomeNetOfTax
description: Resulting effect of restatement to correct an error, after tax effects, on the net income of prior periods for the year in which any adjustments are first made. In statements containing more than one period, discloses the effects for each period.

name: ResultsOfOperationsSalesOrTransfersToEntitysOtherOperations
description: Sales or transfers to the enterprises other operations from oil and gas producing activities.

name: RetailLandSalesDepositMethodPropertyCarryingValue
description: This element represents the carrying value, net of accumulated deprecation, as of the date of the statement of financial position of a property sold during the reporting period, but which sale is accounted for under the deposit method and, therefore, which property continues to be included in the statement of financial position.

name: RetailLandSalesEstimatedCostOfMajorImprovements
description: Estimated cost of expenditure for improvement for each major area from which retail land sale was made during five fiscal years following current fiscal year.

name: RetailLandSalesInstallmentMethodGrossProfitDeferred
description: Amount of deferred gross profit, realized on retail land sale transaction accounted for under the installment method.

name: RetailLandSalesInstallmentMethodSalesValue
description: Amount of sales related to retail land transactions accounted for under the installment method.

name: RevenuesAndGainsReportingCurrencyDenominatedValue
description: The reporting currency-denominated revenue (including gains) amount.

name: SaleLeasebackTransactionCumulativeGainRecognized1
description: Cumulative amount of gain recognized (out of deferred gain) as income or a reduction in rent expense.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type lease, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as noncurrent.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeaseNonaccrual
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease on nonaccrual status.

name: SalesTypeLeaseNetInvestmentInLeasePastDue
description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease, past due.

name: TimeDeposits100000OrMoreDomestic
description: #N/A

name: TimeDeposits100000OrMoreForeign
description: #N/A

name: ScheduleOfInsuredFinancialObligationsWithCreditDeteriorationStatementOfFinancialPositionReinsuranceRecoverable
description: This element represents the amount of reinsurance recoverable, reported on or included in the statement of financial position, related to financial guarantee insurance contracts and presented in the schedule of insured financial obligations with credit deterioration in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Amount of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities borrowed.

name: SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities loaned.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementToResellAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of security purchased under agreement to resell, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellAllowanceForCreditLossRecovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on security purchased under agreement to resell, from recovery.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellCreditLossExpenseReversal
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on security purchased under agreement to resell.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOfOtherThan10Or20PercentAdverseChangeInOtherAssumption
description: The hypothetical financial impact of a specified adverse percentage change in a specified other assumption on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities).

name: SeparateAccountLiabilityCashSurrenderValueAmount
description: Amount of separate account liability payable to policyholder upon surrender of contract before maturity.

name: SeparateAccountLiabilityPremium
description: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability from premium collected from policyholder.

name: SeparateAccountLiabilitySurrenderAndWithdrawal
description: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from contract redemption and withdrawal of funds.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedCostOtherIncreaseDecreaseInObligation
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: TimeShareCosts
description: #N/A

name: TimeShareRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueAdditions
description: Amount of additions from purchases, assumption or transfer to contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenue are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueDisposals
description: Amount conveyed to unrelated parties of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueFairValue1
description: Fair value of the servicing liability that has been amortized.

name: ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTransactionTaxBenefit
description: The amount of income tax expense reduction and deferred tax asset recorded in the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsExcessOfLiabilitiesOverAssets
description: The value of the excess of liabilities over assets. If all outstanding shares are subject to mandatory redemption and the redemption price is more than the book value (the redemption price exceeds the company's equity balance), the resulting cumulative transition adjustment and subsequent adjustments to reflect changes in the redemption price of the shares are recorded as an excess of liabilities over assets.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsNumberOfSharesIndexed
description: For a forward contract or an option indexed to the issuer's equity shares, the number of issuer's shares to which the contract is indexed.

name: SpecialAssessmentBondCurrent
description: The current portion of the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateExistingIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
