description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingExistingUndistributedAccumulatedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiary
description: Amount of undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: TheatricalFilmCostsPreproduction
description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the preproduction of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsDeferredProfit
description: Amount of deferred profit on time share sales.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsDirectWriteOffsChargedAgainstAllowance
description: Amount of decrease in the allowance for uncollectible accounts, for time sharing transactions, from direct write-offs charged against the allowance.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the allowance for uncollectible accounts attributable to time sharing transactions.

name: TradingActivityGain
description: The net gain on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

name: TroubledDebtRestructuringDebtorCurrentPeriodGainLossOnTransferOfAssetsNetOfTax
description: For a debtor, the gain (loss) recognized on the transfer of assets, after the impact of income tax expense or benefit, arising from the difference between the book value of the assets transferred before the restructuring and the fair value of the assets transferred.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsStatedInterestRatesForNotesReceivableMaximum
description: #N/A

name: TimeSharingTransactionsStatedInterestRatesForNotesReceivableMinimum
description: #N/A

name: TimeSharingTransactionsWeightedAverageOfStatedInterestRatesForNotesReceivable1
description: #N/A

name: UnamortizedDiscountsOnAcceptancesResold
description: The amount of the unamortized discount or expense related to the financial institution's sale of short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by the institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances) in the secondary market.

name: UnderlyingDerivativeFlowRate
description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in flow rate but not the derivative contract itself.

name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleNet
description: #N/A

name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

name: UndistributedIncomeFromOtherThanGainOrLossOnSaleOfProperties
description: This element represents the balance as of the reporting date of undistributed income derived from other than the gain (loss) on sale of properties which is otherwise disclosed. The purpose of separately disclosing such information is to distinguish between income generated from the operation of a real estate investment trust's property portfolio and the gain (loss) attributable to the sale of such properties.

name: UndistributedNetRealizedGainOrLossOnSaleOfProperties
description: This element represents the accumulated amount as of the reporting date of undistributed income derived from the gain (loss) on sale of properties which is otherwise disclosed. The purpose of separately disclosing such information is to distinguish between income generated from the gain (loss) attributable to the sale of a real estate investment trust's portfolio properties and the operation of such properties.

name: TradingAccountAssetsFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: UnrealizedLossOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount of unrealized loss related to the decrease in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: TradingActivityGainsAndLossesNet
description: #N/A

name: UnrecoveredProductionCostsExcessUnrecoverableUnderExistingFirmOrders
description: The portion of the aggregate amount of manufacturing or production costs and any related deferred costs (for example, initial tooling costs) that exceeds the aggregate estimated cost of all in-process and delivered units on the basis of the estimated average cost of all units expected to be produced under long-term contracts and programs not yet complete, which would not be absorbed in cost of sales based on existing firm orders at the latest balance sheet date.

name: UnsolicitedTenderOfferCosts
description: Costs incurred in connection with an unsolicited tender offer (one where the Entity being sought has not requested the offer). These would include costs relating to evaluation and dissemination of information regarding an unsolicited tender offer. A tender offer is a broad solicitation by an Entity or a third party to purchase a substantial percentage of another entity's shares or units for a limited period of time. The offer is at a fixed price, usually at a premium over the current market price, and is contingent on shareholders' tendering a fixed number of their shares or units.

name: ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecognizedServicingAssetsSales
description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on sale of the related asset.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsCurrent
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets, classified as current.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsCurrentPledged
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of the VIE, classified as current.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssetsNotPledged
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that do not have to be used to settle obligations of VIE.

name: TradingSecuritiesCurrent
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryingAmountAssetsAndLiabilitiesNet
description: The net carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets and liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

name: VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesNoncurrentNoRecourse
description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that do not have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary, classified as noncurrent.

name: TradingSecuritiesDebtCurrent
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOfTimeDeposits100000OrMoreAfter12Months
description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of greater than twelve months.

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOfTimeDeposits100000OrMoreSixMonthsThrough12Months
description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of six months through twelve months.

name: TradingSecuritiesEquityCurrent
description: #N/A

name: TradingSecuritiesFairValueDisclosure
description: #N/A

name: TradingSecuritiesOther
description: #N/A

name: TradingSecuritiesPledgedAsCollateral
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageInterestRateOfTimeDeposits100000OrMoreThreeMonthsThroughSixMonths
description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of three months through six months.

name: WeightedAverageRateForeignDepositBrokered
description: Weighted average interest rate for brokered deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: WorkersCompensationDiscountPriorYearAmount
description: Prior year monetary amount of the change in worker's compensation reserve liability resulting from the discount applied to reduce the reserve to present value.

name: AccountsReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterestNoncurrent
description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent.

name: TradingSecuritiesShortTermInvestmentsAmortizedCost
description: #N/A

name: AccountsReceivableUnapprovedContractClaimsAmountExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
description: Amount of accounts receivable from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unapproved change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected after one year from the balance sheet date.

name: AdditionalLiabilityLongDurationInsuranceReinsuranceRecoverableAfterAllowance
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, recoverable under reinsurance for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

name: AdvertisingBarterTransactionsAdvertisingBarterCosts
description: Total expense recognized from advertising barter transactions for each income statement presented.

name: TraditionalLifeInterestRateHighEnd
description: #N/A

name: TraditionalLifeInterestRateLowEnd
description: #N/A

name: TransferInvestments
description: #N/A

name: AdvertisingCostsCapitalizedDirectResponseAdvertisingWriteDown
description: The amount of any write-down of capitalized direct response advertising costs to net realizable value which is charged against earnings in the period.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesSharesOutstanding
description: Number of auction market preferred securities shares outstanding.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesPerShareRedemptionAmount
description: The per-share amount at which preferred stock may be called or is subject to redemption through sinking-fund operations or otherwise.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesSharesAuthorized
description: The number of shares of a preferred security the entity has authorized through an auction process.

name: AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSeriesVariableInterestRateEarned
description: The interest (or dividend) rates earned on action market preferred securities (on an annual basis or APY) for the period reported.

name: TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoans
description: #N/A

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherDelinquencyRate
description: This item represents the delinquency rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesTransfersToTradingGrossLosses
description: This item represents the gross amount of losses included in earnings from transfers of securities from the available-for-sale category into the trading category. Such losses represent the unrealized losses included in other comprehensive income associated with the securities transferred from the available-for-sale category to the trading category.

name: TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldForSale
description: #N/A

name: BankruptcyClaimsNumberOfClaimsUnderReviewByManagement
description: The aggregate number of claims under review by the management of the entity.

name: TransferOtherRealEstate
description: #N/A

name: BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedDeferredTaxAssetsCurrent
description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date, classified as current.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassFlightEquipmentGross
description: Gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, subject to a lease and meeting the criteria for capitalization.

name: CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorClassFlightEquipmentNet
description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, subject to a lease and meeting the criteria for capitalization.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodNotAccountedForUsingIncomeRecognitionModelAtAcquisitionAtCarryingValue
description: The recorded value, at the acquisition date, of loans for which the income recognition model was not applied. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities acquired during the period, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferAccountedForAsHeldtomaturityDebtSecuritiesOtherthanTemporaryImpairmentChargesCreditLoss
description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities.

name: CertainLoansAcquiredInTransferNotAccountedForAsDebtSecuritiesAcquiredDuringPeriodNotAccountedForUsingIncomeRecognitionModelAtAcquisition
description: The carrying amount as of the acquisition date of loans to which the income recognition total model was not applied. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer, for which it was deemed probable at acquisition that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments.

name: CoalIndustryRetireeHealthBenefitActOf1992EstimatedAmountOfTotalObligation
description: Amount of obligation for medical and death benefits to be provided under Coal Industry Retiree Health Benefit Act of 1992.

name: CongressionallyMandatedFederalHomeLoanBankAssessments
description: Amount of expense for Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments, for example, but not limited to, Resolution Funding Corporation (REFCORP) assessments.

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeLossGainOnReclassifiedOfEarningsNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: ContinuingCareRetirementCommunitiesAdvanceFeesRefunds
description: The cash paid during the period for refunds related to advance fees. Alternate captions include entrance fees and refundable entrance fees.

name: ContractReceivableDueAfterNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeTaxBenefitExpense
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableDueAfterOneYearHighestInterestRate
description: The highest interest rate charged on contract receivables maturing after one year.

name: ContractReceivableDueAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyLossGainOnReclassifiedOfEarningsNetOfTax
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReportingCurrencyTaxBenefitExpense
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueAfterNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueFiveYearsOrMore
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueFourToFiveYears
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: TreasuryStockNumberOfSharesHeld
description: #N/A

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueOneToTwoYears
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueThreeToFourYears
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractReceivableRetainageDueTwoToThreeYears
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: CooperativeInventoryAmount
description: The carrying amount of members' products at the balance sheet date.

name: CostmethodInvestmentsRealizedLossesExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: For investments in debt and equity securities accounted for at cost, the excess of the carrying amount over net sale proceeds of investments disposed of during the period.

name: CostsInExcessOfBillingsOnUncompletedContractsOrProgramsExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings which is expected to be collected after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: CostsOfFranchisorOwnedOutlets
description: Costs incurred that are directly related to generating franchise revenues from franchisor owned outlets.

name: CreditDerivativeLiquidationProceedsMonetaryAmount
description: Estimated amount to which the maximum potential amount of future payments under the credit derivative would be covered by the proceeds from liquidation of assets held either as collateral or by third parties.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesProceeds
description: Amount of cash inflow from customers for revenue related transactions that are refundable to the customers and do not meet the criteria for revenue recognition.

name: CustomerRefundableFeesRevenueRecognized1
description: Amount of revenue recognized attributable to customer refundable fees.

name: TreasuryStockValueRetiredCostMethod
description: #N/A

name: TreasuryStockValueRetiredParValueMethod
description: #N/A

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossCurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityDerivativeCumulativeLoss
description: Amount of loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityWeightedAverageYield
description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

name: DebtorReorganizationItemsRetireeRelatedCharges
description: Amount of reorganization items related to retiree related charges.

name: DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAndPresentValueOfFutureProfitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: DeferredRevenueLeasesGrossNoncurrent
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of deferred lease income, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

name: DeferredSaleInducementCostExperienceAdjustment
description: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized deferred sale inducement cost.

name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Amount of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

name: DiscontinuedApplicationOfSpecializedAccountingForRegulatedOperations
description: Net effect of discontinued application of the specialized accounting to all or part of its operations; the entity eliminates from its statement of financial position prepared for general-purpose external financial reporting the effects of any actions of regulators that had been recognized as assets and liabilities pursuant to that specialized accounting but would not have been recognized as assets and liabilities by entities in general except for carrying amounts of plant, equipment, and inventory measured and reported pursuant to that specialized accounting unless those assets are impaired, in which case the carrying amounts of those assets is reduced to reflect that impairment. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxAssetCurrent
description: Amount classified as deferred tax assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationDeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: Amount classified as deferred tax liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationFeesAndUnamortizedDiscountsOrPremiumsCommercial
description: #N/A

name: UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationFeesAndUnamortizedDiscountsOrPremiumsConsumer
description: #N/A

name: UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationFeesAndUnamortizedDiscountsOrPremiumsOther
description: #N/A

name: EstimateOfCancellations
description: Estimates of cancellations for refundable service fees, if accounted for by analogy to FASB Statement No. 48.

name: FDICIndemnificationAssetDisposals
description: Amount of decreases to the indemnification asset due to disposals relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskEquityMethodInvestments
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskGuarantees
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueConcentrationOfRiskPremiumsReceivable
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentCurrencies
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are currencies for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentDomesticEquitySecurities
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are domestic equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePercentForeignEquitySecurities
description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are foreign equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

name: FairValueInvestmentsEntitiesThatCalculateNetAssetValuePerSharePlannedSaleInvestmentsNotIdentifiedNumber
description: The total number of all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell 10 of its investments in hedge funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeFloatingRateOneToFiveYears
description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FeesPaidOnAcceptancesResold
description: Represents the amortization to expense from discounts on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances) which have been resold in the secondary market.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsFutureExpectedPremiumRevenueToBeRecognizedMoreThan35AndWithin40YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in thirty-sixth through fortieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumExpectedToBeCollectedMoreThan35AndWithin40YearsFromBalanceSheetDate
description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in thirty-sixth through fortieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumReceivedOverContractPeriodPremiumReceivableAccretion
description: The amount of accretion on premium receivable in the statement of income for financial guarantee insurance contracts where premium is received over the contract period.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsPremiumsReceivablePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancialGuaranteeInsuranceContractsRiskManagementActivitiesMitigatingClaimLiabilitiesExpense
description: The amount of expense recognized during the period related to risk management activities (not including reinsurance) for the mitigating of claim liabilities related to financial guarantee insurance contracts.

name: FinancingReceivablesBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivables.

name: ForeignFinancialInstitutionsMandatedReserveAmount
description: The mandated reserve amounts required of branches of foreign institutions.

name: FrequentFlierLiabilityCurrent
description: Value of revenue deferred or cost to provide future products or services, primarily air transportation, associated with programs used by airlines to encourage passenger loyalty by providing rewards geared to the frequency of travel on the sponsoring airline, typically in the form of frequent flyer miles, points, or segments that can be accumulated and converted into free or discounted travel or other redemption options. Used to reflect the current portion of the liability (within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

name: FrequentFlierLiabilityNoncurrent
description: Value of revenue deferred or cost to provide future products or services, primarily air transportation, associated with programs used by airlines to encourage passenger loyalty by providing rewards geared to the frequency of travel on the sponsoring airline, typically in the form of frequent flyer miles, points, or segments that can be accumulated and converted into free or discounted travel or other redemption options. Used to reflect the noncurrent portion of the liability.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseCapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent capital lease obligations.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseOtherLongTermDebt
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other long-term debt.

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseReorganizationValueInExcessOfAmountsAllocableToIdentifiableAssets
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to reorganization value in excess of amounts allocable to identifiable assets (generally due to the revaluation of assets and liabilities).

name: FreshStartAdjustmentIncreaseDecreaseRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents.

name: GainFromHedgedFirmCommitmentNotQualifyingAsFairValueHedge
description: Amount of gain recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

name: GainLossOnComponentsExcludedFromAssessmentOfPriceRiskHedgeEffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on price risk hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

name: GainLossOnDiscontinuationOfPriceRiskCashFlowHedgeDueToForecastedTransactionProbableOfNotOccurringNet
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when price risk cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

name: GasPurchasePayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for purchases of natural gas.

name: UndistributedEarningsAllocatedToParticipatingSecurities
description: #N/A

name: GrandfatheredESOPExpenseRecognitionActualInterestIncurredOnESOPDebt
description: For grandfathered ESOP shares acquired prior to January 1, 1993, the actual interest incurred on debt for obligations that the employer may secure on behalf of the ESOP.

name: GrandfatheredESOPExpenseRecognitionCashContributionsToESOP
description: For grandfathered ESOP shares acquired prior to January 1, 1993, the amount of cash contributions made to the ESOP.

name: GrandfatheredESOPExpenseRecognitionDividendsUsedByESOPForDebtService
description: For grandfathered ESOP shares acquired prior to January 1, 1993, the amount of ESOP dividends used to pay debt service by the sop.

name: HealthCareOrganizationAccountsReceivableDueFromThirdPartyPayorRetroactiveAdjustment
description: Amount of receivable from retroactive adjustment for final settlement or appeal due from third-party payor.

name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLossPositionsQualitativeDisclosureOtherDefaultRate
description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesSoldAtPar
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with interest rate reset through auction process, sold at par value.

name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTradingSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

name: ImpairmentEffectOnEarningsPerSharePretax
description: Pretax earnings per share or per unit impact arising from asset impairment.

name: ImpairmentExcludingLessorAssetUnderOperatingLease
description: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of impairment for long-lived asset held for use.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInAirTrafficLiability1
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue related to tickets sold but not yet recognized as revenue.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredAirTrafficRevenue
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue related to tickets sold but not yet recognized as revenue and the estimated incremental cost for points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInDepositsFromOtherFederalHomeLoanBanks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest-bearing deposits from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

name: IncreaseDecreaseInEnergyTradingActivity
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of long term assets generated by energy trading activities, which involve the purchase and sale of energy under forward contracts at fixed and variable prices and the buying and selling of financial energy contracts which include exchange futures and options and over the counter options and swaps.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInFrequentFlyerLiability
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue related to the estimated incremental cost for points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherFossilFuelInventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fossil fuel, other than coal, held in inventory.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherTimeDeposits
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in time deposits classified as other.

name: UnitsOfPartnershipInterestChangesInAmount
description: #N/A

name: IncreaseDecreaseInPneumoconiosisBenefitObligationsNoncurrent
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to fund payment obligations to former employees suffering from pneumoconiosis.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInProductionParticipationPlanLiability
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in obligations arising from employee benefits that are based on cash flows generated by interests in oil and gas properties acquired or developed during the year.

name: IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDepositsOf100000OrMore
description: The increase (decrease) in time deposits equal to or greater than $100,000 per account.

name: IndefiniteLivedInternationalSlotsAndRoutes
description: Carrying amount, (original cost adjusted for any previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date, of international slots, route authorities, airport operating and gate lease rights and related intangibles.

name: IndefiniteLivedSlotsAndRoutes
description: Carrying amount, (original cost adjusted for any previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date, of slots, route authorities, airport operating and gate lease rights and related intangibles.

name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumerHomeEquity
description: Interest and fee income from home equity lines-of-credit extended to individuals (borrowers). Such loans are generally secured by the borrower's equity in her or his home.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositBrokered
description: Amount of interest-bearing foreign third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositCertificatesOfDeposits
description: Amount of interest-bearing certificates of deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnInterestRateCashFlowHedgesPretaxAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: #N/A

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositRetail
description: Amount of interest-bearing retail deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: InterestBearingForeignDepositSavings
description: Amount of interest-bearing savings deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

name: InterimPeriodCostsNotAllocableAmountFirstItem
description: The amount of the cost or expense incurred during an interim period that cannot be readily identified with the activities or benefits of other interim periods and are charged to the interim period in which incurred.

name: IntermediateLifePlantsAccumulatedCosts
description: The amount of accumulated costs related to intermediate-life plants.

name: InvestmentOwnedLoanedForShortSalesAtFairValue
description: The aggregate value of investments loaned for short sales. This is not required to be disclosed under Regulation S-X but is commonly reported by Funds.

name: InvestmentOwnedUnrestrictedCarryingValuePerUnitAtDateOfPurchasePriceAgreement
description: The carrying value per unit of investment of unrestricted investment of the same issue as the restricted investment during the preceding year at the date the purchase price was agreed.

name: InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedRestrictedCost
description: The cost of the restricted investment.

name: InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesDividendOrInterestOther
description: All other dividends and interest. Explain in the "Schedule of Investments, Investment Notes" the treatment accorded each item.

name: JapaneseWelfarePensionInsuranceLawGovernmentSubsidies
description: Amount of subsidy from transfer of employee pension fund liability to Japanese government.

name: JapaneseWelfarePensionInsuranceLawPreviouslyAccruedSalaryProgressionDerecognition
description: Amount of derecognition of previously accrued salary progression.

name: JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrustCurrent
description: The current portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

name: LessorOperatingLeaseIndemnificationPaymentReceived
description: Amount received for indemnification payment for tax effect other than investment tax credit for operating lease.

name: LeveragedLeasesIncomeStatementInvestmentTaxCreditRecognizedOnLeveragedLeases
description: Amount of investment tax credit recognized as income.

name: LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquityAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing liabilities and stockholders' equity.

name: LiabilitiesAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing liabilities.

name: LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseRetainedObligationOfDivestedBusinesses
description: The amount of retained obligations related to divested businesses included in liabilities subject to compromise.

name: LiabilityPremiumDeficiencyTestingOnLongDurationContractAnticipatedInvestmentIncomeAmount
description: Amount of anticipated investment income considered when performing premium deficiency testing on long-duration insurance contract issued by insurance entity.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearFive
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearFour
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearThree
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearTwo
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingAfterRollingYearFive
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInYearFive
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInYearFour
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOperatingLossCarryforward
description: #N/A

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInYearThree
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodCarryingAmountMaturingInYearTwo
description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingAfterRollingYearFive
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingAfterYearFive
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearFive
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearFour
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearThree
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInRollingYearTwo
description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearFive
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearFour
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearThree
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodFaceValueMaturingInYearTwo
description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingAfterRollingYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingAfterYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInNextTwelveMonths
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInRollingYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInRollingYearFour
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInRollingYearThree
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInRollingYearTwo
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearFive
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearFour
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearThree
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodNumberOfContractsMaturingInYearTwo
description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodPremiumsToBePaidInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemFourthQuarter
description: #N/A

name: LoansReceivableHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of increase (decrease) in loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemGross
description: #N/A

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemGross1
description: #N/A

name: LongtermTransitionBondCurrent
description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current portion.

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueAfterFifthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueInFifthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueInFourthYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: UseOfRestrictedCashForAcquisitionOfOilAndGasProperty
description: #N/A

name: UtilitiesCosts
description: #N/A

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueInSecondYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueInThirdYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: LossContingencyAccrualProductLiabilityUndiscountedDueWithinOneYear
description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyNumberOfClaims
description: Number of malpractice claims outstanding at the end of the accounting period.

name: MalpracticeLossContingencyPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: The increase (decrease) in the accrued liability for malpractice claims during an accounting period.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingAfterYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearFive
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearFour
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearThree
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsDueInRollingYearTwo
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsSaleLeasebackTransactionsNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: MortgageLoansOnRealEstateIntercompanyProfitsInCarryingAmountOfLoans
description: Amount of intercompany profit included in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

name: MultiemployerPlansCollectiveBargainingArrangementPercentageOfEmployersParticipants
description: Percentage of employee participants subject to a collective bargaining arrangement to all of the employer's participants in a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: MultiemployerPlansPlanAssets
description: Amount of plan assets attributable to the pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

name: UtilityRevenue
description: #N/A

name: ValuationAllowanceAmount
description: #N/A

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossWriteoff
description: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, charged against allowance for credit loss.

name: NetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

name: NoninterestEarningLiabilitiesAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of noninterest-bearing liabilities.

name: ObligationWithJointAndSeveralLiabilityArrangementAmountReceivable
description: Amount of receivable from other entities recognized in the balance sheet resulting from the joint and several liability arrangement.

name: OilAndGasProducingPropertiesOfRateRegulatedCompaniesProvedAndUnprovedReserves
description: The quantity of proved and unproved reserves related to properties subject to cost-of-service ratemaking.

name: OilAndGasSalesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to third parties for oil and gas that has been sold but not delivered.

name: OpenOptionContractsWrittenNumberOfContracts
description: The number of contracts written for the open option contracts written on the investment.

name: OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInRollingYearFourAndFive
description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth and fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: OptionContractIndexedToEquitySettlementNumberOfSharesEffectOfChangeInFairValueOfShare
description: Increase (decrease) in number of shares that would be issued upon settlement from change in fair value of share for option contract indexed to equity.

name: OptionContractIndexedToEquitySettlementShareFairValue
description: Fair value of shares that would be issued upon settlement of option contract indexed to equity.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPlansTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLiabilityFairValueOptionAfterReclassificationAdjustmentTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherComprehensiveLossHeldToMaturitySecurityOttiAfterAdjustmentsTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherDeferredCreditsNoncurrent
description: Amount of unearned revenue or income classified as other, expected to be taken into income after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsCumulativeCashDistributions
description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsCumulativeNetIncome
description: The amount of aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: OtherOwnershipInterestsUnitsAuthorized
description: The number of units of other ownership interest authorized to be issued in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

name: OtherRealEstateCoveredAdditions
description: Additions of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherRealEstateCoveredImprovements
description: Improvements made to other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherRealEstateNonCoveredImprovements
description: Improvements made to other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAvailableforsaleSecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresDefaultRate
description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and the amount of such impairment determined to be related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAvailableforsaleSecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresDelinquencyRate
description: This item represents the delinquency rates of the underlying assets in the security that was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and measure the amount of impairment related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

name: ValueOfPropertiesOtherThanThatAttributableToProvedReserves
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestCarryingAmount
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestCarryingAmountAssets
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestCarryingAmountLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsAvailableforsaleSecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresThirdPartyGuaranteesAmount
description: Amount of third party guarantees against loss of value in the underlying assets of an available-for-sale security for which only the portion of an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) related to a credit loss was recognized in earnings.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsHeldtomaturitySecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresLoanToCollateralValue
description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.
