name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsHeldtomaturitySecuritiesPortionRecognizedInEarningsNetQualitativeDisclosuresPercentageOfNonperformingAssets
description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: VariableInterestEntityCarryingAmountOfCollateralizedAssets
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityCarryingAmountOfCollateralizedAssetsUnconsolidatedVIE
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityCarryingAmountOfCollateralizedLiabilitiesUnconsolidatedVIE
description: #N/A

name: VariableInterestEntityCarryingAmountOfLiabilitiesConsolidatedVIE
description: #N/A

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestHeldtomaturitySecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive income loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvestmentsPortionInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestAvailableforsaleSecurities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementCollateral
description: The amount of collateral required to be received or received by the entity from the counterparty (share borrower) in connection with an own-share lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

name: OwnshareLendingArrangementCounterpartyDefaultEarningsPerShareShares
description: In periods in which default, by a counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement, is probable, but has not yet occurred, this item represents the number of the entity's shares related to the share-lending arrangement that will be reflected in basic and diluted earnings per share when the counterparty (share borrower) default does occur.

name: PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestmentCreditCardSecuritizations
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of securitized credit card receivables which are held for investment purposes. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

name: PostconfirmationCapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PostconfirmationPropertyUnderCapitalLeaseArrangements
description: Amount of property under capital lease at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent
description: Amount of noncurrent capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationCurrentMaturitiesOfCapitalLeaseObligations
description: Amount of current maturities of capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PreconfirmationPropertyUnderCapitalLeaseArrangements
description: Amount of property under capital lease at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

name: PremiumsReceivableGainLossOnSaleOfReceivables
description: The aggregate amount of gains or losses on transfers of premium receivables reported as sales by an insurance entity.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnrealizedInvestmentGains1
description: Amount of unrealized investment gain which decreases present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnrealizedInvestmentLosses1
description: Amount of unrealized investment loss which increases present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

name: PriceRiskDerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedgingInstrumentsAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

name: PriceRiskFairValueHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfOtherLoansHeldForSale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes loans that are not mortgages.

name: ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterestInSecuritizedReceivablesCategorizedAsHeldToMaturity
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of loan receivable measured at amortized cost.

name: ProceedsFromDepositsAppliedToDebtRetirements
description: Cash inflow received during the period as a deposit on account for application (deposits to retire or pay down) against an amount of debt owed to the entity.

name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfPollutionControlBond
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from a long-term debt instrument issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities, sewage, or solid waste disposal facilities.

name: ProceedsFromSaleOfWaterSystems
description: The cash inflow from sale of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities.

name: VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedComparisonOfCarryingAmountOfAssetsAndLiabilitiesToMaximumLossExposureExplanationQuantitativeInformationAdvantageous
description: #N/A

name: ProductiveOilWellsNumberOfWellsWithMultipleCompletionsGross
description: Number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production with multiple completions, with working interest ownership.

name: ProductiveOilWellsNumberOfWellsWithMultipleCompletionsNet
description: Number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production with multiple completions, representing summation of fractional ownership working interest to whole.

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAmortizationOfPresentValueOfRegulatedAssetForPlantAbandonment
description: Amortization of the present value amount of future cost recoveries related to plant abandonment in regulated industries.

name: VariableInterestMaximumExposureToLoss
description: #N/A

name: PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentOriginalCostOfIntangibleUtilityPlants
description: Original cost of establishing intangible utility plants.

name: QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyChargesAndCreditsAmountReconcilingToPreviouslyReportedResults
description: Amount by which previously reported quarterly results were revised (for example, to correct an error, or to give retrospective effect to a change in an accounting principle).

name: RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleSubsidiary
description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or resale by subsidiary entities which hold such assets in the course of business.

name: VehicleTollRevenue
description: #N/A

name: RefundsDueUnderGovernmentContracts
description: Amount of renegotiation refunds which have been determined to be probable and reasonably estimated at the balance sheet date.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueFossilFuel
description: The amount of regulated fossil fuel operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RegulatedOperatingRevenueSteam
description: The amount of regulated steam operating revenues recognized during the period.

name: RestatementOfPriorYearIncomeGross
description: Resulting effect of restatement to correct an error, before tax effects, on the net income of prior periods for the year in which any adjustments are first made. In statements containing more than one period, discloses the effects for each period.

name: RestatementOfPriorYearIncomeTaxEffects
description: The tax effect of the restatement to correct an error in net income of prior periods for the year in which any adjustments are first made. In statements containing more than one period, disclose the effects for each period.

name: RestrictedInvestmentsNotExemptFromRegistrationAtFairValue
description: The aggregate value of all restricted investments which are not exempt from registration pursuant to Rule 144A.

name: RetailLandSalesInstallmentMethodTotalCostOfSale
description: Cost of sales related to retail land sales transactions accounted for under the installment method.

name: RetailLandSalesLiabilityForImprovements
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability for the obligation to provide retail land sale buyers with improvements.

name: RetailLandSalesMaturityOfAccountsReceivableYearTwo
description: Amount of accounts receivable from retail land sale to be collected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

name: Retains
description: Amount of patronage earnings withheld by agricultural cooperatives from distributions and allocated to patrons' capital accounts.

name: RetentionPayableDueAfterOneYear
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: WeightedAverageDiscountRatePercent
description: #N/A

name: RetentionPayableDueFiveYearsOrMore
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RetentionPayableDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RetentionPayableDueInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RetentionPayableDueOneToTwoYears
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RetentionPayableDueOneYearOrLess
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RetentionPayableDueTwoToThreeYears
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: RevenueRecognitionMultipleDeliverableArrangementsDeterminationOfSellingPriceAmount
description: Represents the value established as the selling price of the significant unit of accounting used to allocate the consideration of the multiple-deliverable arrangement.

name: SecuredDebtDollarRolls
description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of an agreement to sell a mortgage-backed security with an agreement to purchase a similar mortgage-backed security at a future date.

name: SecuritiesBorrowedIncrease
description: Amount of increase in security borrowed from entering into new transaction.

name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities purchased under agreements to resell.

name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangementDeduction
description: Amount of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities sold under agreements to repurchase.

name: SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorServicingAssetsOrLiabilitiesImpactOfOtherThan10Or20PercentAdverseChangeInOtherAssumptionPercent
description: A specified percentage variance in a specified key assumption in the determination of fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities).

name: SeparateAccountLiabilityPolicyCharge
description: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from policy charge.

name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValuePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

name: SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettlementTermsExcessOfAssetsOverLiabilities
description: The value of the excess of assets over liabilities. If all outstanding shares are subject to mandatory redemption and the redemption price is less than the book value (the redemption price is less than the company's equity balance), the resulting cumulative transition adjustment and subsequent adjustments to reflect changes in the redemption price of the shares are recorded as an excess of assets over liabilities (equity).

name: SignificantChangesFrachisorOutletsInOperation
description: The number of franchisor-owned outlets in operation at the balance sheet date when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryToGAAPAmountOfReconcilingItem
description: The amount of the specified reconciling item as of the balance sheet date reconciling the financial statements which use generally accepted accounting principles and the statutory financial statements which use statutory accounting practices prescribed or permitted by the state or country in which the filing is made.

name: StockholdersEquityAverageAmountOutstanding
description: Average amount outstanding of stockholders' equity.

name: SubordinatedLiabilitiesExtinguished
description: Liabilities that are subordinated to claims of general creditors and were paid or extinguished during the reporting period.

name: SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsContinuationOfHealthCare
description: Liability for extension of health coverage in instances where coverage under the plan would otherwise end.

name: WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstandingBasicAndDiluted
description: #N/A

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingChangeInTaxRateDeferredTaxAssetExistingIncomeTaxExpense
description: Amount of income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingDeferredTaxLiabilitiesProvisionalUndistributedForeignEarnings
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of subsidiary and other recognized entity not within country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, other basis differences.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingExistingIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingProvisionalCumulativeTemporaryDifference
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for cumulative temporary difference related to foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Temporary differences include, but are not limited to, undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary not subject to transition tax and other basis differences.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingProvisionalUndistributedAccumulatedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiary
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary subject to transition tax for which accounting is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

name: TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccountingUndistributedAccumulatedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiaryProvisionalUnrecognizedDeferredTaxLiability
description: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability not recognized for temporary differences related to foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Temporary differences include, but are not limited to, undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary not subject to transition tax and other basis difference.

name: TimeDepositLiabilityAboveUsInsuranceLimit
description: Amount of uninsured time deposit liability in excess of Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit or similar state deposit insurance regime in United States of America (US). Excludes time deposit that is otherwise uninsured.

name: TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateMaturitiesGreaterThanOneYear
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than one year.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsAllowanceForUncollectibleAccountsOnReceivablesSoldWithRecourse
description: Allowance for uncollectible accounts on receivables sold with recourse at the end of the period.

name: TimeSharingTransactionsAllowanceForUncollectibleAccountsOnReceivablesSoldWithRecoursePeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the allowance for uncollectible accounts for time sharing transactions attributable to receivables sold with recourse.

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowAdditionsToHeldForSale
description: Amount of additions to trade receivables held-for-sale, after allowance for bad debt, that are not part of a disposal group.

name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowPeriodIncreaseDecrease
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in trade receivables held-for-sale, after allowance for bad debt, that are not part of a disposal group.

name: TroubledDebtRestructuringDebtorCurrentPeriodGainLossOnRestructuringTaxEffect
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) on the gain (loss) recognized for the restructuring of payables for troubled debt restructurings.

name: UnbilledChangeOrders
description: Total amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization.

name: UnbilledChangeOrdersAmountExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
description: Amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected after one year from the balance sheet date.

name: WeightedAverageRateForeignDepositCertificatesOfDeposit
description: #N/A

name: UnbilledChangeOrdersAmountExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
description: Amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected within one year from the balance sheet date.

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAmountExpectedToBeCollectedAfterNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: WellServiceExpense
description: #N/A

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAmountExpectedToBeCollectedInNextRollingTwelveMonths
description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAmountExpectedToBeCollectedInRemainderOfFiscalYear
description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnbilledReceivablesNotBillableAtBalanceSheetDateAmountExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

name: UnrealizedGainLossOnPriceRiskFairValueHedgingInstruments
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of price risk derivatives instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

name: UnrealizedGainOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax
description: Amount of unrealized gain from the increase in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

name: UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationChangeOfAmountAsResultOfVariableComponents
description: Amount of change that payments under a contractual obligation might vary as facts and circumstances change.

name: WorkersCompensationLiability
description: #N/A

name: UnusualOrInfrequentItemEarningsPerShareImpactGross
description: Per share amount of earnings, before tax, of an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

name: WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositOtherTimeDeposit
description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic time deposit liabilities other than certificates of deposit.

name: WeightedAverageRateForeignDepositTimeDeposit
description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposit in foreign banking offices.

name: WellsTemporarilySuspended
description: Number of oil and gas wells temporarily suspended.

name: WriteOffOfInventory
description: #N/A
